translated: Kunis al-kallattiin kan deeggare SARS dabalataa erga civets gabaa keessatti argaman hunda ajjeesee booda gabaafamuu dhabuu isaati.

sourceString: However, it has been reported that masked palm civets from the wild or farms without exposure to the live animal markets were largely negative for SARS-CoV, suggesting that masked palm civets might only serve as the intermediate amplifying host but not the natural reservoir of SARS-CoV.
targetString: Haa ta’u malee, bineensi siiveetiin osoo gabaatti bahuu dhabaate SARS-CoV’f nagatiivii ture, siiveetiin SARS-CoV’f gargaaraa yerooti malee haguuga uumamaa akka hin taane himama.
translated: Haa ta’u malee, civets meexxii haguuggii godhatan bosona ykn qonna gabaa bineensota lubbuu qabaniif hin saaxilamne irraa baay’inaan SARS-CoV irratti negaatiivii akka ta’an gabaafameera, kunis civets meexxii haguuggii godhatan akka keessummeessituu guddiftuu gidduugaleessaa qofa tajaajiluu akka danda’an malee kuusa uumamaa SARS akka hin taane agarsiisa -CoV.

sourceString: Notably, since 80% of the different animals in the markets in Guangzhou have anti-SARS-CoV antibodies, the possibilities that multiple species of small mammals might also serve as intermediate amplifying hosts of SARS-CoV cannot be excluded.
targetString: Waanti beekamaan, bineenldota garaagaraa gabaa Guwanzyowuu keessaa 80%n dandeettii dandamattummaa yoo qabaatan, carraan ta’umsaa sanyiin hoosistoota xixiqqoos akka dabaltoo baattoo giddu-galeessaa SARS-CoVtti tajaajiluu maluun isaanii hammatamuu dhiisuu hin danda’u.
translated: Kan hubatamuu qabu, bineensonni adda addaa gabaa Guangzhou keessa jiran keessaa %80 farra qaama farra SARS-CoV waan qabaniif, carraan gosootni hoosistoota xixiqqoo dachaa akka keessummeessitoota SARS-CoV guddisan gidduugaleessaatti tajaajiluu danda’anis hambifamuu hin danda’u.

sourceString: All of these appear to be dead-end hosts of SARS-CoV.
targetString: Kun hundumtuu kan agarsiisutti baattuu dhumaa SARS-CoV ta’uudha.
translated: Kun hundinuu keessummeessitoota SARS-CoV kan du’aa ta’anii mul’atu.

sourceString: Subsequent search for the natural animal host of SARS-CoV unveiled a closely related bat CoV, termed SARS-related Rhinolophus bat CoV HKU3 (SARSr-Rh-BatCoV HKU3), which exists in Chinese horseshoe bats.
targetString: Barbaachi itti aansee bineensa uumamaa golga SARS-CoV’tiif CoV simbira halkanii ta’uu ifa bahe, raayinoolopasii simbira halkanii CoV HKU3 (SARSr-Rh-BatCoV HKU3) SARS’tti dhihaatu, kan argamu kephee fardaa Chaayinaa keessatti.
translated: Barbaacha booda keessummeessituu bineensota uumamaa SARS-CoV irratti godhame, CoV battee walitti dhiyeenyaan walqabatu, SARS-related Rhinolophus bat CoV HKU3 (SARSr-Rh-BatCoV HKU3) jedhamuun kan waamamu yoo ta’u, kunis battee fardaa Chaayinaa keessatti argama.

sourceString: These bats are positive for anti-SARS-CoV antibodies and genome sequence of SARSr-Rh-BatCoV HKU3.
targetString: Simbiroonni halkanii kunneen farra dhibee farra-SARS-CoV’tii fi tartiiba jiinii SARSr-Rh-BatCoV HKU3’tiif pozitiiviidha.
translated: Baattoonni kun farra qaama farra SARS-CoV fi tartiiba jiinoomii SARSr-Rh-BatCoV HKU3 irratti pozaatiivii dha.

sourceString: This and other bat CoVs share 88-92% nucleotide sequence homology with SARS-CoV.
targetString: Kunii fi simbira halkanii biroon CoVs, nuukilootaayidii firoomaa 88-92% SARS-CoV waliin qooddatu.
translated: Kun fi CoVn battee biroo SARS-CoV waliin walfakkeenya tartiiba niwuukilootaayidii %88-92 qooddatu.

sourceString: These studies have laid the foundation for the new concept that bats host emerging human pathogens.
targetString: simbiroonni halkanii wantoota dhala namaatti dhukkuba fiduu danda’an akka qabdu qorannoowwan kunneen bu’uura kaa’anii jiru.
translated: Qorannoowwan kunneen yaada haaraa battee paatojeenoota namaa uumaman keessummeessuu jedhuuf bu'uura kaa'aniiru.

sourceString: Several SARS-like CoVs (SL-CoVs) have also been identified from bats, but none except for one designated WIV1 can be isolated as live virus.
targetString: SARS’wwan baayyeen kanneen akka CoVs (SL-CoVs)’s simbira halkanii irraa adda ba’aniiru, garuu qindeeffama WIV1 tokko irraan kan hafe akka vaayirasii jiruutti adda ba’u.
translated: CoVn SARS fakkaatu (SL-CoV) hedduunis battee irraa adda baafamaniiru, garuu WIV1 tokko jedhamee moggaafame malee tokkollee akka vaayirasii lubbuu qabuutti adda baafamuu hin danda'u.

sourceString: Human angiotensin converting enzyme 2 (ACE2) is known to be the receptor of SARS-CoV.
targetString: Angiotensin converting enzyme 2 (ACE2)’n namaa jedhamee kan beekamu SARS-CoV fudhata.
translated: Inzaayimiin anjiyooteensinii namaa jijjiiru 2 (ACE2) fudhataa SARS-CoV ta’uun isaa beekamaadha.

sourceString: WIV1 derived from fecal sample of bats was demonstrated to use bat, civet and human ACE2 as receptor for cell entry.
targetString: WIV1 fuula simbiroota halkanii irraa fudhatamu simbira halkanii, siiveetii fi ACE2 dhala namaa akka qabuu seeliitti fayyadama.
translated: WIV1 saamuda manca’aa battee irraa argame battee, civet fi ACE2 namaa akka fudhataa seelota seenuuf akka fayyadamu agarsiifameera.

sourceString: Intriguingly, sera of convalescent SARS patients were capable of neutralizing WIV1.
targetString: Bifa gamachiisaan, dandamannaan dhukkubsattoota dhibee SARS, WIV1 himbaabsessuu danda’a.
translated: Kan nama ajaa'ibu, seeramoonni dhukkubsattoota SARS fayyaa ta'anii WIV1 jiddugaleessa gochuu danda'aniiru.

sourceString: Thus far, WIV1 represents the most closely related ancestor of SARS-CoV in bats, sharing 95% nucleotide sequence homology.
targetString: Haala ilaalame kanaan, WIV1 hangafa SARS-CoV simbira halkanii keessatti walitti siqeenyaan bakka bu’a, tarreeffama firoomaa nuukilootaayidii 95% qooddachuun.
translated: Hanga ammaatti, WIV1 akaakayyuu SARS-CoV battee keessatti baay’ee walitti dhiyeenyaan kan walqabatu bakka bu’a, %95 homology tartiiba niwuukilootaayidii qooddata.

sourceString: Albeit the high homology between these two viruses, it is generally believed that WIV1 is not the immediate parental virus of SARS-CoV and bats are not the immediate reservoir host of SARS-CoV.
targetString: Firoommiin viiyirasiiwwan lamman gidduu olaanaa yoo ta’ellee, walumaagalatti WIV1n maatii vaayirasii battalaa baattoo SARS-CoV akka ta’eefi simbirri halkanii baattoo tirsiistuu battalaa SARS-CoV akka hin taanetu amanama.
translated: Vaayirasoota kana lamaan gidduutti walfakkeenyi olaanaan jiraatus, akka waliigalaatti WIV1 vaayirasii warraa battalaa SARS-CoV akka hin taanee fi batteen keessummeessituu kuufama battalaa SARS-CoV akka hin taane ni amanama.

sourceString: Phylogenetic analysis clusters MERS-CoV to the same group as bat CoV-HKU4 and bat CoV-HKU5.
targetString: Walitti qabamni jiinii MERS-CoV kan simbira halkanii CoV-HKU4 fi simbira halkanii CoV-HKU5 waliin garee wal-fakkaataadha.
translated: Xiinxalli faayiloojenetikii MERS-CoV garee bat CoV-HKU4 fi bat CoV-HKU5 waliin garee tokkotti tuuta.

sourceString: Bat CoV-HKU4 and MERS-CoV utilize the same host receptor, dipeptidyl peptidase 4 (DPP4), for virus entry.
targetString: Qabduun CoV-HKU4 fi MERS-CoV fudhattuu keessummeessaa walfakkaataa fayyadama, peeptiidesii daayipeptiidesii 4 (DPP4), galumsa vaayirasiif
translated: Bat CoV-HKU4 fi MERS-CoV seensa vaayirasiidhaaf fudhataa keessummeessituu walfakkaataa, dipeptidyl peptidase 4 (DPP4) fayyadamu.

sourceString: RNA-dependent RNA polymerase sequences of MERS-CoV are phylogenetically closer to counterparts in bat beta-CoVs identified from Europe and Africa.
targetString: RNA- hirkataa RNA pooliimerasii dabaree MERS-CoV qaamota simbira halkaniitti siqeenyaan beta-CoVs awurooppaa fi Afrikaa keessaa adda ba’e.
translated: Tartiiba RNA poliimeereezii RNA irratti hirkate MERS-CoV faayiloojenetikiidhaan gita isaanii bat beta-CoVs Awurooppaa fi Afrikaa irraa adda baafaman keessatti dhihoo dha.

sourceString: Up to now, no live MERS-CoV can be found in wild bats.
targetString: Haga ammaatti, MERS-CoVn jiru simbira halkanii keessatti hin argamu.
translated: Hanga ammaatti MERS-CoV lubbuun jiru tokkollee battee bosona keessatti argamuu hin danda’u.

sourceString: MERS-CoV and its closest relative bat CoV-HKU25 share only 87% nucleotide sequence homology.
targetString: MERS-CoV fi CoV-HKU25 kan simbira halkanii irraa dhufu baayyee walitti siqu, niwukilootaayidii 87% waliin qooddatu.
translated: MERS-CoV fi bat fira isaa isa dhiyoo CoV-HKU25 %87 qofa homology tartiiba niwuukilootaayidii qooddatu.

sourceString: Thus, bats might not be the immediate reservoir host of MERS-CoV.
targetString: Haala kanaan, simbiroonni halkanii baattuu battalaa MERS-CoV hin ta’u.
translated: Kanaafuu, batteen keessummeessituu kuufama battalaa MERS-CoV ta’uu dhiisuu danda’a.

sourceString: On the other hand, studies in Middle East have shown that dromedary camels are seropositive for MERS-CoV-specific neutralizing antibodies, same as camels of Middle East origin in multiple African countries.
targetString: Gama harka biroon, qorannoo baha giddu-galeessaa akka agarsiisetti gaalonni sunneen akkuma gaalota baha giddugaleesssa hundeeffama biyyoota afrikaa baay’ee keessaa MERS-CoV-dhaaf dandamannaarratti hubamoo miti.
translated: Gama biraatiin, qorannoon Baha Giddu Galeessaa irratti gaggeeffame akka agarsiisutti, gaalli dromedary antibodies MERS-CoV-specific neutralizing antibodies seropositive dha, akkuma gaalota madda Baha Giddu Galeessaa biyyoota Afrikaa hedduu keessatti argamanitti.

sourceString: Live MERS-CoV identical to the virus found in humans was isolated from the nasal swabs of dromedary camels, further indicating that camels serve as the bona fide reservoir host of MERS-CoV.
targetString: MERS-CoV vayirasiin jedhamu, kan nama keessatti argamu naamunaa funyaan gaalaa keessaa argameen adda ba’e, kunis kan inni agarsiise gaalonni kun akka baattuu MERS-CoV ta’uun gargaaru.
translated: MERS-CoV lubbuun jiru vaayirasii nama irratti argame waliin walfakkaatu hidhii gaalota dromedary irraa adda baafamee, gaalli akka keessummeessituu kuusaa bona fide MERS-CoVtti akka tajaajilan daran agarsiisa.

sourceString: It is also noteworthy that generally mild symptoms but massive virus shedding were observed in camels experimentally infected with MERS-CoV.
targetString: Walumaa galatti mallattoolee sasalphoon garuu vaayirasii jaboo ta’an dhangala’uun gaalota keessatti dhibeen MERS-CoV qorannoon argameera.
translated: Akkasumas akka waliigalaatti mallattoon salphaan garuu vaayirasiin guddaan dhangala’uun gaalota yaalii MERS-CoVn qabaman irratti mul’achuun isaa hubatamuu qaba.

sourceString: Notably, infected camels shed viruses not only through respiratory route but also through fecal-oral route, which is also the main route for virus shedding from bats.
targetString: Waanti baramaan, gaalonni dhibichaan faalaman vaayirasii dhangala’oo karaa sirna harkansuu keessa qofa miti, garuu karaa afaaniitis, kunis karaa guddaa inni simbira halkanii irraa babal’achaa jiruudha.
translated: Kan hubatamuu qabu, gaalli dhukkuba kanaan qabame karaa sirna hargansuu qofa osoo hin taane karaa manca’aa-afaaniin vaayirasii kan dhangalaasu yoo ta’u, kunis karaa ijoo vaayirasiin battee irraa dhangala’uudha.

sourceString: However, questions still remain since many confirmed cases of MERS have no contact history with camels prior to symptom onset, plausibly ascribed to human-to-human transmission or unknown transmission routes involving unrecognized animal species that harbour MERS-CoV.
targetString: Kana ta’u iyyuu, amma har’aatti gaaffii kan ta’u namoonni vaayirasii kanaan qabamuun isaanii mirkanaa’e baayyee isaanii gaalota waliin tuttuqqaa kan hin qabneedha. Baayyeen akka amanitti namaa gara namaatti darbe jedhaniiti, kaan immoo lubbu qabeeyyii biroo MERS-CoV keessa jiraatu.
translated: Haa ta’u malee, namoonni MERS qabaachuun isaanii mirkanaa’e hedduun mallattoon dhukkubaa osoo hin jalqabin dura seenaa tuttuqaa gaala waliin waan hin qabneef, kan nama irraa gara namaatti daddarbuu ykn karaa daddarbiinsa hin beekamne kan gosoota bineensotaa hin beekamne kan MERS-CoV qaban hirmaachisuun kan walqabatu waan ta’eef ammallee gaaffiin jiru.

sourceString: SARS-CoV-2 shares 96.2% nucleotide homology with a bat CoV RaTG13 isolated from Rhinolophus affinis bats.
targetString: SARS-CoV-2’n hoomooloojii niwukilotaayidii 96.2% CoV RaTG13 waliin qooddatee, wiirtuu simbira halkanii riinooloofasii irraa adda ba’a.
translated: SARS-CoV-2 %96.2 homology niwuukilootaayidii CoV RaTG13 battee Rhinolophus affinis irraa adda baafame waliin qooddata.

sourceString: As in the cases of SARS-CoV and MERS-CoV, the sequence divergence between SARS-CoV-2 and RaTG13 is too great to assign parental relationship.
targetString: Akka dhibeewwan SARS-CoV fi MERS-CoV keessatti, garaagarummaan tarreeffame SARS-CoV-2 fi RaTG13 gidduu jiru hariiroo maatii jelatti ramaduuf baay’ee gaariidha.
translated: Akkuma haala SARS-CoV fi MERS-CoV, addaan ba’iinsi tartiiba SARS-CoV-2 fi RaTG13 gidduu jiru hariiroo warraa ramaduuf baay’ee guddaadha.

sourceString: That is to say, bats might not be the immediate reservoir host(s) of SARS-CoV-2 unless almost identical bat CoVs are found in future.
targetString: Kana jechuun, simbirri halkanii baattuu hatattamaa SARS-CoV-2 ta’uu akka hin dandeenye agarsiisa, gara fuulduraatti CoVs simbira halkanii wal fakkaataan argamuu danda’a.
translated: Kana jechuun, gara fuulduraatti CoV battee walfakkaatan jechuun ni danda’ama yoo hin argamne, batteen keessummeessituu(wwan) kuufama battalaa SARS-CoV-2 ta’uu dhiisuu danda’u.

sourceString: Presumably, the intermediate animal hosts of SARS-CoV-2 should be among the wildlife species sold and killed at the Huanan Seafood Wholesale Market, with which many of the initial cases of COVID-19 were associated, indicative of a probable animal-to-human transmission event.
targetString: Tarii akka tilmaamamutti, bineensonni baattoon giddugaleessaa SARS-CoV-2 sanyiiwwan lubbuqabeeyyii bosonaa warra gurguramanii fi bakka gabaa gurgurtaa nyaataa Huwaanaanitti ajjeefaman keessaati, sababoota COVID-19 hedduu jalqabaa wajjin qindatee, tarii mudannoo bineeldaa-gara-namaa ta’uunsaa hubatamuu danda’a.
translated: Akka tilmaamaatti, keessummeessitoonni bineensota gidduugaleessaa SARS-CoV-2 gosoota bineensota bosonaa Gabaa Jumlaa Nyaata Galaanaa Huanan keessatti gurguramanii fi ajjeefaman keessaa ta’uu qabu, kan namoota jalqaba COVID-19 qabaman hedduun isaanii waliin walqabatee ture, kunis bineensota irraa gara taatee daddarbiinsa namaa.

sourceString: Several recent studies based on metagenomic sequencing have suggested that a group of endangered small mammals known as pangolins (Manis javanica) could also harbour ancestral beta-CoVs related to SARS-CoV-2.
targetString: Qorannoowwan dhiheenya kanaa kan meetaajenoomik irratti hundaa’an garee bineensa hoosiftootaa hamaan paangoliis (Manis javanica) jedhamu beta-CoVs SARS-CoV-2 dhihaatu.
translated: Qorannoon dhiheenya kana tartiiba meetajinoomii irratti hundaa’e hedduun gareen hoosistoota xixiqqoo balaa jala jiran kanneen pangolins (Manis javanica) jedhamuun beekamanis beetaa-CoV akaakayyuu SARS-CoV-2 waliin walqabatan qabachuu akka danda’an yaada dhiyeessan.

sourceString: These novel pangolin CoV genomes share 85-92% nucleotide sequence homology with SARS-CoV-2.
targetString: Paangoliinii haaraan kunneen jiinii dabaree firooma nuukilootaayidii CoV 85-92%, SARS-CoV-2 wallin qooddatu.
translated: Jiinoomoonni asoosama paangooliin CoV kun SARS-CoV-2 waliin walfakkeenya tartiiba niwuukilootaayidii %85-92 qooddatu.

sourceString: However, they are equally closely related to RaTG13 with about 90% identity at the level of nucleotide sequence.
targetString: Haa ta’u malee, isaan gara RaTG13ntti walqixa naannoo 90% addummaa sadarkaa nuukilootaayidiitti siqu.
translated: Haa ta’u malee, sadarkaa tartiiba niwuukilootaayidii irratti gara %90 eenyummaa isaaniitiin RaTG13 wajjin walqixa walitti dhiyeenyaan kan walqabatan dha.

sourceString: They cluster into two sub-lineages of SARS-CoV-2-like viruses in the phylogenetic tree, one of which share a more similar receptor binding domain (RBD) with SARS-CoV-2, with 97.4% amino acid sequence identity.
targetString: Gara qindatiinsa sanyii SARS-CoV-2 kan akka vaayirasoota muka fiiloojeenitikii, fudhattuu walfakkaataa kan (RBD) wajjin SARS-CoV-2 walqabsiisuun, tarree addummaa amino asiidii 97.4%.
translated: Isaanis muka faayiloojenetikii keessatti hidda xiqqaa vaayirasoota SARS-CoV-2 fakkaatanii lamatti kan walitti qabaman yoo ta’u, isaan keessaa tokko SARS-CoV-2 waliin domeenii hidhuu fudhataa (RBD) caalaatti walfakkaataa kan qooddatu yoo ta’u, eenyummaa tartiiba amiinoo asiidii %97.4 qaba.

sourceString: In stark contrast, the RBDs of SARS-CoV-2 and RaTG13 are more divergent, albeit a higher degree of sequence homology genome-wide.
targetString: Faallaa kanaan, RBDs of SARS-CoV-2 fi RaTG13 caalaatti ni babal’atu, guutuu jiinii keessatti digiriin walfakkeenya tartiibaa olaanaa ta’us.
translated: Faallaa kanaatiin, RBDn SARS-CoV-2 fi RaTG13 caalaatti adda adda, sadarkaa olaanaa tartiiba homology genome-wide ta'us.

sourceString: An earlier study on diseased pangolins also reported the detection of viral contigs from lung samples, which turn out to be similarly related to SARS-CoV-2.
targetString: Qorannoon duraa paangooliinii dhukkubsatan irratti geggeeffame naamunaa sombaa irraa fuudhamee mirkanaa’e, kunis SARS-CoV-2 waliin wa fakkaata.
translated: Qorannoon kanaan dura pangolins dhukkubsatan irratti gaggeeffames saamuda sombaa irraa contigs vaayirasii adda baafamuu kan gabaase yoo ta'u, kunis SARS-CoV-2 waliin haala walfakkaatuun walqabatee argama.

sourceString: This study adopted different assembly methods and manual curation to generate a partial genome sequence comprising about 86.3% of the full-length viral genome.
targetString: Qo’annoon kun tooftaalee fi qajeelfama tartiiba gosa jiinii maddisiisuuf kan fayyaduu fi Jiinii vaayirasii guutuu 86.3% of keessaa qaba.
translated: Qorannoon kun tartiiba jiinooma gartokkee gara %86.3 jiinooma vaayirasii dheerina guutuu of keessaa qabu maddisiisuudhaaf mala walga’ii adda addaa fi harkaan qulqulleessuu fudhateera.

sourceString: We cannot exclude the possibility that pangolin is one of the intermediate animal hosts of SARS-CoV-2.
targetString: Paangoliin baattoo SARS-CoV-2 ta’uu danda’uusaa hammachiisuu dandeenya.
translated: Paangooliin keessummeessitoota bineensota gidduugaleessaa SARS-CoV-2 keessaa tokko ta’uu isaa hambisuu hin dandeenyu.

sourceString: However, currently there is no evidence in support of a direct pangolin origin of SARS-CoV-2 due to the sequence divergence between SARS-CoV-2 and pangolin SARS-CoV-2-related beta-CoVs.
targetString: Haa ta’uyyuu malee, ammaaf ragaan kallattii bakka argama SARS-CoV-2 ibsu hin jiru. Kunis sababa hojiin adda baasuu SARS-CoV-2 fi paangoliinii SARS-CoV-2 CoVs’tti siqatuufidha.
translated: Haa ta’u malee, yeroo ammaa kana sababa garaagarummaa tartiiba SARS-CoV-2 fi pangolin SARS-CoV-2-related beta-CoVs gidduu jiruun ka’umsa kallattiin pangolin SARS-CoV-2 deeggaru hin jiru.

sourceString: In addition, the distance between SARS-CoV-2 and RaTG13 is even shorter than that between SARS-CoV-2 and pangolin SARS-CoV-2-related beta-CoVs.
targetString: Dabalataan, fageenyi SARS-CoV-2 fi RaTG13 gidduu jiru kan SARS-CoV-2 fi pangolin SARS-CoV-2-kan wal-qabatan beta-CoVs irra gabaabaadha.
translated: Kana malees, fageenyi SARS-CoV-2 fi RaTG13 gidduu jiru kan SARS-CoV-2 fi pangolin SARS-CoV-2-related beta-CoVs gidduu jiru caalaa gabaabaa dha.

sourceString: The evolutionary pathway of SARS-CoV-2 in bats, pangolins and other mammals remains to be established.
targetString: Karaan daddarbiinsa SARS-CoV-2 simbira halkanii keessatti, paangoliinii fi hoosistoonni gara biroon dhaabbatanii turu.
translated: Karaan jijjiirama SARS-CoV-2 battee, pangolins fi hoosistoota biroo keessatti mul’atu ammallee hin hundeeffamne.

sourceString: Whereas the highest sequence homology has been found in the RBDs between SARS-CoV-2 and pangolin, SARS-CoV-2-related beta-CoVs, SARS-CoV-2 and RaTG13 share the highest genome-wide sequence homology.
targetString: gama biraatin gostokkeen RBDs SARS-CoV-2 fi pangolin jidduu jiru keessattu argama, beta-CoVs SARS-CoV-2-‘tti dhihaatu, SARS-CoV-2 fi RaTG13 waliigala jiinii keessatti gostokke walitti fufaa qooddattu.
translated: RBD SARS-CoV-2 fi pangolin gidduu jiru keessatti homology tartiiba olaanaan kan argame yoo ta’u, SARS-CoV-2-related beta-CoVs, SARS-CoV-2 fi RaTG13 homology tartiiba bal’aa jiinoomii olaanaa qooddatu.

sourceString: It is highly speculative that the high degree of similarity between the RBDs of pangolin SARS-CoV-2-related beta-CoVs and SARS-CoV-2 is driven by selectivity-mediated convergent evolution.
targetString: Digirii olka’aan RBD paangoliinii filannoo adeemsa jijjiiramaa SARS-CoV-2 beta-CoVs fi SARS-CoV-2n waliin walitti siqu tilmaammiidha.
translated: Sadarkaan walfakkeenyi olaanaan RBDs pangolin SARS-CoV-2-related beta-CoVs fi SARS-CoV-2 gidduu jiru jijjiirama walitti dhufeenya filannoo-jiddugaleessa ta’een kan oofu ta’uun isaa tilmaama guddaadha.

sourceString: A counter-proposal is in favour of a recombination between a pangolin SARS-CoV-2-related beta-CoV and RaTG13 in the third wild animal species.
targetString: Baattuun qophii qindatiinsa haaraa paangooliinii pangolin SARS-CoV-2-garabeta-CoV fi RaTG13 sanyii bineensotaa sadii keessa.
translated: Yaadni faallaa ta’e tokko gosa bineensota bosonaa sadaffaa keessatti pangolin SARS-CoV-2-related beta-CoV fi RaTG13 gidduutti irra deebiin walitti makamuu kan deggerudha.

sourceString: As a driving force in evolution, recombination is widespread among beta-CoVs.
targetString: Akka humna geggeessituu jijjiirama suutaatti, qindatiinsi haaraan MERS-CoV- keeessatti baballataadha.
translated: Akka humna jijjiirama tirannaa keessatti sochootuutti, irra deebiin walitti makamuun beetaa-CoV gidduutti bal’inaan mul’ateera.

sourceString: The jury is still out on the immediate zoonotic origin of SARS-CoV-2.
targetString: Salganeen ammayyuu argama battalaa SARS-CoV-2 zonotikoon ala.
translated: Jury ammallee ka'umsa battalaa zoonotic SARS-CoV-2 irratti ala jira.

sourceString: Besides the highly pathogenic HCoVs, the zoonotic origin of HCoV-229E, HCoV-OC43, HCoV-NL63 and HCoV-HKU1 have also been studied.
targetString: Kana biratti maxxantoota bayyee dhukkuba fiduu danda’an kan akka HCoVs, kan bineeldota irraa gara namaatti daddarban HCoV-229E, HCoV-OC43, HCoV-NL63 fi HCoV-HKU1 warreen kunis qoratamuu qabu.
translated: HCoV baay’ee dhukkuba fidan malees, ka’umsi zoonootikii HCoV-229E, HCoV-OC43, HCoV-NL63 fi HCoV-HKU1 qoratameera.

sourceString: Phylogenetic evidence indicated that both HCoV-NL63 and HCoV-229E might have originated from bat CoVs, while the parental viruses of HCoV-OC43 and HCoV-HKU1 have been found in rodents.
targetString: Akka ragaan fiiloojeeneetik ibsutti HCoV-NL63 fi HCoV-229E’iis CoVs simbira halkanii irraa madduu danda’u, yeroo maatiin vaayirasii HCoV-OC43 fi HCoV-HKU1 tuqaa keessatti argaman.
translated: Ragaan faayiloojenetikii akka agarsiisutti HCoV-NL63 fi HCoV-229E lamaan isaanii iyyuu bat CoVs irraa kan maddan ta’uu danda’u, vaayirasiin warraa HCoV-OC43 fi HCoV-HKU1 hantuuta keessatti argameera.

sourceString: It has been reported that a bat CoV termed ARCoV.2 (Appalachian Ridge CoV) detected in North American tricolored bat displayed close relationship with HCoV-NL63.
targetString: Akka gabaafametti CoV ‘tu ARCoV.2’tti moggaafame. Gaara Appalaakiyaan CoV Amerikaa kaabaa keessatti argama. Hariiroo jabaas HCoV-NL63 waliin qaba.
translated: Bat CoV ARCoV.2 (Appalachian Ridge CoV) jedhamuun waamamu battee halluu sadii qabu Ameerikaa Kaabaa keessatti argame HCoV-NL63 waliin hariiroo cimaa akka agarsiise gabaafameera.

sourceString: On the other hand, HCoV-229E was genetically related to another bat CoV, termed Hipposideros/GhanaKwam/19/2008, which was detected in Ghana, while camelids have also been suspected as its intermediate host.
targetString: Gama biroon, HCoV-229E uumamasaan CoV biroo waliin walitti siqata, moggaasnisaas Hipposideros /GhanaKwam/19/2008, Gaanaa keessatti kan argameefi utuu kaamelidsi keessummeessaa giddu galeessaa afeeruu jedhamee eegama.
translated: Gama biraatiin, HCoV-229E jeneetikiidhaan CoV battee biraa, Hipposideros/GhanaKwam/19/2008 jedhamuun kan waamamu, kan Gaanaa keessatti argame waliin kan walqabatu yoo ta’u, gaalliis akka keessummeessituu gidduu galeessaatti shakkameera.

sourceString: For clarity, the current knowledge on animal origins of known HCoVs is summarized in Figure ​1 and Table 2.
targetString: Qulqullinaaf, amma beekumsi bineeldota irraa dhufe jedhamee kan beekame HCoVs fakkii 1 fi gabatee 2 irratti gudunfameejira.
translated: Ifa ta’uuf, beekumsi amma ka’umsa bineensotaa HCoV beekamaa irratti jiru fakkii 1 fi gabatee 2 irratti gabaabfameera.

sourceString: Phylogenetic analysis has provided evidence for interspecies transmission events of HCoVs in the history.
targetString: Xiinxalli filoogeeneetikii sanyiiwwan dhibeewwan daddarboo keessoo mudanno HCoVs seenaa keessaaf ragaa argamsiiseera.
translated: Xiinxalli faayiloojenetikii seenaa keessatti taateewwan daddarbiinsa gosoota gidduutti HCoVs ragaa kenneera.

sourceString: When HCoV-OC43 crossed species to infect humans from domestic livestock around 1890, a pandemic of respiratory infection was recorded.
targetString: Bara 1890 yeroo HCoV-OC43 dhala namaa qabuuf bineensota naannoo irraa gara sanyiiwwan gidduutti daddarbetti kan dhukkubni daddarbaan sirna hargansuu miidhu galmaa’e.
translated: HCoV-OC43 naannoo bara 1890tti beeylada manaa irraa gosoota qaxxaamuree nama faaluuf yeroo ture, weerarri infekshinii sirna hargansuu galmaa’eera.

sourceString: The interspecies transmission history of HCoV-229E is less clear.
targetString: Seenaan daddarbiinsa sanyiiwwan keessoo HCoV-229E ifaa miti.
translated: Seenaan daddarbiinsa gosoota gidduutti HCoV-229E ifa miti.

sourceString: Bat alpha-CoVs closely related to HCoV-229E have been found.
targetString: Viyirasiin simbira halkanii keessatti argamu alpha-CoVs jedhamu HCoV-229E waliin walittiakka siqu beekameera.
translated: Bat alpha-CoVs HCoV-229E waliin walitti dhiyeenyaan kan walqabatan argameera.

sourceString: Between them there is an alpaca alpha-CoV.
targetString: Isaan gidduu alpaakaa alpha-CoV’tu jira.
translated: Isaan gidduutti alpaca alpha-CoV jira.

sourceString: Several lines of evidence support the transmission of virus from bats to humans directly.
targetString: Vaayirasiin kallattiidhaan simbiroota halkanii irraa gara dhala namootatti akka daddarbu ragaawwan hedduun jiru.
translated: Ragaaleen hedduun vaayirasiin battee irraa gara namaatti kallattiin akka darbu ni deeggaru.

sourceString: First, humans but not alpacas might have contact with bats in a shared ecological niche.
targetString: Jalqaba, ‘alpacas’ osoo hin taane dhala namaatu simbiroota halkanii wajjiin wal qunname.
translated: Tokkoffaa, namoonni garuu alpaakaan hin taane, bakka ikoloojii waliin qaban keessatti battee wajjin wal qunnamtii qabaachuu dandaʼu.

sourceString: Instead, humans have close contact with alpacas.
targetString: Bakka sana, namoonni bineensa alpaakas jedhamu wajjiin walitti dhiheenya qabu.
translated: Kanaa mannaa, ilmaan namootaa alpakaa wajjin walitti dhufeenya cimaa qabu.

sourceString: Second, HCoV-229E-related bat alpha-CoVs are diverse and non-pathogenic in bats, whereas alpaca alpha-CoV caused an outbreak of respiratory disease in infected animals.
targetString: Lammaffaa, HCoV-229E- simbira halkanii fi alpha-CoVs garaagaraa fi simbira halkanii keessatti daddabarsoo dhibee miti, alpaca alpha-CoVn garuu dhibee sirna hargansuu binensotaaf sababa ta’e.
translated: Lammaffaa, HCoV-229E waliin walqabatu bat alpha-CoVs battee keessatti adda addaa fi dhukkuba kan hin fidne yoo ta’u, alpaca alpha-CoV ammoo beeylada dhukkuba kanaan qabaman irratti weerara dhukkuba sirna hargansuu fideera.

sourceString: Finally, alpaca alpha-CoV has not been found in feral animals.
targetString: Xumurarratti, alpaca alpha-CoV’n bineeldota manaa keessatti hin argamne.
translated: Dhumarratti, alpaca alpha-CoV bineensota bosonaa keessatti hin argamne.

sourceString: Thus, the possibility cannot be excluded that alpacas obtain the HCoV-229E-related alpha-CoV from humans.
targetString: Haala kanaan, carraan ta’umsaa alpaakaan HCoV-229E- alpha-CoVtti siqatu nama keessatti hammatamuu dhiisuu hin danda’u.
translated: Haala kanaan, alpaakoonni alfaa-CoV HCoV-229E waliin walqabatu nama irraa argachuun isaanii hafuu hin danda’u.

sourceString: In fact, bats are the direct source of human pathogenic viruses including rabies virus, Ebola virus, Nipah virus and Hendra virus.
targetString: Dhugaatti, simbirroonni halkanii vaayirasii dhala namaa qabu kannen akka vaayirasii bineensaa, vaayirasii Iboolaa, vaayirasii Niipaa fi vaayirasii Heendiraatiif madda kallattiiti.
translated: Dhugaa dubbachuuf, batteen madda kallattiin vaayirasii dhukkuba namaa fidan kanneen akka vaayirasii dhukkuba saree maraattee, vaayirasii Iboolaa, vaayirasii Nipah fi vaayirasii Hendraa dabalatee ti.

sourceString: It is therefore not too surprising that bats might transmit HCoV-229E to humans directly.
targetString: Kanaafuu simbiroonni halkanii HCoV-229E namatti dabarsuu akka dandeessu nama hin ajaa’ibu.
translated: Kanaafuu, batteewwan HCoV-229E kallattiin namaatti dabarsuu danda'uun isaanii baay'ee nama hin ajaa'ibu.

sourceString: Alternatively, whereas bat alpha-CoVs serve as the gene pool of HCoV-229E, alpacas and dromedary camels might serve as intermediate hosts that transmit viruses to humans, exactly as in the case of MERS-CoV.
targetString: Filannoon ittaanu, simbirri halkanii alpha-CoVs akka baattoo jiinii HCoV-229Etti yemmuu tajaajilu, alpaakaa fi gaalli akka baattoo giddugaleessaa vaayirasii gara namaatti dabarsaniitti tajaajiluu malu, sirriimatti dhibee MERS-CoV keessatti.
translated: Akka filannootti, bat alpha-CoVs akka poolii jiinii HCoV-229Etti kan tajaajilan yoo ta’u, alpacas fi dromedary camels akka keessummeessitoota gidduugaleessaa vaayirasii gara namaatti dabarsan tajaajiluu danda’u, akkuma MERS-CoV.

sourceString: MERS-CoV serves as an excellent example of interspecies transmission from bats to dromedary camels and from dromedary camels to humans.
targetString: MERS-CoV sanyiiwwaan garaagaraa simbiroota halkanii irraa gara gaalaattii fi gala irraa gara dhala namootatti daddarbuu isaatiif akka fakkeenya gaariitti tajaajila
translated: MERS-CoV akka fakkeenya gaarii gosoota gidduutti daddarbiinsa battee irraa gara gaala dromedary fi gaala dromedary irraa gara namaatti tajaajila.

sourceString: The evolutionary origin of MERS-CoV from bats is known at its initial identification and has also been strengthened by subsequent findings.
targetString: Maddi argama MERS-CoV simbiroota halkanii irraa dhufu eenyumma isa ka’uumsaatiin beekama, akkasumas argannoowwan walitti fufiinsa qabaniin cime.
translated: Ka’umsi jijjiirama tirannaa MERS-CoV battee irraa yeroo adda baafamuu isaa jalqabaatti kan beekamu yoo ta’u, argannoowwan booda dhufaniinis cimee jira.

sourceString: It is obvious that bats provide a rich pool of virus species for interspecies exchange of genetic fragments and interspecies transmission.
targetString: Simbirri halkanii sanyii vaayirasii sanyii keessoof waljijjiirraa faffaca’iinsaa fi daddarbiinsaaf sababa akka ta’an mullataadha.
translated: Baattoonni gosoota vaayirasii badhaadhaa ta’an gosoota gidduutti waljijjiirraa ciccitaa jeneetikii fi gosoota gidduutti dabarsuu akka kennan ifaadha.

sourceString: Longevity, densely packed colonies, close social interaction and strong ability to fly are all favourable conditions for bats to be an ideal 'virus spreader'.
targetString: Umrii dheeraa qabaachuun, kolonii tuutaan qindaa’e qabaachuun, walitti dhiheenya hawaasummaa qabaachuun fi dandeettii balali’uu cimaa qabaachuun simbiroota halkanii haalota filatamoo vaayirasii akka daddabarsitu ishee gargaaruudha.
translated: Umuriin dheeraan, kolonii hedduun guutame, walitti dhufeenyi hawaasummaa dhiyoo fi dandeettiin balali'uu cimaan hundi isaanii haala mijataa battee 'vaayirasii tamsa'aa' gaarii ta'uuf.

sourceString: On the other hand, MERS-CoV has been introduced to dromedary camels for decades.
targetString: Gama biraan immoo, MERS-CoV waggoota kurnan darbaniif gaalota keessatti galfamee ture.
translated: Gama biraatiin MERS-CoV waggoota kurnaniif gaala dromedary keessatti kan dhiyaate ta’uu ibsameera.

sourceString: It is well adapted to these camels that have turned from an intermediate host to a stable and natural reservoir host.
targetString: Madaqiinsi isaa gaalota keessatti baattoo giddugaleessaa ta’ee tuu hn miidhiin baattoo uumamaa ta’ee keessa jiraata.
translated: Gaalota keessummeessituu gidduu galeessaa irraa gara keessummeessituu kuufama bishaanii tasgabbaa’aa fi uumamaa ta’etti jijjiiraman kanaaf haala gaariin kan walsimudha.

sourceString: MERS-CoV causes very mild disease and maintains a relatively low mutation rate in these animals.
targetString: MERS-CoV dhibee hamaafi bineeldota sanneen keessattis wal hormaata gadi bu’aa fidaa.
translated: MERS-CoV dhukkuba baayyee salphaa kan fidu yoo ta’u, bineensota kana keessatti saffisa jijjiirama xiqqaa ta’e eega.

sourceString: Its sporadic transmission to humans is an accident and humans remain a dead-end host of MERS-CoV as its transmission cannot be sustained.
targetString: Kun daddarbiinsa gara namootaatti darbe darbee mullatuudha, MERS-CoV’s akka daddarbiinsa qabuutti itti fufuu hin danda’u.
translated: Yeroo tokko tokko namatti daddarbuun isaa balaa waan ta’eef, daddarbiinsa isaa itti fufiinsa qabaachuu waan hin dandeenyeef namoonni keessummeessituu MERS-CoV du’aa ta’ee hafa.

sourceString: In contrast to the role of camels in the transmission of MERS-CoV, the role of pangolins, if there is any, in the transmission of SARS-CoV-2 is different.
targetString: Tamsaasa MERS-CoV keessatti gahee Gaalaatiin yoo walbira qabamu, gaheen Paangloonii, yoo jiraate, tamsaasa SARS-CoV-2 keessatti garaagarummaa qaba.
translated: Faallaa gahee gaalonni daddarbiinsa MERS-CoV keessatti qaban, gaheen pangolins, yoo jiraate, daddarbiinsa SARS-CoV-2 keessatti qaban adda.

sourceString: Particularly, pangolin beta-CoVs are highly pathogenic in pangolins.
targetString: Keessattuu, paangoliinii beta-CoVs’n madda dhibee olaanaa paangoliiniiti.
translated: Keessattuu, pangolin beta-CoVs pangolins keessatti dhukkuba guddaa kan fidudha.

sourceString: They might be a dead-end host for SARS-CoV-2-related beta-CoVs, similar to civets in the case of SARS-CoV.
targetString: beta-CoVs kana waliin kan wal-qabate isaan SARS-CoV-2 maxxantuu warra dhumaa ta’uu danda’u, waa’ee SARS-CoV xirinyii wajjin kan wal-faakkaatudha.
translated: Isaan keessummeessituu du’aa ta’uu danda’u SARS-CoV-2-related beta-CoVs, haala SARS-CoV keessatti civets wajjin wal fakkaata.

sourceString: Several possibilities for interspecies transmission of SARS-CoV-2 from animals to humans have to be ruled in or ruled out in future studies.
targetString: Akkaataa SARS-CoV-2 keessoo sanyii isaanii lubbu-qabeeyyii irraa gara namaatti daddabarsan gara fuulduraatti qoratamuu qaba.
translated: Carraawwan hedduun gosoota gidduutti SARS-CoV-2 bineensota irraa gara namaatti daddarbuu qorannoowwan gara fuula duraatti taasifaman keessatti adda baafamuu ykn hambifamuu qabu.

sourceString: First, bats could be the reservoir host of a SARS-CoV-2-related virus almost identical to SARS-CoV-2.
targetString: Tokkoffaa, smibirri halkanii mandhee hammattuu SARS-CoV-2- isa baay’ee SARS-CoV-2- dhihaatuu ta’uu qaba.
translated: Tokkoffaa, batteen keessummeessituu kuufama vaayirasii SARS-CoV-2 waliin walqabatee SARS-CoV-2 wajjin walfakkaatu jechuun ni danda’ama ta’uu danda’a.

sourceString: Humans might share the ecological niche with bats through butchering or coal mining.
targetString: Dhalli namaa karaa foon qaluu fi cilee baasuutiin simbiroota halkanii wajjiin bakka qubannaa walii qooduu danda’a.
translated: Ilmaan namootaa karaa foon qalachuu ykn albuuda dhagaa boba’aa baasuun bakka ikoloojii kana battee waliin qooddachuu danda’u.

sourceString: Second, pangolins could be one of intermediate amplifying host to which a SARS-CoV-2-related virus had been newly introduced.
targetString: Lammaffaa, paangoliins iddoo jalqaba vaayirasiin SARS-CoV-2 walitti dhihaatu itti qophaa’ee fi ifa ta’eedha.
translated: Lammaffaa, pangolins keessummeessituu amplifying intermediate kan vaayirasiin SARS-CoV-2 waliin walqabatu haaraa itti galfame ta’uu danda’a.

sourceString: Humans contract the virus through butchering and consumption of game meat.
targetString: Namoonnis foon gurguruu fi nyaachuudhaan baattuu vaayirasii kanaa ta’u.
translated: Ilmi namaa foon adamsaa qalachuu fi nyaachuudhaan vaayirasichaan qabama.

sourceString: It is possible that many mammals including domestic animals are susceptible to SARS-CoV-2.
targetString: Hoosiftoonni baay’een bineeldota biyya bakkee hin jirre dabalatee SARS-CoV-2tti shakkamuu danda’u.
translated: Beeylada manaa dabalatee hoosistoonni hedduun SARS-CoV-2f saaxilamuu danda’u.

sourceString: A survey of domestic and wild animals for antibodies is warranted.
targetString: Dandamannaan bineeldota manaa fi bosonaa qorannoon mirkanaa’e.
translated: Qorannoon bineensota manaa fi bosona irratti farra qaamaa argachuuf gaggeeffamuun barbaachisaadha.

sourceString: Third, as mentioned above, recombination and adaptation of SARS-CoV-2 might have occurred in a third species that has contact with both bats and pangolins.
targetString: Sadaffaarratti, akkuma gararraatti tarreeffame, walfudhachuu fi madaqinsi SARS-CoV-2 sanyii sadaffaa keessatti kanneen tuqaatii simbirfa halkanii fi paangooliinii waliin qaban keessatti ta’uu danda’a.
translated: Sadaffaa, akkuma armaan olitti ibsame, irra deebiin walitti makamuu fi madaqfamuu SARS-CoV-2 gosa sadaffaa kan battee fi pangolins lamaan isaanii wajjin wal qunnamtii qabu keessatti uumamuu danda’a.

sourceString: The search for the animal origins of SARS-CoV-2 is still on.
targetString: Barbaachiargama bineensota SARS-CoV-2f ammayyuu godhamaa jira.
translated: Barbaacha ka'umsa bineensotaa SARS-CoV-2 ammallee itti fufee jira.

sourceString: Apart from different types of the animal hosts, three major factors on the viral side are also important in facilitating CoVs to cross species barriers.
targetString: Bineensa kanuu irraa adda baanaan CoVs daandaa sanyiiwwan bineensota garagaraa gidduu jiru mijeessuuf gama vaayirasiitiin dhiibbaawwan saditu jira.
translated: Gosa keessummeessitoota bineensotaa adda addaatiin alatti, CoVn danqaa sanyii akka qaxxaamuran haala mijeessuu keessattis wantootni gurguddoon sadii gama vaayirasiitiin barbaachisoo dha.

sourceString: First of all, their relatively high mutation rates in RNA replication.
targetString: Waan hundaa dura, hammamtaan latiinsa isaanii RNA walitti dhufeenya bakka walbuusuuti.
translated: Duraan dursee, RNA baay'isuu keessatti saffisa jijjiirama isaanii ol'aanaa.

sourceString: In comparison to other single-stranded RNA viruses, the estimated mutation rates of CoVs could be regarded as “moderate” to “high” with an average substitution rate being ~10-4 substitution per year per site 2, depending on the phase of CoV adaptation to novel hosts.
targetString: Wal bira qabiinsa vaayirasii fuuncaa qeenxee RNA keessatti, hammi latiinsa CoVs tilmaamame kanaan ‘’giddugaleessaa’’ gara ‘’guddaa’’tti hamma dimshaashessa bakka bu’iinsaa ~10-4 ta’e marsaa waggaa 2’n, karaa madaqiinsa baattoo haaraa CoV irra dhaabatee.
translated: Vaayirasoota RNA hidda tokkoo kanneen biroo wajjin wal bira qabamee yoo ilaalamu, tilmaamni saffisa jijjiirama CoVs akka “giddu galeessa” hanga “ol’aanaatti” ilaalamuu danda’a, saffisi bakka bu’iinsaa giddu galeessaan waggaatti bakka bu’iinsa ~10-4 bakka 2 tokkotti, marsaa CoV irratti hundaa’uun keessummeessitoota asoosamaatti madaqsuu.

sourceString: CoVs have a proof-reading exoribonuclease, deletion of which results in exceedingly high mutability and attenuation or even inviability.
targetString: CoVs egzooribooniwuukles qaba, kan dhabamsiisa firiin isaa dandeetti jijjiiramu fi hir’achuu ta’eedha.
translated: CoVn exoribonuclease kan sirreessuu dubbisu qabu, haquun isaas jijjiirama garmalee ol’aanaa fi attenuation ykn illee inviability fida.

sourceString: Interestingly, the nucleotide analogue Remdesivir is known to suppress CoV replication through inhibition of this exoribonuclease and the RNA-dependent RNA polymerase.
targetString: Haala ajaa’ibsiisaadhaan, Reemdesiiviriin niwuukilootaayidii karaa ittisa egzooriboniwuukilasii kanaatiin fi RNA poolimireesii RNA hirkataatiin walhoruu CoV ittisa.
translated: Kan nama ajaa’ibu, analoogii niwuukilootaayidii Remdesivir karaa dhorkuu exoribonuclease kanaa fi RNA irratti hirkate RNA polymerase tiin baay’ina CoV ukkaamsuun beekama.

sourceString: Remdesivir is one of most promising anti-SARS-CoV-2 agents to be tested in clinical trials.
targetString: Reemdesiiviir bakka buutota farra SARS-CoV-2 ta’an keessa isa abdatamaa shaakalliwwan kilinikaa keessa jiru.
translated: Remdesivir farra SARS-CoV-2 abdachiisaa ta'ee fi yaaliiwwan kilinikaa irratti qorataman keessaa isa tokkodha.

sourceString: Nevertheless, mutation rates of CoVs are about a million times higher than those of their hosts.
targetString: Gonkumaa, hammii jijjiiramaa CoVs haguugduu isaarra si’a miiliyoona caala.
translated: Kanas ta’e sana, saffisi jijjiirama CoVs kan keessummeessitoota isaanii irraa gara dachaa miliyoona tokkoo ol ta’a.

sourceString: In addition, mutation rate is often high when CoVs are not well adapted to the host.
targetString: Dabalataan, hammi latiinsaa gaafa CoVs baattoo sanitti sirriitti hin madaqne olka’a.
translated: Kana malees, yeroo baay’ee saffisi jijjiirama yeroo CoVn keessummeessituu wajjin akka gaariitti hin madaqne ol’aanaadha.

sourceString: Compared to SARS-CoV with a high mutation rate, the mutation rate of SARS-CoV-2 is apparently lower, suggestive of a higher level of adaptation to humans.
targetString: Hamma jijjiiramaa olaanaa SARS-CoV wajjiin yoo walbira qabamu, hammi jijjiirama SARS-CoV-2 gadi bu’aadha, agarsiistuu dhala namootatti madaqsuu sadarkaa olaanaa.
translated: SARS-CoV saffisa jijjiirama olaanaa qabuun wal bira qabamee yoo ilaalamu, saffisi jijjiirama SARS-CoV-2 gadi aanaa ta’uun isaa mul’ata, kunis sadarkaa madaqfamuu namaa ol’aanaa ta’uu agarsiisa.

sourceString: Presumably, it has already been adapted to another host close to humans.
targetString: Tilmaamaan, mandhee biroo isa kan namootatti dhihaatutti madaqee jira.
translated: Akka tilmaamaatti, duraanuu keessummeessituu biraa namatti dhihoo ta’eef madaqameera.

sourceString: In addition to SARS-CoV-2, this also applies to MERS-CoV, which is well adapted to dromedary camels.
targetString: Gaalota Eshi’aa dhihaa fi africaa kaabaa irratti kan hojjetame SARS-CoV-2, akkasumas MERS-CoV irrattis ni hojjeta.
translated: SARS-CoV-2 malees, kun MERS-CoV kan gaala dromedary wajjin haala gaariin walmadaalu irrattis ni hojjeta.

sourceString: Theoretically, it is unlikely that genetic drift would render vaccines and antivirals against SARS-CoV-2 ineffective quickly.
targetString: Akka yaadaatti, hiikkaan jiinii kenniinsi talaallii fi dandamachiistonni farra SARS-CoV-2 kan hin fakkaannee fi faayidaa ariitii hin qabneedha.
translated: Akka yaadaatti, jeneetikiin jijjiiramuun talaallii fi farra vaayirasii SARS-CoV-2 dafee bu’a qabeessa akka hin taane gochuun isaa hin oolu.

sourceString: Second, the large RNA genome in CoVs exerts extra plasticity in genome modification for mutations and recombination, thereby increasing the probability for interspecies co-evolution, which is advantageous for the emergence of novel CoVs when the conditions become appropriate.
targetString: Lammaffaa, jiinii guddaan RNA, CoVs keessatti addaba’iinsa latiinsaa fi qindatiinsa jiinii pilaastikummaa guddaa keessatti hojiirra oolchu, sababa kanaaf carraan uumamsaa sanyiiwwan keessoo ni dabala, kunimmoo CoVs haaraan gaafa haallan mijatan akka uumamuuf fayyada.
translated: Lammaffaa, jiinoomiin RNA guddaan CoVs keessatti jijjiirama jiinoomii keessatti pilaastikii dabalataa jijjiirama fi irra deebiin walitti makamuuf hojjeta, kanaanis carraa wal-jijjiirraa gosoota gidduutti taasifamuu ni dabala, kunis yeroo haalli mijatu CoVs asoosama uumamuuf faayidaa qaba.

sourceString: This is supported by the copious unique open reading frames and protein functions encoded towards the 3′ end of the genome.
targetString: Kunis waan addaa hedduun deggerama, faaya dubbisa banaa fi dalagaa pirootiinii xumura jiinii 3’ qindate.
translated: Kunis kan deeggaramuu furmaata dubbisa banaa adda ta’e baay’ee fi dalagaalee pirootiinii gara dhuma 3′ jiinoomiitti koodii ta’aniin.

sourceString: Third, CoVs randomly and frequently switch templates during RNA replication through a unique “copy-choice” mechanism.
targetString: Sadaffaa, CoVs darbee darbees ta’ee walitti fufiinsaan yeroo RNA’n walbaay’isu of jijjiira.
translated: Sadaffaa, CoVs yeroo RNA baay’isuu mala addaa “copy-choice” mechanism akka tasaa fi yeroo baay’ee unka jijjiiru.

sourceString: In a host that serves as the mixing vessel, strand switching occurs frequently during CoV RNA transcription.
targetString: Baattuu akka maktuu hiddoota dhiigaatti tajaajiltu keessatti, fuuncaan bantuu irra deddeebiidhaan gaafa CoV RNA ni uumama.
translated: Keessummeessituu akka ujummoo makaa tajaajilu keessatti, jijjiirraan hidda yeroo CoV RNA tiraanskriipshinii yeroo baay’ee ni mul’ata.

sourceString: Highly homologous full-length and subgenomic RNAs could recombine to generate new CoVs.
targetString: Firooma dheeraa olaanaa fi RNAn CoV haaraa qindeessuun argamsiisuu danda’a.
translated: RNAn dheerina guutuu fi subjeenoomii baay’ee homologous ta’an irra deebi’anii walitti makamuun CoV haaraa uumuu danda’u.

sourceString: Phylogenetic evidence of natural recombination has been found in both HCoV-HKU1 and HCoV-OC43, as well as animal CoVs such as bat SL-CoV and batCoV-HKU9.
targetString: Ragaan walitti makama uumamaa fiiloojeenikii HCoV-HKU1 fi HCoV-OC43 keessatti akkasumas CoVs bineensaa kanneen akka SL-CoV simbira halkanii fi batCoV-HKU9 argaman.
translated: Ragaan faayiloojenetikii irra deebiin walitti makamuu uumamaa HCoV-HKU1 fi HCoV-OC43 lamaan keessatti, akkasumas CoV bineensotaa kan akka bat SL-CoV fi batCoV-HKU9 keessatti argameera.

sourceString: Virus-host interaction in relation to transmission
targetString: Wal fudhachuun Baattuu fi vaayirasii tatamsa’ina isaa waliin walitti dhufeenya qaba.
translated: Wal-nyaatinsa vaayirasii fi keessummeessituu daddarbiinsa waliin walqabatee

sourceString: Besides three viral factors stated above, viral interaction with host receptor is another key factor influential on interspecies transmission.
targetString: Miidhaawwan vaayirasiin geessisu sadeen armaan olitti ilaalleen cinaatti, qaamni fudhatu vaayirasicha wajjiin walqunnamtii qabaachuun vaayirasichi sanyiiwwan garaagaraa gidduutti akka tamsa’u sababa ta’a.
translated: Qabxiilee vaayirasii sadii armaan olitti ibsaman malees, wal-nyaatinsi vaayirasii fudhataa keessummeessituu wajjin taasifamuun isaa waan ijoo biraa daddarbiinsa gosoota gidduutti dhiibbaa geessisudha.

sourceString: Herein, recombination of SARS-CoV is taken as a typical example, which also showed evidence of positive selection during interspecies transmission events.
targetString: Kana irratti, walfudhatiinsi SARS-CoV akka fakkeenya gosaatti fudhatame, kunis ragaa gaafa sanyii keessoo daddarbiinsaa filannoo poosetiivii agarsiiseera.
translated: Asitti, irra deebiin walitti makamuun SARS-CoV akka fakkeenya idileetti fudhatameera, kunis yeroo taateewwan daddarbiinsa gosoota gidduutti raawwatamanitti ragaa filannoo gaarii agarsiiseera.

sourceString: Based on the comparative analysis between isolates of human and civet SARS-CoVs, SARS-CoV is thought to undergo rapid adaptation in different hosts, particularly with mutations at the RBD of the S protein.
targetString: Xiinxala walbira qabaa adda foo’insa namaa fi siiveet SARS-CoVs irratti hundaa’uun, SARS-CoV mandheewwan garagaraa keessatti saffisaan akka madaqu, addatti jijjiirama RBD pirotiinii S wajjiin.
translated: Xiinxala wal bira qabamee ilaalamu adda baafamtoota SARS-CoV namaa fi civet gidduutti taasifame irratti hundaa’uun, SARS-CoV keessummeessitoota adda addaa keessatti saffisaan madaqfamuu akka danda’u yaadameera, keessumaa jijjiirama RBD pirootiinii S irratti.

sourceString: Generally, the RBD in the S protein of a CoV interacts with the cellular receptor and is intensely selected by the host antibody response.
targetString: Walumaagalatti, RBD’n pirootiinii s kan CoV keessatti fudhattuu seelii fi duubdeebii dandamannaa baattoo irraa adda ba’a.
translated: Walumaagalatti, RBD pirootiinii S CoV keessa jiru fudhataa seelii wajjin wal-nyaata, deebii farra qaama keessummeessituutiin cimsee filatama.

sourceString: In SARS-CoV, the RBD is in the 318th to 510th amino acids on the S1 fragment, which binds to the human ACE2 as well as its coreceptors for viral entry.
targetString: SARS-CoV keessatti, RBDn faffaca’iinsa S1 aminoo asiidii keessatti 318ffaa haga 510ffaa gidduu jira, kunis gara ACE2 namaatti kan hidhu akkasumas, galumsa wiirtuu kan vaayirasiiti.
translated: SARS-CoV keessatti, RBDn amiinoo asiidota 318 hanga 510ffaa ciccitaa S1 irratti argama, kunis ACE2 namaa akkasumas coreceptors isaa waliin vaayirasii seenuuf hidha.

sourceString: The RBD of SARS-CoV is capable of recognizing the ACE2 receptors of various animals, including bat, civet, mouse and raccoon dog, allowing interspecies transmission of the virus.
targetString: RBD’n SARS-CoV dandeettiin adda baafachuu fudhattuu ACE2 bineensota garaagaraa kanneen akka simbira halkanii, siiveet fi saree vaayirasiin sanyiiwwan garaagaraa gidduutti akka daddarbu taasisa.
translated: RBD SARS-CoV ACE2 receptors bineensota adda addaa, bat, civet, mouse fi raccoon dog dabalatee adda baasuu danda'a, kunis gosoota gidduutti vaayirasichi akka daddarbu taasisa.

sourceString: In fact, only 6 amino acid residues were observed to be different from human and civet viral isolates in the RBD and 4 of them locate in the receptor-binding motif for interaction with the ACE2 receptor.
targetString: Dhugaamatti, aminoo asiidii 6 qofatu qoratamee kan namaafi siiveetii adda ba’uun RBD keessaa 4 fuuncaa fudhattuu ACE2 waliin hundeessuudha.
translated: Dhugaa dubbachuuf, hafteen amiinoo asiidii 6 qofti RBD keessatti vaayirasii namaa fi civet adda baafame irraa adda ta’uun kan mul’ate yoo ta’u, isaan keessaa 4 ammoo fudhataa ACE2 waliin walqunnamtiidhaaf motiifii fudhataa-hidhuu keessatti argamu.

sourceString: Civet SARS-CoV has K479N and S487T mutations in its RBD, which might increase the affinity of the interaction of spike protein with human ACE2 receptor.
targetString: siiveetiin SARS-CoV jijjiirama RBD keessaa K479N fi S487T qabu ispaayik pirotiinii fi ACE2 dhala namaa walitti harkisa.
translated: Civet SARS-CoV RBD isaa keessatti jijjiirama K479N fi S487T qaba, kunis firooma wal-nyaatinsa pirootiinii ispeekii fudhataa ACE2 namaa wajjin qabu dabaluu danda'a.

sourceString: In other words, these two amino acid substitutions might be critical to viral adaption to humans.
targetString: Jecha biroon, bakka bu’eewwan lamman aminoo asiidii kunneen vaayirasiin gara namootaatti madaquu danda’u.
translated: Kana jechuun, bakka bu’iinsi amiinoo asiidii lamaan kun vaayirasiin namatti madaqsuuf murteessaa ta’uu danda’a.

sourceString: It is noteworthy that SARS-CoV-2 shares the same cellular receptor with SARS-CoV.
targetString: SARS-CoV-2 simattuu seelii walfakkaataa SARS-CoV waliin qooddachuun isaa waan raajeffatamu miti.
translated: SARS-CoV-2 SARS-CoV waliin fudhataa seelii walfakkaataa akka qooddatu hubatamuu qaba.

sourceString: A 30% difference between SARS-CoV-2 and SARS-CoV in the S1 unit of the S protein implicates that the binding affinity of its S protein with human ACE2 might have altered.
targetString: 30% garaagarummaa SARS-CoV-2 fi SARS-CoV gidduu yuuniitii S1 pirootiinii S keessatti akka ibsutti wal qabatiinsi garaagartummaa pirootiinii S ACE2 namootaa wajjin jijjiiramuu danda’a.
translated: Garaagarummaan %30 SARS-CoV-2 fi SARS-CoV gidduu jiru yuunitii S1 pirootiinii S keessatti firoomni hidhaa pirootiinii S isaa ACE2 namaa wajjin jijjiiramuu akka danda’u agarsiisa.

sourceString: Indeed, a cryo-EM study indicates a 10- to 20-fold higher affinity of this binding than that between human ACE2 and SARS-CoV S protein.
targetString: Qorannoon cryo-EM jedhu akka agarsiisutti ACE2 namaa fi pirootinii SARS-CoVs gidduu hidhaa guddaa 10 hamma 20 ga’utu jira jedha.
translated: Dhugumatti, qorannoon cryo-EM kan agarsiisu, walitti dhufeenyi hidhata kanaa kan pirootiinii ACE2 fi SARS-CoV S namaa gidduu jiru caalaa dachaa 10 hanga 20 ol ta’a.

sourceString: It will also be of interest to determine whether any other coreceptor might be required for SARS-CoV-2 transmission.
targetString: Tatamsa’ina SARS-CoV-2’tiif koorseptariin biroo barbaachisuu akka danda’u hubachuun barbaachisaadha.
translated: Akkasumas, daddarbiinsa SARS-CoV-2f coreceptor biraa barbaachisuu danda’uu fi dhiisuu isaa murteessuunis fedhii qaba.

sourceString: Intriguingly, HCoV-NL63 also binds to ACE2 but with a different part of S.
targetString: Haala ajaa’ibsiisaa ta’ee HCoV-NL63’iis gara ACE2 maxxana garuu kutaa S addaati.
translated: Kan nama ajaa’ibu, HCoV-NL63 ACE2ttis ni hidhama garuu kutaa S adda ta’e waliin.

sourceString: There exist many other HCoV receptors, such as aminopeptidase N for HCoV-229E, and 9-O-acetylated sialic acid for HCoV-OC43.
targetString: Fudhattoonni HCoV kanneen akka amiinoopeeptidees N HCoV-229E, fi 9-O-aseetileetid siyaalik asiidii HCoV-OC43 hedduutu jira.
translated: Fudhatootni HCoV biroo hedduun jiru, kanneen akka aminopeptidase N HCoV-229E, fi 9-O-acetylated sialic acid HCoV-OC43.

sourceString: They might also account for successful adaptation of these CoVs in humans after interspecies transmission from their animal hosts.
targetString: Erga bineeldota irraa keessoo sanii isaaniin gara namaatti daddarbanii boodas CoVs nama waliin haala gaariin madaquu danda’u.
translated: Akkasumas, erga gosoota gidduutti keessummeessitoota bineensota isaanii irraa daddarbuu booda CoVs kana nama keessatti milkaa’inaan madaqsuuf sababa ta’uu danda’u.

sourceString: In addition to cellular receptors, the outcome of interspecies transmission of HCoVs is also governed by other host dependency and restriction factors.
targetString: Simattuu seelii irratti argamu irratti dabalamee, akkaataan daddarba sanyiiwwan keessoo HCoVs haala battuu vaayirasii kanaatiin hoogganama.
translated: Fudhatoota seelii malees, bu’aan daddarbiinsa gosoota gidduutti HCoVs hirkattummaa keessummeessituu fi sababoota daangeessuu birootiinis ni bulfama.

sourceString: The divergence of these host proteins between humans and natural reservoir hosts of HCoVs such as bats, dromedary camels and rodents might constitute a barrier to interspecies transmission.
targetString: Garaagarummaan mandhee pirotiinii dhala namaa fi mandheewwan uumamaa HCoVs kanneen akka simbiroota halkanii, gaalaa fi bineensota alala guuran tatamsa’ina sanyiiwwan garaagaraa gudduutti ta’urratti daangaa uumuu danda’a.
translated: Garaagarummaan pirootiinota keessummeessituu kanaa namaa fi keessummeessitoota kuufama uumamaa HCoV kanneen akka battee, gaala dromedary fi hantuuta gidduutti taasifamuu danda’a, daddarbiinsa gosoota gidduutti danqaa ta’uu danda’a.

sourceString: HCoVs have to usurp host dependency factors and subvert host restriction factors for a successful interspecies transmission.
targetString: HCoV vaayirasiin jedhamu daangaa baattuu sanaa cabsuun maxxantuu ta’ee humnaan itti gala, sana booda wal-horuu fi daddarbuu jalqaba.
translated: HCoVn daddarbiinsa gosoota gidduutti milkaa’aa ta’eef sababoota hirkattummaa keessummeessituu dhuunfachuu fi sababoota daangeffama keessummeessituu diiguu qabu.

sourceString: In this regard, molecular determinants in this important area of virus-host interaction remain to be identified and characterized.
targetString: Kana waliin wal qabatee, murteessitooonni moliikulii naannoowwan baattoo fayyadoo vaayirasii adda ba’ee fi qindeeffamee tura.
translated: Gama kanaan, murteessitootni molakiyuulaa naannoo barbaachisaa kana keessatti wal-nyaatinsa vaayirasii fi keessummeessituu adda baafamuu fi amala adda baasuun hafeera.

sourceString: An unbiased genome-wide screening of host dependency and restriction factors for SARS-CoV-2 using the state-of-the-art technology of CRISPR might be fruitful.
targetString: Jiinii bal’aan qulqulleeessituu baattoo sababa madaala isaa eeggate aartii teekinoloojii CRISPR fayyadsmuun milkaa’uu danda’a.
translated: Teeknooloojii ammayyaa CRISPR fayyadamuun hirkattummaa keessummeessituu fi sababoota daangeessuu SARS-CoV-2 loogii hin qabne jiinoomii bal’aa irratti godhamu bu’a qabeessa ta’uu danda’a.

sourceString: Emergence of novel HCoVs: back to ground zero
targetString: Mudannoon tasaa HCoVs haaraa;gara lafa duwwaatti deebi’a
translated: Mul’achuu HCoV asoosama: gara lafa zeerootti deebi’uu

sourceString: The diversity of bat CoVs provides ample opportunities for the emergence of novel HCoVs.
targetString: Garaagarummaan simbira halkanii fi CoVs vayirasii haaraa HCoVs akka baramuuf carraa kenne.
translated: Heddumina Bat CoVs HCoVs asoosama akka uumaman carraa bal’aa kenna.

sourceString: In this sense, bat CoVs serve as the gene pool of HCoVs.
targetString: Miira kana keessatti, CoVs simbira halkanii akka hidda sanyii HCoVs’tti gargaara.
translated: Miira kanaan, Bat CoVs akka poolii jiinii HCoVs tajaajilu.

sourceString: In addition, rapid mutation and genetic recombination also drive HCoV evolution and serve as two important steps in this process.
targetString: Dabalataan, latiinsa battalaa fi qindatiinsi jenetiksiis HCoV jijjiirraa uumamaa geggeessuu fi adeemsa kana keessattis akka tartiiba barbaachisoo lamaatti tajaajila.
translated: Kana malees, jijjiiramni saffisaa fi jeneetikii irra deebiin walitti makamuun jijjiirama HCoV kan oofu yoo ta’u, adeemsa kana keessatti tarkaanfiiwwan barbaachisoo lama ta’anii tajaajilu.

sourceString: For example, the acquisition or loss of novel protein-coding genes has the potential to drastically modify viral phenotypes.
targetString: Fakkeenyaaf, barbaaduu ykn dhabuu pirootiinii jiinii moggaasuun isaanii bifa jabaan feenootaayippii vaayirasii fooyyessuuf dandeettii qaba.
translated: Fakkeenyaaf, jiiniiwwan pirootiinii koodii asoosama ta’an argachuun ykn dhabuun fenootayipii vaayirasii haalaan fooyyessuuf carraa qaba.

sourceString: Among SARS-CoV accessory proteins, ORF8 has been thought to be important in adaptation to humans, as SARS-CoV-related bat viruses were isolated but found to encode divergent ORF8 proteins.
targetString: Pirootiiniiwwan gargaartuu SARS-CoV keessaa, ORF8 madaqqii vaayirasii simbira halkanii se’amaa ture, akka SARS-CoV simbira halkaniirraa madde garuu pirootiniin ORF8 argamu garaagara.
translated: Pirootinoonni gargaaraa SARS-CoV keessaa, vaayirasoonni battee SARS-CoV waliin walqabatan adda baafamaniiru garuu pirootiinota ORF8 adda addaa koodii ta’uun isaanii waan argameef, ORF8 namatti madaqsuu keessatti barbaachisaa ta’ee yaadameera.

sourceString: A 29-nucleotide deletion characteristic of SARS-CoVs has been found in strains isolated at the beginning of the human epidemic.
targetString: Amalli balleessuu 29 nuukilootaayidii SARS-CoVs, yaalii adda baasuu jalqaba weerarsa dhibee namaa keessatti argame.
translated: Amalli haquu niwuukilootaayidii 29 SARS-CoVs gosoota jalqaba weerara namaa irratti adda baafaman keessatti argameera.

sourceString: This deletion splits ORF8 into ORF8a and ORF8b and is thought to be an adaptive mutation that promotes the switch of hosts.
targetString: Haquun kun ORF8 gara ORF8a fi ORF8b’tti adda baasa, akkasumas adeemsa jijjiirraa sanyii madaqsuu mandhee jijjiiru beeksisa jedhamee yaadama.
translated: Haquun kun ORF8 gara ORF8a fi ORF8b tti kan qoodu yoo ta’u, jijjiirama madaqsuu kan jijjiirraa keessummeessitootaa guddisu ta’ee yaadama.

sourceString: Besides, SARS-CoV has a possible recombination history with lineages of alpha- and gamma-CoVs, where a large number of smaller recombinant regions were identified in the RNA-dependent RNA polymerase.
targetString: Cinaatti, SARS-CoV aalfaa- fi gaammaa-CoVs wajjiin seenaa walitti dhiheenya sanyummaa kan diqaalomsuun guddaan RNA-hirkataa fi RNA pooliimerees gidduu jiru itti adda bahe qaba.
translated: Kana malees, SARS-CoV seenaa irra deebiin walitti makamuu danda’u hidda alfaa- fi gamaa-CoVs wajjin qaba, bakka naannoowwan irra deebiin walitti makaman xixiqqoo baay’een RNA irratti hirkatan RNA poliimeereezii keessatti adda baafamaniiru.

sourceString: Recombination locations were also identified in the nsp9, most of nsp10, and parts of nsp14.
targetString: Bakki qindeeffama haaraas nsp9 keessatti adda baafameera, nsp10 baayinaan akkasumas qaamota nsp14.
translated: Bakkeewwan irra deebiin walitti makamuu nsp9, irra caalaan nsp10, fi kutaalee nsp14 keessattis adda baafamaniiru.

sourceString: Likewise, it has been shown that the epidemic MERS-CoV experienced recombination events between different lineages, which occurred in dromedary camels in Saudi Arabia.
targetString: Gaalota Saa’ud Arabiyaa irratti qorannoo taasifameen vaayirasiin MERS-CoV sanyii isaa kessatti irra deebi’ee of ijaaruu akka danda’u barameera.
translated: Akkasumas, weerarri MERS-CoV hidda adda addaa gidduutti taateewwan irra deebiin walitti makamuu akka mudate kan agarsiifame yoo ta’u, kunis gaalota dromedary Sa’udii Arabiyaa keessatti mul’ateera.

sourceString: Besides SARS-CoV and MERS-CoV, recombination events have also been observed in other HCoVs, in which the HCoVs recombine with other animal CoVs in their non-structural genes.
targetString: SARS-CoV biratti MERS-CoV amala of ijaaruu HCoVs keessatti argameera. HCoVs bineensota kan biro waliin jiinii caasaa hin qabneen wal-fudhata.
translated: SARS-CoV fi MERS-CoV malees, taateewwan irra deebiin walitti makamuu HCoV biroo keessattis mul’ataniiru, HCoVn CoV bineensota biroo wajjin jiiniiwwan caasaa hin taane keessatti irra deebi’anii walitti makamu.

sourceString: It should also be cautioned that artificial selection can contribute to unintended changes in viral genomes, most likely resulting from relieving viruses from selection pressures exerted, such as by the host immune system.
targetString: Filannoon fakkeessaa jijjiirama hin eegamne vaayirasii jeenoomii keessatti fiduu waan danda’uuf eeggannoon godhamuu qaba, hedduun isaanii dhiibbaa dhukkubbii vaayirasii hir’isu, kanneen akka baattoo dandeettii ittisa qaamaa.
translated: Akkasumas, filannoo namtolchee jijjiirama hin yaadamne jiinooma vaayirasii keessatti gumaachuu akka danda’u of eeggannoo gochuun barbaachisaadha, kunis baay’ee kan ta’uu danda’u vaayirasoota dhiibbaa filannoo irraa bilisa gochuu irraa, kan akka sirna ittisa qaamaa keessummeessituutiin.

sourceString: An example of these effects is the loss of a full-length ORF4 in the HCoV-229E prototype strain, owing to a two-nucleotide deletion.
targetString: Fakkeenyi bu’aawwan dheerina guutuu kanneenii ORF4, HCoV-229E keessatti fuuncaa pirootootaayippii, gara haqiinsa nuukilootaayidii lamaatti kan qooduudha.
translated: Fakkeenyi bu’aa kanaa sababa haqamuu niwuukilootaayidii lamaatiin, gosa piroototaayipii HCoV-229E keessatti ORF4 dheerina guutuu ta’e dhabuudha.

sourceString: While intact ORF4 could be observed in bat and camel viruses related to HCoV-229E, the alpaca alpha-CoV displays a single nucleotide insertion, resulting in a frameshift.
targetString: Yeroo ORF4 hin miidhamne vaayirasii simbira halkanii fi gaala keessai ilaalamu HCoV-229E ewaliin walitti siqata, alpaca alpha-CoV kan agarsiisu nuukilootaayidii qeenxee galchuun waan keessa galu jijjiira.
translated: ORF4 hin tuqamne vaayirasii battee fi gaala HCoV-229E waliin walqabatan keessatti mul’achuu kan danda’u yoo ta’u, alpaca alpha-CoV niwuukilootaayidii tokko galchuu agarsiisa, kunis jijjiirama furmaataa fida.

sourceString: Last but not least, the evolution of novel HCoVs is also driven by the selection pressure in their reservoir hosts.
targetString: Xumurrratti garuu gadaanaa kan hin taane, adeemsi suutaa HCoVs haaraas dhiibbaa filannoo baattoon oofama.
translated: Dhuma irrattis jijjiiramni HCoV asoosama dhiibbaa filannoo keessummeessitoota kuusaa isaanii keessatti mul’atuun kan oofudha.

sourceString: Asymptomatic or only mild symptoms were detected when bats were infected with CoVs, indicating the mutual adaptation between CoVs and bats.
targetString: Mallattoon ykn mallattoowwan salphaa qofti gaafa simbiroonni halkanii CoVs dhaan hubaman argame, kunis madaqiinsa CoVs fi simbira halkanii gidduu jiru madda godhachuuni.
translated: Mallattoon mallattoo hin qabne ykn salphaa qofa kan argame yeroo batteen CoVn qabaman yoo ta’u, kunis CoV fi battee gidduutti walmadaaluu agarsiisa.

sourceString: It appeared that bats are well adapted to CoVs anatomically and physiologically.
targetString: Akka argamutti simbirroonni halkanii qaama isaanitiinis ta’e, keessa isaaniitiin CoVs walitti madaqaniiru.
translated: Baattoonni anatoomii fi fiiziyoloojiidhaan CoVs wajjin haala gaariin kan madaqan ta’uun mul’ateera.

sourceString: For example, defects in the activation of pro-inflammatory response in bats efficiently reduce the pathology triggered by CoVs.
targetString: Fakkeenyaaf, hanqinni si’eessuu deebii farra summii simbiroota halkanii qorannoo dhibee CoVs’n gaggeeffame hir’isa.
translated: Fakkeenyaaf, mudaan deebii pro-inflammatory activation battee keessatti gahumsaan paatolojii CoVs kakaasu hir'isa.

sourceString: Besides, the natural killer cell activity in bats is suppressed due to upregulation of inhibitory natural killer cell receptor NKG2/CD94 and low expression level of major histocompatibility complex class I molecules.
targetString: Cinaatti, gochoonni uumamaa ajjeestota seelii simbiroota halkanii sababa mandhee ajjeeftuu seelii jijjiiramoo NKG2/CD94 fi waldanda’uu meembireenii molekiyuulii kutaa I’tiin addaan cite.
translated: Kana malees, sochiin seelii ajjeesaa uumamaa battee keessatti sababa upregulation inhibitory natural killer cell receptor NKG2/CD94 fi sadarkaa ibsa gadi aanaa molakiyuulota gurguddoo histocompatibility complex gita I ukkaamfama.

sourceString: Moreover, the high level of reactive oxygen species (ROS) generated from high metabolic activity of bats could both suppress CoV replication and affects proofreading by exoribonuclease, thus providing the selection pressure for the generation of virus strains highly pathogenic when introduced into a new host.
targetString: Dabalataanis, sadarkaa olaanaan ROS gocha meetaaboolikii olaanaa simbira halkanii irraa CoV fiduun dhiibbaa hamaa dhaqqabsiisuu danda’a, haala kanaan filannoon dhiibbaa vaayirasii daddarbiinsaa olaanaa baattoo haaraa keessatti argame geggeessa.
translated: Kana malees, sadarkaan ol’aanaa gosoota oksijiinii deebii kennan (ROS) sochii meetaabolii olaanaa battee irraa maddu baay’ina CoV ukkaamsuu danda’a, akkasumas exoribonuclease’n sirreeffama dubbisuu irratti dhiibbaa qaba, kanaanis dhaloota gosoota vaayirasii yeroo keessummeessituu haaraatti galfaman baay’ee dhukkubsataa ta’aniif dhiibbaa filannoo ni kenna.

sourceString: More pathogenic CoV strains might also evolve by recombination, leading to the acquisition of novel proteins or protein features for host adaptation.
targetString: Maxxantoonni dhukkuba namatti fidan kan vaayirasii CoCs of ijaaraa nanna’u, haala kanaan pirootinii haaraa uummachaa baattuu waliin wal-baru(madaqu)
translated: Gosoonni CoV dhukkuba fidan baay’eenis irra deebiin walitti makamuudhaan guddachuu danda’u, kunis pirootiinota asoosama ykn amala pirootiinii madaqsuu keessummeessitootaaf argachuutti geessuu danda’a.

sourceString: Thus, it is not by chance that three novel HCoVs have emerged in the past two decades.
targetString: Haala kanaan, HCoVs haaraan sadii kan jaarraa lamman darbanitti mudatan akka carraa miti.
translated: Haala kanaan, waggoota kurnan lamaan darban keessatti HCoVn asoosama sadii kan uumaman akka tasaa miti.

sourceString: CoVs are non-pathogenic or cause mild symptoms in their reservoir hosts such as bats and camels.
targetString: CoVs’n bineensota irraagara namaattib hin daddarban akkasumas mallattoon kuusaa baattoo kanneen akkasimbira halkaniifi gaalaati.
translated: CoVn dhukkuba kan hin fidne yookiin keessummeessitoota kuufama isaanii kan akka battee fi gaala irratti mallattoo salphaa fidu.

sourceString: They replicate robustly without eliciting a strong host immune response.
targetString: Osoo ittisa madiinummaa mandhee cimaa keessaa hin bahin wal baay’isuu danda’u.
translated: Isaanis deebii ittisa keessummeessituu cimaa osoo hin kakaasiin ciminaan baay’atu.

sourceString: Herein lie the secrets of why asymptomatic carriers are seen and what causes the severe cases in human infection.
targetString: Iccitiin waa’ee baattota dhukkubaa mallattoo maleeyyii fi maaltu dhala namaatti dhukkuba hammeessa jedhu soba.
translated: Iccitiin maaliif namoonni mallattoo hin agarsiifne akka mul’ataniifi dhukkuba hamaa infekshinii namaa keessatti maaltu fida jedhu kana keessa jira.

sourceString: The severe symptoms are mainly due to the hyperactivation of immune response and the cytokine storm wherein the stronger the immune response, the more severe the lung damage.
targetString: Mallattoowwan dhukkubaa cimoon adda durummaan hyperactivation dandeettii ittisa qaamaa fi saayitookaayinii dandeettii ittisa qaamaa cimaa, somba haala ulfaataa ta’een huba.
translated: Mallattoowwan ciccimoon kun irra caalaa deebii ittisa qaamaa garmalee socho’uu fi obomboleettii saayitookinii irraa kan ka’e yoo ta’u, deebii ittisa qaamaa cimaa yoo ta’e miidhaa sombaa cimaa ta’a.

sourceString: In contrast, in asymptomatic carriers, the immune response has been de-coupled from CoV replication.
targetString: Faallaa kanaa, baattoonni mallattoo hin qabne deebiin madiinummaa walhoruu CoV irraa adda bahe.
translated: Faallaa kanaatiin, baateewwan mallattoo hin qabne keessatti, deebii ittisa qaamaa baay’ina CoV irraa addaan baafameera.

sourceString: The same strategy of delinking the immune response might have beneficial effects in anti-SARS-CoV-2 therapy.
targetString: Tarsiimoo wal fakkaataa dandeettii ittisa qaamaa adda baasuun yaala -SARS-CoV-2’f bu’aa gaarii qabaachuu mala.
translated: Tooftaan walfakkaataan deebii ittisa qaamaa walitti hidhamiinsa irraa kaasuun wal’aansa farra SARS-CoV-2 keessatti bu’aa faayidaa qabu qabaachuu danda’a.

sourceString: The interferon response is particularly strong in bats.
targetString: Deebiin Interfiiroon kan simbirootaa halkanii addatti cimaadha.
translated: Keessattuu deebii interfeerooniin battee irratti cimaadha.

sourceString: Thus, administration of type I interferon at least in the early phase of SARS-CoV-2 infection in humans should be beneficial.
targetString: Kanaafuu, haggansi intarfiiraan gosa tokkoffaa yoo xiqqaate sadarkaa jalqabaa faalama SARS-CoV-2 nama keessatti fayyadamaa ta’uu qaba.
translated: Kanaafuu, yoo xiqqaate marsaa jalqabaa infekshinii SARS-CoV-2 nama keessatti interfeeroon gosa I kennuunis faayidaa qabaachuu qaba.

sourceString: In addition, NLRP3 inflammasome activation in bats is defective.
targetString: Dabalataan, NLRP3 inflammasome activation kan jedhamu simbira halkanii keessatti hanquudha.
translated: Kana malees, NLRP3 inflammasome activation battee keessatti mudaa qaba.

sourceString: By this reasoning, inhibition of NLRP3 inflammasome with MCC950 might be useful in the treatment of COVID-19.
targetString: Sababoota kanaan, NLRP3 MCC950’n dhoksuun yaala COVID-19’tiif faayidaa qabaachuu danda’a.
translated: Sababa kanaan, MCC950n inflammasome NLRP3 dhorkuun wal'aansa COVID-19 keessatti faayidaa qabaachuu mala.

sourceString: The emergence of SARS-CoV-2 follows the general theme by which SARS-CoV and MERS-CoV arose.
targetString: Argamni SARS-CoV-2 yaada waliigalaa dagaagina SARS-CoV fi MERS-CoV hordofsiise.
translated: Mul’achuun SARS-CoV-2 mata duree waliigalaa SARS-CoV fi MERS-CoV ittiin ka’an hordofa.

sourceString: Whereas a bat beta-CoV sharing 95% nucleotide homology with SARS-CoV has been found, there also exists a bat-CoV sharing 96% nucleotide homology with SARS-CoV-2.
targetString: beta-CoV’n simbira halkanii SARS-CoV wajjiin niwuukilootaayidii 95% qooddatu argame, akksumas bat-CoV’n niwuukilootaayidii hoomoolojii 96% SARS-CoV-2 wajjiin qooddatutu jira.
translated: Bat beta-CoV SARS-CoV waliin homology niwuukilootaayidii %95 qooddatu kan argame yoo ta’u, bat-CoV SARS-CoV-2 waliin homology niwuukilootaayidii %96 qooddatus jira.

sourceString: Whereas civets and other animals in the markets have been found to harbour viruses identical to SARS-CoV, immediate intermediate hosts for SARS-CoV-2 have not been identified.
targetString: Xirinyii fi bineensonni kan biroon gabaa irra jiran bakka mijataa vaayirasii hedduun kan akka SARS-CoV fakkaatan hedduutu keessatti argama. Kallattiidhaa baattuun SARS-CoV-2 addaan hin baafamiin jira.
translated: Siiveet fi bineensonni biroo gabaa keessa jiran vaayirasii SARS-CoV wajjin walfakkaatu kan qaban yoo ta’u, keessummeessitoonni gidduugaleessaa battalaa SARS-CoV-2 adda hin baafamne.

sourceString: Pangolin beta-CoVs strikingly homologous to SARS-CoV-2 have been found, indicating that pangolins might serve as one of intermediate hosts or pangolin beta-CoVs could contribute gene fragments to the final version of SARS-CoV-2.
targetString: Paangooliinii beta-CoVsfirooma adda ta’een gara SARS-CoV-2tti argame, paangoolinootni akka baattoo giddugaleessaa tokkootti tajaajiluu ykn paangooliinii beta-CoVs gara uumamsa xumuraa SARS-CoV-2 faffaca’iinsa jiinii uumuu danda’u.
translated: Pangolin beta-CoVs SARS-CoV-2 wajjin haala nama dinqisiisu homologous ta'an argameera, kunis pangolins akka keessummeessitoota gidduugaleessaa keessaa tokkootti tajaajiluu akka danda'u ykn pangolin beta-CoVs ciccitaa jiinii gara version isa dhumaa SARS-CoV-2 gumaachuu akka danda'u agarsiisa.

sourceString: Although questions remain, there is no evidence that SARS-CoV-2 is man-made either deliberately or accidentally.
targetString: Gaaffiiwwan kan jiran yoo ta’ellee, ragaan SARS-CoV-2 itti yaadamees ta’u dingataan namaan akka uumame ibsu hin jiru.
translated: Gaaffiin jiraatus, SARS-CoV-2 itti yaadaniis ta’e akka tasaa namni hojjete ta’uu isaa ragaan agarsiisu hin jiru.

sourceString: CoVs have returned to the limelight due to the recent outbreak of SARS-CoV-2.
targetString: CoVs’n dhukkuba battalaa SARS-CoV-2 irraa kan ka’e gara fuulleffannoo harkisuutti deebi’eera.
translated: Sababa weerara SARS-CoV-2 dhiheenya kana mudateen CoVs gara xiyyeeffannootti deebi’aniiru.

sourceString: The study of CoVs in bats and other animals has drastically changed our perception of the importance of zoonotic origins and animal reservoirs of HCoVs in human transmission.
targetString: Qo’annoon CoVs simbiroota halkanii fi bineensota biroo irratti godhamu miira barbaachisummaa madda zoonootikii fi golga bineensa HCoVs namatti daddarbuu miira keenya jijjiiree jira.
translated: Qorannoon CoVs battee fi bineensota biroo irratti gaggeeffame barbaachisummaa ka’umsa zoonotic fi kuufama bineensotaa HCoVs daddarbiinsa namaa keessatti ilaalcha qabnu haalaan jijjiireera.

sourceString: Pervasive evidence has shown that SARS-CoV, MERS-CoV and SARS-CoV-2 have a bat origin and are transmitted to humans via intermediate hosts.
targetString: Ragaan gadi fagoon akka agarsiisetti SARS-CoV, MERS-CoV fi SARS-CoV-2 bu’uura simbiroota halkanii qabu, akkasumas karaa mandhee yerootiin gara namootatti daddarbu.
translated: Ragaaleen babal’atan akka agarsiisanitti SARS-CoV, MERS-CoV fi SARS-CoV-2 ka’umsa battee kan qaban yoo ta’u, karaa keessummeessitoota gidduu galeessaatiin gara namaatti kan darban ta’uu ibsameera.

sourceString: Given that SARS-CoV infection originates from the contact between humans and civets in the markets, closing wet markets and killing civets therein could have effectively ended the SARS epidemic.
targetString: Dhibeen SARS-CoV gabaa keessatti waltuttuquu dhala namaa fi bineensa ‘civet’ jedhamuu irraa madduudhaan walqabatee gabaa cufanii bineensicha ajjeesuun tatamsa’ina SARS ni dhaaba.
translated: Infeekshiniin SARS-CoV kan maddu walqunnamtii namaa fi civets gabaa keessatti argamu irraa akka ta’e yoo ilaalle, gabaa jiidha qabu cufuu fi civets achi keessatti ajjeesuun weerara SARS bu’a qabeessa ta’een xumuruu danda’a ture.

sourceString: By the same reasoning, pangolins should be removed from wet markets to prevent zoonotic transmission, in view of the discovery of multiple lineages of pangolin beta-CoVs closely related to SARS-CoV-2.
targetString: Sababeessa qal fakkaataan, paangoliiniin sababa ittisa daddarbiinsa dhibee bineeldota irraa gara namaaf gabaa keessaa baafamuu qaba, argamsa sanyii paangoliinii yeroo ilaallu beta-CoVs’n SARS-CoV-2 waliin walitti siqeenya qaba.
translated: Sababa walfakkaatuun, hidda dhalootaa dachaa pangolin beta-CoVs SARS-CoV-2 waliin walitti dhiyeenyaan walqabatan argamuu isaanii ilaalcha keessa galchuun, daddarbiinsa zoonotic ittisuuf, pangolins gabaa jiidha qabu irraa baafamuu qabu.

sourceString: However, whether and how SARS-CoV-2 is transmitted to humans through pangolins and other mammals remain to be clarified in future investigations.
targetString: Yoo ta’eyyuu, haalli tatamsa’iinsa SARS-CoV-2 kara paangooliinii fi hoosistoota kan biroo gara namootaatti daddarbu ammas gara fuulduraatti qorannoon qulqullaa’uu qaba.
translated: Haa ta'u malee, SARS-CoV-2 karaa pangolins fi hoosistoota birootiin namatti akka darbu fi akkamitti akka daddarbu qorannoo gara fuula duraatti taasifamu keessatti qulqullaa'uu qaba.

sourceString: On the other hand, MERS-CoV has existed in dromedary camels for a long time.
targetString: Gama biroon immoo, MERS-CoV vaayirasiin jedhamu kun yeroo dheeraaf Gaalota Eshi’aa dhihaa fi Africaa kaabaa keessa jiraataa tureera.
translated: Gama biraatiin MERS-CoV gaala dromedary keessatti yeroo dheeraaf jiraachaa ture.

sourceString: These camels serve as an important tool for transportation as well as a main source of meat, milk, leather and wool products for the local people.
targetString: Gaalli kun meeshaa imalaa murteessaatti tajaajila, akkasumas akka madda foonii, aannanii, oomisha gogaa fi oomisha uffataatti tajaajila.
translated: Gaalli kunniin geejjibaaf meeshaa barbaachisaa ta’uun akkasumas ummata naannoo sanaaf madda foon, aannan, gogaa fi suufii ijoo ta’uun tajaajilu.

sourceString: They are widely distributed across the Middle East and Africa.
targetString: Bal’inaan gama baha giddugaleessaa fi afrikaatti babal’ataniiru.
translated: Isaanis Baha Giddugaleessaa fi Afrikaa keessatti bal’inaan raabsamanii jiru.

sourceString: It is therefore impossible to sacrifice all camels for the control of MERS, as what was done in wild animal markets in China to prevent the spreading of SARS-CoV and SARS-CoV-2.
targetString: Sababa kanaaf, baballachuu SARS-CoV fi SARS-CoV-2 ittisuuf akka bineeldota bosonaarratti chaayinaa keessatti godhame to’annoo MERSf gaalota hunda aarsaa gochuun hin danda’amu.
translated: Kanaafuu, akkuma Chaayinaa keessatti gabaa bineensota bosonaa keessatti SARS-CoV fi SARS-CoV-2 akka hin babal’anneef hojjetameetti, to’annoo MERS’f gaala hunda aarsaa gochuun hin danda’amu.
