sourceString: To stop the recurrent outbreaks of MERS, a comprehensive approach should be taken to develop effective vaccines against MERS-CoV for camels, in combination with other infection control measures.
targetString: Weerara MERS yeroo ammaa kana dhaabuuf, tooftaalee too’annaa dhukkubootaa biroo wajjiin walitti dabaluun talaalliin amansiisaa ta’e kan MERS-CoV ittisu gaalaaf qophaa’uu qaba.
translated: Weerara MERS irra deddeebiin mul’atu dhaabuuf, tarkaanfiiwwan to’annoo infekshinii biroo waliin walqabatee, talaallii MERS-CoV bu’a qabeessa ta’e gaalaaf qopheessuuf mala bal’aa ta’e fudhatamuu qaba.

sourceString: As we are not able to eliminate these viruses, new genotypes might emerge to cause outbreaks.
targetString: Vaayirasii kana guutumatti dhabamsiisuun waan hin danda’amneef jiinootaayippiin haarofni weerara fidu mul’achuu danda’a.
translated: Vaayirasoota kana dhabamsiisuu waan hin dandeenyeef, jeenootaayipoonni haaraan mul’achuun weerara kana fiduu danda’u.

sourceString: A variety of zoonotic CoVs are circulating in the wild.
targetString: Zoonootik CoVs garaagaraatu bosona keessa marmaaraa jira.
translated: CoVn zoonotic adda addaa bosona keessatti naanna’aa jiru.

sourceString: Particularly, bat CoVs with zoonotic potential are so diverse.
targetString: Muraasa, simbira halkanii irraa kan dhufu CoVs fi bineeldota irraa gara namaatti kan darbu garaa garummaa qaba.
translated: Keessattuu, Bat CoVs kanneen zoonotic potential qaban akkas adda adda.

sourceString: There are plenty of opportunities that these zoonotic CoVs evolve and recombine, resulting in the emergence of new CoVs that are more transmissible and/or deadly in humans in future.
targetString: Carraawwan CoVs ittiin dagaaganii fi walitti makaman hedduutu jira, mul’achuu CoVs haarawaa baay’ee daddarboo ta’anii fi ajjeesanii hordofsiisaa jira.
translated: Carraan CoVn zoonotic kun itti guddatuu fi irra deebi’anii walitti makamuu baay’eedha, kunis CoV haaraa gara fuulduraatti nama keessatti caalaatti daddarbuu fi/ykn lubbuu namaa galaafatu akka uumamu taasisa.

sourceString: The culture of eating wild animals in some places of China should be abandoned to reduce unnecessary contact between humans and animals.
targetString: Aadaan bineensota bosonaa nyaachuu Chaayinaa iddoo tokko tokkotti mul’atu waltuttuqqaa namaa fi bineensota gidduu jiru hir’isuuf balaaleffatamuu qaba.
translated: Aadaan bineensota bosonaa nyaachuu bakkeewwan Chaayinaa tokko tokkotti dhiisuun wal qunnamtii hin barbaachifne namaa fi bineensota gidduu jiru hir'isuu qaba.

sourceString: With the ordeals of SARS, MERS and COVID-19, a better preparedness and response plan should be in place.
targetString: Rakkina SARS, MERS fi COVID-19, irraakan ka’e qophiifi deebiin iddootti qophaa’uu ta’a.
translated: Rakkoolee SARS, MERS fi COVID-19 mudatan waliin, karoorri qophii fi deebii fooyya'aa ta'e qabamuu qaba.

sourceString: In fact, many viruses have existed in the planet for a very long time.
targetString: Dhugaamatti, vaayirasootni baay’een plaanetiirra yeoo dheeraaf turaniiru.
translated: Dhugaa dubbachuuf vaayirasoonni hedduun yeroo baayyee dheeraaf pilaaneetii kanarra jiraataniiru.

sourceString: They stay in their own natural reservoirs until there is a chance for spillover.
targetString: Hamma carraan bahaa argamutti hammattuuwwan uumamaa isaanii keessa turu.
translated: Hanga carraan dhangala’uu danda’utti kuufama uumamaa mataa isaanii keessa turu.

sourceString: Although bats have many features that favours the spreading of viruses, the chance for humans to be in contact with bats and other wildlife species can be minimized if people are educated to stay away from them.
targetString: Simbirroonni halkanii mallattoowwan vaayirasii tamsaasuu ishee agarsiisan hedduu qabaattus karaan itti dhalli namaa simbiroota halkanii fi bineensota bosonaa biroo wajjiin tuttuqqaan qaba hir’achuu danda’u haala kamiin namoonni haala itti isaan irraa fagaatan irratti yoo barataniidha.
translated: Baattoonni amala babal’ina vaayirasichaaf mijatan hedduu qabaatanis, namoonni isaan irraa fagaachuuf yoo baratan carraan ilmaan namaa battee fi gosoota bineensota bosonaa biroo wajjin wal qunnamuu xiqqaachuu danda’a.

sourceString: Continuous surveillance in mammals is necessary for better understanding of the ecology of CoVs and their natural hosts, which will prove useful in preventing animal-to-human transmission and future outbreaks.
targetString: Bineensa harma hoosisoo ta’an itti fufiinsaan hordofuun naannawa golga uumamaa CoVs baruuf fayyada, kunis gara fuulduraatti tatamsa’ina dhibee bineensaa fi nama gidduutti gara fuulduraa uumamuu danda’u beekuu fi too’achuuf fayyada.
translated: Hordoffiin itti fufiinsa qabu hoosistoota irratti taasifamu ikoloojii CoV fi keessummeessitoota uumamaa isaanii haala gaariin hubachuuf barbaachisaa dha, kunis daddarbiinsa bineensotaa gara namaatti fi weerara gara fuula duraa ittisuu keessatti faayidaa qaba.

sourceString: To conclude, the most effective way to prevent viral zoonosis is for humans to stay away from the ecological niches of the natural reservoirs of the zoonotic viruses.
targetString: Guduunfuudhaaf, karaan bu’a qabeessi babal’achuu vaayirasii ittiin ttifnu namootaaf- bakka biqiloota vaayirasii huboo ta’an qaburraa fagaachuudha.
translated: Xumura irratti, karaan bu’a qabeessa ta’een dhukkuba vaayirasii zoonoosii ittisuuf gargaaru, ilmaan namootaa bakka ikoloojii kuufama uumamaa vaayirasii zoonoosii irraa fagaachuudha.

sourceString: Several pieces in the puzzle of the zoonotic origin of SARS-CoV-2 are still missing.
targetString: Sanyiiwwan SARS-CoV-2 hedduun hanga ammaatti badaa jiru.
translated: Puzzle ka'umsa zoonotic SARS-CoV-2 keessatti kutaaleen hedduun ammallee hin argamne.

sourceString: First, if bats transmit an ancestral virus of SARS-CoV-2 to pangolins, it will be of interest to see under what circumstances bats and pangolins could share the same ecological niche.
targetString: Jalqaba, yoo simbirri halkanii vaayirasii SARS-CoV-2 paangoliiniitti dabarsan, haala akkamii keessatti simbirri halkanii fi paangoliiniin bakka jireenyaa tokko qooddachuu isaanii arguun nama fayyada.
translated: Tokkoffaa, yoo batteen vaayirasii akaakayyuu SARS-CoV-2 gara pangolins dabarsan, haala akkamii keessatti battes fi pangolins niche ikoloojii tokko qooddachuu akka danda'an ilaaluun nama hawwata.

sourceString: Second, if bats play a more direct role in human transmission, how humans get into contact with bats should be determined.
targetString: Lammaffaa irratti, gara namaatti dabarsuuf yoo simbira halkaniitu ga’ee guddaa qaba ta’eef, akkamittiin namoonni simbira halkanii wajjin wal-tuttuqu kan jedhu yaadamuu qaba.
translated: Lammaffaa, batteewwan daddarbiinsa namaa keessatti gahee kallattiidhaan kan qaban yoo taʼe, namoonni akkamitti battee wajjin akka wal qunnaman murtaaʼuu qaba.

sourceString: Third, if a third mammal acts as the true intermediate host, how it interacts with the different species including humans, bats and pangolins has to be clarified.
targetString: Sadaffaa, yoo bineensi hoosisaan akka mandhee giddugaleessa dhugaatti tajaajila ta’e, nama dabalatee sanyiiwwan biroo wajjiin akkamitti akka walqunnamu, simbirroonni halkanii yookaan Paangoliiniin adda bahuu qabu.
translated: Sadaffaa, hoosistuun sadaffaan akka keessummeessituu gidduugaleessaa dhugaatti yoo hojjete, akkamitti gosoota adda addaa nama, battee fi pangolins dabalatee waliin akka walqunnamu ifa ta’uu qaba.

sourceString: Finally, since many mammals including domestic animals might be susceptible to SARS-CoV-2, both surveillance and experimental infection should be conducted.
targetString: Walumaagalattu, erga hoosiftoonni beeyiladootas dabalatee SARS-CoV-2 saaxilamoo ta’anii too’annoo fi qorannoon dhukkubichaa gaggeeffamuu qaba.
translated: Dhumarratti, bineensota manaa dabalatee hoosistoonni hedduun SARS-CoV-2f saaxilamoo ta’uu waan danda’aniif, hordoffiin fi yaalii infekshiniin lamaan isaanii iyyuu gaggeeffamuu qabu.

sourceString: Should it be a bat, a pangolin or another mammal, it is expected that SARS-CoV-2 or its parental viruses that are almost identical will be identified in its natural hosts in future.
targetString: Simbira halkanii ta’uu qaba, paangoliinii ykn hoosiftoota biroo, SARS-CoV-2 ykn vaayirasiiwwan maatiiwwan warra adda ba’anii wajjin baattoowwan uumamaa fuulduraa ta’uusaatu eegama.
translated: Yoo battee, pangolin ykn hoosistuu biraa ta'e, SARS-CoV-2 ykn vaayirasoonni warra isaa walfakkaatan jechuun ni danda'ama gara fuulduraatti keessummeessitoota uumamaa isaa keessatti adda baafamu jedhamee eegama.

sourceString: Continued investigations in this area will elucidate the evolutionary pathway of SARS-CoV-2 in animals, with important implications in the prevention and control of COVID-19 in humans.
targetString: Qorannoon naannoo kanatti itti fufe karaa daddarbiinsa SARS-CoV-2 bineensota keessatti, ittisaa fi to’annoo COVID-19 nama keessatti qabu gabaasa barbaachisaan ni ibsa.
translated: Qorannoon itti fufiinsaan gama kanaan taasifamu karaa jijjiirama SARS-CoV-2 bineensota keessatti mul’atu kan ifa taasisu yoo ta’u, ittisaa fi to’annoo COVID-19 nama irratti dhiibbaa guddaa qaba.

sourceString: Updating the diagnostic criteria of COVID-19 “suspected case” and “confirmed case” is necessary
targetString: Ulaagaa qorannaa mallattoo “nama shakkamaa” fi “nama mirkaneeffamaa” COVID-19 fooyyessuun barbaachisaadha.
translated: Ulaagaalee adda baasuu COVID-19 “dhibee shakkame” fi “dhibee mirkanaa’e” haaromsuun barbaachisaa dha

sourceString: On 6 February 2020, our team had published a rapid advice guideline for diagnosis and treatment of 2019 novel coronavirus (2019-nCoV) infection, and this guideline provided our experience and make well reference for fighting against this pandemic worldwide.
targetString: Gurraandhala 6, 2020, gartuun keenya gorsa qajeelcha qo’annoo fi yaalii bara 2019 dhibee vaayirasii koroonaa haaraa (2019-nCoV) dhiyeesse; qajeelchi kun immoo muuxannoo keenya qooduu fi weeraricha akka addunyaatti to’achuuf hube-uumaa gaariidha.
translated: Fulbaana 6 bara 2020 gareen keenya qajeelfama gorsa ariifataa adda baasuu fi wal’aansa infekshinii vaayirasii koroonaa asoosama (2019-nCoV) bara 2019 maxxansee ture, qajeelfamni kun muuxannoo keenya kan kenne yoo ta’u, addunyaa guutuutti weerara kana ofirraa ittisuuf wabii gaarii ta’eera.

sourceString: However, the coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19) is a new disease, our awareness and knowledge are gradually increasing based on the ongoing research findings and clinical practice experience; hence, the strategies of diagnosis and treatment are also continually updated.
targetString: Haa ta’u malee, dhibeen vaayirasii koroonaa 2019 (COVID-19) dhibee haaraadha, argannoowwan qo’annoo adeemsifamaa jiraniitii fi muuxannoo shaakala dhukkubsattootaa irratti hundaa’uudhaan hubannoo fi beekumsi keenya suuta guddataa deemaa jira; kanaaf, malawwan ittiin mallattoo qorataniifi wal’aananis itti fufiinsaan fooyya’aa jiru.
translated: Haa ta'u malee dhibeen vaayirasii koroonaa bara 2019 (COVID-19) dhibee haaraa waan ta'eef, argannoo qorannoo gaggeeffamaa jiruu fi muuxannoo hojii kilinikaa irratti hundaa'uun hubannoo fi beekumsi keenya suuta suutaan dabalaa jira; kanarraa ka’uun tooftaaleen adda baasuu fi wal’aansaas itti fufiinsaan haaromfama.

sourceString: In this letter, we answered one comment on our guideline and provided the newest diagnostic criteria of “suspected case” and “confirmed case” according to the latest Diagnosis and Treatment Guidelines for COVID-19 (seventh version) that issued by the National Health Committee of the People’s Republic of China.
targetString: Xalayaa kana keessatti, qajeelfama keenya irratti yaada tokkoof deebii kenninee ulaagaa mallattoo qorachuu haarawa, kan “namoota shakkaman” fi “namoota qabamuun isaanii mirkanaa’e” jedhu dhiyeessine, akkaataama Qajeelfamoota Qorannoo Mallattootii fi Wal’aansa COVID-19 isa baay’ee dhiyoo (marsaa torbaffaa) isa Koree Biyyoolessaa Fayyaa Rippaabilika Uummata Chaayinaatiin gad dhiifame.
translated: Xalayaa kana keessatti qajeelfama keenya irratti yaada tokko deebisnee akkaataa Qajeelfama Qorannoo fi Wal’aansa COVID-19 isa haaraa (seventh version) kan Koreen Fayyaa Biyyaalessaatiin baaseen ulaagaa adda baasuu haaraa “dhibee shakkame” fi “dhibee mirkanaa’e” jedhu dhiheessineerra kan Rippabiliika Ummata Chaayinaa.

sourceString: In December 2019, the 2019 novel coronavirus (2019-nCoV) has caused an outbreak, which is now officially named as the coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19) and the virus has been named severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2).
targetString: Vaayirasii koroonaa 2019 inni haaraan (2019-nCoV), inni amma seerumaan dhukkuba vaayirasii koroonaa 2019 (COVID-19) jedhamee moggaafamee vaayirasiin isaa immoo mallattoo rakkoo hafuuraa hamaa vaayirasii koroonaa 2 (SARS-CoV-2) jedhamee moggaafame, Muddee 2019 keessa jalqabe.
translated: Muddee 2019 keessa vaayirasiin asoosama koronaa bara 2019 (2019-nCoV) weerara kan uume yoo ta’u, amma ifatti dhukkuba koronaavaayirasii 2019 (COVID-19) jedhamee kan moggaafame yoo ta’u, vaayirasiin kun severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV- 2019) jedhamee moggaafame. 2).

sourceString: On 11 March 2020, WHO characterized COVID-19 as a pandemic.
targetString: Bitootessa 11 bara 2020 dhaabbanni fayyaa addunyaa (WHO)n COVID-19 dhibee weerara addunyaa jedhee moggaase.
translated: Amajjii 11 bara 2020 WHOn COVID-19 akka weerara dhukkubaatti amala itti kenne.

sourceString: In order to fight against the SARS-CoV-2 infection, our team has developed a rapid advice guideline and that has been published online in Military Medical Research on 06 February 2020.
targetString: Dhukkuba SARS-CoV-2 ittisuuf gareen keenya qajeelfama gorsa atattamaa baasee jira, kun immoo Gurraandhala 06, 2020 Qo’annoo Fayyaa Loltuu keessatti toora intarneetiirratti maxxanfamee jira.
translated: Infeekshinii SARS-CoV-2 ittisuuf gareen keenya qajeelfama gorsa ariifataa kan qopheesse yoo ta’u, kunis Fulbaana 06 bara 2020 Qorannoo Fayyaa Waraanaa irratti toora interneetii irratti maxxanfameera.

sourceString: It has attracted a great attention since published.
targetString: Erga maxxanfamee qalbii namoota hedduu hawwatee jira.
translated: Erga maxxanfamee booda xiyyeeffannoo guddaa hawwateera.

sourceString: Note however that COVID-19 is a new disease, our awareness and knowledge is gradually increasing based on the ongoing research findings and clinical practice experience; hence, the strategies of diagnosis and treatment are also continually updated.
targetString: Haa ta’u malee, dhibeen COVID-19 dhibee haaraa ta’uu hubadhu, hubannoo fi beekumsi keenya immoo argannoowwan qo’annoo adeemsifamaa jiraniitii fi muuxannoo shaakala dhukkubsattootaa irratti hundaa’uudhaan suuta guddataa deemaa jira; kanaaf, malawwan ittiin mallattoo qorataniifi wal’aananis itti fufiinsaan fooyya’aa jiru.
translated: Hubadhaa garuu COVID-19 dhukkuba haaraa ta’uu isaa, argannoo qorannoo gaggeeffamaa jiruu fi muuxannoo hojii kilinikaa irratti hundaa’uun hubannoo fi beekumsi keenya suuta suutaan dabalaa jira; kanarraa ka’uun tooftaaleen adda baasuu fi wal’aansaas itti fufiinsaan haaromfama.

sourceString: For instance the Diagnosis and Treatment Guidelines for COVID-19 issued by the National Health Committee of the People’s Republic of China (http://www.nhc.gov.cn/), among 16 January 2020 to 3 March 2020, has issued a total of seven editions with some contexts being substantively changed.
targetString: Fakkeenyaaf, Qajeelfamoonni Mallattoolee Qorachuutii fi Wal’aansaa COVID-19f Koree Fayyaa Biyyoolessaa Rippaabiliikii Uummattootaa Chaayinaatiin gad dhiifame (http://www.nhc.gov.cn/), Amajjii 16 2020 hanga Bitootessa 3, 2020 keessatti, maxxansaalee waliigalaa torba kanneen haalonni isaanii tokko tokko baay’ee jijjiiramanii baasee jira.
translated: Fakkeenyaaf Qajeelfamni Qorannoo fi Wal’aansa COVID-19 Koreen Fayyaa Biyyaalessaa Rippabiliika Ummata Chaayinaatiin (http://www.nhc.gov.cn/) bahe, Guraandhala 16 bara 2020 hanga Amajjii 3 bara 2020 gidduutti, baase a walumaa galatti maxxansa torba kan qaban yoo ta’u, yaadonni tokko tokko haala qabatamaa ta’een kan jijjiiraman ta’uu ibsameera.

sourceString: Now our guideline received a comment by Zhou et al., they introduced a simple scoring proposal based on their clinical experience.
targetString: Qajeelfama keenyaaf yeroo ammaatti ‘Zhou et al.’ irraa yaada argannee jirra, muuxannoo dhukkubsataa irratti qaban irraa ka’uun wixinee qabxii galmeessuu salphaa ta’e eegalan.
translated: Amma qajeelfamni keenya yaada Zhou fi kkf argate, isaan muuxannoo kilinikaa isaanii irratti hundaa’uun yaada qabxii kennuu salphaa dhiyeessan.

sourceString: Their work added new evidence for our guideline and also make valuable reference for this pandemic worldwide.
targetString: Hojiin isaanii qajeelfama keenyaaf ragaa haarawa dabale, kana malees, weerara dhibee daddarbaa addunyaa guutuu kanaaf ragaa gatii guddaa qabu ta’e.
translated: Hojiin isaanii qajeelfama keenyaaf ragaa haaraa kan dabale yoo ta’u, akkasumas addunyaa guutuutti weerara kanaaf wabii gatii guddaa qabu ta’a.

sourceString: We endorse their significant work and express our thanks.
targetString: Hojii isaanii barbaachisaadhaaf beekamtii kennaa akkasumas galata keenya isinii ibsina.
translated: Hojii isaanii isa guddaa ni deggerra, galata keenyas ni ibsina.

sourceString: However, their work also needs update according to the latest Diagnosis and Treatment Guidelines for COVID-19 (Trial seventh version) and recently studies.
targetString: Haa ta’u malee, hojiin isaanii qorannoo haaraa fi yaalii toora qajeelchaa COVID-19 (yaalii fooyyya’iinsaa torbaffaa) waliin walqabatee haarayiinsas ni barbaada.
translated: Haa ta'u malee, hojiin isaaniis akkaataa Qajeelfama Qorannoo fi Wal'aansa COVID-19 isa haaraa (Trial seventh version) fi qorannoowwan dhiyeenyatti baheen haaromsa barbaada.

sourceString: According to the seventh edition (3 March 2020), to confirm the suspected case needs to combine any one item of epidemiological history features with two items of clinical manifestations to make a comprehensive analysis, or needs to meet three items of clinical manifestations if without clear epidemiological history:
targetString: Akkaataa maxxansa isa torbaffaatti (Bitootessa 3, 2020), dhukkubsataa shakkame qabamuu isaa mirkaneessuuf amaloota seenaa dhukkubootaa keessaa tokko mallattoo dhukkubsataa keessaa lama walitti fidanii qaaccessa waliigalaa taasisuu barbaachisa, yookaan seenaa dhukkubaa ifa ta’e hinqabu yoo ta’e, mallattoolee dhukkubsataa sadii guutuu qaba.
translated: Akka maxxansa torbaffaa (3 Amajjii 2020)tti, dhibee shakkame mirkaneessuuf meeshaa tokko kamiyyuu amala seenaa weeraraa fi wantoota mul’annoo kilinikaa lama waliin walitti makuun xiinxala bal’aa gochuu qaba, ykn wantoota mul’annoo kilinikaa sadii guutuu qaba yoo ifa hin taane seenaa dhibee daddarbaa:

sourceString: Epidemiological history: (1) a history of travel or residence in Wuhan city and surrounding areas, or other communities where COVID-19 cases had been reported in the last 14 days before symptom onset; (2) a history of contact with SARS-CoV-2 infectious cases (with positive nucleic acid test); (3) a history of contacting with patients with fever or respiratory symptoms from Wuhan city and surrounding areas, or other communities where COVID-19 had been reported in the last 14 days before symptom onset; (4) a history of contacting with cluster of confirmed cases (≥ 2 cases with fever and/or respiratory symptoms occurred within 2 weeks in small areas, such as home, office, class of school, etc).
targetString: Seenaa qo’annoo faffaca’iinsaa fi to’annaa dhibee: (1) seenaa imalaa yookaan magaalaa Wuhaanii fi naannoo isii keessa jiraachuu yookaan hawaasota biroo dhukkubni COVID-19 guyyoota 14 dura utuu mallattoo hin agarsiisin dura gabaafame; (2) namoota dhukkuba daddarbaa SARS-CoV-2 tiin qabaman waliin tuttuqii qabaachuu (qorannoo niiwukilaay asiid poozetiivii ta’e); (3) seenaa dhukkubsattoota qaama gubaa yookaan mallattoolee hafuura baafannaa qaban, kanneen magaalaa Wuhaaniifi naannoo isaa irraa dhufan, yookaan hawaasota biroo kan guyyoota 14 dura utuu mallattooleen hin eegalin COVID-19 irraa gabaafame irraa dhufan waliin tuttuqqii qabaachuu; (4)tuuta dhukkubsattootaa dhukkubicha qabaachuun isaanii mirkaneeffame (dhukkubsattoota 2 fi isaa ol kan qaama gubaa fi/yookaan mallattooleen hafuura baafannaa torban 2 keessatti irratti argaman, bakkeewwan xixiqqaa akka mana, waajjira, daree mana barnootaa fi kkf keessatti) waliin seenaa tuttuqqii qabaachuu.
translated: Seenaa dhibee daddarbaa: (1) seenaa imala ykn jireenyaa magaalaa Wuhaanii fi naannoo ishee, ykn hawaasa biroo mallattoon dhukkubaa osoo hin mul’atin guyyoota 14 darban keessatti namoonni COVID-19 qabaman itti gabaafame; (2) seenaa tuttuqaa namoota SARS-CoV-2 daddarban (qorannoo niwuukilii asiidii pozaatiivii ta’een); (3) seenaa dhukkubsattoota mallattoo ho’a qaamaa ykn sirna hargansuu qaban magaalaa Wuhaanii fi naannoo ishee irraa, ykn hawaasa biroo COVID-19 guyyoota 14 darban keessatti osoo mallattoon hin mul’atin dura itti gabaafame waliin wal qunnamuu; (4) seenaa tuuta namoota dhukkuba kanaan qabaman mirkanaa’ee wajjin wal qunnamuu (≥ namoonni 2 ho’a qaamaa fi/ykn mallattoolee sirna hargansuu qaban torban 2 keessatti naannoo xixiqqoo, kan akka manaa, waajjira, kutaa mana barumsaa fi kkf keessatti mul’atan).

sourceString: Clinical manifestations: (1) fever and/ or respiratory symptoms; (2) with imaging features of COVID-19 infection; (3) total white blood cell counts showing normal, decreased, or reduced lymphocyte count in the early onset stage.
targetString: Mul’isa kilinikaa: (1) ho’ina qaamaa fi/ykn mallattoolee; (2) tarreeffama suuraa dhibee COVID-19 wajjin; (3) seeliin dhiiga diimaa waliigalaa sirrii ta’u agarsiisu, sadarkaa hubee jalqabaa irratti lakkoofsa lymphocyte gadi bu’e ykn hir’ate.
translated: Mul’annoo kilinikaa: (1) ho’a qaamaa fi/ykn mallattoolee sirna hargansuu; (2) amala suuraa infekshinii COVID-19 waliin; (3) lakkoofsa seelii dhiiga adii waliigalaa sadarkaa jalqabaa jalqabaa irratti lakkoofsa limfoosaayitii idilee, hir’achuu ykn hir’achuu agarsiisu.

sourceString: Diagnosing the confirmed case should base on suspected case with any one item of pathogenic or serological evidence as following: (1) real-time PCR test positive for SARS-CoV-2; (2) viral whole genome sequencing showing high homogeneity to the known novel coronaviruses; (3) positive for the specific IgM antibody and IgG antibody to SARS-CoV-2 in serum test; or a change of the SARS-CoV-2-specific IgG antibody from negative to positive, or titer rising ≥4 times in the recovery phase above that in the acute phase.
targetString: Dhukkubsattoota mirkaneeffaman mallattoo dhukkuba isaanii qorachuun haala armaan gadiitiin namoota shakkaman, kanneen ragaa wantoota dhukkuba fidanii yookaan qorannoo dhiigaa keessaa tokko qabanii irratti hundaa’uu qaba: (1) qorannoo PCR yerooma sanatti SARS-CoV-2 dhaan qabamuu mul’isu. (2) wantoonni vaayirasiin qabu guutummaan isaa toora galee vaayirasii koroonaa haarawaan walfakkeenya guddaa yoo qabaate; (3) antiibodii IgM addaatii fi antiibodii IgG SARS-CoV-2 qorannoo dhiigaa keessaatiif poozetiivii yoo ta’e; yookaan antiibodiin addaa IgG SARS-CoV-2 negetiivii irraa gara poozetiiviitti jijjiiramuu, yookaan sadarkaa fooyya’uu keessatti antiibodiin isa yeroo dhukkubi itti ammaatee jiruu caalaa harka 4 fi isaa oliin ol ka’uu.
translated: Dhukkuba mirkanaa’e adda baasuun nama shakkame irratti hundaa’uun ragaa paatojeenikii ykn seerooloojii meeshaa tokko kamiyyuu akka armaan gadiitti qabaachuu qaba: (1) qorannoo PCR yeroo dhugaa SARS-CoV-2 qabaachuu; (2) tartiiba jiinooma guutuu vaayirasii kan vaayirasii koroonaa asoosama beekaman waliin walfakkeenya olaanaa agarsiisu; (3) qorannoo seerumi keessatti farra qaama IgM addaa fi farra qaama IgG SARS-CoV-2 irratti pozaatiivii; ykn jijjiirama farra qaama IgG SARS-CoV-2-specific IgG negaatiivii irraa gara pozaatiiviitti, ykn titer marsaa fayyinaa keessatti dachaa ≥4 kan marsaa acute ol ka’uu.

sourceString: We can see that the real-time PCR test for nucleic acid in respiratory tract or blood samples was added to the second (18 January 2020) and third (22 January 2020) editions.
targetString: Qorannoon ‘PCR’, inni yerooma qorannootti nuukiliik asiidiin ujummoo qilleensaa yookaan samuuda dhiigaa keessa jiraachuu qoratu maxxansaawwan lammaffaa (Amajjii 18, 2020) fi sadaffaa (Amajjii 22, 2020) tti dabalamuu isaa arguu dandeenya.
translated: Qorannoon yeroo dhugaa PCR niwuukilii asiidii ujummoo sirna hargansuu ykn saamuda dhiigaa keessatti argamu maxxansa lammaffaa (18 Guraandhala 2020) fi sadaffaa (22 Guraandhala 2020) irratti akka dabalame arguu dandeenya.

sourceString: The pathogenic detection of blood sample was added to the fourth (27 January 2020) and fifth (8 February 2020) editions; and then the serological evidence was added to the seventh edition.
targetString: Naamunaa dhiigaa fuudhame keessatti lubbuulee xixiqqooo dhukkuba fidan keessaa arguuf kan qabame; arfaffaa (amajji 27-2020), shanaffaa (gur8-2020) ilaalama, fi kan dhiigaa gulaala torbaffaa irratti ba’a.
translated: Saamuda dhiigaa paatogenic detection maxxansa afraffaa (27 Guraandhala 2020) fi shanaffaa (8 Fulbaana 2020) irratti dabalameera; achiis ragaan seerooloojii maxxansa torbaffaa irratti dabalame.

sourceString: These modifications based on the researchers continued work that to search for an optimal nucleic acid detection kit for rapid diagnosis, as well as the samples from respiratory tract including blood sampling, which increased the availability of different specimens, and supported bringing the specific antibody positive result into the confirmed criteria.
targetString: Fooyya’iinsonni hojii itti fufaa qorattootaarratti hundaa’an kunniin qorannoo mallattoolee saffisa qabuuf meeshaa filatamaa nuukliik asiidii adda baasu barbaachuun, akkasumas samuudonni ujummoo qilleensaa keessaa fuudhaman samuuda dhiigaa dabalatee, kanneen argamuu fakkeenyota (specimen) garaagaraa guddisanii fi bu’aa poozetiivii ‘antiiboodii’ adda ta’ee ulaagaa mirkanaa’e keessa fiduu deeggaran.
translated: Fooyya'iinsi kun qorattoota irratti hundaa'uun hojii itti fufe kan saffisaan adda baasuuf meeshaa niwuukilii asiidii adda baasuu mijatu barbaaduuf, akkasumas saamuda ujummoo sirna hargansuu irraa saamuda dhiigaa dabalatee, kunis argama saayimenii adda addaa dabale, fi bu'aa farra qaama addaa pozaatiivii fiduu kan deeggare ulaagaa mirkanaa’e keessa galcha.

sourceString: Besides, there are more and more evidence that remind us to caution with the atypical symptomatic and asymptomatic patients.
targetString: Kana malees, dhukkubsattoota mallattoo agarsiisaniifi mallattoo hin agarsiisne irraa akka of eeggannuuf ragaaleen nu yaadachiisan daddabalaa dhufaniiru.
translated: Kana malees, dhukkubsattoota mallattoo atypical fi mallattoo hin qabne waliin of eeggannoo gochuu akka qabnu ragaaleen nu yaadachiisan baay’achaa dhufeera.

sourceString: Hence, the flow chart of Zhou et al. should be updated, as they classified the person without clinical symptoms as “low risk”.
targetString: Kanaaf, gabateen yaa’aa ‘Zout et al.’ fooyya’uu qaba, nama mallattoo dhukkubaa hinqabne “carraan qabamuu xiqqaa” jedhanii waan adda baasaniif.
translated: Kanarraa ka’uun, chaartiin yaa’aa Zhou fi kkf. haaromfamuu qaba, sababiin isaas nama mallattoo kilinikaa hin qabne “balaa xiqqaa” jedhanii waan ramadaniif.

sourceString: The score system also needs to be verified in further clinical practice and studies.
targetString: Malli qabxii itti kennanis hojii mana yaalaa fi qo’annoo dabalataatiin mirkaneeffamuu qaba.
translated: Sirni qabxii hojii kilinikaa fi qorannoo dabalataa keessattis mirkanaa’uu qaba.

sourceString: To conclude, we hope more direct evidence coming up and call for readers to provide their comments.
targetString: Gudunfaadhaaf, dubbistoota hundumtuu akka yaada kennanitti ragaa qabatamaan dhufaa akka jiru abdii qabna.
translated: Xumura irratti ragaaleen kallattiin dabalataa akka dhufan abdii qabna, dubbistoonnis yaada isaanii akka kennan waamicha qabna.

sourceString: For the diagnosis of “suspected case” and “confirmed case”, we suggest to trace and obey the newest guidelines of their home countries.
targetString: Qorannoo mallattoolee “namoota shakkamanii” fi “namoota qabamuun isaanii mirkanaa’ee” tiif qajeelfamoota biyya isaanii isa baay’ee dhiyoo akka barbaadaniifi hordofaniif yaada dhiyeessinaaf.
translated: “Dhimma shakkame” fi “dhibee mirkanaa’e” adda baasuuf, qajeelfama haaraa biyyoota dhaloota isaanii hordofanii akka bitaman yaada dhiyeessina.

sourceString: Our team will also timely update our guideline to offer help.
targetString: Gareen keenya isin gargaaruudhaaf qajeelfama keenya yeroo yerootti ni haaressa.
translated: Gareen keenyas qajeelfama keenya yeroon haaromsuun gargaarsa ni kenna.

sourceString: Bangladesh reports five new deaths due to COVID-19, a daily highest
targetString: Baangilaadesh namoota shan sababa COVID-19’tiin du’an, isa olaanaa kan ta’e gabaafte.
translated: Baanglaadeesh sababa COVID-19n lubbuun namoota haaraa shan kan du'an yoo ta'u, guyyaatti ol'aanaadha

sourceString: Yesterday, Bangladesh has confirmed five new deaths due to COVID-19 on the day.
targetString: Kaleessa Baangilaadish guyyicharra namoota haarawa COVID-19 irraa kan ka’e du’an shan mirkaneessiteetti.
translated: Guyyaa kaleessaa Baanglaadeesh guyyaa sanatti sababa COVID-19n lubbuun namoota 5 haaraa ta’uu mirkaneesse.

sourceString: This is the highest number of fatalities in a day due to the virus.
targetString: Kun guyyaa tokko keessatti lakkoofsa du’a vaayiresicharraa maddee isa olaanaadha.
translated: Kunis sababa vaayirasichaan guyyaa tokkotti lubbuun namoota hedduu darbeedha.

sourceString: As of yesterday, Bangladesh's Institute of Epidemiology, Disease Control and Research (IEDCR) reported the number of recorded infected cases included 114 active cases and 33 recovered cases who were staying home.
targetString: Guyyaa kaleessaa, Institute of Epidemiology, Disease Control and Research (IEDCR)’n Baangilaadish akka gabaasetti lakkoofsi namoota haarawa qabamanii 114 fi kanneen dhukkubicha irraa dandamatanii mana isaanii turaa jiran 33 dha.
translated: Hanga kaleessaatti Inistiitiyuutiin Dhibee Daddarbaa, To’annoo fi Qorannoo Dhukkuboota Baanglaadeesh (IEDCR) akka gabaasetti lakkoofsi namoota vaayirasichaan qabaman galmaa’an namoota 114 active cases fi 33 vaayirasichaan dandamatan kanneen mana turanii turan.

sourceString: A total of 17 deaths have been recorded.
targetString: Du’a waliigalaa 17tu galmaa’e.
translated: Waliigalatti lubbuun namoota 17 galmaa'eera.

sourceString: In an online news briefing, the director of IEDCR, Dr Meerjady Sabrina Flora, said the fatalities included four males and one female.
targetString: Walga’ii oduu oonlaayinii taasifamu irratti, qindeessaan ‘IEDCR’, Dr Merjaadii Saabiriinaa Filooraa, namoonni du’an dhiira afurii fi dhalaa tokkodha jedhan.
translated: Ibsa oduu toora interneetii irratti kennaniin, daayreektarri IEDCR, Dr Meerjady Sabrina Flora akka jedhanitti, namoonni lubbuun isaanii darbe dhiirota afuriifi dubartii tokko akka ta’e himaniiru.

sourceString: According to Dr Meerjady, two cases were aged above 60, two between 51 and 60, and one 41-50 years old.
targetString: Akka Dr Meerjaadiin jedhanitti, dhukkubsattoonni lama umuriin isaanii 60 oli, lama 51 fi 60 gidduu, tokko ammoo 41 hanga 50 tti dha.
translated: Akka Dr Meerjady jedhanitti, namoonni lama umriin isaanii 60 ol, lama umriin isaanii 51 hanga 60 gidduutti, tokko ammoo umriin isaanii waggaa 41-50 ta’uu ibsameera.

sourceString: She also said two of the victims were from Dhaka.
targetString: Miidhamtoota keessaa lama Dhaka irraa dhufan jette.
translated: Namoota miidhaman keessaa lama Daakaa akka ta'es dubbatteetti.

sourceString: The World Health Organization (WHO) declared COVID-19 a pandemic on March 11.
targetString: Dhaabbanni fayyaa addunyya (WHO) COVID-19 dhibee daddarbaadha jedhee kan labse bitootessa 11.
translated: Dhaabbanni Fayyaa Addunyaa (WHO) Sadaasa 11 COVID-19 weerara ta'uu labse.

sourceString: A hospital official told Anadolu Agency, a local news outlet, that one of the deceased was Jalal Saifur Rahman, a director of Bengali Anti-Corruption Commission, who was cared for at the Kuwait Maitree Hospital.
targetString: Akka hoggantoonni dhaabbata miidiyaa biyyattii Anadolu’tti himanitti, kanneen dhukkubsatan keessaa namni hogganaa koomishiinii farra malaammaltummaa Beengaalii ta’an Jalal Saifur Rahman hospitaala kuweet Maitree’tti waldhaanaman.
translated: Qondaalli hospitaalichaa tokko miidiyaa oduu biyya keessaa Anadolu Agency jedhamutti akka himanitti, namoota du’an keessaa tokko Jalal Saifur Rahman, daayreektarri Komishinii Farra Malaammaltummaa Beengaalii kan ta’ee fi Hospitaala Kuweet Maitree keessatti kunuunfamaa ture.

sourceString: On Saturday, in an online video announcement, Bangladeshi Road Transport and Bridges Minister Obaidul Quader said public transport would be shut down for longer than initially planned, until this coming Saturday.
targetString: Dilbatarra, labsii viidiyoo keessatti, ministeeerri geejiba daandii fi riqichaa baangelaadesh Obaayidul Kuwaader akka jedhetti geejibni ummataa hamma jalqaba karoorfame caalaa cufamee tura, hamma dilbata dhufuutti.
translated: Dilbata darbe beeksisa viidiyoo toora interneetii irratti baaseen, Ministirri Geejjibaa Daandii fi Riqicha Baanglaadeesh Obaidul Quader geejjibni ummataa jalqaba karoorfame caalaa yeroo dheeraaf, hanga Dilbata dhufu kanaatti akka cufamu dubbataniiru.

sourceString: This public transport shutdown had initially started on March 26 and was planned to end on Saturday, April 4.
targetString: Sochii geejjiba uummataa dhaabuun kun Bitootessa 26 eegalee Sambata Ebla 4 xumuramuuf karoorfame.
translated: Cufamuun geejjibaa uummataa kun jalqaba Amajjii 26 kan jalqabe yoo ta'u, Dilbata Ebla 4 xumuramuuf karoorfamee ture.

sourceString: Transport of essential goods -- medical, fuel and food -- was still allowed.
targetString: Geejjibsiisi meeshaalee murteessoo—qoricha, boba’aa fi nyaata—amma iyyuu hayyamamaa ture.
translated: Geejjibni meeshaalee barbaachisoo -- yaalaa, boba'aa fi nyaataa -- ammallee hayyamameera.

sourceString: The first recorded incidents of COVID-19 infection in Bangladesh were on March 8, in two people who returned from Italy and also the wife of one of them.
targetString: Mudannaan dhibee COVID-19 jalqaba galmaa’e Baangilaadesh keessatti bitootessa 8, namoota xaaliyaaniitii deebi’an lamaa fi haadha warraasaanii keessaa tokkorrati argame.
translated: Baanglaadeesh keessatti taateewwan dhukkuba COVID-19 yeroo jalqabaaf galmaa'an Sadaasa 8, namoota lama Xaaliyaanii irraa deebi'anii fi akkasumas haadha warraa isaan keessaa tokkoo irratti.

sourceString: As of March 19, these three had already recovered.
targetString: Bitootessa 19 asitti, namoonni sadan kunniin fooyya’aniiru.
translated: Hanga Amajjii 19tti sadan kun duraan fayyaniiru.

sourceString: SARS-CoV-2 surpasses one million infections worldwide
targetString: Akka addunyaatti namoonni SARS-CoV-2 qabaman miliyoona tokko darban.
translated: SARS-CoV-2 addunyaa guutuutti namoota vaayirasichaan qabaman miliyoona tokko caala

sourceString: On Thursday, the total number of cases of the SARS-CoV-2 coronavirus infections surpassed one million worldwide, Johns Hopkins University data indicated.
targetString: Akka Yuunivarsitiin Joonsi Hoopkinsi ibsetti gaafa Kamisaa, lakkoofsi waliigalaa namoota dhukkuba SARS-Cov-2 dhaan qabamanii akka addunyaatti miliyoona tokko darbeera.
translated: Kamisa darbe akka addunyaatti lakkoofsi namoota vaayirasii koroonaa SARS-CoV-2 qabaman miiliyoona tokko caaluu ragaan Yunivarsiitii Joon Hoopkiins ni mul’isa.

sourceString: At least 52 thousand deaths were linked to COVID-19, the disease caused by the coronavirus.
targetString: Yoo xiqqaate du’i namoota kuma 52 COVID-19, dhukkuba vaayirasii koroonaatiin dhufu, waliin wal qabsiifaman.
translated: Yoo xiqqaate lubbuun namoota kuma 52 COVID-19, dhibee vaayrasii koroonaatin dhufuun walqabatee ture.

sourceString: The milestone came the same day Malawi confirmed its first coronavirus infections and Zambia had its first coronavirus-related death.
targetString: Guyyaa walfakkaataatti Maalaawii keessatti namni jalqabaa vaayirasii koroonaatiin qabame argamuunii fi Zaambiyaa keessatti namni sababa koroonaa vaayirasiitiin du’uun guyyaa murteessaa ture.
translated: Milkaa'inni kun kan raawwatame guyyuma Maalaawiin yeroo jalqabaaf vaayrasii koroonaa qabamuu ishee mirkaneessitee fi Zaambiyaan du'a koronaavaayirasiin walqabatee yeroo jalqabaaf argatteetti.

sourceString: North Korea claimed, as of Thursday, it was one of the few countries remaining free of coronavirus infections.
targetString: Kamisarraa eegaaltee Kooriyaan Kaabaa biyyoota muraasa faalama vaayirasii koroonaa irraa bilisa ta’an keessaa tokko ta’uu isii falmatte.
translated: Kooriyaan Kaabaa, hanga Kamisaatti, biyyoota muraasa vaayirasii koroonaa irraa bilisa ta’an keessaa tokko ta’uu ibsiteetti.

sourceString: By yesterday, the World Health Organization reported 1,051,635 confirmed cases, including 79,332 cases in the twenty four hours preceding 10 a.m. Central European Time (0800 UTC) on April 4.
targetString: Dhaabbanni fayyaa addunyaa Kaleessa dhukkubsattoota 1,051,635 gabaase. Kanneen keessa 79,332 sa’aatii digdamii afur keessatti hanga sa’aatii 10 a.m. Central European Time (0800 UTC) ebla 4tti.
translated: Hanga kaleessaatti Dhaabbanni Fayyaa Addunyaa Ebla 4 akka sa’aatii Awurooppaa Giddugaleessaa (0800 UTC) ganama sa’aatii 10 dura sa’aatii digdamii afuriin dura namoota 79,332 dabalatee namoota 1,051,635 vaayirasichaan qabamuu isaanii mirkanaa’eera.

sourceString: In the United States, over 244 thousand coronavirus cases were recorded, linking to at least 5,900 deaths.
targetString: Yuunaayitid isteetitti namoota koroonaan qabaman kuma 244 oltu galmaa’e, yoo xiqqaate du’aatii 5,900 galmeessise
translated: Ameerikaatti namoonni koronaavaayirasiin qabaman kuma 244 ol kan galmaa’an yoo ta’u, yoo xiqqaate lubbuu namoota 5,900 waliin walqabatee jira.

sourceString: CBS News reported, citing Johns Hopkins University data, there were over 1,000 US deaths on Wednesday caused by coronavirus infections.
targetString: Daataa yuunivarsiitii Hoopkiins wabeeffachuun oduun CBS akka gabaasetti, sababa vaayirasii koroonaaf roobiirra namoota US 1000 oltu du’e.
translated: CBS News akka gabaasetti ragaa Yunivarsiitii Joon Hoopkiins wabeeffachuun Kibxata darbe Ameerikaatti namoonni 1,000 ol sababa dhibee koronaavaayirasiitiin du’aniiru.

sourceString: Around the world, countries announced stricter measures to inhibit the disease from spreading.
targetString: Addunyaa kana keessatti biyyoonni tatamsa’ina dhukkubichaa dhaabuuf tarkaanfiiwwan daran ciccimoo ta’an labsan.
translated: Addunyaa guutuutti biyyoonni tarkaanfii ciccimoo dhibeen kun akka hin babal’anne ittisuuf labsaniiru.

sourceString: On Thursday, Sergei Sobyanin, the mayor of Moscow, extended the city lockdown to May 1.
targetString: Gaafa Kamisaa, Sergeey Soobiyaanin, kantiibaan magaalaa Mooskoo, cufamuu magaalichaa hanga Caamsaa 1 tti dheeressan.
translated: Kamisa darbe kantiibaan magaalaa Moskoo Sergei Sobyanin uggura magaalattii hanga Caamsaa 1tti dheeresse.

sourceString: Nationally, President Vladimir Putin declared Russians would continue to be paid without going to work until April 30.
targetString: Akka biyyoolessaatti, Pirezidaanti Vilaadimiir Putiin hanga Ebla 30 tti lammiiwwan Raashaa utuu bakkee hojii hindeemin kaffaltii argachuun isaanii akka itti fufu beeksisan.
translated: Akka biyyaatti Pirezidaantiin Vilaadmiir Puutiin lammiileen Raashiyaa hanga Ebla 30tti hojii osoo hin deemin kaffaltiin isaanii akka itti fufu labsaniiru.

sourceString: The parliament of Portugal voted to extend the national state of emergency by 15 days; the vote passed with 215 votes in favor, ten abstentions, and one vote against.
targetString: Paarlaamaan poorchugaal labsii yeroo muddamaa guyyoota 15’n dheeressuuf murteesse; murtichi sagalee deeggarsaa 215, sagalee dhoorkaa kudhan fi sagalee faallaa tokkoon ragga’e.
translated: Paarlaamaan Poorchugaal labsii yeroo muddamaa biyyaalessaa guyyoota 15n akka dheeratu sagalee kenne; sagaleen kun sagalee deggersaa 215, sagalee hin kennine kudhan, sagalee mormii tokkoon darbe.

sourceString: Saudi Arabia extended curfews in the holy cities of Mecca and Medina to last the entire day; previously, the curfew was only in effect between 3 p.m. and 6 a.m.
targetString: Saawudii Arabiyaan magaalota qulqullaa’oo Makkaa fi Madiinaa keessatti qoqqobbiin sochii gara guyyaa guutuutti deeressite; isaan dura, qoqqobbiin sochii kan hojjetu 3 p.m fi 6 a.m. gidduu qofatti ture.
translated: Sa’udiin magaalota qulqulluu Makkaa fi Madiinaa keessatti guyyaa guutuu akka turuuf uggura sochii dheeressite; kanaan dura uggurri sochii galgala sa'aatii 3 hanga ganama sa'aatii 6 gidduutti qofa hojiirra oolaa ture

sourceString: Thailand planned to implement a curfew between 10 p.m. and 4 a.m.
targetString: Taayilaandi qoqqobbii sochii sa’a 10 p.m fi 4 a.m gidduu hojiirra oolchuuf karoorfatte.
translated: Taayilaandi galgala sa'aatii 10 hanga ganama sa'aatii 4 gidduutti uggura sochii hojiirra oolchuuf karoorfatte

sourceString: The governor of Ohio, Mike DeWine, announced the state had extended its stay-at-home order until May 1.
targetString: Bulchaan Oohiyoo, Mike DeWine, yeroon turtii manaa-bahuu-dhiisuu hanga caamsaa 1tti akka dheeratu beeksisan.
translated: Bulchaan Ohio, Mike DeWine, ajaja mana turuu hanga Caamsaa 1tti dheeressuu isaa beeksisaniiru.

sourceString: Stores in Australia lower toilet paper limits per transaction
targetString: Kuusaawwan Awustaraaliyaa daangaa sooftii mana fincaanii walitti dhufeenya namaatiin gadi buuse.
translated: Manneen daldalaa Awustiraaliyaa keessa jiran daangaa waraqaa mana fincaanii daldala tokkoof gadi buusu

sourceString: On Sunday and Saturday evening, Australian store chains Woolworths and Coles lowered their purchase restrictions on toilet paper to two and one package per transaction in all stores on national level, respectively.
targetString: Gaafa Dilbataa fi Sanbata xiqqaa galgala, hidhatawwan kuusaa Awustiraaliyaa Woolworths fi Coles daangeffama bittaa isaanii waraqaa mana fincaanii irraa gara lamaafi baasiifi galii tokkotti qarqaba tokko kuusaawwan sadarkaa biyyoolessaa hundaa keessatti hir’isaniiru.
translated: Wiixataa fi Dilbata galgala, manneen daldalaa Awustiraaliyaa Woolworths fi Coles uggura bittaa waraqaa mana fincaanii irratti qaban gara paakeejii lamaa fi tokkootti gadi buuse, manneen daldalaa sadarkaa biyyaatti hunda keessatti.

sourceString: ALDI also introduced a one-pack limit, on Monday.
targetString: ALDI nillee gaafa Dafinoo, daangeffama saamsa-tokko tti jalqabdeetti.
translated: ALDI daangaa paakkii tokkoos, Isniina kaleessaa jalqabe.

sourceString: These limitations were posted as messages on the checkouts, and on the chains' Facebook pages.
targetString: Hanqinooti kunniin akka ergaawwaniitti bakkaa baasii (checkouts) irratti, akkasumas hidhatawwan fuulota Facebook irratti maxxanfaman.
translated: Daangeffamni kun akka ergaa kaffaltii irratti, fi fuula Feesbuukii sansalataa irratti maxxanfameera.

sourceString: Buyers were reportedly stocking up due to fears of COVID-19 in case people need to self-isolate.
targetString: Bittoonni sababa sodaa COVID-19’tiif yoo namni adda of baasuu barbaadeef meeshaa kuusaa akka jiran gabaafame
translated: Bitamtoonni sodaa COVID-19 irraa kan ka’e namoonni ofirraa adda ba’uu yoo barbaachise kuusaa akka turan himamaa jira.

sourceString: On Wednesday, Woolworths also limited toilet paper purchases for home delivery to one pack per order.
targetString: Gaafa Roobii, Woolworths ajaja tokkotti bittaawwan waraqaa mana fincaanii dhiyeessii manaaf qarqaba tokkotti daangesse.
translated: Kibxata darbes Woolworths waraqaa mana fincaanii manatti geessuuf bitamuu ajaja tokkoof paakkii tokko qofa daangeesse.

sourceString: These changes followed the previous four-pack per transaction restriction introduced by Woolworths and Coles on March 4 and 5 respectively.
targetString: Jijjiiramoonni kunneen dhorkaa walbittaa tokkotti paakii afurii duraanii kan Woolworths fi Coles n walduraa duubaan Bitootessa gaafa 4 fi 5 jalqabsiifame hordofuudhaani.
translated: Jijjiiramni kun kan kanaan dura daangeffama daldalaa tokkoof paakkii afur kan Woolworths fi Coles Amajjii 4 fi 5 jalqaban hordofeeti.

sourceString: Coles, in its March 8 media release, reported that with the four-pack restriction in place, "many stores are still selling out within an hour of delivery", and called the demand "unprecedented", while ALDI, in a Facebook post on Tuesday, called it "unexpected".
targetString: Koolsi, ibsa miidiyaa Bitootessa 8 kennaniin akka gabaasanitti, daangaa saamsa afurii wajjiin, “kuusaawwan hedduun dhihaatanii sa’aatii tokko keessatti gurguramaa jiru”, fi dhiheessa gaafatan “seeraan ala”, yeroo ALDI’n, maxxansa feesbuukii kan Kibxataa, “kan hin eeggamin” jedheenitti.
translated: Coles, ibsa miidiyaaf Sadaasa 8 baaseen, daangeffamni paakkii afur hojiirra oolchuu isaatiin, "manneen daldalaa hedduun ammallee erga geejjibsiifamanii sa'aatii tokko keessatti gurguramaa jiru" jechuun gabaase, fedhii kanas "kan kanaan dura hin argamne" jedheera, ALDI ammoo, maxxansa Feesbuukii irratti barreesseen Kibxata, ''waan hin eegamne'' jedheera.

sourceString: Sales went up in a "sharp increase" last week, according to a Woolworths spokesperson.
targetString: Torban darbe gurgurtaan “fiixeetti ol guddataa” deeme, akka dubbi himaa Woolworzitti.
translated: Torban darbe gurgurtaan ''dabala guddaa'' ta'een akka ol ka'e dubbi himaan Woolworths himaniiru.

sourceString: Costco's store in Canberra also limited the allowed amount to two packs last week.
targetString: Kuusaan Koostikoo Kaambeeraa keessaa torban darbe hamma hayyamame saamsa lamatti daangesse.
translated: Suuqiin Costco's Canberra keessa jirus torban darbe maallaqa hayyamame paakkii lama qofa irratti daangeesse.

sourceString: To further alleviate the shortage, Coles ordered bigger packages from suppliers and increased delivery frequency, Woolworths ordered extra stock, while ALDI made stocks for a planned Wednesday special available early.
targetString: Caalaatti hanqinicha gadi hir’isuuf, Coles qarqabaalee gurguddoo dhiyeessitoota irraa ajajeera fi deddeebitii harkaan gahuu dabaleera, Woolworths istookii dabalataa ajajeera, yeroo ALDI’n Roobii addaa karoorfameef dursee argametti istookiiwwan hojjeteera.
translated: Hanqina kana daran salphisuuf, Kools dhiyeessitoota irraa paakeejii gurguddoo ajajee fi irra deddeebiin geejjibaa dabale, Woolworths istookii dabalataa ajaje, ALDI ammoo istookii addaa Roobii karoorfameef dursee akka dhiyaatu taasiseera.

sourceString: Russell Zimmerman, executive director of the Australian Retailers Association, said that retailers try to raise stock, but local council restrictions on the timing of truck-deliveries make it hard.
targetString: Daayirektarri hogganaan Waldaa Shaqaxxootaa Awustiraaliyaa Russell Zimmerman, shaqaxxoonni mankuusa guutuuf ni yaalu, garuu dhorkaaleen manneen maree naannawaa makiinota qaqqabsiisanii irrattii rakkisaa taasiseera.
translated: Daarektarri olaanaa Waldaa Daldaltoota Awustiraaliyaa Raasil Zimmerman akka jedhanitti, daldaltoonni istookii walitti qabuuf yaalu, garuu daangeffamni mana maree naannoo yeroo konkolaataan fe’umsaa geessu irratti kaa’e akka ulfaatu taasisa.

sourceString: He expects rising production costs, as suppliers try to meet demand, and fewer specials.
targetString: Inni gatiiwwan oomishaa ol ka’aa deeman eega, akka dhiyeessitoonni fedhii, akkasumas adda kan ta’an xiqqoo guutuuf yaalaniin.
translated: Baasii oomishaa dabaluu, dhiyeessitoonni fedhii guutuuf waan yaalan, fi addaa xiqqaa ta'uu ni eega.

sourceString: On Tuesday, ALDI announced that following the early release of stock, some stores can't run the Wednesday special.
targetString: Gaafa facaasaa, ADLI gadhiifama duraa istookii hordofuun, kuusaaleen muraasi Roobii addaa adeemsisuu hin danda’an.
translated: Kibxata darbe ALDIn akka beeksisetti, dafee aksiyooniin gadhiifamuu isaa hordofee, manneen daldalaa tokko tokko addaa Roobii gaggeessuu akka hin dandeenye beeksiseera.

sourceString: In a News.com.au report, Dr Gary Mortimer, retail expert from Queensland University of Technology, said the stores fill the stock every night.
targetString: Gabaasa News.com.au irratti ogeessi shaqaxaa ‘Queensland University of Technology’ akka jedhanitti, manneen kuusaa galgala hundumaa meeshaalee guutu.
translated: Gabaasa News.com.au baaseen, ogeessi daldalaa Yunivarsiitii Teeknooloojii Kuwiinslaand irraa Dr Gaarii Mortimer akka jedhanitti, manneen daldalaa kunneen halkan hunda istookii kana guutu.

sourceString: He remarked toilet paper is a bulky item, leading to low quantity of stocks in numbers, and, when sold out, leaves vast shelf spaces empty, hardening the feeling of a shortage.
targetString: Sooftiin mana fincaanii meeshaa bal’aa akka ta’e yaada kenne, gara hamma lakkoofsa gabaa xiqqeessattu geessa, akkasumas, yeroo gurgurame, teessoo bal’aa duwwaatti hambisa, sodaa dhabamuu cimsa.
translated: Waraqaan mana fincaanii meeshaa guddaa ta'uu isaa, baay'inni istookii xiqqaa ta'uu fi, yeroo gurguramee dhumu, iddoowwan sheelfii bal'aa duwwaa taasisuudhaan miira hanqina jabeessa jechuun yaada kennaniiru.

sourceString: "Coles and Woolworths have a view [that] if there was plenty of stuff on the shelf, if product like toilet rolls and sanitiser could be [bought] and are there in quantities, you would probably minimise the panic" said Russell Zimmerman per ABC News.
targetString: Akka ‘ABC News’ tti “Coles fi Woolworths yaada [kana]utuu meeshaaleen baayyeen minjaala kusaarra jiru ta’ee, utuu oomihaaleen akka qulqulleessituu mana fincaanii fi saanitaayizeriin [bitamuu] danda’uu ta’ee fi baayyinaan jiru ta’ee, walitti qabama hawaasaa hir’isuu ni dandeessa ture” jedheera, Russell Zimmerman.
translated: "Coles fi Woolworths ilaalcha [kan] osoo wanti baay'een sheelfii irratti jiraatee, oomishni akka roola mana fincaanii fi saanitaayizari [bitamuu danda'ee] fi baay'inaan yoo jiraate, rifachuu xiqqeessuu hin oollu" jedhan Russell Zimmerman per ABC Oduu.

sourceString: Recycled toilet paper producer Who Gives a Crap said on last Wednesday they'd run out of stock.
targetString: Oomishaan sooftii mana fincaanii wanta miira hin kennine dubbate Roobii darbe irratti gabaan ala akka ta’an dubbate.
translated: Oomishtoonni waraqaa mana fincaanii deebi'ee fayyadamu Who Gives a Crap Kibxata darbe akka jedhanitti, istookii isaanii akka dhumu dubbataniiru.

sourceString: Kimberly-Clark, which makes Kleenex Toilet Tissue, and Solaris Paper which makes Sorbent, emphasized they were working 24/7 to maintain the supply, according to the News.com.au report.
targetString: Kiimberlii-Klaarki, kan sooftii mana fincaanii Kileeneksi uumee, fi Soolaaris Peeppar kan Xuuxxuu uume, dhiheessa eeguus 24/7 hojjataa akka jiran ibsan, akkan gabaasa news.com.au’tti.
translated: Kimberly-Clark kan Kleenex Toilet Tissue hojjetu, Solaris Paper kan Sorbent hojjetu dhiyeessii kana eeguuf 24/7 hojjechaa akka jiran cimsanii dubbataniiru jedha gabaasni News.com.au.

sourceString: Domain.com, a real estate site, reported some property sellers offering free toilet paper to the first bidder on auctions in Melbourne, when fewer auctions were held because of buyers having time off on the long weekend of Labour Day.
targetString: Domain.com, weebsaayitiin riil isteetii, akka gabaasetti dhiheessitoonni tokko tokko namoota Meelboornitti karaarraa meeshaa bitataniif sooftii mana fincaatii bilisaan dhiheessan.
translated: Domain.com, marsariitiin qabeenyaa hin sochoone, gurgurtoonni qabeenyaa tokko tokko caalbaasii Melboorn keessatti dorgomaa jalqabaaf waraqaa mana fincaanii bilisaan dhiyeessuu isaanii gabaaseera, yeroo sanatti sababa bitoonni dhuma torbee dheeraa guyyaa hojjettootaa irratti boqonnaa argachuu isaaniitiin caalbaasiin muraasni gaggeeffame.

sourceString: The Thursday edition of NT News, a daily printed in Darwin, included an eight-page insert meant to be cut up and used as toilet paper.
targetString: Oduu NT gulaallii Kamisaa, guyyaa guyyaan Darwin keessatti kan maxxanfamu, fuula saddeet kan ciramee akka waraqaa mana fincaaniitti faaayidaarra oolu galcheera.
translated: Maxxansi Kamisaa NT News, guyyaa guyyaan Darwinitti maxxanfamu, fuula saddeet kan qabu kan muramee akka waraqaa mana fincaaniitti itti fayyadamuuf yaadame of keessaa qaba ture.

sourceString: The stores were originally reluctant to impose restrictions, according to a report from ABC Australia on March 3 in which they said they had no plans to introduce restrictions on the purchases.
targetString: Kuusaaleen jalqaba daangessa fudhachuu didan, akka gabaasa BBC Awustaraaliyaa Bitootessa 3’tti gurgurtaawwan irra daangaa kaa’uuf karoora akka hin qabe dubbatan.
translated: Manneen daldalaa kunneen jalqaba irratti daangaa kaa’uuf fedhii kan hin qabne ta’uu gabaasni ABC Australia irraa Amajjii 3 baheen bittaa kana irratti daangaa kaa’uuf karoora akka hin qabne ibseera.

sourceString: Russell Zimmerman added that other products are also in high demand, including masks, sanitiser, dried goods, handwash and flour.
targetString: Russell Zimmerman oomishoonni biroo fedhii olaanaa keessa akka jiran dabale, golgaawwan, sanitaayizarii, mi’oota gogfaman, dhiqannaa harkaafi daakuu dabalatee.
translated: Raasil Zimmerman itti dabaluudhaan, maaskii, saanitaayizara, meeshaalee goggogaa, harka dhiqannaa fi daakuu dabalatee oomishaalee biroos fedhii guddaa akka qaban himaniiru.

sourceString: Similarly, outside of Australia, on Sunday evening online British supermarket Ocado was observed limiting purchases of Andres toilet paper to two 12-roll packs.
targetString: Bifa walfakkaatuun, Awustaraaliyaan alatti, dilbata galgala giddugala gabaa Biriitish Okaadootti gurgurtaan sooftii mana fincaanii Andirees hammattuu-12 hanga lamatti.
translated: Haaluma walfakkaatuun, Awustiraaliyaan alatti, Wiixata galgala toora interneetii irratti suuqiin guddaan Biriteen Ocado bittaa waraqaa mana fincaanii Andres paakkii 12-roll lama qofa irratti daangeessuu isaa ilaalameera.

sourceString: World Health Organization declares COVID-19 pandemic
targetString: Dhaabbanni Fayyaa Addunyaa COVID-19 n weerara addunyaa jechuun labse.
translated: Dhaabbanni Fayyaa Addunyaa weerara COVID-19 labse

sourceString: On Wednesday, the World Health Organization (WHO) declared the ongoing outbreak of COVID-19 — the disease caused by coronavirus SARS-CoV-2 — to be a pandemic.
targetString: Gaafa Roobii, Dhaabbati Fayyaa Addunyaa (WHO) jalqabbii COVID-19 itti fufaa jiru — dhukkuba vaayirasii koroonaa SARS-CoV-2’n dhufu — akka weerara addunyaawaatti labse.
translated: Kibxata darbe Dhaabbanni Fayyaa Addunyaa (WHO) weerarri COVID-19 — dhibee koronaavaayirasii SARS-CoV-2 fidu — weerara dhibee itti fufee jiru ta’uu labseera.

sourceString: Although the word "pandemic" only refers to how widely a disease has spread, not how dangerous specific cases are, the WHO noted the need to drive governments to action:
targetString: Jechi “weerara” jedhu baldhinaan tatamsa’uu dhukkubaa kan ibsu ta’us, haalonni murtaa’an hangam hamaa akka ta’an hin ibsu, Dhaabbanni Fayyaa Addunyaa (WHO)’n barbaachisummaa tarkaanfii mootummaa kaa’e:
translated: Jechi "pandemic" jedhu dhukkubni tokko hammam akka babal'ate qofa kan agarsiisu ta'us, dhimmoonni addaa hammam balaa akka qaban osoo hin taane, WHOn mootummoota tarkaanfii fudhachuuf oofuun barbaachisaa ta'uu hubateera:

sourceString: "All countries can still change the course of this pandemic.
targetString: “Biyyoonni hundi ammallee haala weerara kanaa jijjiiruu ni danda’u.
translated: "Biyyoonni hundi ammallee adeemsa weerara kanaa jijjiiruu ni danda'u."

sourceString: If countries detect, test, treat, isolate, trace and mobilize their people in the response," said Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus, the Director-General of the WHO.
targetString: Yoo biyyoonni deebicha keessatti namoota isaanii adda baasan, qoratan, wal’aanan, qofaatti baasan, faana dhahan akkasumas gurmeessan," jedhan Teediroos Adhaanom Gebreyesuus, Daarekteerri Olaanaa WHO.
translated: Yoo biyyoonni deebii kennuu keessatti ummata isaanii adda baasan, qoratan, wal’aansan, adda baasuun, hordofanii fi sochoosan," jedhan Daarektarri Olaanaa WHO Teediroos Adihaanoom.

sourceString: "We are deeply concerned both by the alarming levels of spread and severity and by the alarming levels of inaction."
targetString: “nuti sadarkaa saffisa tatamsa’iinsaatiinii fi hammeenyaa akkasumas sadarkaa akeekkachiisa hoj-malee baay’ee nu yaachisa.”
translated: "Sadarkaa babal'inaafi cimina sodaachisaa ta'ee fi sadarkaa sochii dhabuu sodaachisaa ta'een baay'ee nu yaaddessa."

sourceString: According to Dr. Tom Frieden, formerly the director of the United States' Centers for Disease Control and Prevention, the pandemic is "unprecedented."
targetString: Akka Dr.Toom Fireedi, Yuunaayitid Isteetitti hogganaa Giddugala Ittisaa fi Too’annoo Dhibee duraaniitti, weerarichi “kan hin baratamne.”
translated: Akka Dr. Tom Frieden, duraan daayreektarri Giddugala To'annoo fi Ittisa Dhukkuboota Yunaayitid Isteetis jedhanitti, weerarri kun ''kan kanaan dura hin argamne''.

sourceString: He said, in remarks published by CNN in February, "other than influenza, no other respiratory virus has been tracked from emergence to continuous global spread."
targetString: Yaadachiisa Guraandhala keessa CNN’n maxxanfame irratti “infiluweenzaan alatti, vaayiresiin sirna hargansuu tatamsa’ina tasaa irraa gara walitti fufaa addunyaatti tarkaanfate hin jiru” jedhe.
translated: Dubbii CNN Fulbaana keessa maxxansee keessatti, "infuleenzaa malee, vaayirasiin sirna hargansuu biraa uumamuu irraa kaasee hanga babal'ina addunyaatti itti fufiinsa qabuutti hordofamee hin jiru" jedheera.

sourceString: Ghebreyesus expressed a similar view, saying "we have never before seen a pandemic sparked by a coronavirus."
targetString: Ghebreyesus akkana jechuun ilaalcha wal fakkaata dubbatan “kana dura weerara vaayirasii koroonaatiin babal’ate hin agarre.”
translated: Ghebreyesus yaada walfakkaatu kan ibsan yoo ta'u, "kanaan dura weerara koronaavaayirasiitiin ka'e argine hin beeknu" jedhan.

sourceString: He continued, "and we have never before seen a pandemic that can be controlled at the same time."
targetString: Itti fufuudhaanis, “fi weerara addunyaa yero walfakkaataatti to’atame kanaan dura arginee hin beeknu.”
translated: Itti fufees, "kanaan duras weerara yeroo tokkotti to'atamuu danda'u argine hin beeknu."

sourceString: The new status as a pandemic follows the WHO's decision in January to declare the outbreak a public health emergency of international concern.
targetString: Haala haaraa erga weerarri addunyaa kun murtoo WHO’n Amajjii keessa weerarichi dhimmaa balaa fayyaa hawaasaa addunyaa jechuun labsee as
translated: Haalli haaraan akka weerara dhibee kanaatti murtee WHOn baatii Guraandhalaa keessa weerara fayyaa hawaasaa hatattamaa addunyaa yaaddoo ta’e labsuu hordofeeti.

sourceString: The United States' National Institute of Allergy and Infectious Disease's director, Dr. Anthony Fauci, said of the outbreak, "bottom line, it's going to get worse."
targetString: Daayirektarri Inistiitiyuutii Alerjii fi Dhibeewwan Huboo Biyyaalessaa Yuunaayitid Isteetsi, Dr. Anthony Fauci, waa’ee weerarichaa irratti, “wanta jala sararamuu qabu, kana caala hammaachuuf jira,” jedhan.
translated: Daarektarri Inistiitiyuutii Biyyoolessaa Alarjii fi Dhukkuboota Daddarboo Ameerikaa Dr. Antoonii Faawusii waa'ee weerara vaayirasii kanaa akka jedhanitti, ''xiyyeeffannoon, hammaachuuf deema'' jedhan.

sourceString: As of Thursday, Associated Press reported there were at least 126,000 cases of COVID-19 worldwide, resulting in over 4,600 deaths.
targetString: Kamisaa kaasee, Associated Press yoo xinnaate akka addunyaatti dhimmoota COVID-19 126,000 jiraachuu gabaase, du’a 4,600 ol geessisuun.
translated: Hanga Kamisaatti Asoosheetid Prees akka gabaasetti yoo xiqqaate namoonni COVID-19 qabaman 126,000 yoo ta’u, lubbuun namoota 4,600 ol darbeera.

sourceString: The 2019–20 coronavirus pandemic is an ongoing pandemic of coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19), caused by severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2).
targetString: Weerarri addunyaawaa vaayirasii koroonaa 2019–20 weerara addunyaawaa dhukkuba vaayirasii koroonaa 2019 (COVID-19) itti fufaa jirudha, miidhamuu sombaa akka tasaa hamaatiin coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2) dhufa.
translated: Weerara vaayrasii koroonaa bara 2019–20, weerara dhukkuba vaayirasii koroonaa bara 2019 (COVID-19) kan itti fufee jiru yoo ta’u, sababa dhukkuba sirna hargansuu cimaa (severe acute respiratory syndrome) koronaavaayirasii 2 (SARS-CoV-2) tiin kan dhufudha.

sourceString: The outbreak was identified in Wuhan, China, in December 2019, declared to be a Public Health Emergency of International Concern on 30 January 2020, and recognized as a pandemic on 11 March 2020.
targetString: Jalqabbichi Wuhaan, Chaayinaa keessatti gaafa Mudde 2019 adda baafame, akka Yaaddoo Addunyaawaa Balaa Tasaa Fayyaa Uummataa ta’ee Amajjii 30, 2020 tti labsame, akkasumas akka weerara addunyaawaatti Bitootessa 11, 2020 tti beekame.
translated: Weerarri kun Muddee 2019 Chaayinaa magaalaa Wuhaan keessatti adda baafamee, Guraandhala 30 bara 2020 balaa Fayyaa Hawaasaa Yaaddoo Idil-addunyaa ta’ee labsamee, Amajjii 11 bara 2020 akka weeraraatti beekamtii argateera.

sourceString: As of 10 April 2020, approximately 1.61 million cases of COVID-19 have been reported in 210 countries and territories, resulting in approximately 97,000 deaths.
targetString: Akka Ebla 10, 2020’tti, daangaalee fi biyyoota 210 keessatti dhukkubsattoota COVID-19 tilmaamaan miiliyoona 1.61’tu argame, kunis tilmaamaan du’a 97,000 hordofsiise.
translated: Hanga Ebla 10 bara 2020tti biyyootaa fi naannolee 210 keessatti tilmaamaan namoota miiliyoona 1.61 COVID-19 qabamuun, tilmaamaan namoonni 97,000 du’aniiru.

sourceString: About 364,000 people have recovered.
targetString: Namoonni 364,000 tti siqan bayyannataniiru.
translated: Namoonni gara kuma 364 ta'an bayyanataniiru.

sourceString: The case fatality rate has been estimated to be 4% in China, while globally ranging from 13.04% in Algeria to .08% in New Zealand.
targetString: Dhimmi hamma du’aa dhukkubichi geessisu Chaayinaa keessatti 4%, yeroo akka addunyaatti Aljeeriyaa keessatti 13.04% hanga Niiw Zilaand keessatti 0.8% deemutti.
translated: Chaayinaa keessatti du’a namoota dhibee kanaan qabaman %4 akka ta’u kan tilmaamame yoo ta’u, akka addunyaatti Aljeeriyaa keessatti %13.04 hanga Niwuu Ziilaanditti %.08 gidduutti argama.

sourceString: Common symptoms include fever, cough and shortness of breath.
targetString: Mallattoowwan beekamoon hoo’a qaama, qufaa fi hanqachuu hargansuu hammatu.
translated: Mallattoowwan mul’atan ho’a qaamaa, qufaa fi hafuura kutuu.

sourceString: Complications may include pneumonia and acute respiratory distress syndrome.
targetString: Mallattooleen niimooniyaa fi dhibee dhukkubbii hamaa sirna hargansuu ta’uu mala.
translated: Rakkoon isaan mudatu dhukkuba sombaa fi dhiphina sirna hargansuu cimaa (acute respiratory distress syndrome) ta’uu danda’a.

sourceString: The time from exposure to onset of symptoms is typically around five days, but may range from two to fourteen days.
targetString: Yeroon saaxilamummaatii hanga mallattoon mullatutti fudhatu naannoo guyyoota shanii ta’a, garuu guyyoota lamaa hanga kudha-afurii turuu danda’a.
translated: Yeroon saaxilamuu irraa kaasee hanga mallattoon mul’atutti yeroo baay’ee naannoo guyyaa shanii yoo ta’u, garuu guyyaa lamaa hanga kudha afuriitti ta’uu danda’a.

sourceString: There is no known vaccine or specific antiviral treatment.
targetString: Talaalliin yookaan qorichi addaa beekame hin jiru.
translated: Talaalliin ykn yaaliin farra vaayirasii addaa beekamaan hin jiru.

sourceString: Primary treatment is symptomatic and supportive therapy.Recommended preventive measures include hand washing, covering one's mouth when coughing, maintaining distance from other people, and monitoring and self-isolation for people who suspect they are infected.
targetString: Yaaliin jalqabaa kan mallattoo qabuu fi yaala gargaaraadha. Tarkaanfiileen ittisaa gorfaman harka dhiqachuu, yeroo qufa’an afaan haguuggachuu, namoota biraa irraa fageenya eeggachuu, akkasumas hordofuu fi namoota qabaman jedhamanii shakkaman irraa adda of baasuu of keessatti hammata.
translated: Wal’aansi jalqabaa yaala mallattoo fi deeggarsa.Tarkaanfiiwwan ittisaa gorfaman harka dhiqachuu, yeroo qufa’u afaan ofii haguuggachuu, namoota biroo irraa fageenya eeguu, namoota vaayirasichaan qabamuu isaanii shakkan hordofuu fi of adda baasuu kan dabalatudha.

sourceString: Authorities worldwide have responded by implementing travel restrictions, quarantines, curfews, workplace hazard controls, and facility closures.
targetString: Abbootiin taayitaa guutuu addunyaa ittisa imalaa hojiirra oolchuun, adda foo’uun, yeroo mana turuu kaa’uun, too’annoo balaa naannoo hojiitiin, fi dhaabbilee cufuun deebii kennan.
translated: Angawoonni addunyaa deebii kennaniin uggura imala, adda baafamuu, uggura sochii, to’annoo balaa bakka hojii, fi cufiinsa dhaabbilee hojiirra oolchuudhaani.

sourceString: The pandemic has led to severe global socioeconomic disruption, the postponement or cancellation of sporting, religious, political and cultural events, and widespread shortages of supplies exacerbated by panic buying.
targetString: Weerarri addunyaawaa kun tasgabbii dhabuu hamaa hawaas-diinagdee addunyaa, ta’iileen ispoortii, amantaa, siyaasaa fi aadaa yeroo biraatti darbuu ykn haqamuu, fi hawaasa ballaan bitamuudhaan hanqinni dhiyeessii guddaan akka mudatu taasiseera.
translated: Weerarri dhibee kun jeequmsa hawaas-dinagdee addunyaa hamaa, taateewwan ispoortii, amantii, siyaasaa fi aadaa yeroo biraatti akka darban ykn haqamuu fi hanqinni dhiyeessii bal’aa bittaa rifachuutiin hammaate akka uumamu taasiseera.

sourceString: Schools and universities have closed either on a nationwide or local basis in 193 countries, affecting approximately 99.4 percent  of the world's student population.
targetString: Manneen barnootaa ykn Yuuniversiitiileen guutummaa biyyaatti ykn akka naannawaatti biyyoota 193 keessatti cufamuudhaan, tilmaamaan baayyina barattoota addunyaa dhibbeentaa 99.4 irraan kan dhiibbaa geessisedha.
translated: Biyyoota 193 keessatti manneen barnootaa fi yunivarsiitiiwwan akka biyyaattis ta’e naannootti cufamanii, lakkoofsa barattoota addunyaa keessaa tilmaamaan dhibbeentaa 99.4 miidheera.

sourceString: Misinformation about the virus has spread online, and there have been incidents of xenophobia and discrimination against Chinese people, other people of East and Southeast Asian descent and appearance, and others from areas with significant virus cases.
targetString: Odeeffannoon sobaa waayee vaayiresichaa toora interneetaan kan baballatanii fi mudannooleen akka lammiilee alaa jibbuu fi namoota chaayinaa, namoota gosa Bahaa fi Kibba-baha Eeshiyaa ta’iinaa fi bifa isaanii qaban fi kan biroo naannoowwan vaayiresichi baayyinaan itti mullate irraa ta’an irraa qoollifannaan tureera.
translated: Odeeffannoon dogoggoraa waa’ee vaayirasichaa toora interneetii irratti kan babal’ate yoo ta’u, namoota Chaayinaa, namoota biroo hidda dhalootaa fi bifa Bahaa fi Kibba Baha Eeshiyaa ta’an, akkasumas kanneen biroo naannoo vaayirasiin guddaan itti mul’ate irraa jibbiinsa biyyoota alaa fi loogiin raawwatame ni mul’ateera.

sourceString: Due to reduced travel and closures of heavy industry, there has been a decrease in air pollution and carbon emissions.
targetString: Sababa hir’achuu imalaa fi cufamuu industirii gurguddaatiin, hir’inni faalama qilleensaa fi dhabamiinsi kaarboonii jira.
translated: Imalli hir’achuu fi industirii ulfaataa cufamuu irraa kan ka’e faalama qilleensaa fi gadi lakkifamni kaarboonii hir’ateera.

sourceString: Health authorities in Wuhan, China (the capital of Hubei province) reported a cluster of pneumonia cases of unknown cause on 31 December 2019, and an investigation was launched in early January 2020.
targetString: Angaawonni wuhaan, Chaayinaa (magaalaa guddoo konyaa Hubei) keessaa garee dhimmoota michii sombaa sababa hin beekamne qaban Mudde 31, 2019 tti gabaasan, akkasumas qorannoon Amajjii 2020 gara jalqabaatti jalqabame.
translated: Angawoonni fayyaa Chaayinaa Wuhaan (magaalaa guddoo bulchiinsa Hubei) Mudde 31 bara 2019 dhukkuba sombaa sababni isaa hin beekamneen walitti qabamuu kan gabaasan yoo ta’u, jalqaba baatii Guraandhalaa 2020tti qorannoon jalqabameera.

sourceString: The cases mostly had links to the Huanan Seafood Wholesale Market and so the virus is thought to have a zoonotic origin.
targetString: Dhukkubsattoonni hedduun gabaa gurgurtaa Nyaata Galaanaa Huunaan wajjiin hidhata qaban kanaaf vaayirasichi bu’uura zoonootik qaba jedhamee yaadama.
translated: Namoonni vaayirasichaan qabaman irra caalaan isaanii Gabaa Jumlaa Nyaata Galaanaa Huanan waliin hidhata waan qabaniif vaayirasichi ka'umsa zoonotic qaba jedhamee yaadama.

sourceString: The virus that caused the outbreak is known as SARS-CoV-2, a newly discovered virus closely related to bat coronaviruses, pangolin coronaviruses, and SARS-CoV.The earliest known person with symptoms was later discovered to have fallen ill on 1 December 2019, and that person did not have visible connections with the later wet market cluster.
targetString: Vaayiresiin weerara sana kaase SARS-CoV-2 jedhamuun kan beekamu, koronaavaayiresoota simbira halkanii, koronaavaayiresoota pangolini, fi SARS-CoV tti kan dhiyaatu vaayiresii haaraa argamedha. Namicha jalqaba mallattoon irratti argamee booda adda baafame kan dhukkubsate Muddee gaafa 1, 2019 fi namni sunimmoo tuttuqaa muldhataa kilaastera gabaa wantoota jiidhaa boodaa sanaa wajjiin hin qabu ture.
translated: Vaayirasiin weerara kanaaf sababa ta'e SARS-CoV-2 jedhamuun kan beekamu yoo ta'u, vaayirasii haaraa argame kan vaayirasii koroonaa battee, vaayirasii koroonaa paangooliin, fi SARS-CoV waliin walitti dhiyeenyaan wal qabatudha.Namni mallattoo dhukkuba kanaa yeroo jalqabaaf beekame kun boodarra Muddee 1 bara 2019 dhukkubsatee akka ture hubatameera , namni sun immoo kilaastara gabaa jiidhaan boodarra dhufe waliin walitti dhufeenya mul’atu hin qabu ture.

sourceString: Of the early cluster of cases reported in December 2019, two-thirds were found to have a link with the market.
targetString: Kilaasteroota ta’iilee Muddee2019 keessa gabaafaman keessaa lama-sadaffaan gabichaa hidhata qabaachuun isaanii bira ga’ameera.
translated: Kilaastara jalqabaa Muddee 2019 gabaafame keessaa harki sadii lama gabaa waliin walitti dhufeenya qabaachuun isaanii argameera.

sourceString: On 13 March 2020, an unverified report from the South China Morning Post suggested that a case traced back to 17 November 2019, in a 55-year-old from Hubei province, may have been the first.On 26 February 2020, the WHO reported that, as new cases reportedly declined in China but suddenly increased in Italy, Iran, and South Korea, the number of new cases outside China had exceeded the number of new cases within China for the first time.
targetString: Bitootessa 13, 2020 tti, gabaasi Chaayinaa Kibbaa Maxxansa Ganamaa (Morning Post) hin mirkanoofne dhimmi Sadaasa 17, 2019 tti deebi’e, umurii 55 keessatti konyaa Hubei irraa, isa jalqabaa ta’uu mala. Gurraaandhala 26, 2020 tti, WHO’n, akkuma dhimmoonni haaraan Chaayinaa keessatti gadi bu’uun gabaafameen garuu Xaaliyaan, Iraan fi Kooriyaa Kibbaa keessatti tasa dabaluu gabaase, lakkoofsi dhimmoota haaraa Chaayinaan alaa lakkoofsa dhimmoota haaraa Chaayinaa keessaa yeroo jalqabaaf caale.
translated: Amajjii 13 bara 2020 gabaasni hin mirkanoofne gaazexaa South China Morning Post irraa bahe akka agarsiisutti dhimmi Adoolessa 17 bara 2019, nama ganna 55 bulchiinsa Hubei irraa dhufe tokko irratti hordofame, isa jalqabaa ta'uu mala.Fulbaana 26 bara 2020 akka gabaase WHOn gabaaseera akka ta’e, Chaayinaa keessatti namoonni haaraan vaayirasichaan qabaman gadi bu’uu isaanii gabaafame garuu Xaaliyaanii, Iraan fi Kooriyaa Kibbaatti akka tasaa dabaluu isaatiin, Chaayinaan alatti lakkoofsi namoota haaraa vaayirasichaan qabaman yeroo jalqabaaf Chaayinaa keessatti namoota haaraa vaayirasichaan qabaman caaleera.

sourceString: There may be substantial underreporting of cases, particularly among those with milder symptoms.
targetString: Ta’iileen gadi butamanii gabaafamuun, keessattuu warren mallattoo giddu galeessaa agarsiisan irratti mullachuu mala.
translated: Keessattuu warra mallattoo salphaa qaban biratti, namoota dhibee kanaa gadi bu’uun gabaafamuu danda’a.

sourceString: By 26 February, relatively few cases had been reported among youths, with those 19 and under making up 2.4% of cases worldwide.The United Kingdom's chief scientific adviser, Patrick Vallance, estimated that 60% of the British population would need to become infected before effective herd immunity could be achieved.
targetString: Gurraandhala 26 tti, wal bira qabiinsaan dhimmoota xiqqootu dargaggoota keessaa gabaafame, warreen 19 fi isaa gadi ta’an akka addunyaatti dhimmoota 2.4% bakka bu’an waliin. Gorsaan saayinsawaa olaanaa Ingilizii, Patrick Vallance, 60% uummata Biriitish utuu madiinummaan qaamaa hawaasa keessa jiru bira hin ga’amin hubamuu akka qaban tilmaame.
translated: Fulbaana 26tti dargaggoota biratti namoonni vaayirasichaan qabaman muraasni kan gabaafame yoo ta’u, warri umuriin isaanii waggaa 19 fi isaa gadi ta’e addunyaa guutuutti namoota vaayirasichaan qabaman keessaa %2.4 ta’u.Gorsaan saayinsii olaanaa Yunaayitid Kingidam, Paatrik Vaalaans, ummata Biriteen keessaa %60 kanaan dura vaayirasichaan qabamuu akka qabu tilmaameera ittisa tuuta bu’a qabeessa ta’e argachuun ni danda’ama ture.

sourceString: Cases refers to the number of people who have been tested for COVID-19, and whose test has been confirmed positive according to official protocols.
targetString: Lakkoofsi dhukkubsattoota COVID-19 wajjiin walqabatanii, fi kanneen akkaataa adeemsa seeraatiin qorannoon isaanii poozatiivii ta’uu mirkanaa’e.
translated: Cases jechuun baay'ina namoota qorannoo COVID-19 taasifameef, akkasumas qorannoon isaanii akka pirootokoolii ofiisaaniitiin vaayirasichaan qabamuun mirkanaa'e agarsiisa.

sourceString: As of 23 March, no country had tested more than 3% of its population, and many countries have had official policies not to test those with only mild symptoms, such as Italy, the Netherlands, Spain, and Switzerland.
targetString: Akka Bitootessa 23’tti, biyyi baay’ina ummata ishee keessaa %3 qoratte hin turre, akkasumas biyyoonni hedduun kanneen akka Xaaliyaanii, Neezarlaandi, Ispeen, fi Siwuuzerlaandi imaammata warreen mallattoo salphaa qaban hin qorataman jedhu qabu.
translated: Hanga Amajjii 23tti biyyi kamiyyuu ummata ishee keessaa %3 ol qorannoo hin goone yoo ta'u, biyyoonni hedduun imaammata ofiisaa kanneen mallattoo salphaa qofa qaban kan akka Xaaliyaanii, Nezerlaand, Ispeen, fi Siwiizarlaand akka hin qoratne qaban.

sourceString: A study published on 16 March found that in China, up to 23 January, an estimated 86% of COVID-19 infections had not been detected, and that these undocumented infections were the infection source for 79% of documented cases.
targetString: Qu’annoon Bitootessa 16 tti maxxanfame Chaayinaa keessatti, hanga Amajjii 23 tti, COVID-19’n hubamuun 86% tti tilmaamamu akka adda hin baanee, fi dhukkubaan hubamuun ragaa barreeffamaan hin deeggaramne kunniin madda dhukkubaan hubamuu 79% dhimmoota ragaa barreeffamaan deeggaramanii ta’uu argate.
translated: Qorannoon Amajjii 16 maxxanfame akka agarsiisutti, Chaayinaa keessatti, hanga Guraandhala 23tti, tilmaamaan %86 dhukkuba COVID-19 hin argamne, akkasumas dhukkuboonni waraqaa ragaa hin qabne kun madda infekshinii %79 ta’uu isaanii galmaa’ee jira.

sourceString: A statistical analysis published 30 March estimated that numbers of infections in Italy were considerably greater than the reported cases.
targetString: Xiinxalli istaatistiksii Bitootessa 30 maxxanfame, lakkoofsi dhibamtootaa Xaaliyaanii keessaa hamma gabaafame akka caalu tilmaameera.
translated: Xiinxalli istaatiksii Amajjii 30 maxxanfame akka tilmaametti lakkoofsi namoota vaayirasichaan qabamanii Xaaliyaanii keessatti namoota vaayirasichaan qabaman kan gabaafame caalaa baay’ee akka ta’e ibseera.

sourceString: The initial estimates of the basic reproduction number (R0) for COVID-19 were 1.4 to 2.4.
targetString: Tilmaamni jalqabaa lakkoofsa wal hormaataa (R0) kan COVID-19 1.4 hanga 2.4 ture.
translated: Tilmaamni jalqabaa lakkoofsa walhormaataa bu’uuraa (R0) COVID-19 1.4 hanga 2.4 ture.

sourceString: A study published by the US Center for Disease Control and Prevention has concluded that it may be 5.7.
targetString: Qu’annoon Wiirtuu To’annoofi Ittisa Dhukkubaa US’n maxxanfame 5.7 ta’uu akka malu goolabe.
translated: Qorannoon Giddugala To’annoo fi Ittisa Dhukkubaa Ameerikaatiin maxxanfame 5.7 ta’uu akka danda’u xumureera.

sourceString: Most people with COVID-19 recover.
targetString: Namoonni baay’een COVID-19 qabaman dandamatan.
translated: Namoonni COVID-19 qabaman irra caalaan ni dandamatu.

sourceString: For those who do not, the time from development of symptoms to death has been between 6 and 41 days, with the most common being 14 days.
targetString: Warreen hin qabneef, yeroon mallattooleen dagaagan irraa gara du’aatti guyyoota 6 hanga 41 gidduutti ture, kan caalatti baramaa guyyoota 14 ta’uu waliin.
translated: Warra hin qabneef yeroon mallattoon dhukkuba kanaa mul’achuu irraa kaasee hanga du’aatti guyyoota 6 hanga 41 gidduutti kan ture yoo ta’u, baay’inaan guyyoota 14 ta’uu ibsameera.

sourceString: As of 10 April 2020, approximately 97,000 deaths had been attributed to COVID-19.
targetString: Hanga Ebla 10 2020tti, tilmaamaan du’a 97,000 tu COVID-19 waliin walqabata ture.
translated: Hanga Ebla 10 bara 2020tti lubbuun namoota 97,000 ta'an COVID-19n walqabatee ture.

sourceString: In China, as of 5 February about 80% of deaths were in those over 60, and 75% had pre-existing health conditions including cardiovascular diseases and diabetes.Official tallies of deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic generally refer to dead people who tested positive for COVID according to official protocols.
targetString: Chaayinaa keessatti hamma Guraandhala 5tti du’aatiiwwan 80%n warreen 60 ol ta’anii fi 75% immoo dhukkuboota kardiyovaaskulaarii fi Sukkaaraa dabalatee warra rakkoolee fayyaa durumaan qaban turan. Akka pirootokooliitti hammi du’aatii weerara addunyaa COVID-19, namoota COVIDf bu’aa qorannoo poositiivaa qabaatanii du’anidha.
translated: Chaayinaa keessatti hanga Fulbaana 5tti du’a keessaa gara %80 warra umuriin isaanii 60 ol ta’e, %75 ammoo dhukkuba onnee fi ujummoolee dhiigaa fi dhukkuba sukkaaraa dabalatee haala fayyaa duraan ture.Official tallies of deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic generally refer to dead people who tested akka pirootokoolii ofiisaaniitiin COVID'n qabamaniiru.

sourceString: The number of true fatalities from COVID-19 may be much higher, as it may not include people who die without testing - e.g. at home, in nursing homes, etc.
targetString: Lakkoofsi hamma dhukkuba COVID-19’n du’uu olaanaa ta’uu mala, akka namoota utuu hin qoratamin du’an hammachuu hin malleen – fkn. manatti, iddoo yaalaman keessatti, kkf.
