translated: Osoo hin deemin dura qorannoon yaalaa kan raawwatame yoo ta'u, lammiileen Afrikaa Kibbaa afur mallattoo vaayirasii koroonaa agarsiisaa turan balaa hir'isuuf duubatti hafaniiru.

sourceString: Only South Africans who tested negative were repatriated.
targetString: Lammiilee Afrikaa Kibbaa qorannoon isaanii nagatiiva ta’e qofatu gara biyya isaanii deebi’e.
translated: Lammiileen Afrikaa Kibbaa qorannoon isaanii negaatiivii ta'e qofatu gara biyyaatti deebi'e.

sourceString: Test results cleared all the South Africans, including the flight crew, pilots, hotel staff, police and soldiers involved in the humanitarian mission who, as a precautionary measure, all remained under observation and in quarantine for a 14-day period at The Ranch Resort.
targetString: Firiiwwan qorannoo gareewwan balalii, balaliistota, hojjettoota hoteelaa, poolisii fi loltoota akka tarkaanfii of eeggannootti ergama namoomaa keessatti hirmaatan dabalatee lammiilee Afrikaa Kibbaa hunda baasuun, hundisaanii hordoffii fi iddoo turtii wayita guyyoota 14 f ‘The Ranch Resort’ keessa tursiifamaniiru.
translated: Bu’aan qorannoo lammiilee Afrikaa Kibbaa hunda qulqulleesseera, hojjettoota balalii, balaliistota, hojjettoota hoteelaa, poolisii fi loltoota ergama gargaarsa namoomaa kana keessatti hirmaatan kanneen akka of eeggannootti hundi isaanii hordoffii jala fi turtii guyyoota 14f The Ranch Resort keessatti hafan .

sourceString: On 20 March, the United States began to partially withdrawal its troops from Iraq due to the pandemic.
targetString: Bitootessa 20, Yuunaayitid Isteet sababa weeraraatiif hamma tokko loltuuwwan ishee Iraaq keessaa baasuu eegalte.
translated: Amajjii 20 Ameerikaan sababa weerara vaayirasii koronaatiin loltoota ishee gartokkoon Iraaq keessaa baasuu eegalte.

sourceString: On 5 February, the Chinese foreign ministry stated that 21 countries (including Belarus, Pakistan, Trinidad and Tobago, Egypt, and Iran) had sent aid to China.
targetString: Guraandhala gaafa 5, ministeerri alaa Chaayinaa biyyoonni 21 (Beelaaruus, Paakistaan, Tirinidaad fi Toobaagoo, Igiptii fi Iraan dabalatee)deeggarsa Chaayinaatti erguu eereera.
translated: Fulbaana 5 ministeerri haajaa alaa Chaayinaa biyyoonni 21 (Beelaaruus, Paakistaan, Triniidaad fi Toobaagoo, Masrii fi Iraan dabalatee) Chaayinaaf gargaarsa erganiiru jedheera.

sourceString: Some Chinese students at American universities joined together to help send aid to virus-stricken parts of China, with a joint group in the greater Chicago area reportedly managing to send 50,000 N95 masks to hospitals in the Hubei province on 30 January.The humanitarian aid organization Direct Relief, in coordination with FedEx, sent 200,000 face masks along with other personal protective equipment, including gloves and gowns, by emergency airlift to the Wuhan Union Hospital by 30 January.
targetString: Barattoonni Chaayinaa muraasi Yunivarsiitii Amerikaa keessaa kutaawwan Chaayinaa vaayirasiin miidhamaniif gargaarsa erguuf waliin gurmaa’an, garee iddoo guddaa Chikaagoo keessaa waliin ta’uun haala yaadamneen golgaawwan N95 50,000 hospitaalota konyaa Hubei keessa jiraniitti gaafa Amajjii 30 erguuu danda’aniiru. Dhaabbati gargaarsa namummaa Direct Relief, FedEx waliin qindaa’uun, golgaawwan fuulaa 200,000 meeshaa eegumsa dhuunfaa waliin, uffatoota harkaa fi gonfawwan, Amajjii 30 tti gara Gamtaa Hospitaala Wuhaanitti xiyyaara yeroo hatattamaan erganiiru.
translated: Barattoonni Chaayinaa tokko tokko yunivarsiitiiwwan Ameerikaa keessa jiran tokko tokko walitti makamuun kutaalee Chaayinaa vaayirasiin miidhaman gargaarsa erguuf gargaaran, gareen waloo naannoo guddicha Chikaagootti argamu Guraandhala 30tti haguuggii fuulaa N95 50,000 hospitaalota bulchiinsa Hubei keessa jiranitti erguu akka danda’e himameera.Dhaabbanni gargaarsa namoomaa kun Direct Relief qindoomina FedEx waliin ta’uun meeshaalee ittisa dhuunfaa biroo kanneen akka guwaantii fi gown dabalatee haguuggii fuulaa 200,000 hanga Guraandhala 30tti xiyyaaraan hatattamaa gara Hospitaala Wuhaan Union erge.

sourceString: On 5 February, Bill and Melinda Gates announced a $100 million donation to the WHO to fund vaccine research and treatment efforts along with protecting "at-risk populations in Africa and South Asia".
targetString: Guraandhala gaafa 5, Biilii fi Miliindaa Geetsi qorannoo talaallii fi tattaaffiiwwan yaalii “ummattoota Afrikaa fi Eeshiyaa balaa keessa jiran” eegaa akka raawwataman gargaaruuf arjooma miiliyoona $100 ifoomsaniiru.
translated: Fulbaana 5, Biil fi Meeliindaa Geetis "Uummata balaadhaaf saaxilaman Afrikaa fi Eeshiyaa Kibbaa" eeguu cinaatti qorannoo talaallii fi tattaaffii wal'aansaaf maallaqa kennuuf WHO'f arjooma doolaara miiliyoona 100 akka godhan beeksisan.

sourceString: Interaksyon reported that the Chinese government donated 200,000 masks to the Philippines on 6 February, after Senator Richard Gordon shipped 3.16 million masks to Wuhan.
targetString: Akka Interaaksiyoon gabaasetti mootummaan Chaayinaa Filiippiinsiif deeggarsa haguugduu fuulaa 200,000 Gurraandhala 6 arjoome, akkuma miseensi Paarlaamaa Riichaard Gaarden haguugduu fuulaa miliyoona 3.16 ergeen.
translated: Interaksyon akka gabaasetti mootummaan Chaayinaa Fulbaana 6, Senetar Riichaard Gordon haguuggii fuulaa miiliyoona 3.16 gara Wuhanitti erga ergitee booda, Fulbaana 6 Filiippiinsiif maaskii 200,000 arjoome.

sourceString: On 19 February, the Singapore Red Cross announced that it would send $2.26 million worth of aid to China.
targetString: Gurraandhala 19tti, Qaxxaamurri Diimaan Singaapoor gargaarsa Chaayinaatiif doolaara miiliyoona 2.26 akka baasu beeksise.
translated: Fulbaana 19 Fannoo Diimaan Singaapoor gargaarsa doolaara miiliyoona 2.26 Chaayinaaf akka ergu beeksise.

sourceString: Japan donated one million face masks to Wuhan, Turkey dispatched medical equipment, Russia sent more than 13 tonnes of medical supplies to Wuhan, Malaysia announced a donation of 18 million medical gloves to China, Germany delivered various medical supplies including 10,000 Hazmat suits, and the United States donated 17.8 tons of medical supplies to China and promised an additional $100 million in financial support to affected countries.After cases in China seemed to stabilize, the country has been sending aid to various nations hit by the pandemic.
targetString: Jaappaan maaskii fuulaa miiliyoona tokko Wuhaaniif arjoomte, Turki meeshaa fayyaa saffisaan ergite, Raashiyaana meeshaa fayyaa toonii 13 Wuhaaniif ergite, Maaleezhiyaan deeggarsa haguugduu harkaa miiliyoona 18 Chaayinaaf arjoomu ifoomsite, Jarman dhiheessa meedikaalaa garaagara uffata Haazmaat 10,000 dabalatee dhiheessite, akkasumas Yuunaayitid Isteet meeshaa meedikaalaa toonii 17.8 Chaayinaaf arjoomtee akkasumas dabalataan biyyoota hubaman gargaaruuf doolaara miiliyoona 100 waadaa galte. Erga haalli Chaayinaa tasgabbaa’ee, biyyattiin biyyoota weeraraan rukutaman garaagaraatiif gargaarsa ergaa jirti.
translated: Jaappaan Wuhaaniif haguuggii fuulaa miliyoona tokko arjoomte, Turkiyaan meeshaalee yaalaa ergite, Raashiyaan meeshaalee yaalaa toonii 13 ol gara Wuhanitti ergite, Maaleeziyaan guwaantii yaalaa miiliyoona 18 Chaayinaaf arjoomuu beeksiste, Jarmaniin suutii Hazmat 10,000 dabalatee meeshaalee yaalaa adda addaa geessite, akkasumas... Ameerikaan meeshaalee yaalaa toonii 17.8 Chaayinaaf arjoomtee biyyoota dhibee kanaan qabamaniif deeggarsa maallaqaa dabalataa Doolaara miiliyoona 100 akka gootu waadaa galte.Chaayinaatti namoonni vaayirasichaan qabaman tasgabbaa'uu erga fakkaattee booda biyyittiin biyyoota adda addaa weerara vaayirasii koronaan miidhamaniif gargaarsa ergaa turte.

sourceString: In March, China, Cuba and Russia sent medical supplies and experts to help Italy deal with its coronavirus outbreak.
targetString: Bitootessa keessa, Chaayinaa, Kuubaa fi Raashiyaan, jalqabbii vaayirasii koroonaa wajjiinii irratti gargaaruuf dhiyeessiilee wal'aansaa fi ogeeyyii gara Xaaliyaaniitti erganiiru.
translated: Ji’a Sadaasaa keessa Chaayinaan, Kuubaa fi Raashiyaan meeshaalee yaalaa fi ogeeyyii erguun Xaaliyaan weerara vaayirasii koroonaa ishee akka dandamattu gargaaran.

sourceString: Businessman Jack Ma sent 1.1 million testing kits, 6 million face masks, and 60,000 protective suits to Addis Ababa, Ethiopia for distribution by the African Union.
targetString: Daldalaan Jack Ma meeshaalee qorannoo miiliyoona 1.1, haguuggii fuulaa miiliyoona 6, fi uffataalee of eeggannoo 60,000 Gamtaa Afrikaatiin akka qoodamuuf Etiyoophiyaa, Addis Ababaatti ergeera.
translated: Daldalaan Jaak Maa meeshaalee qorannoo miiliyoona 1.1, haguuggii fuulaa miiliyoona 6, fi uffata ittisaa kuma 60 gara Ityoophiyaa Addis Ababaatti erguun Gamtaa Afriikaa akka raabsu taasiseera.

sourceString: He later sent 5,000 testing kits, 100,000 face masks and 5 ventilators to Panama.
targetString: Boodarra meeshaalee qorannoo 5,000, haguuggii fuulaa 100,000 fi ventileeteroota 5 Paanaamaatti erge.
translated: Boodarra meeshaalee qorannoo kuma 5, haguuggii fuulaa kuma 100 fi veentileetaroota 5 gara Paanaamaatti ergeera.

sourceString: Ma also donated medical supplies to Canada.The Netherlands, Spain, Turkey, Georgia, and the Czech Republic expressed their concerns over Chinese-made masks and test kits.
targetString: Ma’n akkasumas dhiyeessiiwwan wal’aansaa Kaanaadaaf arjoomeera. Warri Neezerlaand, Ispeen, Turkii, Joorjiyaa, akkasumas Cheek Rippaabiliik golgaawwaniif meeshaawwan qorannoo warri Chaayinaa hojjetan irratti yaada isaanii ibsataniiru.
translated: Ma meeshaalee yaalaa Kanaadaatiifis arjoomaniiru.Nezerlaand, Ispeen,Turkii, Joorjiyaa, fi Cheek Rippabilikni haguuggii haguuggii fi meeshaalee qorannoo Chaayinaa keessatti hojjetaman irratti yaaddoo qaban ibsaniiru.

sourceString: For instance, Spain withdrew 58,000 Chinese-made coronavirus testing kits with an accuracy rate of just 30%, meanwhile, the Netherlands recalled 600,000 Chinese face masks which were defective.
targetString: Fakkeenyaaf, Ispeen meeshaalee qorannoo vaayirasii koroonaa 58,000 sirrummaan isaa %30 qofa jechuun keessaa baate, yeroma kana, Neezarlaandi maaskii fuulaa 600,000 sirrii hin taane deebifte.
translated: Fakkeenyaaf Ispeen meeshaalee qorannoo koronaavaayirasii Chaayinaa keessatti hojjetaman 58,000 kan sirrummaa %30 qofaan ofirraa baaste, gama biraatiin Nezerlaand haguuggii fuula Chaayinaa 600,000 kan mudaa qaban yaadatteetti.

sourceString: Belgium recalled 100,000 unusable masks, thought to be from China, but were in fact from Colombia.
targetString: Beeljiyeem haguugduu fuulaa 100,000 itti dhimmi hin bahamin, kan Chaayinaa irraa jedhamee yaadamu, garuu dhugaatti Kolombiyaa irraa kan ta’e.
translated: Beeljiyeem haguuggii fuulaa fayyadamuu hin dandeenye kuma 100 yaadatte, Chaayinaa irraa akka ta'e yaadame, garuu dhugaa dubbachuuf Kolombiyaa irraa ture.

sourceString: On the other hand, Chinese aid has been well-received in parts of Latin America and Africa.On 2 April, the World Bank launched emergency support operations for developing countries.
targetString: Karaa biraatiin, gargaarsi Chaayinaa kutaalee Laatin Ameerikaa fi Afrikaatti haala gaariin fudhatame. Ebla 2 irratti, Baankiin Addunyaa gargaarsa muddamaa biyyoota guddataa jiraniif jalqabsiise.
translated: Gama biraatiin gargaarsi Chaayinaa kutaalee Laatiin Ameerikaa fi Afrikaa keessatti fudhatama guddaa argateera.Ebla 2 Baankiin Addunyaa biyyoota guddachaa jiraniif hojii deeggarsa hatattamaa eegale.

sourceString: The WHO has commended the efforts of Chinese authorities in managing and containing the epidemic.
targetString: WHO’n tattaaffii aanga’oonni Chaayinaa weeraricha hogganuu fi to’achuuf godhaniif beekamtee kenneera.
translated: WHOn tattaaffii aanga'oonni Chaayinaa weerara kana bulchuu fi to'achuu irratti taasisan galateeffateera.

sourceString: The WHO noted the contrast between the 2002–2004 SARS outbreak, where Chinese authorities were accused of secrecy that impeded prevention and containment efforts, and the current crisis where the central government "has provided regular updates to avoid panic ahead of Lunar New Year holidays".
targetString: WHO’n walbira qabaa weerara SARS 2002-2004, kan odeeffannoo dhoksuun aanga’oota Chaayinaa tattaaffiiwwan ittisaa fi to’annoo boodatti harkisee, fi dabboo ammaa, kan mootummaan giddu galeessaa “walitti qabama hawaasaa Ayyaana Bara Haaraa Ji’aa’nii hambisuuf idileedhaan odeeffannoo haaraa kennaa jiru”, qabateera.
translated: WHOn walfaallaa weerara SARS bara 2002–2004, kan aanga'oonni Chaayinaa iccitii tattaaffii ittisaa fi to'annoo gufachiisuun himataman, fi rakkoo amma mootummaan giddu galeessaa "ayyaana waggaa haaraa ji'aa dura sodaa akka hin uumamneef yeroo yeroon odeeffannoo haaraa kenne" gidduu jiru hubateera. .

sourceString: On 23 January, in reaction to the central authorities' decision to implement a transportation ban in Wuhan, WHO representative Gauden Galea remarked that while it was "certainly not a recommendation the WHO has made", it was also "a very important indication of the commitment to contain the epidemic in the place where it is most concentrated" and called it "unprecedented in public health history".On 30 January, following confirmation of human-to-human transmission outside China and the increase in the number of cases in other countries, the WHO declared the outbreak a Public Health Emergency of International Concern (PHEIC), the sixth PHEIC since the measure was first invoked during the 2009 swine flu pandemic.
targetString: Amajjii gaafa 23, murtoo aanga’onni uggura geejjibaa Wuhan raawwachiisuuf godhan irratti akka deebiitti, bakka bu’aan WHO Gauden Galea’n “kun gorsa WHO tiin kan ta’e miti,” jedhanii hubachiisuudhaan, “kunimmoo bakka inni hunda caalaa itti walitti qabame kanattti weeraricha to’achuuf kutannoo jiruuf mullistuu baayyee barbaachistuu” kan ta’esii fi “Seenaa Fayyaa Hawaasaa keessatti dursi kan hin jirreefdha” jechuun waamaniiru. Amajjii gaafa 30, daddarbiinsi namaa-namattii Chaayinaan alatti mirkana’uu fi biyyoota biroo keessattiin ta’iileen dabaluu hordofuudhaan, WHO’n weerara kana Dhimma Balaa Fayyaa Hawaasa Addunyaa (PHEIC) jechuun labsuun, erga wayita weerara addunyaa ‘swine flu’ 2009 ttiitii tarkaanfiin kun fudhatameetii PHEIC ja’affaa ta’eera.
translated: Guraandhala 23, murtee aanga'oonni giddugaleessaa uggura geejjibaa Wuhaan keessatti hojiirra oolchuuf murteessan irratti deebii kennaniin, bakka bu'aan WHO Gauden Galea ''yaada WHOn kenne ta'uun isaa mirkanaa'aa ta'us, ''agarsiiftuu baay'ee barbaachisaa ta'e kan... weerarri kun bakka inni baay'inaan itti baay'atutti to'achuuf waadaa galuu" jechuun "seenaa fayyaa hawaasaa keessatti kan kanaan dura hin argamne" jechuun waamuun isaanii ni yaadatama.Guraandhala 30, Chaayinaan alatti daddarbiinsa namaa gara namaatti taasifamuu mirkanaa'uu fi kanneen biroo keessatti lakkoofsi namoota vaayirasichaan qabaman dabaluu hordofee biyyoota, WHOn weerara kana yeroo hatattamaa Fayyaa Hawaasaa Yaaddoo Idil-addunyaa (PHEIC) jechuun labse, kunis erga tarkaanfiin kun yeroo jalqabaaf yeroo weerara dhukkuba infuleenzaa allaattii bara 2009tti waamamee booda PHEIC isa 6ffaadha.

sourceString: WHO Director-General Tedros Adhanom said that the PHEIC was due to "the risk of global spread, especially to low- and middle-income countries without robust health systems.
targetString: Daayirektarri waliigalaa WHO Tedros Adhanom PHEI n sababa “ balaa tatamsa’ina addunyaattii, keessattuu biyyoota galii gadi aanaa fi giddu galeessa qabaatanii sirna fayyaa amansiisaa hin qabnetti ta’udha” jechuun dubbataniiru.
translated: Daarektarri Olaanaa WHO Teediroos Adihaanoom akka jedhanitti, PHEIC "balaa tamsa'ina addunyaa, keessattuu biyyoota galii gadi aanaa fi giddu galeessaa qaban kanneen sirna fayyaa cimaa hin qabneef" jedhan.

sourceString: In response to the implementations of travel restrictions, Tedros stated that "there is no reason for measures that unnecessarily interfere with international travel and trade" and that the "WHO doesn't recommend limiting trade and movement."
targetString: Deebii hojiirra oolmaa ittisa imalaatiif, Tedros kan jedhan “imalaa fi daldala addunyaa irratti tarkaanfii hin barbaachifne sababni fudhannuuf tokko hin jiru” akkasumas “Dhaabbanni Fayyaa Addunyaa (WHO)’n daldalaa fi sochii ittisuu hin deeggaru.”
translated: Teedroos hojiirra oolmaa daangaa imalaaf deebii kennaniin, "tarkaanfiiwwan imalaafi daldala idil-addunyaa hin barbaachifne gidduu seenuuf sababni akka hin jirre" fi "WHOn daldalaa fi sochii daangeessuu hin gorsu" jechuun ibseera.

sourceString: On 5 February, the WHO appealed to the global community for a $675 million contribution to fund strategic preparedness in low-income countries, citing the urgency to support those countries which "do not have the systems in place to detect people who have contracted the virus, even if it were to emerge".
targetString: Gurraandhala 5, Dhaabbanni Fayyaa Addunyaa (WHO) hawaasa addunyaatiif deeggarsa doolaara miiliyoona 675 biyyoota galii gadi aanaa qaban baajataan “kanneen sirna namoota vaayirasichi jiraatus qabaman adda baasuu hin dandeenye” gargaaruuf gaafate.
translated: Fulbaana 5, WHOn biyyoota galii gadi aanaa qaban keessatti qophii tarsiimoo maallaqaan gargaaruuf gumaacha doolaara miiliyoona 675 hawaasa addunyaaf waamicha dhiheessee, biyyoota "sirna namoota vaayirasichaan qabaman adda baasuuf gargaaran hin qabne" deeggaruun ariifachiisaa ta'uu kaasuun isaa ni yaadatama , yoo mul'atellee".

sourceString: Tedros further made statements declaring that "we are only as strong as our weakest link" and urged the international community to "invest today or pay more later".On 11 February, the WHO in a press conference established COVID-19 as the name of the disease.
targetString: Tedros itti fufuudhaan “hammi jabina keenyaa, hamma hidhaa laaftuu keenyaati”haasaa jedhu kan taasisanii fi ummatni addunyaa “har’a hojiitti bobba’uu ykn booda kan caalu akka baasu” akeekkachiisaniiru. Guraandhala gaafa 11,konfireensii pireesii irratti COVID-19 akka maqaa dhukkubichaatti hundeesseera.
translated: Teediroos dabalataan ibsa labsuun "hanga hidhaa keenya isa dadhabaa qofa jabaannee jirra" jechuun labsuun hawaasni addunyaa "har'a invastimantii ykn booda dabalataa akka kaffalu" dhaamaniiru.Fulbaana 11 WHOn ibsa gaazexeessitootaaf kenneen COVID-19 akka maqaa... dhukkuba kana.

sourceString: On the same day, Tedros stated that UN Secretary-General António Guterres had agreed to provide the "power of the entire UN system in the response".
targetString: Guyyaama walfakkaataatti, Tedros Barreessaa Olaanaan UN Antonio Guterres “aangoo waliigalaa sirna UN kenniinsa deebii keessatti” dhiyeessuuf akka waliigalan himaniiru .
translated: Guyyuma sanatti Teediroos barreessaan olaanaa Dhaabbata Mootummoota Gamtoomanii Antooniyoo Gutereez ''deebii kennuu keessatti humna sirna Dhaabbata Mootummoota Gamtoomanii guutuu'' kennuudhaaf waliigaluu isaanii ibsaniiru.

sourceString: A UN Crisis Management Team was activated as a result, allowing coordination of the entire United Nations response, which the WHO states will allow them to "focus on the health response while the other agencies can bring their expertise to bear on the wider social, economic and developmental implications of the outbreak".
targetString: Gareen Bulchiinsa Rakkoo UN kanaan gara hojiitti galuun, kan WHO’n “wayita ejensiiwwan biroon agarsiistuuwwan hawaasaa, diinagdee fi misoomaa weerirachaa irratti beekumsa gadi fagoo wayita argatanitti, isaaniimmoo deebii fayyaa irratti akka xiyyeeffatan taasisa”, jechuun kan lafa kaa’e, deebii waliigalaa Yuunaayitid Neeshinsii kan qindeessudha.
translated: Sababa kanaan Gareen Bulchiinsa Rakkoo Dhaabbata Mootummoota Gamtoomanii hojii irra kan oole yoo ta'u, kunis qindoomina deebii Dhaabbata Mootummoota Gamtoomanii guutuu kan hayyame yoo ta'u, kunis "deebii fayyaa irratti akka xiyyeeffatan kan hayyamu yoo ta'u, dhaabbileen biroo ammoo ogummaa isaanii hawaasummaa, dinagdee bal'aa irratti fiduu danda'u." fi dhiibbaa misoomaa weerarri vaayirasichaa".

sourceString: On 14 February, a WHO-led Joint Mission Team with China was activated to provide international and WHO experts on the ground in China to assist in the domestic management and evaluate "the severity and the transmissibility of the disease" by hosting workshops and meetings with key national-level institutions and to conduct field visits to assess the "impact of response activities at provincial and county levels, including urban and rural settings".On 25 February, the WHO declared that "the world should do more to prepare for a possible coronavirus pandemic," stating that while it was still too early to call it a pandemic, countries should nonetheless be "in a phase of preparedness".
targetString: Gaafa Guraandhala 14, gareen ergamaa WHO-dhaan durfameefi China waliin ogeeyyii WHO akkasumas idil adduunyaa Chaayinaatti sarara duraa irra jiran gargaaruufi hooggansa biyya keessaa “daddarbiinsaafi hammina dhukkubichaa” xiinxaluuf walgahiifi workishooppii dhaabbilee biyyoolessaa murteessoo ta’an waliin doo’ii bakkee godhuudhaan “firii ittisa dhukkubichaaf godhame sadarkaa pirooviinsiifi kaawuntiitti, magaalafi baadiyyaa dabalatee” gochuudhaaf jalqabame. Gaafa Guraandhala 25, WHOn yoo yeroodhaaf weerara dhibeeti jechuuf nudandeessisuu baatellee, biyyoonni “sirna qophaa’uu keessa” jiraachuu qabu jechuun labsii “addunyaan dhibee daddarbaa haaraa ta’uu deemuuf of qopheessuu qaba” jechuun labse.
translated: Fulbaana 14 Gareen Ergama Waloo Chaayinaa waliin WHOn durfamu ogeeyyii idil-addunyaa fi WHO Chaayinaa keessatti lafa irratti argaman dhiyeessuun bulchiinsa biyya keessaa gargaaruu fi "ciminaa fi daddarbiinsa dhukkuba kanaa" madaaluuf workshopii fi walgahii waliin keessummeessuun hojiitti hiikame dhaabbilee sadarkaa biyyaatti ijoo ta'an akkasumas daawwannaa dirree gaggeessuun "dhiibbaa hojiiwwan deebii kennuu sadarkaa naannoo fi koonyaa, bakka magaalaa fi baadiyyaa dabalatee" madaaluuf.Fulbaana 25, WHOn "addunyaan waan danda'amuuf qophaa'uuf caalaatti gochuu qabdi" jechuun labseera weerara vaayirasii koroonaa," jechuun weerara jechuun ammallee dafee ta'us, biyyoonni kanas ta'e sana "marsaa qophii keessa" ta'uu akka qaban ibseera.

sourceString: In response to a developing outbreak in Iran, the WHO sent a Joint Mission Team there to assess the situation.On 28 February, WHO officials said that the coronavirus threat assessment at the global level would be raised from "high" to "very high", its highest level of alert and risk assessment.
targetString: Weerara Iraan keessatti baballachaa jiruuf akka deebiitti, WHO’n haalicha galmeessuudhaaf Garee Ergama Waliinii garasitti ergeera. Guraandhala gaafa 28, qondaaltonni WHO, sadarkaa addunyaatti madaalliin miidhaa koronaavaayiresii “olaanaa” irraa gara “baayyee olaanaatti”,sadarkaa waamichaa fi madaallii miidhaa isaa olaanaatti ce’uu danda’a jedhaniiru.
translated: Weerara Iraan keessatti guddachaa dhufeef deebii kennuudhaan WHOn Garee Ergama Waliinii achitti erguun haala jiru madaaluuf.Fulbaana 28 qondaaltonni WHO madaalliin balaa vaayirasii koroonaa sadarkaa addunyaatti gaggeeffamu "ol'aanaa" irraa gara "baay'ee ol'aanaatti" akka ol ka'u dubbataniiru. , sadarkaa dammaqiinsaa fi madaallii balaa isaa isa olaanaa.

sourceString: Mike Ryan, executive director of the WHO's health emergencies program, warned in a statement that "This is a reality check for every government on the planet: Wake up.
targetString: Maayik Riyaan, Dhaabbata Fayyaa Addunyaa (WHO)’tti hogganaa olaanaa sagantaa fayyaa ariifachiisaa, jecha “mootummoota pilaaneetii kanarra jiran hundaaf kun sakatta’iinsa dhugaati: dammaqaa jedhu keessatti akeekkachiisan.
translated: Daarektarri olaanaa sagantaa balaa fayyaa WHO Maayik Raayan ibsa kennaniin "Kun mootummaa pilaaneetii kanarra jiru hundaaf sakatta'iinsa dhugaa ta'uu isaati: Dammaqaa" jechuun akeekkachiisaniiru.

sourceString: This virus may be on its way and you need to be ready," urging that the right response measures could help the world avoid "the worst of it".
targetString: Vaayirasiin kun karaa isaa irra jiraachuu mala kanaaf qophaa’uu qabdu, “tarkaanfiin deebii sirriin addunyaan akka too’attu gargaaruu akka danda’u akeekkachiisaa “hammeenya isaa”.
translated: Vaayirasiin kun karaa irra jiraachuu mala, qophii ta'uu qabda," jechuun tarkaanfiiwwan deebii sirrii ta'an addunyaan "waan hamaa" irraa akka of qusachuuf gargaaruu akka danda'an dhaamaniiru.

sourceString: Ryan further stated that the current data did not warrant public health officials to declare a global pandemic, saying that such a declaration would mean "we're essentially accepting that every human on the planet will be exposed to that virus."
targetString: Ryan itti dabaluudhaan daataan ammaa weerara addunyaa jedhanii labsuuf aanga’oota fayyaa hawaasaaf wabii akka hin taane himanii, labsiileen akkasii hiikkaa, “namoonni pilaaneetii kanarra jiraatan hundi vaayiresichaaf saaxilamoo ta’uusaanii fudhachaa jirra” jedhaniiru.
translated: Raayan itti dabaluudhaan ragaan amma jiru qondaaltonni fayyaa hawaasaa weerara addunyaa akka labsan kan hin mirkaneessine ta'uu ibsuun, labsiin akkanaa "bu'uuraan namni pilaaneetii kanarra jiru hundi vaayirasii sanaaf akka saaxilamu fudhachaa jirra" jechuudha jedheera.

sourceString: On 11 March, the WHO declared the coronavirus outbreak a pandemic.
targetString: Bitootessa 11, Dhaabbani Fayyaa Addunyaa WHO’n vaayirasiin koroonaa weerara akka ta’e labse.
translated: Sadaasa 11 WHOn weerara vaayirasii koroonaa weerara ta’uu labse.

sourceString: The Director-General said that the WHO was "deeply concerned both by the alarming levels of spread and severity, and by the alarming levels of inaction".The WHO has faced significant criticism for what is seen as inadequate handling of the pandemic, including the late declaration of a public health emergency and the classification of the virus as a pandemic.
targetString: Hogganaan-Waliigalaa akka jedhanitti Dhaabbanni Fayyaa Addunyaa (WHO)’n “sadarkaa tatamsa’inaa lallabuu fi hammeenya, akkasumas sadarkaa al-gochaa akeekkachiisuu irratti gadi fageenyaan xiyyeeffatee ture.” WHO’n too’annaa weerarichaa gahaa hin taane fi vaayirasicha akka weeraratti adda baasuu kanneen jedhuun balaaleffatamee ture.
translated: Daarektarri Muummichaa kun WHOn "sadarkaa tatamsa'inaafi cimina sodaachisaa ta'e, akkasumas sadarkaa sodaachisaa ta'e gocha dhabuun yaaddoo guddaa qaba". labsii ariifachiisaa fayyaa hawaasaa yeroon booda labsuu fi vaayirasichi akka weeraraatti ramaduu.

sourceString: The backlash included a petition for the WHO Director-General Tedros Adhanom to tender his resignation, signed by 733,000 people as of 6 April.
targetString: Deebiin kun iyyannoo Daayirektera Waliigalaa WHO Tedros Adhanom kan hojii gadhiisuu isaatiif namoota 733,000n Eebla gaafa 6 mallatta’e ni hammata.
translated: Duub-deebii kana keessatti iyyanni Daarektarri Olaanaa WHO Teediroos Adhanom aangoo gadhiisuuf caalbaasii akka dhiyeessan kan hammate yoo ta’u, hanga Ebla 6tti namoota kuma 733n mallattaa’eera.

sourceString: On 26 March 2020, dozens of UN human rights experts emphasized respecting the rights of every individual during the COVID-19 pandemic.
targetString: Bitootessa gaafa 26, 2020 ogeeyyiin mirga namoomaa UN danuun wayita weerara addunyaa COVID-19 kanatti mirgi nama dhuunfaa kamiiyyuu kabajamuu irratti xiyyeeffataniiruu.
translated: Amajjii 26 bara 2020 ogeeyyiin mirga namoomaa Dhaabbata Mootummoota Gamtoomanii kudhanootaan lakkaa’aman yeroo weerara COVID-19 mirgi nama dhuunfaa hundaa kabajuu cimsanii dubbataniiru.

sourceString: The expert group stated that everyone is entitled to life-saving interventions and the government holds this responsibility.
targetString: Gareen ogeessota akka jedhanitti namni kamuu giddu seentummaa lubbuu baraaruuf godhamuu argachuuf mirga kan qabuu fi mootummaan immoo itti gaafatamummaa kanaa qaba.
translated: Gareen ogeeyyii kun namni hundi gidduu seensaa lubbuu baraaruuf mirga akka qabuu fi itti gaafatamummaa kana mootummaan akka qabu ibseera.

sourceString: The group stressed that the lack of resources or health insurance should never serve as a justification for discrimination against a specific group.
targetString: Garee murtaa’e adda basuuf hanqinni qabeenyaa fi wabii fayyaa yoomiyyuu akka sababa akka hin fayyadne garichi dhiibbaa uume.
translated: Gareen kun hanqinni qabeenya ykn inshuraansii fayyaa gonkumaa loogii garee murtaa’e tokko irratti raawwatamuuf sababa ta’ee tajaajiluu akka hin qabne cimsee ibseera.

sourceString: The experts underscored that every individual has the right to health, including people with disabilities, belonging to minority groups, older people, internally displaced people, the homeless, those living in extremely poor conditions, people in detention, as well as refugees and other unspecified groups in need of government support.
targetString: Namni dhuunfaa kamuu mirga fayyaa qabaachuu qaba, namoota miidhaa qaamaa qaban, garee xiqqaa, namoota dullooman, ummata keessaa buqqa’an, mana dhabeeyyii, kanneen hiyyummaa hamaa keessa jiraatan, namoota uggura keessa jiran, godaantotaa fi gareen adda hin bahin kanneen biroo gargaarsa mootummaa akka barbaadan ogeeyyonni jala muran.
translated: Namoota qaama miidhamtoota, garee xiqqaa keessaa ta’an, maanguddoota, namoota biyya keessaa buqqa’an, namoota mana hin qabne, kanneen haala garmalee gadhee keessa jiraatan, namoota hidhaa keessa jiran, akkasumas baqattootaa fi kanneen biroo kan hin ibsamne dabalatee namni dhuunfaa kamiyyuu mirga fayyaa akka qabu hubachiisaniiru gareewwan deeggarsa mootummaa barbaadan.

sourceString: International governmental organizations are addressing the economic and social impacts of the COVID-19 crisis.
targetString: Dhaabbileen addunyaa dhiibbaa balaan COVID-19 diinagdee fi hawaasummaa irraan gahaa jiru irratti dubbataa jiru.
translated: Dhaabbileen mootummaa idil-addunyaa dhiibbaa diinagdee fi hawaasummaa rakkoo COVID-19 mudate irratti xiyyeeffachaa jiru.

sourceString: The Organisation for Economic Co-operation and Development has launched a platform to provide timely and comprehensive information on policy responses in countries around the world, as well as viewpoints and advice.
targetString: Dhaabbanni Tumsaafi Dagaagina Diinagdeef odeeffannoo yeroon ta’ee fi hunda galeessa ta’e dhiyeessuuf hujeeffannoo deebiiwwan imaammataa biyyoota addunyaa keessaa irratti, akkasumas ilaalchotaafi gorsa irratti jalqabsiiseera.
translated: Dhaabbanni Tumsa Diinagdee fi Misooma deebii imaammataa biyyoota addunyaa irratti kennamu irratti odeeffannoo yeroo fi bal’aa, akkasumas ilaalchaa fi gorsa kennuudhaaf waltajjii jalqabeera.

sourceString: From policies to strengthen health systems and the world economy to addressing the effects of lockdown and restrictions on travel, the digital hub includes a Country Policy Tracker, and aims to help countries learn from each other and to facilitate a co-ordinated global response to the coronavirus challenge.
targetString: Imaammatoota irraa sirnoota fayyaa fi diinagdee addunyaa jabeessuuf miidhaawwan ugguraafi daangeffamuu imalaa irratti fala barbaaduuf, wiirtuun dijitaalaa Faana dhooftuu Imaammata Biyyaa hammata, fi biyyoonni akka isaan walirraa baratan akkasumas rakkoo vaayirasii koroonaaf deebii addunyaawaa qindaa’e haala mijeessuuf akeeka.
translated: Imaammata sirna fayyaa fi dinagdee addunyaa cimsuu irraa kaasee hanga bu’aa lockdown fi uggura imala irratti ka’u furuutti, wiirtuun dijitaalaa kun hordoffii Imaammata Biyyaa kan of keessatti hammate yoo ta’u, biyyoonni wal irraa akka baratan gargaaruu fi deebii addunyaa irratti qindoominaan akka kennamuuf haala mijeessuu kan kaayyeffate dha qormaata koronaa.

sourceString: The Chinese government has been criticized by the United States, UK Minister for the Cabinet Office Michael Gove, and Brazil President Jair Bolsonaro's son Eduardo Bolsonaro for its handling of the pandemic, which began in the Chinese province of Hubei.
targetString: Mootummaan Chaayinaa Yuunaayitid Isteetsiin, Ministeera Waajjira kaabinee UK, Michael Goven, fi ilma pireezidaantii Biraazil Jair Bolsonaro, Eduardo Bolsonaro niin haala qabiinsa weerara addunyaa, godina Chaayinaa Hubei keessatti jalqabee irratti qeeqamaa jira.
translated: Mootummaan Chaayinaa dhibee weerara vaayirasii Chaayinaa bulchiinsa Hubei keessatti eegale haala itti qabateef Ameerikaa, Ministira Waajjira Kaabinee UK Maayikeel Goovee fi ilmi preezdaantii Biraazil Jaayir Boolsoonaaroo Eduwaardoo Bolsonarootiin qeeqamaa tureera.

sourceString: A number of provincial-level administrators of the Communist Party of China (CPC) were dismissed over their handling of the quarantine efforts in Central China, a sign of discontent with the political establishment's response to the outbreak in those regions.
targetString: Bulchitoonni sadarkaa godinaa Paartii Kooministii Chaayinaa (CPC) hedduun sababa akkaataa qabiinsa iddoo tursiisaa Giddu gala Chaayinaattiif, akka mallattoo deebii weerarichaaf kennamu irratti ejjennoowwan siyaasaa fudhatamanitti gammadoo ta’uu dhiisuu isaanii mullisuun hojii isaaniirra kaafamaniiru.
translated: Bulchitoonni sadarkaa naannoo Paartii Koominiistii Chaayinaa (CPC) hedduun tattaaffii adda baafamuu Giddugaleessa Chaayinaa keessatti raawwatame haala itti qabataniin hojiirraa ari’amuun isaanii, deebii dhaabbati siyaasaa naannolee sanatti weerara vaayirasichaaf kenne irratti quufa dhabuu agarsiisa.

sourceString: Some commentators believe that this move was intended to protect Chinese Communist Party general secretary Xi Jinping from the public's anger over the coronavirus outbreak.
targetString: Yaada kennitoonni muraasni sochiin kun barreessaa olaanaa Paartii Kooministii Chaayinaa Xi Jinping weerara koronaavaayiresichaa irratti aarii ummataa irraa tiksuuf kan kaayyefate akka ta’e amanu.
translated: Namoonni yaada kennan tokko tokko tarkaanfiin kun barreessaa waliigalaa Paartii Koominiistii Chaayinaa Xi Jinping weerara vaayirasii koroonaa irratti aarii ummataa irraa eeguuf kan yaadame ta’uu amanu.

sourceString: Some Chinese officials, e.g. Zhao Lijian rejected an earlier acknowledgement of the coronavirus outbreak starting in Wuhan, in favour of conspiracy theories about the COVID-19 originating from the U.S. or Italy.
targetString: Qondaaltonni Chaayinaa muraasni, fknf Zhao Lijian weerarri koronaavaayiresii Wuhan keessatti jalqabe jedhamuun dursee kan dubbatame, yaadrimeewwan COVID-19 hin mirkanoofne U.S. ykn Xaaliyaaniidha jechuun haalaniiru.
translated: Qondaaltonni Chaayinaa tokko tokko, fkn Zhao Lijian weerara vaayirasii koroonaa Wuhaan irraa eegaluun duraan beekamtii kennameef kuffisuudhaan, yaada shiraa waa’ee COVID-19 US ykn Xaaliyaanii irraa madde deggeraniiru.

sourceString: The U.S. administration of Donald Trump has referred to the coronavirus as "Chinese virus" or "Wuhan virus" saying that China's "censorship supercharged a virus that has now turned into a global pandemic", which has in turn been criticized by some critics as racism and "distract[ing] from his administration's failure to contain the disease".
targetString: Bulchiisni Donald Trump kan U.S. coronaavaayiresichaan “vaayiresii Chaayinaa” ykn “vaayiresii Wuhan” jechuun moggaasuudhaan, Chaayinaan“odeeffannoosaa dhoksuun vaayiresii amma weerara addunyaatti jijjiirame kana akkaan olkaaseera” jechuun isaanii, qeeqxota muraasaab akka arrabsoo sanyummaatti fi “dadhabina bulchiinsisaa dhukkubicha to’achuurratti qabu irraa xiyyeeffannoo kaasuufiin” qeeqamaa ture.
translated: Bulchiinsi Ameerikaa Doonaald Tiraamp vaayirasii koroonaa "vaayirasii Chaayinaa" ykn "vaayirasii Wuhaan" jechuun waamuun, Chaayinaan "saassuun vaayirasii amma gara weerara addunyaatti jijjiirame supercharged" jechuun, kunis dabaree isaatiin qeeqxota tokko tokkoon sanyummaa jechuun qeeqameera akkasumas "bulchiinsi isaa dhukkuba kana to'achuu dadhabuu irraa yaada namaa kan jeequ".

sourceString: The Daily Beast obtained a U.S. government cable outlining a communications stratagem with apparent origins in the National Security Council, with the strategy being quoted as "Everything is about China.
targetString: Akka argatetti tooftaa walqunnamtii sararaa diriirsuu mootummaan U.S. argama ifa galeessa Koree Nageenya BIyyaalessaa keessaa wajjiin, tooftaa “wanti hunduu waa’ee Chaayinaati” jedhamee kaa’ame wajjiin.
translated: Gaazexaan Daily Beast tooftaa qunnamtii ka'umsi isaa mul'atu Mana Maree Nageenya Biyyaalessaa keessaa kan ibsu keebilii mootummaa Ameerikaa kan argate yoo ta'u, tarsiimoon kun "Wanti hundi waa'ee Chaayinaati" jedhamee caqasameera.

sourceString: We're being told to try and get this messaging out in any way possible, including press conferences and television appearances."Outlets such as Politico, Foreign Policy, and Bloomberg have claimed that China's efforts to send aid to virus-stricken countries is part of a propaganda push for global influence.
targetString: Akka yaalluuf fi ergaa kana karaa danda’amu kamiiniyyuu akka baasnuuf nutti himamaa jira, yaa’iiwwan pireesii fi muldhiiwwan televiiziyoonaa dabalatee. Maddooti akka Politico, Imaammata Alaa, fi Bloomberg carraaqqiiwwan Chaayinaan gargaarsa gara biyyoota vaayirasiin miidhamaniitti erguuf gootu dhiibbaa addunyaatiif dhiibbaa qaama ololaati jedhan.
translated: Ergaa kana karaa danda'ame hundaan, ibsa gaazexeessitootaaf kennuu fi televijiinii irratti mul'achuu dabalatee, akka yaalnu nutti himamaa jira."Dhaabbanni akka Politico, Foreign Policy, fi Bloomberg carraaqqiin Chaayinaan biyyoota vaayirasiin qabamaniif gargaarsa erguuf gootu qaama ta'uu himan dhiibbaa addunyaa irratti dhiibbaa ololaa.

sourceString: EU foreign policy chief Josep Borrell warned that there is "a geo-political component including a struggle for influence through spinning and the 'politics of generosity'".
targetString: Itti gaafatamaan seera biyya alaa EU Jooseep Boorreel “qaama ji’oopolotiksii naanna’uudhaan dhiibbaa uumuus dabalatee akkasumas ‘siyaasa arjoomaa’” akka jiru akeekkachiisan.
translated: Hogganaan imaammata alaa Gamtaa Awurooppaa Joozeep Booreel ''qabsoo dhiibbaa karaa naanna'uu fi 'siyaasa arjummaa' dabalatee qaamni ji'oo-siyaasaa jira'' jechuun akeekkachiisaniiru.

sourceString: Borrell also said that "China is aggressively pushing the message that, unlike the US, it is a responsible and reliable partner."
targetString: Boorreellis akka jedhanitti “Chaayinaan ergaa haala cimaadhaan dhiibaa jirti, akka US miti, kun hariiroo itti gaafatamummaa qabuu fi amanamaadha. ”
translated: Booreel akkasumas "Chaayinaan ergaa US irraa adda ta'ee michuu itti gaafatamummaa qabuu fi amanamaa ta'uu ishee cimsitee dhiibaa jirti" jedheera.

sourceString: China has also called for the US to lift its sanctions off of Syria, Venezuela and Iran, while reportedly sending aid to the latter two countries.
targetString: Chaayinaanins US akka uggura Syria, Venezuweelaa fi Iraan irraa kaaftuuf waamicha dhiyeessiteetti, akka gabaafameen biyyoota boodaa lamaaniif gargaarsa erguun.
translated: Chaayinaan akkasumas Ameerikaan qoqqobbii Siiriyaa, Veenzuweelaa fi Iraan irraa kaaste akka kaaftu kan gaafatte yoo ta’u, biyyoota lamaan boodaaf gargaarsa akka ergitu himamaa jira.

sourceString: Jack Ma's donation of 100,000 masks to Cuba was blocked by US sanctions on 3 April.
targetString: Gumaachi golgaawwan 100,000 kan Jaak Maan Kuubaaf kennan Ebla 3 adabbii US’tiin uggurame.
translated: Jaak Maa deeggarsa maaskii kuma 100 Kuubaaf godhe qoqqobbii Ameerikaan Ebla 3 kaa'een ugguramee ture.

sourceString: US authorities have also been accused of diverting aid meant for other nations to their own country.
targetString: Angawoonni US dabalataan gargaarsa biyyoota biraaf ture gara biyya mataa isaaniitti maqsuu isaaniin himatamaniiru.
translated: Angawoonni Ameerikaa gargaarsa saboota biroof yaadame gara biyya isaaniitti dabarsuudhaanis himatamaa turaniiru.

sourceString: And there have been mask-related disputes reported between other countries, such as Germany, Austria and Switzerland; and the Czech Republic and Italy.
targetString: Fi waldhabdeewwan haguuggii waliin walqabatan biyyoota biroo akka Jarmanii, Oostiriyaa fi Siwiizerlaand; fi Cheek Repubilikii fi Xaaliyaanii gidduutti gabaafamaa jiru.
translated: Akkasumas biyyoota biroo kan akka Jarman, Oostiriyaa fi Siwiizarlaand gidduutti waldhabdeen haguuggii fuulaa waliin walqabatee gabaafame jira; akkasumas Rippabiliika Cheek fi Xaaliyaanii.

sourceString: In addition, Turkey seized hundreds of ventilators destined for Spain.
targetString: Dabalataan, Turkiin meeshaawwan hargansuu dhibbaan lakkaa’aman kan Ispeeniif karoorfaman qabatteetti.
translated: Kana malees Turkiyaan veentileetaroota gara Ispeenitti imalan dhibbaan lakkaa'aman to'attee jirti.

sourceString: In early March, the Italian government criticized the European Union's lack of solidarity with coronavirus-affected Italy.
targetString: Bitootessa gara duraa keessa, mootummaan Xaaliyaanii koronaavaayiresiin kan miidhamte Xaaliyaaniif dirmannaa hin taasisne jechuun komateera.
translated: Jalqaba baatii Sadaasaa keessa mootummaan Xaaliyaanii Gamtaan Awurooppaa Xaaliyaanii koronaavaayirasiin miidhamte waliin tumsa dhabuu isaa qeeqee ture.

sourceString: Maurizio Massari, Italy's ambassador to the EU, said that "Only China responded bilaterally.
targetString: EU’tti ambaasaaddarri Xaaliyaanii Maurizio Massari n, “Chaayinaa qofatu gam-lamaan deebise jedhan.
translated: Gamtaa Awurooppaatti ambaasaaddarri Xaaliyaanii Maurizio Massari ''Deebii lameenii kan kennite Chaayinaa qofa'' jedhan.

sourceString: Certainly, this is not a good sign of European solidarity."
targetString: Ta’us, kun mallattoo gaarii tokkummaa Awurooppaatii miti.”
translated: Kun mallattoo gamtaa Awurooppaa akka hin taane beekamaadha."

sourceString: On 22 March, after a phone call with Italian Prime Minister Giuseppe Conte, Russian president Vladimir Putin arranged the Russian army to send military medics, special disinfection vehicles, and other medical equipment to Italy.
targetString: Bitootessa 22 tti, waamicha bilbilaa Muummicha Ministeeraa Xaaliyaan Giuseppe Conte booda, Pireezidaantiin Raashiyaa Vladimir Putin raayyaa Raashiyaanotaa barattoota wal’aansaa (doktaroota), konkolaataawwan addaa baakteeriyaa dhukkuba fidu ajjeesuun qulqulleessan, fi meeshaa wal’aansaa kan biraa Xaaliyaanitti erguuf mijeessan.
translated: Amajjii 22, pirezidaantiin Raashiyaa Vilaadimiir Puutiin MM Xaaliyaanii Juuseepe Koontee waliin bilbilaan erga bilbilanii booda, waraanni Raashiyaa ogeeyyii fayyaa waraanaa, konkolaataa addaa disinfection fi meeshaalee yaalaa biroo gara Xaaliyaanii akka erguuf haala mijeesse.

sourceString: Italy's La Stampa newspaper cited an anonymous "high-level political source" that 80 percent of Russia's aid was "useless or of little use to Italy".
targetString: Gaazexaan Xaaliyaanii La Stampa’n madda hin beekamne, “madda siyaasaa sadarkaa olaanaa” tuquudhaan gargaarsi Raashiyaa dhibbentaan 80 “Xaaliyaaniif faayidaa kan hinqabne ykn faayidaa xinnoo qabu” jedheera.
translated: Gaazexaan Xaaliyaanii La Stampa jedhamu maqaan isaa hin ibsamne ''madda siyaasaa sadarkaa olaanaa'' wabeeffachuun gargaarsi Raashiyaa dhibbeentaan 80 ''faayidaa hin qabu ykn Xaaliyaaniif faayidaa xiqqaa qaba'' jechuun ibseera.

sourceString: The source accused Russia of embarking on a "geopolitical and diplomatic" charm offensive.
targetString: Raashiyaan “siyaasaa fi diploomaasii” arrabsoo hammaa eegaluu ishee maddichi yakke.
translated: Maddi kun Raashiyaan haleellaa charmii "ji'oopoolitikaa fi dippilomaasii" irratti seente jechuun himate.

sourceString: The President of Lombardy, Attilio Fontana, and Italian Foreign Minister Luigi Di Maio dismissed the media reports and expressed their gratitude.
targetString: Piresidaantiin Lombardy, Attilio Fontana fi Ministeerri Dhimma Alaa Xaaliyaanii Luigi Di Maio n gabaasee miidiyaa kan maqsanii fi kabaja isaaniis ibsataniiru.
translated: Pirezidaantiin Loombardii, Attilio Fontana, fi Ministirri Dhimma Alaa Xaaliyaanii Luwiiji Di Maayo gabaasa miidiyaalee kana kuffisuun galata isaanii ibsaniiru.

sourceString: Russia also sent a cargo plane with medical aid to the United States.
targetString: Raashiyaanis xiyyaara fe’isaa gargaarsa meedikaalaa waliin Yuunaayitid Isteetsitti ergiteetti.
translated: Raashiyaan xiyyaara fe'umsaa gargaarsa yaalaa waliinis gara Ameerikaatti ergite.

sourceString: Kremlin spokesman Dmitry Peskov said that "when offering assistance to US colleagues, [Putin] assumes that when US manufacturers of medical equipment and materials gain momentum, they will also be able to reciprocate if necessary."
targetString: Dubbi himaan Kremlin Dmitry Peskov “yemmuu hiriyaawwan hojii US’f gargaarsa goonu, [Putin] yemmuu oomishtoonni meeshaalee meedikaalaa fi mi’ootaa olaantummaa argatan, yoo barbaachise gargalchuufis ni malu, jedhanii tilmaamu” jechuun dubbataniiru.
translated: Dubbi himaan Kremlin Dmitry Peskov akka jedhanitti, "[Putin] yeroo michoota Ameerikaa gargaarsa kennan, oomishtoonni meeshaalee yaalaa fi meeshaalee yaalaa Ameerikaa yeroo humna argatan, yoo barbaachisaa ta'es deebii kennuu akka danda'an tilmaama."

sourceString: The planned NATO "Defender 2020" military exercise in Germany, Poland, and the Baltic states, the largest NATO war exercise since the end of the Cold War, will be held on a reduced scale.
targetString: NATO’n karoorfame “ittisa 2020” shaakala toltummaa Jarman, Poolaandi, fi kutaa Baaltik keessatti, shaakala NATO guddaa erga waraana qorraatii kaasee, hamma xiqqaateen taasifama.
translated: Shaakala waraanaa NATO "Defender 2020" Jarman, Poolaandi, fi biyyoota Baaltik keessatti karoorfame, shaakala waraanaa NATO isa guddaa erga xumura Waraana Qorqorroo booda, sadarkaa hir'ifameen gaggeeffama.

sourceString: The Campaign for Nuclear Disarmament's general secretary Kate Hudson criticized the Defender 2020 exercise: "In the current public-health crisis, it jeopardizes the lives not only of the troops from the US and the many European countries participating but the inhabitants of the countries in which they are operating."The Iranian government has been heavily affected by the virus, with around two dozen parliament members infected as well as fifteen other current or former political figures.
targetString: Barreessaa olaanaan Duula Hiikkachiisa Niwkileraa Kate Hudson shaakala Qolannaa 2020 wayita qeeqan: “Dabboo fayyaa-hawaasaa ammaa kana keessatti, lubbuu loltoota US fi biyyoota Europe hedduu hirmaachaa jiranii qofaa utuu hin taane kan lubbu qabeeyyii biyyoota isaan keessatti socho’aniillee balaarra kan buusudha.” Mootummaan Iraan miseensonni paarlaamaa naannoo daarzaana lamaa akkasumas dureewwan siyaasaa ammaa fi duraa kudha shan biroon jalaa hubamuudhaan vaayiresichaan hedduu miidhamteetti.
translated: Barreessituun waliigalaa Duula Hidhannoo Niwukilaraa Keet Haadsan shaakala Defender 2020 qeequun: "Rakkoo fayyaa hawaasaa amma mudate keessatti, lubbuu loltoota US fi biyyoota Awurooppaa hedduu hirmaatan qofa osoo hin taane jiraattota biyyoota keessa jiran balaadhaaf saaxilaa jira." they are operating."Mootummaan Iraan vaayirasichaan haalaan kan miidhame yoo ta'u, miseensonni paarlaamaa gara kudhan lamaa akkasumas namoota siyaasaa ammaa ykn duraanii kudha shaniin qabamaniiru.

sourceString: Iran's President Hassan Rouhani wrote a public letter to world leaders asking for help on 14 March 2020, saying that his country is struggling to fight the outbreak due to lack of access to international markets as a result of the United States sanctions against Iran.The outbreak has prompted calls for the United States to adopt social policies common in other wealthy countries, including universal health care, universal child care, paid family leave, and higher levels of funding for public health.
targetString: Pirezidaantiin Iraan Hassan Rouhani’n biyyi isaanii sababa qoqqobbii Yuunaayitid Isteets Iraan irra keesseen gabaa addunyaatti hirmaachuu dhabuun weeraricha qolachuuf carraaqaa jirti jechuun Bitootessa gaafa 14, 2020 gargaarsa gaafachuuf dureewwan addunyaatiif xaalayaa barreessaniiru. Weerarri kunis Yuunaayitid Isteetsi imaammatawwan hawaasummaa biyyoota badhaadhoo biroo eegumsa fayyaa waliigalaa, eegumsa daa’immanii waliigalaa, kaffaltii maatiiwwan ittiin wal gargaaran, fi fayyaa hawaasaatiif fandiiwwan sadarkaa olaanoo taasisuu dabalatee akka hojiirra oolchitu dirqamsiiseera.
translated: Preezdaantiin Iraan Hasan Ruhaaniin sadaasa 14 bara 2020 xalayaa ummataaf hooggantoota addunyaatiif barreessuun gargaarsa gaafachuun biyyi isaanii sababa qoqqobbii Ameerikaan Iraan irratti kaa’atteen gabaa addunyaa dhaqqabuu dhabuu isheetiin weerara kana qolachuuf rakkachaa jirti jedhan.Weerarri vaayirasichaa Ameerikaan imaammata hawaasummaa biyyoota dureeyyii biroo keessatti barame akka fudhattu kan taasise yoo ta’u, kunis kunuunsa fayyaa waliigalaa, kunuunsa daa’immanii waliigalaa, boqonnaa maatii kaffaltii qabuu fi fayyaa hawaasaaf maallaqa sadarkaa olaanaa ta’e akka fudhattu taasiseera.

sourceString: Political analysts anticipated it may negatively affect Donald Trump's chances of re-election in the 2020 presidential election.Diplomatic relations between Japan and South Korea worsened due to the pandemic.
targetString: Xiinxaltoonni siyaasaa filannoo pirezindaantummaa 2020 irratti carraa Donald Trump irra deebiin filatamuuf qaban irratti dhiibbaa gadhee qabaachuu akka malu dubbatu. Hariiroon dippilomaasii Jaappaanii fi Kooriyaa Kibbaa sababa weera addunyaa kanaan caalaatti hammaateera.
translated: Xiinxaltoonni siyaasaa carraa Donaald Tiraamp filannoo pirezidaantii bara 2020 irra deebiin filatamuu isaanii irratti dhiibbaa hamaa geessisuu mala jedhanii tilmaamaniiru.Hariiroon dippilomaasii Jaappaanii fi Kooriyaa Kibbaa sababa weerara vaayirasii koronaan hammaate.

sourceString: South Korea criticized Japan's "ambiguous and passive quarantine efforts" after Japan announced anybody coming from South Korea will be placed in two weeks' quarantine at government-designated sites.
targetString: Erga Jaappaan nama Kooriyaan Kibbaa irraa dhufu kamuu iddoowwan mootummaan qopheesse keessa torbanoota lamaaf qofaatti baafamuu isaanii beeksiftee eegaltee Kooriyaa Kibbaa “tattaaffiiwwan qofaatti baasuu ifa hin taaneef si’awaa hin taane” kan Jaappaan qeeqxeetti.
translated: Kooriyaan Kibbaa Jaappaan namni Kooriyaa Kibbaa irraa dhufu kamiyyuu bakka mootummaan murteessetti torban lamaaf akka turu erga beeksiftee booda ''tattaaffii adda baafamuu walxaxaa fi dadhaboo'' Jaappaan qeeqxe.

sourceString: The South Korean society was initially polarized on President Moon Jae-in's response to the crisis.
targetString: Hawaasni Kooriyaa Kibbaa deebii pirezidaanti Moon Jae-in rakkina kanarratti kennaniin jalqabarratti giddu gidduu ta’anii turan.
translated: Hawaasni Kooriyaa Kibbaa jalqaba irratti deebii Pirezidaanti Moon Jae-in rakkoo kanaaf kennan irratti poolaarized ture.

sourceString: Many Koreans signed petitions either calling for the impeachment of Moon over what they claimed to be government mishandling of the outbreak, or praising his response.The pandemic has allowed countries to pass emergency legislation in response.
targetString: Kooriyoonni baay’een iyyata mallatteessaniiru himannaa Moon’f jalqabbii dhukkubichaa seeraan to’achuu dadhabuu mootummaa isaan jedhan irratti waamicha gochuuf, yookaan deebiisaa galateeffachuuf. Weerarri addunyaawaa isa ilaalchisee biyyoonni akka isaan seera hiikuu balaa hatattamaa labsan hayyameera.
translated: Lammiileen Kooriyaa hedduun iyyannoowwan yookaan waan mootummaan weerara vaayirasii koronaa haala gaariin qabate jedhanii Moon aangoo irraa akka kaafamu gaafatan, yookaan deebii kenne faarsuun mallatteessaniiru.Vaayirri dhibee kanaan biyyoonni deebii kennuudhaaf seera hatattamaa akka dabarsan taasiseera.

sourceString: Some commentators have expressed concerns that it could allow governments to strengthen their grip on power.
targetString: Yaada kennitoonni muraasi inni mootummoonni qabannoo isaanii aangoo irratti akka jabessan hayyamuu akka danda’u yaaddoowwan ibsaniiru.
translated: Namoonni yaada kennan tokko tokko mootummoonni aangoo irratti qaban akka cimsan hayyamuu danda'a jechuun yaaddoo qaban ibsaniiru.

sourceString: In Hungary, its parliament voted to allow the prime minister, Viktor Orbán, to rule by decree indefinitely, suspend parliament as well as elections and punish those deemed to have spread false information about the virus and the government's handling of the crisis.
targetString: Hangaarii keessatti, paarlaamaan isaa Muummicha Ministeeraa, Viiktoor Orbaan, yeroo hin murtoofneef akka inni labsiin bulchu, paarlaamaa akkasumas filannoowwan yeroof akka dhaabuu fi sanneen odeeffannoo sobaa waa’ee vaayirasichaafi akkaataa mootummaan balaa to’atu facaasan akka adabu hayyamuuf filateera.
translated: Haangaariitti paarlaamaan ishee muummichi ministeeraa Viktor Orbaan yeroo hin murtoofneef labsiidhaan akka bulchu, paarlaamaa akkasumas filannoo akka addaan kutuu fi namoota waa’ee vaayirasichaa odeeffannoo sobaa facaasan jedhamanii fi haala mootummaan rakkoo kana itti qabate akka adabuuf sagalee kenne.

sourceString: The coronavirus outbreak has been blamed for several instances of supply shortages, stemming from globally increased usage of equipment to fight the outbreaks, panic buying, and disruption to factory and logistic operations.
targetString: Weerarri vaayirasii koroonaa sababoota hedduuf balaaleffatama hanqina dhiheessaa, weerara qolachuuf haala olaanaan itti fayyadamamuu meeshaalee sadarkaa addunyaatti dabaluu, bittaa burjaaja’aa, fi miidhamuu warshaa fi sochii fe’uumsaa.
translated: Weerarri vaayirasii koroonaa hanqinni dhiyeessii akka addunyaatti itti fayyadamni meeshaalee weerara vaayirasii kana ittisuuf baay’achuu, bittaa rifachuu, hojii warshaa fi loojistikii addaan cituu irraa kan madde yeroo hedduudhaaf komatamaa tureera.

sourceString: The United States Food and Drug Administration has issued warnings about shortages of drugs and medical equipment due to increased consumer demand and supplier disruption.
targetString: Bulchiinsi Nyaataa fi Qorichaa Yuunaayitid Isteet waa’ee hanqina qorichaa fi meeshaalee yaalaa sababa daballii fayyadamaatiinii fi dadhabuu dhiheessaatiin muudate akeekkachiise.
translated: Bulchiinsi Nyaataa fi Qorichaa Yunaayitid Isteetis fedhiin fayyadamtootaa dabaluu fi dhiyeessii addaan cituu irraa kan ka’e hanqina qorichaafi meeshaalee yaalaa ilaalchisee akeekkachiisa kenneera.

sourceString: Several localities also witnessed panic buying that led to shelves being cleared of grocery essentials such as food, toilet paper, and bottled water, inducing supply shortages.
targetString: Jiraattonni naannoos bittaa hawaasa ballaan geggeeffame kan mi’oonni gurgurtaa hedduu barbaadaman kanneen akka nyaataa, sooftii, fi bishaan saamsamaan faan minjaalarraa dhumuu fi hanqina dhiyeessiif sababa ta’uu ragaa ba’aniiru.
translated: Naannoleen hedduunis bittaa rifachuu kan argan yoo ta’u, kunis sheelfota meeshaalee gurgurtaa nyaataa kanneen akka nyaataa, waraqaa mana fincaanii fi bishaan qaruuraa irraa qulqulleessuun hanqina dhiyeessii uumeera.

sourceString: The technology industry in particular has been warning about delays to shipments of electronic goods.
targetString: Industiriin teknoloojii keessattuu harkifannaa geejjiba meeshaalee elektirooniksii irratti akeekkachiiseera.
translated: Keessattuu indaastiriin teeknooloojii ergaa meeshaalee elektirooniksii irratti harkifachuu akeekkachiisaa tureera.

sourceString: According to WHO director-general Tedros Adhanom, the demand for personal protection equipment has risen 100-fold.
targetString: Akka Daarektara Olaanaa WHO Teediroos Adhaanomitti, fedhiin meeshaa eegumsa dhuunfaa dachaa 100’n dabaleera.
translated: Akka daayreektarri olaanaa WHO Tedroos Adhanom jedhanitti fedhiin meeshaalee eegumsa dhuunfaa dachaa 100n dabaleera.

sourceString: This demand has led to the increase in prices of up to twenty times the normal price and also induced delays on the supply of medical items for four to six months.
targetString: Fedhiin kun daballiin gatii isa dhaabbii irraa si’a diigdama akka dabalu akkasumas dhiheessi meeshaalee fayyaa ji’oota afurii hanga jahaatii akka darbu taasise.
translated: Fedhiin kun gatiin gatii idilee hanga dachaa digdamaa akka dabalu kan taasise yoo ta’u, dhiyeessii meeshaalee yaalaa irrattis ji’oota afur hanga jahaaf harkifannaa fideera.

sourceString: It has also caused a shortage of personal protective equipment worldwide, with the WHO warning that this will endanger health workers.
targetString: Hanqina meeshaalee of eeggannoo dhuunfaa, WHO’n hojjettoota fayyaa balaarra buusa jechuun akeekkachiiseefis sababa ta’eera.
translated: Akkasumas addunyaa guutuutti hanqina meeshaalee ittisa dhuunfaa uumeera, kunis hojjettoota fayyaa balaadhaaf akka saaxilu WHO akeekkachiiseera.

sourceString: In Australia, the pandemic provided a new opportunity for daigou shoppers to sell Australian products into China.
targetString: Awustiraaliyaa keessatti, weerarri addunyaa kun shammattoonni daigou oomishaalee Awustiraaliyaa Chaayinaatti akka gurguraniif carraa haaraa baneefi.
translated: Awustiraaliyaa keessatti weerarri dhibee kanaa bitattoonni daigou oomisha Awustiraaliyaa gara Chaayinaatti akka gurguran carraa haaraa uumeera.

sourceString: The activity has created a shortage of baby formula in some supermarkets and was subsequently banned by the Australian government.Despite the high prevalence of COVID-19 cases in Northern Italy and the Wuhan region, and the ensuing high demand for food products, both areas have been spared from acute food shortages.
targetString: Sochiin kunis suuppermaarkeetota muraasa keessatti hanqinaata nyaata daa’immanii kan uumee fi Mootummaa Awustiraaliyaatiin battalatti uggarameera. Baballinaa olaanaa ta’iilee COVID-19 Kaaba Xaaliyaanii fi naannoo Wuhan, fi fedhiilee oomishaalee nyaataa mirkaneessuun alatti, naanooleen lameen hanqinoota nyaataa hamaarraa baraaramaniiru.
translated: Sochiin kun suuqiiwwan gurguddoo tokko tokko keessatti hanqina foormulaa daa’immanii kan uume yoo ta’u, kana boodas mootummaan Awustiraaliyaatiin dhorkamee ture.Kaaba Xaaliyaanii fi naannoo Wuhaan keessatti baay’inaan namoonni COVID-19 qabaman baay’inaan mul’atanis, kana booda fedhiin oomishaalee nyaataa olaanaa ta’us, naannoleen lamaan hanqina nyaataa cimaa irraa baraarameera.

sourceString: Measures by China and Italy against the hoarding and illicit trade of critical products have been successful, avoiding acute food shortages that were anticipated in Europe as well as in North America.
targetString: Tarkaanfiiwwan Chaayinaafi Xaaliyaaniin kuufamaafi daldala seeraala oomishoota murteessoo irratti fudhataman milkaa’oo turani, hanqina nyaataa hatattamaa dursanii yaadaman Awurooppaa akksumas Amerikaa Kaabaa keessatti dhowwuu.
translated: Tarkaanfiiwwan Chaayinaa fi Xaaliyaan oomishaalee murteessoo ta’an walitti qabuu fi daldala seeraan alaa irratti fudhatan milkaa’aniiru, hanqina nyaataa cimaa Awurooppaa akkasumas Ameerikaa Kaabaa keessatti eegamu hambiseera.

sourceString: Northern Italy with its significant agricultural production has not seen a large reduction, but prices may increase according to industry representatives.
targetString: Kaabni Xaaliyaan oomisha qonnaa guddaa ishee waliin hir’ina guddaa hin argine, garuu gatiiwwan akkaataa bakka bu’oota industiriitti dabaluu malu.
translated: Kaaba Xaaliyaanii oomisha qonnaa guddaa qabduun hir’ina guddaa hin agarsiifne, garuu akka bakka bu’oonni indaastirichaa jedhanitti gatiin dabaluu mala.

sourceString: Empty food shelves were only encountered temporarily, even in Wuhan city, while Chinese government officials released pork reserves to assure sufficient nourishment of the population.
targetString: Baattoowwan nyaataa duwwaa ta’an yeroo gabaabaaf qofaa mudatan, magaalaa Wuhaan keessatillee, yeroo qondaaltonni mootummaa Chaayinaa hambaawwan foon booyyee soorata gahaa uummataa mirkaneessuuf gadhiisanitti.
translated: Sheelfoon nyaataa duwwaan yeroodhaaf qofa kan mudate yoo ta'u, magaalaa Wuhaan keessattillee kan mudate yoo ta'u, qondaaltonni mootummaa Chaayinaa ammoo soorata gahaa ummataa mirkaneessuuf kuufama foon allaattii gadhiisaniiru.

sourceString: Similar laws exist in Italy requiring food producers to keep reserves for such emergencies.
targetString: Seeronni walfakkaataan Xaaliyaan keessa oomishtoonni nyaataa akka isaan balaawwan hatattamaa akkasiif nyaata kuusuu isaanii barbaadan ni jiru.
translated: Xaaliyaanii keessattis seerri walfakkaataan oomishtoonni nyaataa yeroo hatattamaa akkasiif kuufama akka qabaatan dirqisiisu jira.

sourceString: Damage to the global economy has been felt in China: according to a media report on 16 March, the economy in China was very hard hit in the first two months of 2020 due to the measures taken by the government to curtail virus spread, and retail sales plunged 20.5%.
targetString: Miidhaan diinagdee addunyaa Chaayinaa keessatti mullachaa jira: akka gabaasa miidiyaa Bitootessa gaafa 16 tti, sababa tarkaanfilee baballina vaayiresii to’achuuf mootummaan fudhatamani, fi gurgurtaan shaqaxaa 20.5%n gadi bu’eef, diinagdeen Chaayinaa ji’oota jalqabaa lamaan 2020 tti hedduu miidhamee ture.
translated: Miidhaan dinagdee addunyaa irratti Chaayinaa keessatti dhaga’ameera: akka gabaasa miidiyaa Sadaasa 16 ba’etti, tarkaanfii mootummaan tamsa’ina vaayirasii, fi daldala gurgurtaa hir’isuuf fudhate irraa kan ka’e ji’oota lamaan jalqabaa bara 2020 keessa dinagdeen Chaayinaa baay’ee miidhameera gurgurtaan %20.5 gadi bu’eera.

sourceString: As mainland China is a major economy and manufacturing hub, the viral outbreak has been seen to pose a major destabilizing threat to the global economy.
targetString: Akka biyyaatti Chaayinaan wiirtuu diinagdee fi oomishaa guddoodha, jalqabbiin dhukkuba vaayirasiin dhufuu diinagdee addunyaa doorsisa tasgabbaa’ina dhabsiisu ta’ee ilaalame.
translated: Lafti guddittii Chaayinaan giddugala dinagdee fi omishaa guddaa waan taateef, weerarri vaayirasii kun dinagdee addunyaa irratti balaa guddaa tasgabbii dhabsiisu ta’ee mul’ateera.

sourceString: Agathe Demarais of the Economist Intelligence Unit has forecast that markets will remain volatile until a clearer image emerges on potential outcomes.
targetString: Agaatee Deemaraayis kan garee Nageenya Diinagdee hanga bu’aa guddaa irraa mallattoon ifatti mul’atutti jijjiiramni gabaa akka itti fufu raage.
translated: Kutaa Odeeffannoo Diinagdee irraa Agathe Demarais hanga suuraan ifa ta’e bu’aa dhufuu danda’u irratti mul’atutti gabaan jijjiirama akka hin qabne tilmaameera.

sourceString: In January 2020, some analysts estimated that the economic fallout of the epidemic on global growth could surpass that of the 2002–2004 SARS outbreak.
targetString: Amajjii 2020 tti, xiinxaltoonni muraasi bu’aan gadhee diinagdee weerara iddoo murtaa’ee guddina addunyaa irratti fidu kan jalqabbii SARS 2002–2004 caaluu akka danda’u tilmaamani.
translated: Guraandhala bara 2020 keessa xiinxaltoonni tokko tokko bu’aan dinagdee weerarri kun guddina addunyaa irratti fide kan weerara SARS bara 2002–2004 caalu akka danda’u tilmaamaniiru.

sourceString: One estimate from an expert at Washington University in St. Louis gave a $300+ billion impact on the world's supply chain that could last up to two years.
targetString: Tilmaamni ogeessa Yuuniversiitii Washington kan St. Louis keessaa, kan hanga waggaa lamaatti turuu malu dhiibbaa biiliyoona $300+ fuuncaa dhiyeessii addunyaarra kaa’eera.
translated: Tilmaamni ogeessa Yunivarsiitii Waashingitan Seent Luwiis irraa argame tokko dhiyeessii addunyaa irratti dhiibbaa doolaara biiliyoona 300+ kan hanga waggaa lamaa turuu danda’u kenneera.

sourceString: The Organization of the Petroleum Exporting Countries (OPEC) reportedly "scrambled" after a steep decline in oil prices due to lower demand from China.
targetString: Dhaabbanni Biyyoota Peetrooliyeemii Gabaa-alaaf dhiyeessanii (OPEC) akka gabaasaaleetti fedhiin Chaayinaa gadi bu’uu isaatiin gatiin zayitaa erga kufeetii “akka dhabaniiru.”
translated: Dhaabbanni Biyyoota Boba'aa Al-ergii (OPEC) sababa fedhii Chaayinaa irraa dhufuun gatiin boba'aa haalaan gadi bu'ee booda ''wal-xaxaa'' akka ture himameera.

sourceString: Global stock markets fell on 24 February due to a significant rise in the number of COVID-19 cases outside mainland China.
targetString: Gabaan meeshaalee addunyaa sababa olka’iinsa guddaa ta’iilee COVID-19 lafa Chaayinaan alattiitiin Guraandhala gaafa 24 kufeera.
translated: Gabaa aksiyoonaa addunyaa Fulbaana 24 gadi bu’e sababa lakkoofsi namoota COVID-19 qabaman biyya guddittii Chaayinaan alatti baay’ee dabaluu isaatiin.

sourceString: On 27 February, due to mounting worries about the coronavirus outbreak, various U.S. stock indexes including the NASDAQ-100, the S&P 500 Index, and the Dow Jones Industrial Average posted their sharpest falls since 2008, with the Dow falling 1,191 points, the largest one-day drop since the financial crisis of 2007–08.
targetString: Gurraandhala 27’tti, sababa olka’uu sodaa weerara vaayirasii koroonaatiin, indeeksiin mankuusaa U.S. NASDAQ-100, SfiP 500 Indeeksi dabalatee, akkasumas Giddugalli Industirii Dow Joonsi gadi bu’iinsa isaani bara 2008 irraa kaasee jiru maxxansan, gadi bu’uu Dow qabxiilee 1,191 wajjiin, erga miidhaa faayinaansii bara 2007-08 tii gadi bu’a guyyaa tokkoo isa guddaadha.
translated: Fulbaana 27, sababa yaaddoo weerara vaayirasii koroonaa dabalaa dhufeen, NASDAQ-100, S&P 500 Index, fi Dow Jones Industrial Average dabalatee indeeksii istookii Ameerikaa adda addaa bara 2008 irraa eegalee gadi bu’iinsa cimaa kan agarsiisan yoo ta’u, Dow qabxii 1,191 gadi bu’uun isaa isa guddaadha erga rakkoo maallaqaa bara 2007–08 mudatee booda guyyaa tokkoo gadi bu’eera.

sourceString: All three indexes ended the week down more than 10%.
targetString: Qoodamoonni sadeen hundi torbanitti %10 caala gadi bu’u.
translated: Indeeksii sadan torban kana %10 ol gadi bu'uun xumuran.

sourceString: On 28 February, Scope Ratings GmbH affirmed China's sovereign credit rating, but maintained a Negative Outlook.
targetString: Guraandhala gaafa 28, ‘Scope Ratings GmbH’ hamma liqeessuu dandeettii liqeessuu Chaayinaa mirkaneesseera, garuu, ilaacha negetiiviisaa qabateema tureera.
translated: Fulbaana 28, Scope Ratings GmbH sadarkaa liqii abbaa biyyummaa Chaayinaa mirkaneesse, garuu Ilaalcha Hamaa qaba.

sourceString: Stocks plunged again based on coronavirus fears, the largest fall being on 16 March.
targetString: Sodaa koronaavaayiresiitiin mi’oonni ammas dhumaniiru, kufaatii guddaa Bitootessa 16 ta’edha.
translated: Sodaa koronaavaayirasii irratti hundaa'uun aksiyooniin ammas gadi bu'e, kufaatiin guddaan Amajjii 16 ture.

sourceString: Many consider an economic recession to be likely.
targetString: Baayyonni kufaatiin diinagdee mudachuuf mijataadha jedhu.
translated: Baay’een isaanii kufaatiin dinagdee akka ta’uu danda’utti ilaalu.

sourceString: Economist Mohamed El-Erian praised central banks' and states' timely emergency measures.
targetString: Hayyuun diinagdee Mohaammed El-Eriyaan mootummaa fi baankii seentaraal tarkaanfii saffisaa yeroo isaa eeggateef kadhatan.
translated: Ogeessi diinagdee Mohaammad El-Erian tarkaanfiiwwan hatattamaa yeroon baankota giddugaleessaa fi mootummoonni fudhatan jajataniiru.

sourceString: Central banks are reacting more quickly than they did to the 2008 financial crash.
targetString: Baankonni giddu galeessaa kisaaraa maallaqaa 2008 caalaatti aariitiin deebii laachaa jiru.
translated: Baankonni giddugaleessaa kufaatii maallaqaa bara 2008 mudate caalaa saffisaan deebii kennaa jiru.

sourceString: Tourism is one of the worst affected sectors due to travel bans, closing of public places including travel attractions, and advice of governments against any travel all over the world.
targetString: Turiizimiin seektaroota haala baay’ee gadheen sababa dhowwamuu imalaatiin, cufamuu iddoowwan uummataan hawwannaa imalaa dabalatee, akkasumas gorsa mootummootaa imala kamuu addunyaa hundumaa irratti godhamuun miidhaman keessaa tokko.
translated: Uggura imala, bakkeewwan ummataa cufamuu hawwata imala dabalatee, fi gorsa mootummoonni imala kamiyyuu addunyaa guutuutti akka hin raawwanne kennuudhaan dameewwan tuurizimiin miidhaa guddaa irra gahe keessaa isa tokkodha.

sourceString: As a consequence, numerous airlines have cancelled flights due to lower demand, including British Airways, China Eastern Airlines, and Qantas, while British regional airline Flybe collapsed.
targetString: Akka miidhaatti, daandiiwwan qilleensaa lakkoosaan hedduun Daandiiwwan Qilleensaa Biriitish, Daandiiwwan Qilleensa Baha Chaayinaa fi Qantas dabalatee fedhiin hirdhachuu hordofee balaliiwwan haqaniiru, daandiin qilleensaa naannawaa Biriitish Flybe nimmoo gadi buuse.
translated: Kanarraa kan ka’e daandiiwwan qilleensaa hedduun fedhii gadi aanaa irraa kan ka’e balalii kan haqan yoo ta’u, Daandii Xiyyaaraa Biriteen, Daandii Xiyyaaraa Chaayinaa Bahaa fi Qaantas dabalatee, daandiin xiyyaaraa naannoo Biriteen Flybe ammoo kufeera.

sourceString: The impact on the cruise line industry was at a level never seen before.
targetString: Miidhaan industirii sarara doonii irra gahe kan sadarkaa kana dura argamee hin beekneeti.
translated: Dhiibbaan indaastirii sarara kruuzii irratti uumame sadarkaa kanaan dura argamee hin beekne ture.

sourceString: Several train stations and ferry ports have also been closed.
targetString: Buufatoonni baaburaa fi bidiruu hedduunis cufamaniiru.
translated: Buufatni baaburaa fi buufata doonii hedduunis cufamanii jiru.

sourceString: The epidemic coincided with the Chunyun, a major travel season associated with the Chinese New Year holiday.
targetString: Weerarri kun waqtii imalaa kabaja ayyaana Bara Haaraa Chaayinaa waliin walqabtu ‘Chunyun’ waliin walirra bu’e.
translated: Weerarri kun yeroo imala guddaa ayyaana waggaa haaraa Chaayinaa waliin walqabatee Chunyun jedhamu waliin wal-simu ture.

sourceString: A number of events involving large crowds were cancelled by national and regional governments, including annual New Year festivals, with private companies also independently closing their shops and tourist attractions such as Hong Kong Disneyland and Shanghai Disneyland.
targetString: Ta’iileen hedduun walitti qabama namootaa hedduu qaban feestivaalota ayyaana Bara Haaraa dabalatee mootummoota naannoolee fi biyyaan haqamaniiru, kaampaanonni dhuunfaas suuqiilee fi hawwattoota tuurizimii isaanii kanneen akka ‘Hong Kong Disneyland ’ fi ‘Shanghai Disneyland’ of danda’anii cufaa jiru.
translated: Taateewwan namoota hedduu hirmaachisu hedduun mootummoota biyyaalessaa fi naannootiin kan haqaman yoo ta’u, ayyaana waggaa haaraa waggaa waggaadhaan kabajamu dabalatee, dhaabbileen dhuunfaas of danda’anii suuqiiwwan isaanii fi hawwata turizimii kanneen akka Hoong Koong Diiznii Laandii fi Shaangaayi Diiznii Laandii cufaniiru.

sourceString: Many Lunar New Year events and tourist attractions have been closed to prevent mass gatherings, including the Forbidden City in Beijing and traditional temple fairs.
targetString: Taateewwan Waggaa Haaraa Ji’a waliin walqabataniifi hawwaannaawwan tuuristii walitti qabama tuutaa ittisuuf cufamaniiru, magaalaa Foorbideen Beejiing keessaa fi manneen qulqullummaa aadaa dabalatee.
translated: Taateewwan bara haaraa ji’aa fi hawwata turizimii hedduun walga’ii ummataa ittisuuf cufamanii jiru, Magaalaa Dhorkaam Beejiing fi agarsiisa mana qulqullummaa aadaa dabalatee.

sourceString: In 24 of China's 31 provinces, municipalities and regions, authorities extended the New Year's holiday to 10 February, instructing most workplaces not to re-open until that date.
targetString: Konyaawwan Chaayinaa 31 keessaa 24 keessatti, manneen qopheessaa fi naannoleen, angaawonni ayyaana Waggaa Haaraa gara Gurraandhala 10 tti dheeressaniiru, iddoowwan hojii irra caalaa hamma guyyaa sanaatti akka deebi’anii hin banamne qajeelcha kennuun.
translated: Bulchiinsa bulchiinsa magaalotaa fi naannolee Chaayinaa 31 keessaa 24 keessatti aanga'oonni ayyaana waggaa haaraa hanga Fulbaana 10tti dheeressuun iddoowwan hojii irra caalaan hanga guyyaa sanaatti akka hin banamne qajeelfama kennaniiru.

sourceString: These regions represented 80% of the country's GDP and 90% of exports.
targetString: Naannoleen kunneen GDP 80% fi alergii 90% biyyatti kan uwwisanidha.
translated: Naannoleen kunneen GDP biyyattii keessaa %80 fi al-ergii %90 bakka bu’aniiru.

sourceString: Hong Kong raised its infectious disease response level to the highest and declared an emergency, closing schools until March and cancelling its New Year celebrations.The retail sector has been impacted globally, with reductions in store hours or temporary closures.
targetString: Hoongi Koongi sadarkaa deebii dhukkuba daddarbaa ol guddifte akkasumas labsii muddamaa labsite, Bitootessa keessa mana barnootaa cufte akkasumas ayyaana Bara Haaraa haqxe. Seektarri gurgurtaa akka addunyaatti hubame, yeroon mankuusaa gadi bu’uu yookaan irra keessoon cufamuudhaan.
translated: Hong Kong sadarkaa deebii dhukkuba daddarbaa ishee sadarkaa olaanaatti ol guddisee yeroo hatattamaa labsite, manneen barnootaa hanga Amajjiitti cuftee ayyaana waggaa haaraa ishee haqxe.Dameen daldalaa akka addunyaatti dhiibbaa irra ga’eera, sa’aatiin manneen daldalaa hir’isuun ykn yeroodhaaf cufamuun isaa ni yaadatama.

sourceString: Visits to retailers in Europe and Latin America declined by 40%.
targetString: Qanxabdoota bira qaamaan deemuun Europe fi Laatin Amerikaa keessatti 40% dhaan hir’ateera.
translated: Daawwannaan daldaltoota Awurooppaa fi Laatiin Ameerikaa %40 hir’ateera.

sourceString: North America and Middle East retailers saw a 50–60% drop.
targetString: Dhiheessitoonni Ameerikaa Kaabaa fi Giddugala Bahaa hir’ina %50–60 argan.
translated: Daldaltoonni Ameerikaa Kaabaa fi Baha Giddu Galeessaa %50–60 gadi bu’uu agarsiisaniiru.

sourceString: This also resulted in a 33–43% drop in foot traffic to shopping centres in March compared to February.
targetString: Kun ammas Gurraandhala waliin gaafa walbira qabamu gara wiirtuuwwan suuqiitti gad bu’a traafikii miilaa 33–43% Bitootessa keessa agarsiiseera.
translated: Kunis ji’a Sadaasaa keessa sochiin miilaan gara wiirtuuwwan daldalaatti geessu Fulbaana waliin wal bira qabamee yoo ilaalamu %33–43 gadi bu’eera.

sourceString: Shopping mall operators around the world imposed additional measures, such increased sanitation, installation of thermal scanners to check the temperature of shoppers, and cancellation of events.According to a United Nations Economic Commission for Latin America estimate, the pandemic-induced recession could leave between 14 and 22 million more people in extreme poverty in Latin America than would have been in that situation without the pandemic.
targetString: Sochoostonni giddu gala daldalaa addunyaarra jiran tarkaanfilee dabalataa akka qulqullina dabalataa, tempireechara bittootaa ilaaluuf sakattaatuu ho’aa galchuu, fi ta’iilee haquu fudhataniiru. Akka tilmaama koomishinii Diinagdee Laatin Amerikaatti, kufaatiin weerara addunyaa kanaan dhufu namoota Laatin Amerikaa miiliyoona 14 fi 22 gidduu ta’an, weeraricha malee haala isaan keessa turan caalaatti hiyyummaa hamaarra kan buusudha.
translated: Opereetoroonni giddugala daldalaa addunyaa guutuutti tarkaanfiiwwan dabalataa kanneen akka qulqullina naannoo dabaluu, ho’a bitattootaa sakatta’uuf iskaanara ho’aa kaa’uu fi taateewwan haquu kaa’aniiru.Akka tilmaama Komishiniin Diinagdee Dhaabbata Mootummoota Gamtoomanii Laatiin Ameerikaatti, kufaatiin weerara dhibee kanaan dhufu gidduutti hafuu danda’a 14 fi Laatiin Ameerikaa keessatti namoota hiyyummaa hamaa keessa jiran kanneen osoo weerara dhibee kanaa hin qabaatin haala sana keessa jiran caalaa miiliyoona 22 caalu.

sourceString: In January and February 2020, during the height of the epidemic in Wuhan, about 5 million people in China lost their jobs.
targetString: Amajjii fi Guraandhala 2020 keessa, wayita weerarri addunyaa kun sadarkaa guddaarra ga’etti, Chaayinaa keessaa namoonni miiliyoona 5 hojii isaanii dhabaniiru.
translated: Ji’a Guraandhalaa fi Fulbaana 2020 yeroo weerarri kun Wuhaan keessatti baay’inaan itti mul’ate Chaayinaa keessatti namoonni gara miliyoona 5 ta’an hojii dhabaniiru.

sourceString: Many of China's nearly 300 million rural migrant workers have been stranded at home in inland provinces or trapped in Hubei province.In March 2020, more than 10 million Americans lost their jobs and applied for government aid.
targetString: Hojjettoonni godaansa baadiyyaa Chaayinaa miiliyoona 300 tti siqan godinoota giddu gidduutti kan gataman ykn Hubei keessatti kan danqamandha. Bitootessa 2020 keessa, Amerikaanonni miiliyoona 10 ol ta’an hojii isaanii kan dhabanii fi gargaarsa mootummaaf kan galmaa’anidha.
translated: Hojjettoonni baadiyyaa godaantota Chaayinaa gara miliyoona 300 ta'an hedduun isaanii bulchiinsa biyya keessaa keessatti mana isaaniitti ukkaamfamanii ykn bulchiinsa Hubei keessatti qabamaniiru.Amajjii bara 2020 keessa lammiileen Ameerikaa miliyoona 10 ol ta'an hojii dhabanii gargaarsa mootummaaf iyyataniiru.

sourceString: The coronavirus outbreak could cost 47 million jobs in the United States and unemployment rate may hit 32%, according to estimates by the Federal Reserve Bank of St. Louis.The lockdown in India has left tens of millions of Indian migrant workers (who are paid through daily wages) unemployed.The survey from the Angus Reid Institute found that 44% of Canadian households have experienced some type of unemployment.Nearly 900,000 workers lost their jobs in Spain since it went into lockdown in mid-March 2020.
targetString: Akka tilmaama Baankii Dhiiheessaa Federaalaa St. Liwuuz’tti weerarri vaayirasii koroonaa namoota miiliyoona 47 hojiin ala gochuu danda’a akkasumas hoji dhabdummaan %32 gahuu danda’a. Cufamni hojjattoota godaanoo Hindii miliyoona kudhaniin lakkaa’aman (kanneen hojii guyyaatiin jiraatan) hojiin ala godhe. Akka qorannoon dhaabbata Angas Reyid argatetti namoonni mana keessaa Kanaadaa %44 hojii dhabummaa walfakkaataatu muudate. Ispeenitti hojjattoonni 900,000 lakkaa’aman sababa cufama walakkaa Bitootessaa 2020 tti hojii isaaniii dhaban.
translated: Weerarri vaayirasii koroonaa Ameerikaatti carraa hojii miiliyoona 47 fiduu akka danda'u fi sadarkaan hoji dhabdummaan %32 rukutuu mala jedha tilmaama Baankii Federaalaa Seent Luwiis karaa mindaa guyyaa) hojii dhabeeyyii.Qorannoo dhaabbata Angus Reid Institute irraa gaggeeffame akka agarsiisutti maatiin Kanaadaa %44 hoji dhabdummaa gosa tokko tokko mudataniiru.Ispeen walakkeessa baatii Sadaasaa 2020 keessa erga gara lockdown seentee asitti hojjettoonni gara 900,000 ta’an hojii dhabaniiru.

sourceString: During the second half of March, 4 million French workers applied for temporary unemployment benefits and 1 million British workers applied for a universal credit scheme.Almost half a million companies in Germany have sent their workers on a government-subsidized short-time working schemes known as Kurzarbeit.
targetString: Walakkeessa lammataa Bitootessaatti, hojjettoonni Faransaay miiliyoona 4 faayidaawwan hojii dhabdummaa yeroo gabaabaatiif iyyatan akkasumas hojjettoonni Biriitish miiliyoonni 1 karoora liqaa waliigalaaf iyyatan. Irra caalaan kaampaanoota miiliyoona walakkaa Jarman keessaa hojjettoota isaanii karoorota hojii yeroo gabaabaa Kurzarbeit jedhamee waamamu kan mootummaan gargaarsi godhamuufitti ergan.
translated: Walakkaa baatii Sadaasaa lammaffaa keessa hojjettoonni Faransaay miliyoona 4 ta’an faayidaa hoji dhabdummaa yeroof kan iyyatan yoo ta’u, hojjettoonni Biriteen miliyoona 1 ammoo skiimii liqii waliigalaa argachuuf iyyataniiru.Dhaabbiileen Jarmanii walakkaa miliyoonaa ta’an hojjettoota isaanii skiimii hojii yeroo gabaabaa mootummaan deeggaramu kan beekamu irratti erganiiru akka Kurzarbeit jedhamuun beekama.

sourceString: The German short-time work compensation scheme has been adopted by France and Britain.
