targetString: Namoonni waliin hojjennu tokko tokko yeroo jalqabaatiif fageenyarra taa’anii hojjetaa jiru.
translated: Hiriyoonni keenya tokko tokko yeroo jalqabaaf fageenya irraa hojjechaa jiru.

sourceString: Our long-time remote colleagues know that it can be an adjustment, and wanted to offer you some advice:
targetString: Namoonni waggoota dheeraadhaaf fageenyarraa nu waliin hojjetan sirreeffama ta’uu akka danda’u beeku, isiniif immoo gorsa muraasa kennuu barbaadu.
translated: Hiriyoonni keenya yeroo dheeraaf fageenya irraa hojjetan sirreeffama ta'uu akka danda'u beeku, gorsa tokko tokkos isiniif kennuu barbaadan:

sourceString: Limit the length of meetings to at most one or two hour increments.
targetString: Dheerina yeroo walga’ii yoo baay’ate daballii sa’aatii tokkoo yookaan lamaatti daangessaa.
translated: Dheerinni walgahii yoo baay’ate sa’aatii tokkoo ykn lama dabaluudhaan daangeessi.

sourceString: If longer sessions are required, consider how they can be broken up over the course of several days.
targetString: Yoo marii dheeraa barbaachisa ta’e, guyyoota hedduutti akkamittiin caccabsuun akka danda’amu yaadaa.
translated: Walgahiin dheeraan yoo barbaachise, guyyoota hedduu keessatti akkamitti addaan cituu akka dandaʼamu ilaali.

sourceString: Clearly define the meeting, have an agenda, and send reading materials in advance.
targetString: Walga’icha sirriitti ibsaa, ajandaa qabaadhaa, akkasumas meeshaawwan dubbisaa dursaatii ergaa.
translated: Walgahii ifatti ibsi, ajandaa qabaadhu, meeshaalee dubbisaa dursitee ergi.

sourceString: Make video the default, with tools like Google Docs and Zoom to facilitate live collaboration and connection.
targetString: Suursagalee, waltumsuufi qunnamtii kallattii mijeessuuf meeshaalee akka Google Docs fi Zoom waliin durtii godhaa.
translated: Viidiyoo durtii godhi, meeshaalee akka Google Docs fi Zoom waliin tumsaa fi walitti hidhamiinsa kallattiin mijeessuuf.

sourceString: Have a lead to facilitate every meeting, someone to monitor the chat for questions and track the speaker list, and someone to help take notes (or do collaborative note-taking).
targetString: Walga'ii hunda mijeessuuf gaggeessaa, nama gaaffiiwwaniif haasicha to’atuufi tarreeffama dubbataa faana dhahu, akkasumas nama yaadannoo qabuun gargaaru (yookaan yaadannoo gamtoominaan qabachuu hojjetu) qabaadhaa.
translated: Walgahii hunda haala mijeessuuf geggeessaa, nama gaaffiidhaaf marii hordofuu fi tarree dubbattoota hordofu, fi nama yaadannoo fudhachuuf gargaaru (ykn yaadannoo walta’iinsaa fudhachuu) qabaadhu.

sourceString: Send an email to tech support if you need a comfortable headset.
targetString: Yoo heedseetii mijataa barbaaddu ta’e imeelii tech support tti ergaa.
translated: Yoo headset mijataa barbaaddan tech support tti email ergaa.

sourceString: Use your wellness reimbursement for snacks.
targetString: Kaffaltii fayyummaa keessaniif deebi’ee isiinif kaffalame sharfaaf fayyadamaa.
translated: Nyaata salphaadhaaf deebii fayyaa keessanii fayyadamaa.

sourceString: Join the #remoties channel in Slack to talk with your colleagues about distributed work
targetString: Waa'ee hojii raabsamee waa'iloota kee wajjin haasa'uuf #remoties channel kan Slack keessaatti makami
translated: Slack keessatti chaanaalii #remoties join gochuun waa'ee hojii raabsame hiriyoota keessan waliin haasa'aa

sourceString: The HR Operations team is looking into webinar-based ergonomics guidance to support the increase in distributed work across the Foundation.
targetString: Gareen humna namaa (HR) hojii irratti bobba’an Dhaabbaticha keessatti dabalamuu hojiiwwan raabsamanii gargaaruuf qajeelfama irgoonomiksii leenjii sarara irraa irratti hundaa’e xiinxalaa jiru.
translated: Gareen HR Operations qajeelfama ergonomics webinar irratti hundaa’e ilaalaa jira, kunis hojii raabsame guutuu Faawundeeshinii keessatti dabaluu deeggaruuf.

sourceString: This past week we asked all community grant recipients to cancel Wikimedia-funded public events, such as editathons, until the WHO declares the pandemic to be over.
targetString: Torbee darbe kana fudhattoota kennaa hawaasaa hunda taateewwan uummataa Wiikiimiidiyaan gargaarsa argatan, kanneen akka editathons, hamma WHO’n weerarichi dhaabachuusaa labsutti akka haqan gaafanne.
translated: Torban darbe kana namoonni deeggarsa hawaasaa fudhatan hundi taateewwan ummataa Wiikiimidiyaan maallaqaan gargaaraman, kan akka editathons, hanga WHOn weerara dhibee kanaa akka xumurame labsutti akka haqan gaafanneerra.

sourceString: We let them know that we understood that our request for cancellations and other restrictions could make it impossible to complete their agreed-upon grant activities and that no one would be penalized for having to delay or modify those goals.
targetString: Gaaffiin keenya kan haquufi daangeffamoota kan biroo gochaawwan isaanii kennaa irratti waliigalame xumuruuf akka hin danda’amne akka godhu kan hubanne ta’uu akkasumas eenyuyyuu maniiwwan sanneen yoo tursiise yookaan fooyyesse kan hin adabamne ta’uu isaan beeksifna.
translated: Gaaffiin keenya haqamuu fi daangaawwan biroo hojiiwwan gargaarsaa waliigaltee irra ga’an xumuruun akka hin danda’amne gochuu akka danda’uu fi namni tokkollee galmoota sana harkifachuu ykn fooyyessuu waan qabuuf akka hin adabamne akka hubanne isaan beeksifna.

sourceString: This coming week we will follow up with additional guidance on Wikimania and other regional and thematic community conferences.
targetString: Torbee dhufaa jiru kana qajeelcha dabalataa Wikimaniiyaa fi yaa'iiwwan biroo naannoofi hawaasaa dhaamsa irratti hundaa’e irra jiru waliin hordofna.
translated: Torban dhufu kana qajeelfama dabalataa Wikimania fi konfiraansii hawaasaa naannoo fi mata duree biroo irratti hordofna.

sourceString: The general sentiment from around the global community seems to be both sadness at the disruption but relief at the clarity and ability to focus on their own communities, Wikimedia and otherwise.
targetString: Miirri waliigalaa hawaasa addunyaa irraa lamaanuu jeequmsatti gadda fakkaata garuu iftoomatti boqonnaa akkasumas dandeettii hawaasota isaanii, Wikimiidiyaa fi kanaan alaa irratti xiyyeeffachuu.
translated: Miirri waliigalaa hawaasa addunyaa irraa mul’atu jeequmsa kanaan gadda malee ifa ta’uu fi dandeettii hawaasa ofii, Wiikiimidiyaa fi kanneen biroo irratti xiyyeeffachuu irratti boqonnaa waan ta’e fakkaata.

sourceString: Going forward, the CRT is working to set up a page on Meta-Wiki to provide a space for the community to monitor the impact and follow our communications with them.
targetString: Gara duraatti deemuun, CRT‘n hawaasi dhiibbaa sana akka to’atuuf bakka dhiyeessuufi isaan waliin qunnamtii keenya akka hordofnuuf Meta-Wiki irratti fuula qindeessuuf hojjetaa jira.
translated: Gara fuulduraattis CRTn fuula Meta-Wiki irratti diriirsuun hawaasni dhiibbaa kana hordofuu fi qunnamtii isaan waliin qabnu akka hordofu bakka akka argatu hojjechaa jira.

sourceString: Staying in touch around COVID-19 related issues
targetString: Naannoo dhimmoota COVID-19 waliin walqabatanii turuu.
translated: Naannoo dhimmoota COVID-19 waliin walqabatan waliin wal qunnamuu

sourceString: We’ll be sending an invitation to your calendars for next Thursday, 14:00 UTC/07:00 PT for a special staff meeting.
targetString: Kamisa dhufu 14:00UTC/07:00PT tti waltajjii hojjettootaa addaatiif gara sagantaa keessaniitti afeerraa ergaa jirra.
translated: Kamisa dhufuuf, sa'aatii 14:00 UTC/07:00 PT walgahii hojjettootaa addaatiif waamicha gara kalaandarii keessaniitti ergina.

sourceString: We’ll use this time to share additional updates, answer your questions and spend some time connecting with each other.
targetString: Yeroo kana dabalataan waantota haarawoo qooddachuu, gaaffilee keessan deebisuu fi waliitti dhufnee yeroo muraasa waliin dabarsuuf itti fayyadamna.
translated: Yeroo kana fayyadamnee waan haaraa dabalataa qooduuf, gaaffii keessaniif deebii kennuu fi yeroo muraasa waliin wal qunnamsiisuuf ni dabarsina.

sourceString: We’re in this together and here to help however we can.
targetString: Nuyi kana keessa walumaan jirra akkasumas hamma dandeenyeen gargaaruuf as jirra.
translated: Kana keessa waliin jirra, hamma dandeenye gargaaruuf as jirra.

sourceString: In the meantime, you can continue to find the information from this email, and all other essential COVID-19 related information, on Office Wiki.
targetString: Hangasitti, imeelii kanarraa odeeffannoo, akkasumas odeeffannoo biroo kan COVID-19 waliin walqabatan isaan barbaachisoo, Office Wiki irraa barbaaduu itti fuufuu dandeessu.
translated: Gidduu kana odeeffannoo email kana irraa, fi odeeffannoowwan barbaachisoo biroo COVID-19 waliin walqabatan hunda, Office Wiki irratti argachuu itti fufuu dandeessu.

sourceString: The CRT will keep these pages updated and all the information in one place.
targetString: CRT’n fuulota kanaafi odeeffannoo hunda ammayyoomsuun bakka tokko isaan kaa’a.
translated: CRTn fuula kana haaromfamee fi odeeffannoo hunda bakka tokkotti ni eega.

sourceString: We are also working to maintain regular communications with staff who reside in countries that are currently significantly affected.
targetString: Hojjettoota biyyoota baay’ee miidhaman keessa jiraatan waliin quunnamtii dhaabbataan akka jiraatuufis hojjechaa jirra.
translated: Akkasumas hojjettoota biyyoota yeroo ammaa kana haalaan miidhaman keessa jiraatan waliin qunnamtii idilee akka qabaannu hojjechaa jirra.

sourceString: If you have any questions about travel, events, a major workstream, or coverage challenge, or anything else you may need help with, please don’t hesitate to notify and work with the CRT.
targetString: Waa’ee imalaa, taateewwanii, bakkee hojii bal’aa, yookaan danqaa uwwisaa, yookaan wanta deeggarsa itti barbaaddan kan biraa kamiinuu ilaalchistanii gaaffii kamiinuu yoo qabaattan CRT beeksisuufi waliin hojjechuuf duubatti hin deebi’inaa maaloo.
translated: Waa’ee imala, taateewwan, adeemsa hojii guddaa, ykn qormaata uwwisaa, ykn waan biraa gargaarsa isin barbaachisu yoo qabaattan, maaloo beeksisuu fi CRT waliin hojjechuu irraa duubatti hin jedhinaa.

sourceString: We’re here to help provide support and liaise as needed.
targetString: Nuti as kan jirruuf deeggarsi akka dhiyaatu gochuu fi akka barbaachisummaa isaatti warra kaan waliin gamtaan hojjechuufidha.
translated: Akka barbaachisummaa isaatti deeggarsa fi qunnamtii kennuu gargaaruuf as jirra.

sourceString: If you have a confidential or sensitive matter, please email Bryan Judan - Director of HR International Global Operations.
targetString: Yoo waan iccitaawaa yookaan miira-qabeessa qabaattan, adaraa Bryan Judan - Daarakteera Opereeshinii Addunyaawaa Humna Namaa (Director of HR International Global Operations) tiif imeelii barreessaa
translated: Yoo dhimma iccitii ykn miira namaa kakaasu qabaattan, maaloo Bryan Judan - Director of HR International Global Operations iimeelii ergaa.

sourceString: None of these changes should be seen as an abandonment of our work and obligations.
targetString: Jijjiiramoota kanniin keessaa inni kam iyyuu akka hojii fi dirqama keenya dhiisuutti ilaalamuu hinqabu.
translated: Jijjiiramni kun tokkollee akka hojii fi dirqama keenya dhiisuutti ilaalamuu hin qabu.

sourceString: Rather, they are a recognition that at this moment, our work and obligations will likely need to adapt in a way we have not in the past.
targetString: Caalaatti, isaan beekamtii kan yeroo kanatti, hojiifi dirqamni keenya karaa duraan ta’ee hin beekneen itti madaquu qabu.
translated: Kanaa mannaa, yeroo kanatti hojii fi dirqamni keenya haala kanaan dura hin madaqneen madaqfamuu akka qabu beekamtii kennuudha.

sourceString: These are the steps we believe are necessary to support this one another so that we can continue to work, provide our movement with the support they need, and the world with the service they rely on.
targetString: Kunniin tarkaanfiiwwan nuyi walii walii keenya deeggaruuf barabachisoodha jennee amannu kanaaf hojjechuu itti fufuu dandeenya, sochii keenya deeggarsa isaan barbaadaniin, fi adunyaadhaaf tajaajila isaan irratti hirkatan waliin dhiyeessina.
translated: Hojii keenya itti fufuu, sochii keenya deeggarsa isaan barbaachisu kennuu, addunyaaf tajaajila isaan irratti hirkatan kennuu akka dandeenyuuf kana wal deeggaruuf tarkaanfiiwwan barbaachisoodha jennee amannu kanneen kana.

sourceString: Our planned work will be there waiting for us when the time comes.
targetString: Hojiin keenya karoorfame gaafa yeroon isaa gahu achumatti nu eega.
translated: Hojiin karoorfanne yeroo yeroon gahu achitti nu eega.

sourceString: For now, it is time to support one another and create space for the important work that will be coming in the weeks and potentially months ahead.
targetString: Ammaaf, yeroo itti walii keenya deeggarru akkasumas hojii barbaachisaa torbaniifi ji’oota fulduraa keessa dhufaaniif bakka uumnudha.
translated: Ammaaf yeroon wal deeggaruun hojii barbaachisaa torban fi ji’oota dhufan keessatti dhufuuf jiruuf bakka uumuudha.

sourceString: We need all of you to make that happen, and so we need you all to take care of yourself and your families so that you can be at your best when the need arises.
targetString: Nuyi sana gochuuf hunda keessan ni barbaadna, fi kanaaf yeroo barbaachiisaa ta’etti akka haala gaarii irra jiraattaniif hundi keessan ofii keesaaniifi maatii keessan akka eegdan barbaadna.
translated: Sun akka ta’uuf hunda keessan nu barbaachisa, kanaaf yeroo barbaachisummaan isin mudatu hunda keessan akka gaariitti akka jiraattaniif ofii keessanii fi maatii keessan akka kunuunsitan isin barbaachisa.

sourceString: Now, please -- wash your hands and don’t touch your face!
targetString: Amma, adaraa – harka keessan dhiqadhaa akkasumas fuula keessan hin tuqinaa!
translated: Amma maaloo -- harka keessan dhiqadhaa fuula keessan hin tuqinaa!

sourceString: Katherine, the CRT (Amanda K, Amy V, Bryan J, Doreen D, Gregory V, Jaime V, Joel L, Lynette L, Ryan M, and Tony S), and the rest of the Leadership Team (Grant I, Heather W, Jaime V, Janeen U, Lisa S, Robyn A, Ryan M, and Toby N).
targetString: Katherine, CRT (Amanda K, Amy V, Bryan J, Doreen D, Gregory V, Jaime V, Joel L, Lynette L, Ryan M, and Tony S), fi garee hoggansaa hunduma (Grant I, Heather W, Jaime V, Janeen U, Lisa S, Robyn A, Ryan M, and Toby N).
translated: Kaatireen, CRT (Amanda K, Amy V, Bryan J, Doreen D, Gregory V, Jaime V, Joel L, Lynette L, Ryan M, fi Tony S), fi Garee Hooggansaa kanneen hafan (Grant I, Heather W , Jaime V, Janeen U, Liisaa S, Roobin A, Raayan M, fi Toobii N).

sourceString: b'Angiotensin-converting enzyme 2 (ACE2) is an enzyme attached to the outer surface (cell membranes) of cells in the lungs, arteries, heart, kidney, and intestines.
targetString: b’jijjiiraan inzaayimii-Anjiyootensiinii 2 (ACE2) n inzaayimii dirra alaa (seelii membireenii) seelota somba, arteroota, onnee, kalee fi mar’immaan keessa jiranitti maxxanee jirudha.
translated: b'Angiotensin-converting enzyme 2 (ACE2) inzaayimii fuula alaa (meembraanota seelii) seelii somba, arteriiwwan, onnee, tiruu fi garaachaa keessatti maxxane dha.

sourceString: ACE2 counters the activity of the related angiotensin-converting enzyme (ACE) by reducing the amount of angiotensin-II and increasing Ang(1-7) making it a promising drug target for treating cardiovascular diseases.ACE2 also serves as the entry point into cells for some coronaviruses.
targetString: ACE2’n hamma angiotensin-II hir’isuun fi Ang(1-7) dabaluun gochaa inzaayimii angiotensin-converting (ACE) deebisa dhibeewwan onnee wal’aanuuf manii qoricha abdii kennu ta’uun. ACE2’n vaayirasoota koroonaa muraasaaf karaa isaan ittiin gara seelii lixan ta’ee gargaara.
translated: ACE2n sochii inzaayimii angiotensin-converting (ACE) walqabatee jiru hamma angiotensin-II hir'isuu fi Ang(1-7) dabaluudhaan dhukkuboota onnee fi ujummoolee dhiigaa yaaluuf galma qoricha abdachiisaa taasisuudhaan morma.ACE2 akkasumas akka bakka seensaa seelii tajaajila vaayirasii koroonaa tokko tokkoof.

sourceString: The human version of the enzyme is often referred to as hACE2.
targetString: Gosti iinzaayimii kanaa inni kan namaa hACE2 jedhamuun waamama.
translated: Inzaayimiin namaa yeroo baayyee hACE2 jedhamee waama.

sourceString: Angiotensin-converting enzyme 2 is a zinc containing metalloenzyme located on the surface of endothelial and other cells.
targetString: Angiotensin-converting enzyme’n 2 Zinkii metalloenzyme lama qabuu fi qaama endothelial fi seelii kan biroo keessatti argamuudha.
translated: Inzaayimii anjiyootensin jijjiiru 2 ziinkii meetalooinzaayimii of keessaa qabuu fi fuula endothelial fi seelii biroo irratti argamu dha.

sourceString: ACE2 protein contains an N-terminal peptidase M2 domain and a C-terminal collectrin renal amino acid transporter domain.
targetString: Pirootiiniin ACE2 peptidees fiixee-N doomeenii M2 fi amiinoo aciidii kalee koolektrin fiixee-C doomeenii geejjibduu of keessaa qaba.
translated: Pirootiiniin ACE2 domeenii N-terminal peptidase M2 fi domeenii geejjibaa amiinoo asiidii kalee collectrin C-terminal of keessaa qaba.

sourceString: ACE2 is a single-pass type I membrane protein, with its enzymatically active domain exposed on the surface of cells in lungs and other tissues.
targetString: ACE2’n karaa daddarbiinsa qeenxee membireenii pirootiinii I,qayee enzaayimii ciicataa hin taane qaama seelii sombaafi tishuuwwan biroo keessatti maqeessuu.
translated: ACE2 pirootiinii meembraanii gosa I darbiinsa tokkoo yoo ta’u, domeeniin isaa inzaayimiidhaan socho’u fuula seelii sombaa fi tishuuwwan biroo irratti kan saaxilame dha.

sourceString: The extracellular domain of ACE2 is cleaved from the transmembrane domain by another enzyme known as sheddase, and the resulting soluble protein is released into the blood stream and ultimately excreted into urine.
targetString: Mandheen seeliin alaa ACE2 mandhee traansimembireenii irraa inzaayimii kan biraa sheddase jedhamuun adda ba’e, pirootiiniin bulbulamuu danda’u argame yaa’uu dhiigaatti gadhiifama akkasumas dhumarratti fincaanitti dabalama.
translated: Domeeniin seelii ala ACE2 domeenii transmembrane irraa inzaayimii biraa sheddase jedhamuun beekamuun kan ciccitu yoo ta’u, pirootiiniin bulbulamaa bu’aa kanaa gara dhiigaatti gadhiifamee dhumarratti gara fincaaniitti baafama.

sourceString: ACE2 is present in most organs: ACE2 is attached to the cell membrane of mainly lung type II alveolar cells, enterocytes of the small intestine, arterial and venous endothelial cells and arterial smooth muscle cells in most organs.
targetString: ACE2 n qaamota harka caalu keessatti argama: ACE2 n membireenii seelii seelota alviiyolaarii sombaa gosa II, interoosaayitii mar’ummaan qallaa, seelota indooteeliyaalii venosii fi arterii, fi qaamota harka caalu keessatti immoo seelota maashaa walqixxaatoo arterii tti maxxanee argama.
translated: ACE2 qaamolee baay’ee keessatti argama: ACE2 meembraanii seelii irra caalaa seelota alveolar sombaa gosa II, enterocytes garaacha xiqqaa, seelota endothelial arterial fi venous fi seelii maashaa lallaafaa arterial organ irra caalaan keessatti maxxaneera.

sourceString: ACE2 mRNA expression is also found in the cerebral cortex, striatum, hypothalamus, and brainstem.
targetString: Ibsi ACE2 mRNA koorteksii kan sammuu, istiriyaatamii, haayipootalamasii, fi kutaa wiirtuu sammuu keessattillee ni argamu,
translated: ACE2 mRNA ibsamuunis qola sammuu, striatum, hypothalamus, fi hundee sammuu keessatti argama.

sourceString: The primary function of ACE2 is to act as a counter balance to ACE.
targetString: Hojiin ACE2 jalqabaa akka deebisa madaala ACE tti raawwachudha.
translated: Hojiin inni jalqabaa ACE2 akka madaallii faallaa ACEtti hojjechuudha.

sourceString: ACE cleaves angiotensin I hormone into the vasoconstricting  angiotensin II.
targetString: ACE’n hoormoonii anjiyooteensin I gara anjiyooteensin II shuntuuratatti jabeessa.
translated: ACEn hormoonii anjiyooteensiin I gara anjiyootensin II vaazoconstricting tti addaan kuta.

sourceString: ACE2 in turn cleaves the carboxyl-terminal amino acid phenylalanine from angiotensin II (Asp-Arg-Val-Tyr-Ile-His-Pro-Phe) and hydrolyses it into the vasodilator angiotensin (1-7), (H-Asp-Arg-Val-Tyr-Ile-His-Pro-OH).
targetString: ACE2 n gama isaatiin Kaarbookzaayil-terminaal amiinoo asiid feeniyaalalanaayinii anji’ootensiin II (Asp-Arg-Val-Tyr-Ile-His-Pro-Phe) irraa baasuun fi gara vaasodileeter anji’ootensinii (1-7),(H-Asp-Arg-Val-Tyr-Ile-His-Pro-OH) tti haayidiroolaayis godha.
translated: ACE2 dabaree isaatiin amiinoo asiidii kaarboksiilii-tarminaalii feeniilaalaaniin anjiyootensin II (Asp-Arg-Val-Tyr-Ile-His-Pro-Phe) irraa cicciree gara vaazodilaator anjiyootensin (1-7), (H-Asp-Arg) tti haayidiroolaayizii godha -Val-Tyr-Ile-Isaa-Pro-OH).

sourceString: ACE2 can also cleave a number of other peptides including [des-Arg9]-bradykinin, apelin, neurotensin, dynorphin A, and ghrelin.
targetString: ACE2’n ammallee peeptaayidoota baay’ee addaan baasuu ni danda’a [des-Arg9]-bradykinin, apelin, neurotensin, dynorphin A, fi ghrelin dabalatee.
translated: ACE2 [des-Arg9]-bradykinin, apelin, neurotensin, dynorphin A, fi ghrelin dabalatee peeptiidota biroo hedduus addaan kutuu danda’a.

sourceString: ACE2 also regulates the membrane trafficking of the neutral amino acid transporter SLC6A19 and has been implicated in Hartnup's disease.
targetString: ACE2 n daddabarsa membireenii deddeebisaa amiinoo asiidii niwutiraalii SLC6A19 kan to’atuu fi dhibee Hartinaappii irratti kan mullatee jirudha.
translated: ACE2 akkasumas daldala meembraanii geejjiba amiinoo asiidii niwutraala SLC6A19 kan to’atu yoo ta’u, dhukkuba Hartnup keessatti hirmaateera.

sourceString: As a transmembrane protein, ACE2 serves as the main entry point into cells for some coronaviruses, including HCoV-NL63; SARS-CoV (the virus that causes SARS); and SARS-CoV-2 (the virus that causes COVID-19).
targetString: Akka pirootinii tiraansmeembireeniitti, ACE2’n iddoo bu’uura seensa koronaa vaayrasii gara seeliitti, HCoV-NL63; SARS-CoV (vaayrasii SARS fiduu); fi SARS-CoV-2 (vaayrasii COVID-19 fidu) dabalate akka galu taasisa.
translated: Akka pirootiinii transmembrane tti, ACE2 HCoV-NL63 dabalatee vaayirasii koroonaa tokko tokkoof bakka seensaa ijoo seelii ta'ee tajaajila; SARS-CoV (vaayirasii SARS fidu); fi SARS-CoV-2 (vaayirasii COVID-19 fidu).

sourceString: More specifically, the binding of the spike S1 protein of SARS-CoV and SARS-CoV2 to the enzymatic domain of ACE2 on the surface of cells results in endocytosis and translocation of both the virus and the enzyme into endosomes located within cells.
targetString: Keessattuu, tuttuqaan olka’an pirootinii S1 SARS-Cov fi SARS-Cov2 waliin walqabate inzaayimii doomeenii ACE2 qaama seelii irraa indoosaaytosisii fi walkeessa galuu vaayrasii fi inzaaymiii indoosomii seelii keessatti uuma.
translated: Caalaatti ibsuuf, pirootiiniin ispiik S1 SARS-CoV fi SARS-CoV2 gara domeenii inzaayimii ACE2 fuula seelii irratti argamutti hidhamuun isaa endosayitoosii fi vaayirasichaa fi inzaayimii lamaan gara endoosoomii seelii keessa jiranitti jijjiiramuu fida.

sourceString: This entry process also requires priming of the S protein by the host serine protease TMPRSS2, the inhibition of which is under current investigation as a potential therapeutic.This has led some to hypothesize that decreasing the levels of ACE2, in cells, might help in fighting the infection.
targetString: Adeemsi seensaa kun pirootinii S keessummeesituu seerayin piroteesii TMPRSS2 titin baasus ni barbaada, kan amma qooranna jala jiru wal’aansa ta’uu kan danda’udha. Kunis yaadota sadarkaa ACE2 ni hir’isa jedhu tokko tokkotti geessera, seelii keessatti, lola dhukkubaa gargaaru mala.
translated: Adeemsi seensaa kun pirootiinii S pirootiyeesii seeriinii keessummeessituu TMPRSS2 tiin priming gochuus kan barbaadu yoo ta’u, dhorkaan isaas akka yaala ta’uu danda’utti qorannoo ammaa jala jira.Kun tokko tokko sadarkaa ACE2 hir’isuun, seelii keessatti, lola keessatti gargaaruu danda’a jedhanii akka tilmaaman taasiseera dhukkuba kanaan qabamuu isaati.

sourceString: However, multiple professional societies and regulatory bodies have recommended continuing standard ACE inhibitor and ARB therapy.
targetString: Haa ta’uyyuu malee, gareewwan ogeeyyii hedduunii fi qaamoleen to’attoonni boodatti harkistuu ACE fi wallaansa ARP gulanta qabeessa gorsaniiru.
translated: Haa ta’u malee, waldaaleen ogummaa fi qaamoleen qajeelfama baasan hedduun yaaliin ACE inhibitor fi ARB sadarkaa isaa eeggate akka itti fufu yaada dhiyeessan.

sourceString: A systematic review and meta-analysis published on July 11, 2012, found that "use of ACE inhibitors was associated with a significant 34% reduction in risk of pneumonia compared with controls."
targetString: Keeddeebiin sirnaawaa fi xiinxalli meetaa Adoolessa 11, 2012 maxxanfame, " to’annoowwan waliin gaafa walbira qabamu fayyadamni ittisoota ACE hir’ina 34% ol’aanaa balaa michii sombaa keessaa waliin kan walitti hidhate" ta’uu argatan.
translated: Gamaaggamni sirnaa fi xiinxalli meetaa July 11, 2012 maxxanfame akka agarsiisutti, "fayyadamni inhibiitaroota ACE namoota to'annoo wajjin wal bira qabamee yoo ilaalamu balaa dhukkuba sombaa %34 hir'isuu wajjin walqabatee jira."

sourceString: Moreover, "the risk of pneumonia was also reduced in patients treated with ACE inhibitors who were at higher risk of pneumonia, in particular those with stroke and heart failure.
targetString: Hunda caalaa, “balaan niimooniyaa dhukkubsattoota balaa niimooniyaa jabaa keessa turan, addatti kanneen istirookii fi dadhabbii onnee qaban yaala hojii ACE hir’isuu argatanii keessatti hir’ateera.”
translated: Kana malees, "dhukkubsattoota ACE inhibitors'n yaalaman kanneen carraan dhukkuba sombaa ol'aanaa qaban, keessattuu kanneen dhiigni sammuu keessatti dhangala'uu fi dadhabina onnee qaban irrattis carraan dhukkuba sombaa hir'ateera."

sourceString: Use of ACE inhibitors was also associated with a reduction in pneumonia related mortality, although the results were less robust than for overall risk of pneumonia."
targetString: Fayyadamni ittisoota ACE ammas hir’achuu du’aa michii sombaa waliin walqabatee ture, bu’aan isaa balaa michii sombaa guutummaa irra xiqqoo jabaa yoo ta’es. "
translated: Fayyadamni inhibiitaroota ACE du'a dhukkuba sombaatiin walqabatee dhufu hir'isuu waliinis walqabatee ture, bu'aan isaa balaa waliigalaa dhukkuba sombaa caalaa cimaa ta'us."

sourceString: Recombinant human ACE2 (rhACE2) is surmised to be a novel therapy for acute lung injury, and appeared to improve pulmonary hemodynamics and oxygen saturation in piglets with a lipopolysaccharide-induced acute respiratory distress syndrome.
targetString: Rikoombinaant huumaan ACE2(rhACE2) dhibee sombaatiif talaallii haaraa jedhamee yaadama, akkasumas dhibee sombaa ilmoo booyyee 'lipopolysaccharide-induced acute respiratory distress syndrome' jedhamu keessatti akka dhiigni somba keessa dafee raabsamuu fi oksijiniin akka seeraan tamsa'u ni gargaara.
translated: ACE2 namaa irra deebiin walitti makame (rhACE2) yaala asoosama miidhaan sombaa cimaa ta'eef tilmaamameera, akkasumas allaattiiwwan allaattiiwwan dhiphina sirna hargansuu cimaa lipopolysaccharide-induced acute respiratory distress syndrome qaban keessatti hemodynamics sombaa fi oksijiinii guutuu fooyyessuu mul'ateera.

sourceString: The half-life of rhACE2 in human beings is about 10 hours and the onset of action is 30 minutes in addition to the course of effect (duration) of 24 hours.
targetString: Yeroon rhACE2’n gatii isaa jalqabaa irraa ittiin walakkaatti gadi bu’u ilmaan namaa keessatti sa’aatiiwwan 10 fi jalqabbiin gochaa immoo daqiiqaawwan 30 adeemsa bu’aa isaa dabalaan (turmaata) sa’aatiiwwan 24.
translated: Walakkaan umriin rhACE2 nama keessatti gara sa’aatii 10 yoo ta’u, jalqabni gochaa daqiiqaa 30 ta’a, kana malees adeemsa bu’aa (yeroo) sa’aatii 24 ta’a.

sourceString: Several findings suggest that rhACE2 may be a promising drug for those with intolerance to classic renin-angiotensin system inhibitors (RAS inhibitors) or in diseases where circulating angiotensin II is elevated.Infused rhACE2 has been evaluated in clinical trials for the treatment of acute respiratory distress syndrome.
targetString: Qorannoowwan hedduun akka jedhanitti rhACE2 qoricha dadhabbii addaa sirna rennin-angiotensin baballistoota RAS ykn dhibeewwan marsaan angiotensin II isaanii olaanaa taeef abdachiisaadha. RhACE2’n baballatee yaaliiwwan kilinikaa keessatti yaalii mallattoo sirna hargansuu cimaaf qoratama.
translated: Argannoowwan hedduun akka agarsiisanitti rhACE2 warra inhibiitaroota sirna reeniin-angiotensin kalaasikii (RAS inhibitors) dandamachuu dadhabaniif ykn dhukkuboota angiotensin II naannootti naanna’u olka’e keessatti qoricha abdachiisaa ta’uu akka danda’u agarsiisa.RhACE2 infused has been evaluated in clinical trials for the treatment of acute respiratory distress syndrome jedhamuun beekama.

sourceString: b'COVID-19 apps are mobile software applications designed to aid contact tracing in response to the 2019-20 coronavirus pandemic, i.e. the process of identifying persons ("contacts") who may have been in contact with an infected individual.
targetString: Fayyadamoonni b'COVID-19 mosajjii fayyadama bilbilaa quunnamtii vaayirasii koroonaa biyyoota hunda keessatti argamuu 2019-20 faana dhahuuf saxaxame, sana jechuun adeemsa namoota ("contacts") kan tarii nama hubame waliin quunnamtii qabu adda baasuudha.
translated: b'Appilikeeshiniiwwan COVID-19 appilikeeshiniiwwan sooftiweerii moobaayilaa weerara vaayirasii koroonaa bara 2019-20tti deebii kennuudhaan tuttuqaa hordofuu gargaaruuf qophaa'aniidha, jechuunis adeemsa namoota ("qunnamtii") nama dhuunfaa dhukkuba kanaan qabame waliin tuttuqaa qabaachuu danda'an adda baasuudha.

sourceString: Numerous applications were developed or proposed, with official government support in some territories and jurisdictions.
targetString: Appilikeeshinoonni baayyeen ifatti gargaarsa mootummaatiin daangaawwanii fi bittaawwan muraasa jalatti hojjetamii ykn wixineeffamanii turani.
translated: Iyyannoowwan hedduun kan qophaa’an ykn yaada dhihaatan yoo ta’u, naannolee fi aangoo murtii tokko tokko keessatti deeggarsa mootummaa ofiisaa argateera.

sourceString: Several frameworks for building contact tracing apps have been developed.
targetString: Goodayyaan hamma tokko baay’ee ta’e fayyadama quunnamtii faana dhahuu ijaaruudhaaf gargaaru dagaagfameera.
translated: Appii hordoffii tuttuqaa ijaaruuf bu’uuraaleen hedduun qophaa’aniiru.

sourceString: Privacy concerns have been raised, especially about systems that are based on tracking the geographical location of app users.
targetString: Yaaddoowwan iccitii dhuunfaa ka’aniiru, keessattuu wa’ee sirnoota iddoo gii’ograafii namoota fayyadama fayyadaman faana dhahuu.
translated: Keessattuu sirnoota teessuma lafaa fayyadamtoota appii hordofuu irratti hundaa'an ilaalchisee yaaddoon dhuunfaa ka'eera.

sourceString: Less intrusive alternatives include the use of Bluetooth signals to log a user's proximity to other cellphones.
targetString: Filannoowwan xinnoo gidduun seenu biluutuuzii waliitti dhiyeenya bilbilatin fayyadaman akka seenu godhu fayyadama.
translated: Filannoon kanneen keessa hin seenne kanneen akka fayyadamaan tokko bilbiloota harkaa birootti dhiyeenya qabaachuu isaa galmeessisuuf mallattoo Biltuutii fayyadamuudha.

sourceString: On 10 April 2020, Google and Apple jointly announced that they would integrate functionality to support such Bluetooth-based apps directly into their Android and iOS operating systems.
targetString: Ebla 10 2020 tti, Google fi Apple fayyadamoota Bluetooth irratti hundaa’an akkasii kallattiidhaan sirna dalagaa Android fi ios isaaniitti deeggaruuf hojiiwwan akka walfudhachiisan waliin beeksisan.
translated: Ebla 10 bara 2020 Google fi Apple waliin ta'uun hojiiwwan appii akkanaa Bluetooth irratti hundaa'an kallattiin sirna opereetiingii Andirooyidii fi iOS isaanii keessatti deeggaruuf akka walitti makaman beeksisaniiru.

sourceString: In China, the Chinese government, in conjunction with Alipay, has deployed an app that allows citizens to check if they have been in contact with people that have COVID-19.
targetString: Chaayinaa keessatti, mootummaan Chaayinaa, Alipay waliin ta’uun, fayyadama lammiileen nama COVID-19 qabu waliin quunnamtii akka qaban ilaaluuf isaan gargaaru gadhiisaniiru.
translated: Chaayinaatti mootummaan Chaayinaa Alipay waliin ta'uun appii lammiileen namoota COVID-19 qaban waliin wal qunnamtii qabaachuu isaanii akka ilaalan taasisu bobbaasuun isaa ni yaadatama.

sourceString: It is in use across more than 200 Chinese cities.In Singapore, an app called TraceTogether is being used.
targetString: Magaalota Chaayinaa 200 ol ta’an keessatti ni fayyada. Singaapoor keessatti app’n TraceTogether jedhamu faayida irra oolaa jira.
translated: Magaalota Chaayinaa 200 ol keessatti fayyadama irra jira.Singaapoor keessatti app TraceTogether jedhamu fayyadamaa jira.

sourceString: The app was developed by local IT community, released as open source and will be handed over to the government.North Macedonia launched "StopKorona!", a Bluetooth-based app to trace exposure with potentially infected persons and  provide a fast response to healthcare authorities.
targetString: Fayyadamichi hawaasa IT biyya keessaan dagaagfame, akka madda banaatti kan gadhiifameefi mootummaatti dabarfamee kan kennamudha. Meqedooniyaan Kaabaa "StopKorona!", fayyadama Bluetooth irratti hundaa’e saaxilabahuu namoota ciminaan hubaman faana dhahuuf fi angaawota kunuunsa fayyaaf deebii hatattamaa dhiyeessa.
translated: Appichi hawaasa IT biyya keessaatiin kan hojjetame yoo ta'u, akka madda banaatti kan gadhiifame yoo ta'u, mootummaaf kan kennamu ta'a.Kaaba Maqedooniyaa "StopKorona!", appii Biltuutii irratti hundaa'ee namoota vaayirasichaan qabamuu danda'an waliin saaxilamuu hordofuu fi aanga'oota eegumsa fayyaatif deebii saffisaa kennuuf gargaaru eegalte .

sourceString: The app was developed by the Ministry of Communication and Technology and Ministry of Health.
targetString: App’n Ministeera Walqunnamtii fi Teeknooloojii akkasumas Ministeera Fayyaatiin dagaagfame.
translated: Appii kana Ministeera Komunikeeshinii fi Teeknooloojii fi Ministeera Fayyaatiin kan hojjetamedha.

sourceString: As of 14 April 2020, the app was awaiting approval by the Google Play Store and Apple App Store.
targetString: Akka Ebla, 14, 2020 tti, App’n Google play istoorii fi apple app istoorii irraa fudhatama eeggacha jira.
translated: Ebla 14 bara 2020 irraa eegalee appichi Google Play Store fi Apple App Store irraa hayyama eegaa ture.

sourceString: On 12 April, the government stated that the contact tracing app was in an advanced stage of development, and would be available for deployment within weeks.A similar app is planned in Ireland, and in France ("StopCovid").
targetString: Ebila 12 irratti, mootummaan akka ibsetti kuufamni walfakkeenya hojii sadarkaa misoomaa irra ture, adeemsa torbee keessattis argamuu danda’a, hojiin wal fakkaataan Aayirlaandii fi Faransaayi keessattis karoorfameera. (‘’CovidHaDhaabbatu’’)
translated: Ebla 12 mootummaan appiin hordoffii tuttuqaa kun guddina sadarkaa olaanaarra akka jiru, torban muraasa keessattis bobbaa'uuf akka dhiyaatu ibseera.Appiin walfakkaataan Ayerlaanditti, akkasumas Faransaayitti ("StopCovid") karoorfameera.

sourceString: Both Australia and New Zealand are considering apps based on Singapore's TraceTogether app and BlueTrace protocol.Russia intends to introduce a geofencing app for patients diagnosed with COVID-19 living in Moscow, designed to ensure they do not leave home.
targetString: Awustiraliyaa fi niw ziiland lamaanuu appii singaapoorii TraceTogether app fi BlueTrace protocol tilmaama keessa galchaa jiru. Ruusiyaan app ji’oofeensiing jedhu dhukkubsattoota COVID-19 Moskow adda baasuuf, mana ba’u dhiisuu isaanii beekuf beeksisuu barbaaddi.
translated: Awustiraaliyaa fi Niw Ziilaand lamaan isaanii iyyuu appii appii TraceTogether Singaapoor fi pirootokoolii BlueTrace irratti hundaa'e ilaalaa jiru.Raashiyaan dhukkubsattoota COVID-19n qabamuun isaanii adda baafamee Moskoo jiraataniif appii geofencing, manaa akka hin baane mirkaneessuuf qophaa'e hojiirra oolchuuf yaaddee jirti.

sourceString: Ross Anderson, professor of security engineering at Cambridge University, listed a number of potential practical problems with app-based systems, including false positives and the potential lack of effectiveness if takeup of the app is limited to only a small fraction of the population.
targetString: Pirofeesarri injiinerummaa iccitii yuunivarsiiitii kaambiriijii Roos Andersan, lakkoofsa furmaata rakkoo yaalii ga’umsa qabanii sirna qo’annoorratti hundaa’uun tarreessaniiru, soba poosetiivii fi dhiba ga’umsaa dabalatee yoo ummata xiqqoo murtaa’an qofaadhaaf fudhannaan yaalii daangeffame.
translated: Yunivarsiitii Kaambiriijiitti piroofeesara injinariingii nageenyaa Roos Anderson, sirnoota appii irratti hundaa’an irratti rakkoolee qabatamaa ta’uu danda’an hedduu tarreessan, kanneen keessaa pozaatiivii sobaa fi yoo fudhatamni appii kanaa ummata muraasa qofa irratti daangeffame bu’a qabeessummaa dhabuu danda’u dabalatee.

sourceString: Addressing concerns about the spread of misleading or harmful "coronavirus" apps, Apple set limits on which types of organizations could add coronavirus-related apps to its App Store, limiting them to only "official" or otherwise reputable organizations.
targetString: Dhimmoota baballina aappota “koronaavaayiresii” baalafamoo fi dogoggorsiisoo furuuf, warra “beekamtiin kennameef” ykn yoo ta’uudhaa baatemmoo dhaabbilee amanamanitti daangessudhaan, Aappiliin dhaabbilee kuusaa aappota isaatti aappota koronaavaayiresiin walqabatan dabaluu danda’anirra daangaa kaa’eera.
translated: Yaaddoo tamsa'ina appii "koroonaavaayirasii" dogoggorsituu ykn miidhaa geessisan irratti mul'atu furuuf, Applen gosoota dhaabbilee kamtu appii koronaavaayirasiin walqabatu gara App Store isaatti dabaluu akka danda'u daangaa kaa'ee, dhaabbilee "official" ykn karaa biraatiin maqaa gaarii qaban qofa irratti daangesse.

sourceString: Google and Amazon have implemented similar restrictions.
targetString: Googilii fi Amaazon qoqqobbii walfakkaataa hojii irra oolchan.
translated: Google fi Amazon uggura walfakkaatu hojiirra oolchaniiru.

sourceString: Privacy campaigners voiced their concern regarding the implications of mass surveillance using coronavirus apps, in particular about whether surveillance infrastructure created to deal with the coronavirus pandemic will be dismantled once the threat has passed.
targetString: Duultonni iccitii dhuunfaa agarsiisa to’annaa tuutaa fayyadamoota vaayirasii koroonaa fayyadamuun ilaalchisee yaada qaban dhageessisaniiru, addatti waa’ee bu’uuraalee misoomaa to’annaa dhukkuba vaayirasii koroonaa biyyoota hunda keessatti argamanii dandamachuuf uumaman erga doorsisichi darbee akka diigamuu qabani.
translated: Duultoonni dhuunfaa appii koronaavaayirasii fayyadamuun hordoffiin jumlaan raawwatamu, keessumaa bu’uuraaleen hordoffii weerara vaayirasii koroonaa ittisuuf uumaman balaan kun erga darbee booda ni diigamuu fi dhiisuu isaanii ilaalchisee yaaddoo qaban ibsaniiru.

sourceString: Amnesty International and over 100 other organizations issued a statement calling for limits on this kind of surveillance.
targetString: Amineestiin Idil-addunyaa fi dhaabbiileen biroo 100 ol ta’an daangaa to’annaa akkanaa irratti labsii waamichaa baasan.
translated: Amnesty International fi dhaabbileen 100 ol ta’an ibsa baasaniin hordoffiin gosa kanaa daangaa akka qabaatu gaafataniiru.

sourceString: The organisations declared eight conditions on governmental projects:
targetString: Dhaabbileen piroojektoota mootummaarratti haaldureewwan saddeet labsaniiru:
translated: Dhaabbileen kunneen pirojektoota mootummaa irratti haal-duree saddeet labsaniiru:

sourceString: surveillance would have to be "lawful, necessary and proportionate";
targetString: Too’annoon “seera qabeesssa, barbaachisaa fi gitaqabeessa” ta’uun irraa eegama.
translated: hordoffiin "seera qabeessa, barbaachisaa fi madaalawaa" ta'uu qaba ture;

sourceString: extensions of monitoring and surveillance would have to have sunset clauses;
targetString: Dheeraachuun sakkata’uu fi too’anna gara ciroo dhiha biiftuu qabaachuuf ta’a;
translated: dheerinni hordoffii fi hordoffii keewwata aduu lixuu qabaachuu qaba ture;

sourceString: the use of data would have to be limited to COVID-19 purposes;
targetString: Itti fayyadamni daataa kaayyoo COVID -19 tti daangeffamuun irra jiraachuu qaba;
translated: itti fayyadamni daataa kaayyoo COVID-19 qofaaf daangeffamuu qaba ture;

sourceString: data security and anonymity would have to be protected and shown to be protected based on evidence;
targetString: Nageenyi daataa fi iccitiin maalummaa eeggamuu fi eegamuun isaa ragaa irratti hindaa’e agarsiifamuun irra jiraata.
translated: nageenyi daataa fi maqaa dhahuun ragaa irratti hundaa’uun eegumsa argachuu fi eegumsa argachuu isaa agarsiisuu qaba ture;

sourceString: digital surveillance would have to avoid exacerbating discrimination and marginalisation;
targetString: to’annaan dijitaalaa loogiifi daangeffamuu hammeessuu irraa of-qusachuu qaba.
translated: hordoffiin dijitaalaa loogii fi marginalisation hammeessuu irraa fagaachuu qaba ture;

sourceString: any sharing of data with third parties would have to be defined in law;
targetString: qaama sadaffaa waliin deetaa qooduun kamiyyuu seera keessatti hiikamuu qaba;
translated: qaama sadaffaa waliin daataa qooduun kamiyyuu seeraan ibsamuu qaba ture;

sourceString: there would have to be safeguards against abuse and the rights of citizens to respond to abuses;
targetString: Sarbamaa fi mirga lammiileen sarbama ofirraa ittisuuf qabaniif wabiin jiraachuu qaba ture.
translated: miidhaa irraa eegumsi fi mirga lammiileen miidhaa irra ga’eef deebii kennuu danda’an jiraachuu qaba ture;

sourceString: meaningful participation by all "relevant stakeholders" would be required, including that of public health experts and marginalised groups.The German Chaos Computer Club (CCC) and Reporters Without Borders (Reporter ohne Grenzen) (RSF) also issued checklists.
targetString: "Hirmaannaan hiika qabeessi “qooda fudhattoota barbaachisoo” hundaa ogeeyyota fayyaa hawaasaa fi kutaalee hawaasaa dagatamanii dabalatee, barbaachisuu mala. Gumiin Kee’osii Kompiiteraa Jarmanii (CCC) fi Gabaastonni Daangaa Maleessaa (Ripporter oohine Gireenzenii) (RSF)s cheeklistoota kennaniiru."
translated: hirmaannaan hiika qabu "qooda fudhattoota barbaachisoo" hundaan ni barbaachisa, kan ogeeyyii fayyaa hawaasaa fi gareewwan marginalized dabalatee.Kilabiin Kompiitaraa Jeequmsa Jarmanii (CCC) fi Rippoortaroota Daangaa Malee (Reporter ohne Grenzen) (RSF) akkasumas tarreewwan sakatta'iinsaa baasan.

sourceString: The proposed Google/Apple plan intends to address the problem of persistent surveillance by removing the tracing mechanism from their device operating systems once it is no longer needed.
targetString: Yaadrimeen karooraa Googilii/Aappilii rakkoolee hordoffii jala bu’iinsaa, yemmuu inni itti hin barbaachisnetti sirna hojjechiisaa meeshaa isaaniirraa balleessuun furuurratti kan kaayyeffatedha.
translated: Karoorri Google/Apple yaadame kun rakkoo hordoffii itti fufiinsa qabu furuuf kan yaadame yoo ta’u, kana booda mala hordoffii sirna hojii meeshaalee isaanii irraa erga hin barbaachifneen booda baasuudhaani.

sourceString: Some countries used network-based location tracking instead of apps, eliminating both the need to download an app and the ability to avoid tracking.
targetString: Biyyoonni muraasni bakka aappotaa, faana dhooftuu bakka-argamaa netwoorkiin hojjetu fayyadamanii, barbaachisummaa aappicha buusuu fi dandeettii faana dha’amuu ofirraa ittisuu hir’isaniiru.
translated: Biyyoonni tokko tokko appii dhiisanii hordoffii bakka networkii irratti hundaa'e fayyadamuun barbaachisummaa appii tokko buufachuu fi dandeettii hordoffii irraa fagaachuu dhabamsiiseera.

sourceString: In Israel, network-based tracking was approved.
targetString: Isiraa’el keessatti sirni faana dha’uu netwoorkii-irratti hundaa’e ragga’eera.
translated: Israa’el keessatti hordoffiin networkii irratti hundaa’e raggaasifameera.

sourceString: Network-based solutions that have access to raw location data have significant potential privacy problems.
targetString: Furmaatawwan cimdaa irratti hundaa’an kan mala iddoo deetaa dheedhiitti qaban rakkoolee dhuunfaa hamoo gurguddoo qabu.
translated: Furmaatni neetworkii irratti hundaa’ee fi daataa bakka raw argachuu danda’an rakkoo iccitii guddaa qabaachuu danda’u.

sourceString: However, not all systems with central servers need to have access to personal location data; a number of privacy-preserving systems have been created that use central servers only for intercommunication (see section below).
targetString: Ta’us, sirnooti hundumtuu kan kaadima giddu galaa qaban deetaa iddoo dhuunfaatti mala qabaachuu hin qaban; sirnooti iccitii dhuunfaa eegan hedduun kan kaadima giddu galaa qofa quunnamtiif fayyadaman uumamaniiru (kutaa armaan gadii ilaalaa).
translated: Haa ta’u malee, sirnoonni sarvaroota giddugaleessaa qaban hundi daataa bakka dhuunfaa argachuu hin qaban; sirnoonni icciitii kunuunsan baay’een kanneen sarvaroota giddugaleessaa walqunnamtii qofaaf fayyadaman uumamaniiru (kutaa armaan gadii ilaali).

sourceString: In South Korea, a non-app-based system was used to perform contact tracing.
targetString: Kooriyaa kibbaa kessatti siistemni applikeeshinii irratti hin hundoofne akkaataa itti wal quunnaman hojjete.
translated: Kooriyaa Kibbaatti sirni appii irratti hin hundoofne fayyadamuun hordoffii tuttuqaa raawwateera.

sourceString: Instead of using a dedicated app, the system gathered tracking information from a variety of sources including mobile device tracking data and card transaction data, and combined these to generate notices via text messages to potentially-infected individuals.
targetString: Appitti fayyadamuurra, sirnichi odeeffannoowwan madda garagaraa bilbilaa dabalatee daataa adda baasuu fi kaardii daddarbinsaa daataa fuunaanun, akkasumas isaan kanneen qindeessun erga barreeffamatiin dhukkubsataa beeksisuu wayya.
translated: Sirnichi appii addaa fayyadamuu mannaa, daataa hordoffii meeshaalee moobaayilaa fi daataa daldala kaardii dabalatee maddoota adda addaa irraa odeeffannoo hordoffii walitti qabuun, kanneen walitti makuun karaa ergaa barreeffamaa namoota dhukkuba kanaan qabamuu danda’aniif beeksisa maddisiiseera.

sourceString: In addition to using this information to alert potential contacts, the government has also made the location information publicly available, something permitted because of far-reaching changes to information privacy laws after the MERS outbreak in that country.
targetString: Dabalataanis odeeffannoo eeggannoo xuxxuqqii danda’amaa fayyadamuun, akkasumas mootummaan bakkee odeeffannoo hawaasaaf qopha’aa taasiseera, erga dho’insa MERS biyya sana keessatti waan heeyyamame sababni isaa odeeffannoo irraa fageenyi seera odeeffannoo icciitii jijiire.
translated: Mootummaan odeeffannoo kana namoota qunnamtii ta’uu danda’an akeekkachiisuuf fayyadamuu bira darbee odeeffannoo bakka sanaa ummataaf akka dhiyaatu taasiseera, kunis sababa jijjiirama fagoo seera iccitii odeeffannoo irratti erga weerara MERS biyya sanatti mudateen booda hayyamame.

sourceString: This information is available to the public via a number of apps and websites.Countries including Germany considered using both centralized and privacy-preserving systems.
targetString: Odeeffannoon kun uummataaf karaa appiiwwanii fi marsariitiiwwan hedduu ni argama. Biyyoonni Jarman dabalatee sirnoota gidduu gala ta’aniifi iccitii dhuunfaa eeguu danda’an lachuu tilmaama keessa galchan.
translated: Odeeffannoon kun karaa appii fi weebsaayitii hedduu ummataaf ni argama.Biyyoonni Jarmanii dabalatee sirna giddugaleessaa fi iccitii eegu fayyadamuu yaadaniiru.

sourceString: As of 6 April 2020, the details had not yet been released.
targetString: Akkuma ebila 6 bara 2020, baballinnisaa haga ammaa hin ifoomne.
translated: Hanga Ebla 6 bara 2020tti bal'inni isaa hanga ammaatti hin ibsamne.

sourceString: Privacy-preserving contact tracing is a well-established concept, with a substantial body of research literature dating back to at least 2013.As of 7 April 2020, over a dozen expert groups were working on privacy-friendly solutions, such as using Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE) to log a user's proximity to other cellphones.
targetString: Yaada bu’uuraa haalan hundeeffamee fi qunnamttiwwan iccitii isaa eeggate barbaaduuf, qaama qorannoo hogbarruu yoo xinnate gara 2013 duubatti deebisa. Akka Ebla 7, 2020 tti, beektonni darzanaa ol ta’an falka iccitii tolaa gochuuf hojjechaa turan, kan akka biluutuuzii annisaa xinnoo(BLE) fayyadaman akka bilbilan dhiyeenya galu gochuu fayyadamu.
translated: Hordoffiin qunnamtii icciitii kunuunsu yaad-rimee haala gaariin hundeeffame yoo ta’u, qaamni barreeffamoota qorannoo guddaan yoo xiqqaate bara 2013. Hanga Ebla 7 bara 2020tti gareewwan ogeeyyii kudhan ol ta’an furmaata iccitiidhaaf mijatoo ta’an irratti hojjechaa turan, kan akka Bluetooth Low fayyadamuu Humna (BLE) fayyadamaan tokko bilbiloota harkaa birootti dhiyeenya qabaachuu isaa galmeessisuuf.

sourceString: However, PEPP-PT is a co-ordination effort which contains both centralised and decentralised approaches, and is not a single protocol.Decentralised protocols include Decentralized Privacy-Preserving Proximity Tracing (DP-PPT/DP-3T), Temporary Contact Numbers (TCN, fka Contact Event Numbers, CEN), Privacy Sensitive Protocols and Mechanisms for Mobile Contact Tracing (PACT) and others.
targetString: Ta’us, PEPP-PT’n carraaqqii qindeeffamaa adeemsota kan giddu gala ta’anii fi giddu gala hin taane of keessatti qabatu, akkasumas qajeelfama baaqqee miti. Qajeelfamoonni giddu gala hin taane kan isaan of-keessatti hammatan Decentralized Privacy-Preserving Proximity Tracing (DP-PPT/DP-3T), Temporary Contact Numbers (TCN, fka Contact Event Numbers, CEN), Privacy Sensitive Protocols and Mechanisms for Mobile Contact Tracing (PACT) fi kan biroo.
translated: Haa ta’u malee, PEPP-PT tattaaffii qindoominaa kan ta’ee fi mala giddugaleessaa fi giddugaleessa hin taane kan of keessaa qabu yoo ta’u, pirootokoolii tokko miti.Pirootokooliin giddugaleessa hin taane hordoffii Dhiyeenya Dhuunfaa Eeguu (DP-PPT/DP-3T), Lakkoofsa Quunnamtii Yeroo (TCN) of keessatti qabata , fka Lakkoofsa Taatee Qunnamtii, CEN), Pirootokoolota fi Malawwan Icciitii Miiraa ta’an Hordoffii Quunnamtii Moobaayilaa (PACT) fi kanneen biroo.

sourceString: In these protocols, identifiable personal data never leaves the device, and all matching happens on-device.
targetString: Pirootokoolota kanneen keessatti, daataan dhuunfaa eenyummaa qabu gonkumaa meeshicha irraa kan hin deemnee, fi firoomsuun hunduu meeshaama-irratti ta’a.
translated: Pirootokoolota kana keessatti, daataa dhuunfaa adda baafamuu danda'u gonkumaa meeshaa keessaa hin bahu, walsimsiisni hundis meeshaa irratti ta'a.

sourceString: The Privacy Group at MIT Media Lab has been developing SafePaths, a platform for using privacy-preserving techniques when collecting and using location or path intersection data to track the spread of COVID-19.
targetString: Gareen Odeeffannoo Dhuunfaa Laabii Sabquunnamtii MIT, yemmuu bakka argamaa funaanamuu fi maayiirra ooluuf ykn faffaca’iinsa COVID-19 faana dha’uuf yommuu daataan waltuquuf maloota odeeffannoo dhuunfaa eegan fayyadamuuf kan oolu dirree SeefPaaz jedhamu hojjachaa jira.
translated: Gareen Dhuunfaa MIT Media Lab keessatti argamu SafePaths, waltajjii tooftaalee iccitii eegu fayyadamuun yeroo daataa bakka ykn karaa walqaxxaamuraa walitti qabuu fi itti fayyadamuun tamsa’ina COVID-19 hordofuu danda’u qopheessaa tureera.

sourceString: It is based on research from the whitepaper "Apps Gone Rogue: Maintaining Personal Privacy in an Epidemic" released in March 2020.Another similar effort is the SafeTrace platform by Enigma MPC, a company developing privacy technologies that was also originally founded at the MIT Media Lab.
targetString: Innis qorannoo dabalataa “Aapponni Toorarra kaa’ataniiru: Weerara keessatti odeeffannoo dhuunfaa eeguu” Biteessa 2020 ba’e irratti kan hundaa’edha.Tattaaffiin walfakkaataan inni biraan dirree SeefTirees kan kampaanii teknoloojiiwwan odeeffannoo dhuunfaa hojjechaa jiru, jalqaba Laabii Sabquunnamtii MIT keessatti kan hundaa’e, kan Iinijmaa MPC ta’edha.
translated: Innis qorannoo waraqaa adii "Apps Gone Rogue: Maintaining Personal Privacy in an Epidemic" jedhu Amajjii 2020 ba'e irratti hundaa'a.Tattaaffiin walfakkaataan kan biraan waltajjii SafeTrace kan Enigma MPC, dhaabbata teeknooloojiiwwan iccitii misoomsu kan akkasumas jalqaba MIT Media irratti hundeeffame dha Lab.

sourceString: SafeTrace utilizes secure hardware technologies to allow users to share sensitive location and health data with other users and officials, without compromising the privacy of that data.
targetString: Seeftirees Teeknooloojiiwwan haardweerii fayyadamtoota iddoo isaan jiraanii fi daataa fayyaa isaanii gara fayyadamtoota biroo fi seeraatti qooduuf, osoo iccitii dataa isaanitiif shaakkii hin qabaatin eega.
translated: SafeTrace teknooloojiiwwan haardwaaraa nageenya qaban fayyadamuun fayyadamtoonni daataa bakka fi fayyaa miira namaa kakaasu fayyadamtootaa fi qondaaltota biroo waliin akka qooddatan kan taasisu yoo ta’u, iccitii daataa sanaa osoo hin miidhin.

sourceString: On 5 April 2020, the global TCN Coalition was founded by groups that had coalesced around what was essentially the same approach and largely overlapping protocols, with the goal to reduce fragmentation, and enable global interoperability of tracing and alerting apps, a key aspect of achieving widespread adoption.
targetString: Eebla gaafa 5 2020, gareewwan bu’uurarraa yaada walfakkaatu fi pirootokolii baayyinaan walirra bu’u walitti fiduun, kaayyoo harcaatii hambisuu, fi fudhatamummaa ballaaaf furtuu isa ta’e aappota faana dha’uu fi dammaqsuu irratti waliin hojjechuu addunyaa dandeessisuuf, Gamtaan TCN addunyaa hun.daa’ee ture
translated: Ebla 5 bara 2020, Gamtaan TCN addunyaa gareewwan naannoo bu’uuraan mala walfakkaataa fi pirootokoolota baay’inaan wal-irratti walitti makamaniin kan hundeeffame yoo ta’u, kaayyoon isaas gargar bahuu hir’isuu, fi walta’iinsa addunyaa appii hordofuu fi akeekkachiisuu dandeessisuudha, kunis gama ijoo galmaan ga’uuf bal’inaan guddifachaa.

sourceString: On 9 April 2020, the Singaporean government announced that it had open-sourced the BlueTrace protocol used by its official government app.
targetString: Eebla gaafa 9, 2020 mootummaan Singaapoor aappii mootummichaan kan fayyadamamu pirootokolii Biluu Tireesii banaa gochuusaa ibsee ture.
translated: Ebla 9 bara 2020 mootummaan Singaapoor pirootokoolii BlueTrace kan appii mootummaa ofiisaa fayyadamu madda banaa ta'uu isaa beeksise.

sourceString: On 10 April 2020, Google and Apple, the companies that control the Android and iOS mobile platforms, announced an initiative for contact tracing, which they claimed would preserve privacy, based on a combination of Bluetooth Low Energy technology and privacy-preserving cryptography.
targetString: Ebla 10, 2020 irratti, Googilii fi Apple, dhaabbatoonni Andirooyidii fi iOS waltajjii moobaayila to’atan, jalqabbii hordoffii xuxxuqii beeksisan, Teeknoolojii humna gad-aanaa Biluutuuziitti hundaa’uun akkasumas kiriptoogiraafii dhuunfaa-hambisaa.
translated: Ebla 10 bara 2020, dhaabbileen waltajjii moobaayilaa Andirooyidii fi iOS to’atan, Google fi Apple, jalqabbii hordoffii tuttuqaa, kan iccitii ni eega jedhan, walnyaatinsa teeknooloojii Bluetooth Low Energy fi cryptography iccitii eegu irratti hundaa’e beeksisaniiru.

sourceString: They also published specifications of the core technologies used in the system.
targetString: Barreeffama waayee Sirnicha keessatti teknoloojii ijoo fayyadamamuus maxxansaniiru.
translated: Akkasumas teeknooloojiiwwan ijoo sirnicha keessatti fayyadaman ibsa maxxansaniiru.

sourceString: According to Apple and Google, the system is intended to be rolled out in three stages:
targetString: Akka apple fi google tti, sirnichi sadarkaalee sadiin hirmaachuu barbaada:
translated: Akka Apple fi Google jedhanitti sirni kun sadarkaa sadiitti akka diriirfamuuf yaadameera:

sourceString: rollout of tools to enable governments to create official privacy-preserving coronavirus tracing apps
targetString: fayyadama meeshaalee mootummoota fayyadamoota faana dhahan vaayirasii koroonaa iccitii dhuunfaa eegan seera qabeessa ta’an uumuuf dandeessisuuf.
translated: meeshaalee mootummoonni appii hordoffii vaayirasii koroonaa ofiisaa iccitii eegu akka uumuu danda’an diriirsuu

sourceString: integration of this functionality directly into iOS and AndroidGoogle and Apple plan to address the take-up and persistent surveillance problems by first distributing the system through operating system updates, and later removing it in the same way once the threat has passed.
targetString: Walitti hidhamiinsi kallattii caasaa iOS kanaa fi ittisaa fi AndroidGoogle fi Apple to’annoo fi ittisa fudhachuuf karoorsuun jalqabatti odeeffannoo haaraa baballisuu bu’uura godhatee, akkasumas boodarra karuma wal fakkaataa yaaddoon dura darbeen haquudha.
translated: dalagaa kana kallattiin iOS fi Android keessatti walitti makuunGoogle fi Applen rakkoolee fudhachuu fi hordoffii itti fufiinsa qaban furuuf jalqaba sirnicha karaa fooyya’iinsa sirna opereetiingii raabsuun, boodarra ammoo erga balaan sun darbee booda haala walfakkaatuun balleessuuf karoorfataniiru.

sourceString: b'Drug repositioning (also known as drug repurposing, re-profiling, re-tasking or therapeutic switching) is the repurposing of an approved drug for the treatment of a different disease or medical condition than that for which it was originally developed.
targetString: Dawaalee iddoo haaraa geessuun (dawaa kaayyoo biraaf oolchuu, barreeffama haaraa kennuufi, hojii biraaf oolchuu ykn jijjiirraa wallaansaa jedhamuunis ni beekama) dawaa mirkanaa’ee tureef kaayyoo biraa kennuufiin isanni jalqaba ittiin hojjetameefiin alatti wallaansa dhukkuba biraaf ykn haala fayyaa biraaf oolchuudha.
translated: b'Drug repositioning (drug repurposing, re-profiling, re-tasking ykn therapeutic switching jedhamuunis beekama) qoricha mirkanaa'e tokko dhukkuba ykn haala fayyaa isa jalqaba itti hojjetame irraa adda ta'e yaaluuf irra deebi'ee kaayyoo itti kennuudha.

sourceString: This is one line of scientific research which is currently being pursued to develop safe and effective COVID-19 treatments.
targetString: Inni kun sarara qorannoo saayinsawaa yeroo ammaa kana wal’aansa gaarii fi bu’a qabeesssa COVID-19 argachuuf amansiisaa jiruudha.
translated: Kun sarara qorannoo saayinsii keessaa tokko yoo ta’u yeroo ammaa wal’aansa COVID-19 nageenya qabuu fi bu’a qabeessa ta’e qopheessuuf hojjetamaa jira.

sourceString: Other research directions include the development of a COVID-19 vaccine and convalescent plasma transfusion.SARS-CoV-2 has about 66 druggable proteins, each of which has multiple ligand binding sites.
targetString: Kallattiiwwan qorannoo biroon barbaacha talaallii COVID-19 fi daddarbiinsa hamaa pilaasmaa ni hammata. SARS-CoV-2n pirootiiniiwwan dawaa gara 66 qaba, hundi isaanii fuuncaa wlitti hidhamsaa baay’ee qabu.
translated: Kallattiiwwan qorannoo biroon talaallii COVID-19 qopheessuu fi pilaasmaa fayyinaa dabarsuu kan dabalatudha.SARS-CoV-2 pirootiinii qorichaan kennamu gara 66 kan qabu yoo ta’u, tokkoon tokkoon isaanii bakka ligaandii hidhuu dachaa qabu.

sourceString: Analyzing those binding sites provide the reasonable project of developing effective antiviral drug against COVID-19 proteins.
targetString: Maddawwan wal qabatan kana xiinxaluudhaan hojiin bu’a qabeessi talaallii kan farra pirootiinii COVID-19 argachuu irratti dha.
translated: Bakkeewwan walitti hidhamiinsa qaban sana xiinxaluun pirojektii madaalawaa qoricha farra vaayirasii bu’a qabeessa pirootiinota COVID-19 irratti hojjechuuf ni kenna.

sourceString: Of the most important SARS-CoV-2 target proteins are papain-like protease, RNA dependent RNA polymerase, helicase, S protein, and ADP ribophosphatase.
targetString: Pirootiinota manii baay’ee barbaachisoo SARS-CoV-2 keessaa pirooteesiin akka papain, RNA poolimereesii RNA irratti hirkatu, heelikeesii, pirootiinii S, fi riiboofoosfeeteesii ADP.
translated: Pirootinoonni galma SARS-CoV-2 barbaachisoo ta’an keessaa pirootiyeesii paapaayinii fakkaatu, RNA poliimeereezii RNA irratti hirkate, heelikeesii, pirootiinii S, fi ADP raayboofosfataasii dha.

sourceString: Hussein A A, et al studied several candidate compounds which then optimized and analyzed for their skeleton similarity with the highest similar approved drugs in order to accelerate a potent anti-SARS-CoV-2 drug development in his preclinical study to be recommended in a clinical study design.
targetString: Huseen A A, et al kompaawundoota kaadhimamoo hedduu qoratee walfakkeenyi lafee isaanii dawaalee mirkanaa’oo hunda caala isa fakkaatuun kan sirreessee fi xiinxale, qorannoo mallattoon duraa isaa keessatti oomisha dawaa jabaa farra-SARS-CoV-2 ariifachiisuun diizaayinii qorannoo kilinikaalaa keessatti akka kaadhimamuufi.
translated: Hussein AA, et al kompaawundoota kaadhimamaa hedduu qoratan isaanis sana booda qorannoo kilinikaa keessatti gorfamuuf qorannoo isaa keessatti guddina qoricha farra SARS-CoV-2 cimaa ta’e saffisiisuuf jecha walfakkeenya lafee isaanii qoricha walfakkaataa ol’aanaa mirkanaa’e waliin fooyyessuu fi xiinxale tolfama.

sourceString: Chloroquine is an anti-malarial medication that is also used against some auto-immune diseases.
targetString: Kiloorookiniin qoricha farra maalaariyaa ta’ee dhukkuboota madiinummaa-ofiirrattis ni fayyada.
translated: Kiloorookiin qoricha farra busaa yoo ta'u, dhukkuboota ofirraa ittisuu danda'an tokko tokko irrattis kan gargaarudha.

sourceString: On 18 March, the WHO announced that chloroquine and the related hydroxychloroquine would be among the four drugs studied as part of the Solidarity clinical trial.
targetString: Bitootessa gaafa 18, WHO n kiloorookinii fi kan isatti dhiyaatu haayidiroogzaayikiloorookiniin dawaalee akka qaama Duula wallaansa yaaliitti qorataman afran keessa tokko akka ta’an beeksiseera.
translated: Amajjii 18 WHOn qorichoota afran akka qaama yaaliin kilinikaa Solidarity qorataman keessaa kiloorookinii fi haayidirooksiikiloorookiin waliin walqabatu akka ta’u beeksiseera.

sourceString: New York governor Andrew Cuomo announced that New York State trials of chloroquine and hydroxychloroquine would begin on 24 March.On 28 March, the FDA authorized the use of hydroxychloroquine sulfate and chloroquine phosphate under an Emergency Use Authorization (EUA).
targetString: Bulchaan Niwuyoork Andireewu Kuumoo yaaliiwwan chloroquine fi hydroxychloroquine mootummaa Niwuyoork bitootessa 24 akka jalqabu beeksisaniiru. Gaafa bitootessa 28, FDAn fayyadama hydroxychloroquine sulfate fi chloroquine phosphate EUA jelatti aangeseera.
translated: Bulchaan Niiw Yoorki Andireew Kuumoo yaaliin Kiloorookinii fi haayidirooksiikiloorookiinii kutaa Niiw Yoorki Amajjii 24 akka eegalu beeksisaniiru.Amajjii 28 FDAn Hayyama Itti Fayyadama Yeroo Hatattamaa (EUA) jalatti haayidirooksiikiloorookiin salfeet fi kiloorookii fosfeetii akka fayyadaman hayyame.

sourceString: The treatment has not been approved by the FDA's clinical trials process and is authorized under the EUA only as an experimental treatment for emergency use in patients who are hospitalized but are not able to receive treatment in a clinical trial.
targetString: Wallaansi kun adeemsa wallaansa yaalii FDA’tiin kan hin mirkanoofnee fi dhukkubsattoota hospitaala jiranii fi yaala wallaansa yaalii argachuu hin dandeenyeef akka wallaansa shaakalaatti, yaala hatattamaaf akka fayyadamamuuf EUA jalatti eyyema argate.
translated: Wal’aansi kun adeemsa yaaliiwwan kilinikaa FDAn kan hin mirkanoofne yoo ta’u, EUA jalatti kan hayyamame dhukkubsattoota hospitaala ciisan garuu yaaliin kilinikaa keessatti wal’aansa argachuu hin dandeenye irratti yeroo hatattamaa fayyadamuuf akka wal’aansa yaalii qofaatti.

sourceString: The CDC has said that "the use, dosing, or duration of hydroxychloroquine for prophylaxis or treatment of SARS-CoV-2 infection" are not yet established.
targetString: CDC’n akka jedhetti "fayyadamiinsi, hammi fudhannaa, yookaan turmaati hydroxychloroquine prophylaxis’f yookaan wal’aansa hubama SARS-CoV-2’f" ammayyuu hin hundeeffamne.
translated: CDCn "itti fayyadama, doosiin, ykn yeroon haayidirooksiikiloorookiin ittisa ykn wal'aansa infekshinii SARS-CoV-2" ammallee hin mirkanoofne jedheera.

sourceString: Doctors have said they are using the drug when "there's no other option".
targetString: Doktoroonni qoricha “filannoon biraa hin jiru” taanan akka fayyadaman dubbatanii jiru.
translated: Doktooronni qoricha kana yeroo ''filannoo biraa hin jirretti'' fayyadamaa akka jiran himaniiru.

sourceString: A Turkish research team in Istanbul is conducting a small study on the use of chloroquine in combination with zinc, vitamin A, vitamin C and vitamin D.
targetString: Gareen qorannaa Turkii Istaanbul keessatti zinkii, vitaamin A, vitaamin C fi vitaamin D wajjiin walitti makuun itti fayyadama kiloorookinii irratti qorannoo xinnoo geggeessaa jira.
translated: Gareen qorannoo Turkiyaa Istaanbul keessatti argamu, itti fayyadama kiloorookiin ziinkii, vitaamin A, vitaamin C fi vitaamin D waliin walqabatee qorannoo xiqqaa gaggeessaa jira.

sourceString: Large studies are underway at Duke University and the University of Oxford.
targetString: Qorannoowwaan gurguddoon Yuuniversiitii Diyuukii fi Yuuniversiitii oof Ooksifoorditti adeemsifamaa jiru.
translated: Yuunivarsiitii Duukaa fi Yuunivarsiitii Oksifoorditti qorannoon gurguddaan gaggeeffamaa jira.

sourceString: NYU Langone Medical School is conducting a trial on the safety and efficacy of preventative use of hydroxychloroquine.
targetString: Manni Barumsaa Fayyaa NYU nageenyummaa fi bu’a qabeessummaa haayidiroogzaayilkiloorookinii ittisaaf fayyadamuu irratti yaalii gaggeessaa jira.
translated: Manni barumsaa fayyaa NYU Langone Medical School nageenyaafi bu’a qabeessummaa itti fayyadama ittisaa haayidirooksiikiloorookiin irratti yaali gaggeessaa jira.

sourceString: Chinese clinical trials in Wuhan and Shenzhen claimed to show favipiravir was "clearly effective".
targetString: Yaaliiwwan kilinikaawaa Chaayinootaa Wuhaanii fi Sheenzheen keessaa favipiravir "ifaatti bu’a qabeessa" akka ta’e ibsuu yaalani.
translated: Yaaliin kilinikaa Chaayinaa Wuhaanii fi Shenzhen keessatti gaggeeffame favipiravir ''ifaan bu'a qabeessa'' ta'uu agarsiisa jedhan.

sourceString: 35 patients in Shenzhen tested negative in a median of 4 days, while the length of illness was 11 days in the 45 patients who did not receive it.
targetString: Sheenijeen keessatti dhukkubsattoonni 35 giddu-galeessaan guyyoota 4 keessatti bu’aa qorannoo negetiiva kan argatan yommuu ta’u, dhukkubsattoota 45 hin fudhatiin hafan irrattimmoo dheerinni yeroo dhukkubbii guyyoota 11 ture.
translated: Dhukkubsattoonni 35 Shenzhen keessatti qorannoon isaanii giddu galeessaan guyyoota 4 keessatti negaatiivii yoo ta'u, dhukkubsattoota 45 hin fudhanne keessatti dheerinni dhukkubaa guyyoota 11 ture.

sourceString: In a study conducted in Wuhan on 240 patients with pneumonia, half were given favipiravir and half received umifenovir.
targetString: Wuhaan keessatti qorannoon dhukkubsattoota niimooniyaa 240 irratti godhamee, gartokkeef favipiraavaayeriin kennamee fi gartokkeen immoo aamifeenoovaayerii fudhatani.
translated: Qorannoon Wuhaanitti dhukkubsattoota dhukkuba sombaa qaban 240 irratti gaggeeffameen, walakkaan isaanii favipiravir, walakkaan ammoo umifenovir fudhataniiru.

sourceString: The Italian Pharmaceutical Agency reminded the public that the existing evidence in support of the drug is scant and preliminary.
targetString: Ejeensiin dhabbata qorichaa Xaaliyaanii gargaarsi qorichaa ragaa jiruun xinnoo fi bu’uura akka ta’e hawaasa yaadachise.
translated: Ejensiin Qoricha Xaaliyaanii ragaaleen qoricha kana deeggaran jiran xiqqaa fi kan duraa ta’uu ummata yaadachiiseera.

sourceString: On 2 April, Germany announced that it would purchase the drug from Japan for its stockpile, and use the military to deliver the drug to university hospitals, where the drug will be used to treat COVID-19 patients.
targetString: Ebla gaafa 2, Jarmaniin dawicha kuusaa dilbii isheetiif Jaappaan irraa akka bittuu fi dawaa gara hospitaalota Yuuniversiitii iddoo dawaaleen dhukkubsattoota COVID-19 wallaanuuf hojiirra oolutti geessuuf immoo humna waraanaa akka fayyadamtu ibsitee turte.
translated: Ebla 2 Jarmaniin qoricha kana Jaappaan irraa kuusaa isheef akka bittu, waraanatti fayyadamuun qoricha kana hospitaalota yunivarsiitiitti geessuuf, achitti qorichi kun dhukkubsattoota COVID-19 yaaluuf akka oolu beeksiste.

sourceString: According to the South China Morning Post, Shinzo Abe has made overtures to the Trump administration about purchasing the drug.The drug may be less effective in severe cases of illness where the virus has already multiplied.
targetString: Akka Maxxansa Ganamaa Chaayinaa Kibbaatti (South China Morning Post), Shinzo Abe’n bulchiinsa Trump’f waa’ee qorichicha bituu fedhii agarsiisaniiru. Qorichichi tarii dhimmoota hammaatoo dhibee iddoo vaayirasoonni lakkoofsaan baay’atanitti bu’a qabeessummaan isaa gadi aanaa ta’uu danda’a.
translated: Akka gabaasa South China Morning Post jedhutti Shinzo Abe waa'ee qoricha kana bitachuuf bulchiinsa Tiraampiif yaada kennaniiru.Qorichi kun dhukkuboota ciccimoo vaayirasichi duraan baay'ate keessatti bu'a qabeessa ta'uu dhiisuu mala.

sourceString: It may not be safe for use by pregnant women or those trying to conceive.
targetString: Dubbartoota ulfaatif yookiin ulfaa’a jiraniif gaarii ta’u dhabuu mala.
translated: Dubartoota ulfaa ykn warra ulfaa'uuf yaalaniif itti fayyadamuuf nageenya qabaachuu dhiisuu danda'a.

sourceString: One study of lopinavir/ritonavir (Kaletra), a combination of the antivirals lopinavir and ritonavir, concluded that "no benefit was observed".
targetString: Qorannoon lopinavir/ritonavir (Kaletra) tokko, walitti makama farra dhukkuboota vaayirasiin dhufanii lopinavir fi ritonavir akka “bu’aan tokkoyyuu hin mul’anne” guduunfani.
translated: Qorannoon tokko lopinavir/ritonavir (Kaletra), walnyaatinsa farra vaayirasii lopinavir fi ritonavir, "faayidaan tokkollee hin mul'anne" jechuun xumureera.

sourceString: The drugs were designed to inhibit HIV from replicating by binding to the protease.
targetString: Qorichichi HIV akka of hin baay’isnee dhorkuufi pirootesii irratti akka maxxanuutti hojjetame.
translated: Qorichootni kunneen pirootiyeesii waliin hidhamuun HIV akka hin baay'anne dhorkuuf kan qophaa'anidha.

sourceString: A team of researchers at the University of Colorado are trying to modify the drugs to find a compound that will bind with the protease of SARS-CoV-2.There are criticisms within the scientific community about directing resources to repurposing drugs specifically developed for HIV/AIDS.
targetString: Gareen qorattootaa Yuuniversiitii Koloraadoo kompaawundii pirooteesii SARS-CoV-2 waliin firoomuu danda’u argachuuf dawaalee fooyyessuuf dhama’aa jiru. Dawaaalee addatti HIV/AIDS f hojjetaman kaayyoo biraaf oolchuuf galteewwan kallattii qabsiisuu irratti hawaasa saayinsii keessa qeeqawwanis ni jiru.
translated: Gareen qorattoota Yunivarsiitii Koloraado qoricha kana fooyyessuudhaan kompaawundii pirootiyeesii SARS-CoV-2 waliin walqabatu argachuuf yaalaa jiru.Qabeenya gara qorichoota addatti HIV/ 100f qophaa’an irra deebi’anii kaayyoof oolchuuf qajeelchuu ilaalchisee qeeqni hawaasa saayinsii keessa jira. AIDS.

sourceString: The WHO included lopinavir/ritonavir in the international Solidarity trial.
targetString: Dhaabbanni fayyaa addunyaa(WHO)n lopinavir/ritonavir akka tokkummaa yaalii addunyaatti fudhate.
translated: WHOn yaaliin idil-addunyaa Solidarity keessatti lopinavir/ritonavir hammateera.

sourceString: Remdesivir was created and developed by Gilead Sciences as a treatment for Ebola virus disease and Marburg virus infections . Gilead Sciences subsequently discovered that Remdesivir had antiviral activity in vitro against multiple filo-, pneumo-, paramyxo-, and corona- viruses .
targetString: Remdesivir akka wal’aansa dhukkuba vaayirasii Iboolaatiif fi dhukkubaan faalamuu vaayirasii Marbargiif Gilead Sciences’n uumame fi dagaagfame. Gilead Sciences isa booda Remdesivir gocha farra vaayirasummaa qaamaan alaa (meeshaa saayinsawaa keessatti) multiple filo-, pneumo-, paramyxo-, fi vaayirasii koroonaa irratti akka qabu argatan.
translated: Remdesivir kan uumamee fi kan hojjetame Gilead Sciences akka yaala dhukkuba vaayirasii Iboolaa fi infekshinii vaayirasii Marburg . Itti aansuudhaan Gilead Sciences Remdesivir in vitro keessatti vaayirasii filo-, pneumo-, paramyxo-, fi corona- hedduu irratti sochii farra vaayirasii akka qabu hubate .

sourceString: One issue with antiviral treatment is the development of resistance through mutations that can lead to more severe disease and transmission.
targetString: Rakkoon wal’aansa farra dhukkuboota vaayirasiin dhufanii jiru tokko jijjiiramaan ittisa dagaagu kan dhibee baay’ee hammaataa fi daddarbaatti geessu ta’uusaati.
translated: Dhimmi wal’aansa farra vaayirasii wajjin walqabatu tokko, karaa jijjiirama (mutation) dhukkuba cimaa fi daddarbiinsa cimaa fiduu danda’uun dandeettii dhukkuba ofirraa ittisuu (resistance) uumuudha.

sourceString: Some early pretrial studies suggest remdesivir may have a high genetic barrier to resistance.There are several clinical trials underway, including two conducted by Cleveland University Hospitals; one for people with moderate illness and another for those with more severe illness.
targetString: Qorannoowwan yaalii duraa muraasni akka ibsanitti remdeesivaayeriin dandeettii dhiibbaa jala dhaabbachuu sanyii guddaa qaba. Lameen Hospitaalota Yuuniversitii Kileevlaandiin godhaman; tokko namoota dhukkubbii giddu-galeessaa qabanii fi kanbiraan immoo warreen dhukkubbii jabaa qabanii, dabalatee wallaansawwan yaalii hedduutu adeemsifamaa jira.
translated: Qorannoon yaaliin duraa jalqabaa tokko tokko remdesivir danqaa jeneetikii olaanaa dandeettii ittisuu danda’u qabaachuu akka danda’u agarsiisu.Yaaliiwwan kilinikaa hedduun gaggeeffamaa jiru, kanneen keessaa lama Hospitaalota Yunivarsiitii Kilivilaandiin gaggeeffaman; tokko namoota dhukkuba giddu galeessaa qabaniif, kan biraa immoo warra dhukkuba cimaa qabaniif.

sourceString: There are three ongoing clinical trials of intravenous vitamin C for people who are hospitalized and severely ill with COVID-19; two placebo controlled (China, Canada) and one with no control (Italy).
targetString: Yaaliiwwan kilinikaawaa sadii kan vaayitaamiin C namoota hospitaala galaniifi COVID-19’n baay’ee hubaman karaa hidda dhiigaan kennuufiitu jiru; qoricha wal-bira-qabiinsaan kan to’ataman lama (Chaayinaa, Kanaadaa) fi kan to’annoo malee waliinii (Xaaliyaan)
translated: Namoota COVID-19n hospitaala ciisanii fi haalaan dhukkubsatan irratti yaaliin kilinikaa vitaamin C hidda dhiigaa keessaa sadi itti fufee jira; lama kan pilaasboo to’ataman (Chaayinaa, Kaanaadaa) fi tokko kan to’annoo hin qabne (Xaaliyaanii).

sourceString: New York State began trials for the antibiotic azithromycin on 24 March 2020.
targetString: Bulchiinsi Niw Yoorkii Bitootessa gaafa 24, 2020 farra lubbu-qabeeyyii azitroomaayisiin f yaalii jalqabeera.
translated: Kutaan biyyaa Niiw Yoork yaaliin qoricha farra baakteeriyaa azithromycin jedhamu Amajjii 24 bara 2020 eegale.

sourceString: Japan's National Center for Global Health and Medicine (NCGM) is planning a clinical trial for Teijin's Alvesco (ciclesonide), an inhaled corticosteroid for asthma, for the treatment of pre-symptomatic patients infected with the novel coronavirus.
targetString: Giddu-galli Fayyaa Addunyaa fi Qorichaa Biyyaalessaa Jaappaan (NCGM) n wallaansa dhukkubsattoota noovel Koronaavaayiresii mallattoo agarsiisuu utuu hin jalqabaniif akka ooluuf wallaansa yaalii Teeyijensi Alveeskoo (saayikilsoonaayidii), kortikostirooyidii asitmaaf olfudhatamee karoorsaa jira.
translated: Giddu-galli Fayyaa fi Qoricha Addunyaa Biyyaalessaa Jaappaan (NCGM) yaaliin kilinikaa Teijin's Alvesco (ciclesonide) jedhamu kan kortikoostirooyidiin dhukkuba asmii afuuraan fudhatamu dhukkubsattoota mallattoon dhukkuba kanaan dura vaayirasii koroonaa haaraan qabaman yaaluuf karoorfateera.

sourceString: A form of angiotensin-converting enzyme 2, a Phase II trial is underway with 200 patients to be recruited from severe, hospitalized cases in Denmark, Germany, and Austria to determine the effectiveness of the treatment.
targetString: Deenmaark, Jaarman fi Awustiraaliyaa keessatti gosti anjiyootensin konvartiing inzaayimii-2, qorrannoo sadarkaa II dhukubsattoota 200 hospitaala jiranii fi baay’ee itti hammaate keessaa filaman irratti hojjetamaa jira.
translated: Bifa inzaayimii angiotensin-converting enzyme 2, yaaliin Marsaa II dhukkubsattoota 200 kanneen Deenmaark, Jarmanii fi Oostiriyaa keessatti dhukkuboota ciccimoo, hospitaala ciisan irraa fudhatamuun bu'a qabeessummaa yaala kanaa murteessuuf gaggeeffamaa jira.

sourceString: Researchers from the Montreal Heart Institute in Canada are currently studying the role of colchicine in reducing inflammation and pulmonary complications in patients suffering from mild symptoms of COVID-19.
targetString: Qorattoonni Inistitiyuutii Onnee Montiriyaalii Kaanaadaa gahee koolchiisiiniin gubaa dhaqnaa fi mallattoolee dhukkubbii sombaa dhukkubsattoota mallattoolee COVID-19 giddu-galeessaan dhiphatanii hir’isuu keessatti qaburratti yeroo ammaa qorannaarra jiru.
translated: Qorattoonni Inistiitiyuutii Onnee Montreal Kanaadaa yeroo ammaa dhukkubsattoota mallattoolee salphaa COVID-19n rakkatan irratti inflammation fi rakkoo sombaa hir'isuu keessatti gahee kolchicine qorachaa jiru.

sourceString: The study, named COLCORONA, is recruiting 6000 adults aged 40 and over who were diagnosed with COVID-19 and experience mild symptoms not requiring hospitalization.
targetString: Qorannoon COLCORONA jedhamee moggaafame namoota umuriin isaanii 40 fi isaa ol ta’e COVID-19 kan keessatti argamee mallattoo sasalphaa argisiisaniif hospitaala ciisuun akka hin barbaachifne dargagoota 6000 qacara jira.
translated: Qorannoon maqaa COLCORONA jedhuun moggaafame kun ga’eessota umuriin isaanii waggaa 40 fi isaa ol ta’an kanneen COVID-19n qabamuun isaanii adda baafamee fi mallattoolee salphaa hospitaala ciisuu hin barbaachifne isaan mudatan 6000 bobbaasaa jira.

sourceString: Women who are pregnant or breastfeeding or who do not have an effective contraceptive method are not eligible.
targetString: Dubartoonni ulfa ta’an yookaan hoosisan yookaan kanneen mala ittiin ulfummaa ittisan bu’a qabeessa ta’e hin qabne ulaagaa hin guutan.
translated: Dubartoonni ulfa ta’an ykn harma hoosisan ykn mala ittisa ulfaa bu’a qabeessa ta’e hin qabne ulaagaa guutuu hin qaban.

sourceString: Several anticoagulants are being tested in Italy.
targetString: Farroonni kantaruu dhiigaa hamma tokko baay’ee ta’an Xaaliyaan keessatti qorannoorra jiru.
translated: Xaaliyaaniitti qorichi farra dhiigaa hedduun qoratamaa jira.

sourceString: Low-molecular-weight heparin is being widely used to treat patients, prompting the Italian Medicines Agency to publish guidelines on its use.
targetString: Hepaariiniin ulfaatina-molaakiyuulawaa-xinnaa dhukkubsattoota yaaluuf ballinaan faayidaarra oolaa jiru, Ejensiin Qorichootaa Xaaliyaanii itti fayyadamasaa irratti qajeelcha akka maxxansuuf dirqisiisaa jira.
