translated: Heepaariin ulfaatina molakiyuulaa xiqqaa qabu dhukkubsattoota yaaluuf bal’inaan itti fayyadamaa waan jiruuf, Ejensiin Qoricha Xaaliyaanii qajeelfama itti fayyadama isaa akka maxxansu taasiseera.

sourceString: A multicenter study on 300 patients researching the use of enoxaparin sodium at prophylaxis and therapeutic dosages was announced in Italy on April 14.
targetString: Qorannoon bakka garaagaraatti dhukkubsattoota 300 irratti fayyadama inogzaapaariin soodiyemii piroofaayilaagzisii irrattii fi doozii wallaansaa irratti qoratamu Xaaliyaanii keessatti Eebla gaafa 14 ibsame.
translated: Qorannoon wiirtuuwwan hedduu dhukkubsattoota 300 irratti gaggeeffame kan itti fayyadama soodiyemii enooksaapaariin doosiiwwan ittisaa fi wal'aansaa irratti qoratan irratti gaggeeffame Xaaliyaaniitti Ebla 14 ifoomeera.

sourceString: Since SARS-CoV-2 is a virus, considerable scientific attention has been focused on repurposing approved anti-viral drugs that were developed for prior outbreaks such as MERS, SARS, and West Nile virus.
targetString: Erga SARS-CoV-2 ‘uun vaayrasii ta’ee, xiyyeeffannoon saayinsawaa tilmaama keessa galu dawwaa farra vaayrasii kanan dura mu’aatef oomishame mirkaana’e kan akka MERS, SARS, akkasumas vaayrasii Naayil Dhiha irraa deebisanii itti faayyadamuu irratti fuulleeffachaa jiru.
translated: SARS-CoV-2 vaayirasii waan ta’eef, xiyyeeffannaan saayinsii guddaan qoricha farra vaayirasii mirkanaa’ee fi weerara duraan ture kan akka MERS, SARS, fi vaayirasii West Nile’f qophaa’e deebisee kaayyoof kennuu irratti xiyyeeffateera.

sourceString: Ribavirin: ribavirin was recommended for COVID-19 treatment according to Chinese 7th edition guidelines
targetString: Ribavirin: akka qajeelfama Chaayinootaa jildii 7ffaatti ribavirin wal’aansa COVID-19’f eeramee ture.
translated: Ribavirin: ribavirin yaala COVID-19f akka qajeelfama Chaayinaa maxxansa 7ffaatti gorfame

sourceString: Umifenovir: umifenovir was recommended for COVID-19 treatment according to Chinese 7th edition guidelines
targetString: Uumifenoovir: akka qajeelfama Chaayinaa maxxansa 7ffaatti uumifenovirin wal’aansa COVID-19 tiif eeramera
translated: Umifenovir: umifenovir akkaataa qajeelfama maxxansa 7ffaa Chaayinaatiin yaala COVID-19f gorfame

sourceString: Some antibiotics that have been identified as potentially repurposable as COVID-19 treatments:
targetString: Antiibaayootikoota muraasa kan akka wal’aansota COVID-19 tti humna guutuun kaayyoo haaraaf jijjiramuu danda’aniitti adda baafaman:
translated: Antibaayootikii tokko tokko kanneen akka wal’aansa COVID-19tti deebi’anii kaayyoof akka oolu danda’an adda baafaman:

sourceString: Tocilizumab (Anti-IL-6 receptor): Approved by China.
targetString: Toshiliizumaab (fudhatoo Farra-IL-6): Chaayinaadhaan kan mirkanaa’e.
translated: Tocilizumab (Anti-IL-6 receptor): Chaayinaan kan mirkanaa’e.

sourceString: Also trials in Italy and China. and see Tocilizumab#COVID-19.
targetString: Akkasumas yaaliiwwan Xaaliyaaniifi Chaayinaa keessatti. Akkasumas Tocilizumab#COVID-19 ilaalaa.
translated: Akkasumas yaaliiwwan Xaaliyaanii fi Chaayinaa keessatti. akkasumas Tocilizumab#COVID-19 ilaali.

sourceString: b'A COVID-19 vaccine is a hypothetical vaccine against coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19).
targetString: Talaalliin b’A COVID-19 talaallii yaadaa farra dhukkuba koronaavaayiresii 2019 (COVID-19) ti.
translated: b'Talaalliin COVID-19 talaallii dhibee vaayirasii koroonaa bara 2019 (COVID-19) ittisuuf yaadame.

sourceString: Although no vaccine has completed clinical trials, there are multiple attempts in progress to develop such a vaccine.
targetString: Talaalliin wallaansa yaaliiwwan kiliinikaalawaa xumure jiraachuu baatus, talaallii akkasii hojjechuuf tattaaffiiwwaan adeemsarra jiran hedduutu jira.
translated: Talaalliin yaaliiwwan kilinikaa xumuruu baatus, talaallii akkasii hojjechuuf yaaliin dachaa taasifamaa jira.

sourceString: In late February 2020, the World Health Organization (WHO) said it did not expect a vaccine against SARS-CoV-2, the causative virus, to become available in less than 18 months.
targetString: Dhuma ji’a Guraandhalaa 2020, Dhaabbanni Fayyaa Addunyaa (WHO) n, talaallii farra vaayiresii kanaaf sababa ta’ee SARS-CoV-2 f ji’oota 18 gaditti akka argamu eegee akka hin turre dubbateera.
translated: Dhuma Fulbaana 2020tti Dhaabbanni Fayyaa Addunyaa (WHO) talaalliin vaayirasii saars-CoV-2, vaayirasii sababa ta’e, ji’oota 18 hin guunne keessatti ni argama jedhee akka hin eegne ibseera.

sourceString: Five vaccine candidates were in Phase I safety studies in April.
targetString: Talaallin kaadhimaa shan sadarkaa I Ebla keessa qorannaa nageenyumma irra turan.
translated: Kaadhimamaa talaallii shan baatii Eblaa keessa qorannoo nageenyaa Marsaa I keessa turan.

sourceString: COVID-19 was identified in December 2019.
targetString: Waa'ee COVID-19 muddee 2019 keessatti ibsame.
translated: COVID-19 Muddee 2019 adda baafame.

sourceString: A major outbreak spread around the world in 2020, leading to considerable investment and research activity to develop a vaccine.
targetString: 2020 keessa akka addunyaatti jalqabbiin faffaca’insaa ijoo, talaallii dagaagsuuf gara investimentii ol’aanaa fi sochii qorannaatti geessa jira.
translated: Weerarri guddaan bara 2020 addunyaa guutuutti babal’atee, talaallii qopheessuuf invastimantii fi sochii qorannoo guddaa taasiseera.

sourceString: Many organizations are using published genomes to develop possible vaccines against SARS-CoV-2.
targetString: Dhaabbileen hedduun talaalliiwwan farra SARS-CoV-2 ta’uu danda’an hojjechuuf kuusaa hidda sanyii maxxanfame fayyadamaa jiru.
translated: Dhaabbileen hedduun talaallii SARS-CoV-2 irratti ta'uu danda'u qopheessuuf jiinooma maxxanfame fayyadamaa jiru.

sourceString: Stated in April, imperatives of the CEPI initiative for vaccine development are speed, manufacturing capacity, deployment at scale, and global access.
targetString: Ebla keessa ibsame, dagaafamuu talaalliitiif wantoonni ariifachiisoon karoora haaraa rakkoo adda ta’eef karoorfame kan CEPI saffisa, dandeettii oomishaa, hamma guddaan dhiyeessuu, fi gahiinsa addunyaawaadha
translated: Ji’a Eblaa keessa akka ibsametti, barbaachisummaan jalqabbii CEPI misooma talaallii saffisa, dandeettii omishaa, bobba’iinsa sadarkaa, fi qaqqabummaa addunyaati.

sourceString: In April, CEPI scientists reported that 10 different technology platforms were under research and development during early 2020 to create an effective vaccine against COVID-19.
targetString: Ebla keessa, saayintistoonni CEPI hujeffannoowwan teknolojii garaagaraa 10 yeroo gara jalqabaa 2020 tti talaallii bu’a qabeessa COVID-19 irratti uumuuf qorannoo fi dagaagfamuu jala jiraachuu gabaasan.
translated: Ji'a Eblaa keessa saayintistoonni CEPI talaallii COVID-19 bu'a qabeessa ta'e uumuuf jalqaba bara 2020 keessa waltajjiiwwan teeknooloojii adda addaa 10 qorannoo fi misooma irra akka turan gabaasaniiru.

sourceString: Major platform targets advanced into Phase I safety studies include:
targetString: Xiyyeeffannoowwan waltajjii guddaan gara qo’annoo nageenyaa Gulantaa I itti ol-guddatan kan hammatan:
translated: Targetwwan waltajjii gurguddoon gara qorannoowwan nageenyaa Marsaa Itti guddatan kanneen akka:

sourceString: nucleic acid (DNA and RNA) (Phase I developer and vaccine candidate: Moderna, mRNA-1273)
targetString: Niyukiliik Acidii (DNA fi RNA) (sadarkaa I qopheessaa fi kaadhimama talaallii: ammayyaa, mRNA-1273)
translated: asiidii niwuukilii (DNA fi RNA) (Marsaa I qopheessaa fi kaadhimamaa talaallii: Moderna, mRNA-1273)

sourceString: viral vector (Phase I developer and vaccine candidate: CanSino Biologics, adenovirus type 5 vector)
targetString: Baattoo vaayiresii (oomishaa marsaa I fi kaadhimamaa talaallii: Kaansiinoo Baayoloojiksi, baattoo adinoovaayiresii gosa 5)
translated: veektarii vaayirasii (Marsaa I qopheessaa fi kaadhimamaa talaallii: CanSino Biologics, veektarii adenovirus gosa 5) .

sourceString: As reported by CEPI scientists in April, 115 total vaccine candidates are in early stages of development, with 78 confirmed as active projects (79, according to the Milken Institute), and 37 others announced, but with little public information available (presumed to be in planning or being designed).
targetString: Eebla keessa saayintistoota CEPI tiin akka gabaafametti, waliigalaan talaalliiwwan kaadhimamoon 115 waqtii oomisha duraarra jiran, 78 akka piroojektii dammaqaatti kan fudhatam ( akka Inistiitiyuutii Miilkenitti,79), fi kan biroon 37 immoo kan beeksifaman ta’anii, garuu odeeffannoon hawaasaa baayyee xinnoon jiraachuun (karoorra ykn diizaayiniirra akka turuuf kan gidduutti dhaabbate).
translated: Akkuma saayintistoonni CEPI Ebla keessa gabaasan, walumaa galatti kaadhimamaa talaallii 115 sadarkaa jalqabaa misooma irra kan jiran yoo ta’u, 78 pirojektoota sochiirra jiran ta’uun isaanii mirkanaa’eera (79, akka Dhaabbanni Milken jedhutti), kanneen biroo 37 ammoo ifoomaniiru, garuu odeeffannoon ummataa xiqqaadha (akka ta’etti tilmaamameera karoora baasuu ykn dizaayinii ta’uu keessatti).

sourceString: A Phase I-II trial conducts preliminary safety and immunogenicity testing, is typically randomized, placebo-controlled, and at multiple sites, while determining more precise, effective doses.
targetString: Yaaliin sadarkaa I-II nageenyumaa fi qorannoo summaa’inaa irratti, keessattu walkeessa makuu, pilaasiboodhan kan to’atamee, fi iddoo garagaraatti, isa sirrii fi hammanta sirrii ta’e argachuuf gaggeefama.
translated: Yaaliin Marsaa I-II qorannoo nageenyaa fi immunogenicity duraa kan gaggeessu yoo ta’u, akkaataa adda addaatiin kan tasaa, pilaasboodhaan kan to’atamu, fi bakka hedduutti kan raawwatamu yoo ta’u, doosiiwwan sirrii, bu’a qabeessa ta’an murteessa.

sourceString: Phase III trials typically involve more participants, including a control group, and test effectiveness of the vaccine to prevent the disease, while monitoring for adverse effects at the optimal dose.
targetString: Yaaliiwwaan marsaa III gosa gosaan, hirmaattota dabalataa, garee to’annoo, fi doozii sirrii irratti miidhaanni fiduu malu to’achaa, dandeetti talaallichi dhukkubicha ittisuuf qabu madaaluu dabalatee kan of keessatti hammatudha.
translated: Yaaliin marsaa III akkaataa idileetti garee to’annoo dabalatee hirmaattoota baay’ee kan hirmaachisu yoo ta’u, bu’a qabeessummaa talaallii dhukkuba kana ittisuuf qorachuun, bu’aa badaa doosiin isaa sirrii ta’een hordofa.

sourceString: Of 79 vaccine candidates in active development (confirmed as of early April 2020), 74 were not yet in human evaluation (still in "preclinical" research).
targetString: Kadhimamtoota talaalli 79 oomishamaa jiran keesssaa (Ebla 2020 kana kan mirkanaa’an), 74 sadarkaa yaalii namaa irra hin geenye (hanga amma qorannoo “kilinikaala dura” keessa jiru).
translated: Kaadhimamaa talaallii 79 guddina sochiirra jiran keessaa (jalqaba Ebla 2020tti mirkanaa'eera), 74 ammallee madaallii namaa keessa hin turre (ammallee qorannoo "preclinical" keessa jiru).

sourceString: Around 24 January 2020 in Australia, the University of Queensland announced that it is investigating the potential of a molecular clamp vaccine that would genetically modify viral proteins in order to stimulate an immune reaction.
targetString: Naannoo Amajjii 24 2020 Awustiraaliyaatti Yuuniversiitiin Kuwiinsilaandii deebii madiinummaa si’eessuuf hidda sanyii pirootiinota vaayiresii kan jijjiiru, dandeettii talaallii moolaakiwulaar kilaampii qorachaa akka jiru beeksisee ture.
translated: Naannoo Guraandhala 24 bara 2020 Awustiraaliyaatti Yunivarsiitiin Kuwiinslaand talaalliin molakiyuulaa kilaampii pirootiinota vaayirasii jeneetikiidhaan fooyyessuun deebii ittisa qaamaa kakaasuuf dandeettii qabaachuu isaa qorachaa akka jiru beeksiseera.

sourceString: Around 24 January 2020 in Canada, the International Vaccine Centre (VIDO-InterVac) at the University of Saskatchewan announced the commencement of work on a vaccine, aiming to start human testing in 2021.
targetString: Naannoo Amajjii 24, 2020 Kaanaadaa keessatti, Giddu-galli Talaallii Addunyaa (VIDO-InterVac) Yuunversiitii Saskatchewanitti hojii taalallii irratti guyyaa jalqabbii beeksise, qorannoo nama irratti bara 2021 jalqabuu irratti kan kaayyeffate.
translated: Naannoo Guraandhala 24 bara 2020 Kanaadaatti, Yunivarsiitii Saskatchewan keessatti Giddugalli Talaallii Idil-addunyaa (VIDO-InterVac) talaallii irratti hojii jalqabuu isaa kan beeksise yoo ta’u, bara 2021tti qorannoo namaa jalqabuuf kaayyeffateera.

sourceString: Vaccine development projects were announced at the Chinese Center for Disease Control and Prevention on 26 January 2020, and the University of Hong Kong on 28 January.
targetString: Dagaaginni pirojektiiwwan talaalli giddu gala to’annaa fi ittisa dhukkubaa Chaayinaatti Amajjii 26,2020, akkasumas Yuunversiitii Hoong Koongiitti Amajjii 28 beeksifame.
translated: Pirojektoonni misooma talaallii Giddugala To’annoo fi Ittisa Dhukkuboota Chaayinaa keessatti Guraandhala 26 bara 2020, Yunivarsiitii Hoong Koongitti ammoo Guraandhala 28 ifoomeera.

sourceString: Around 29 January 2020, Janssen Pharmaceutical Companies, led by Hanneke Schuitemaker, announced that it had begun work on developing a vaccine.
targetString: Naannoo Amajjii 29, 2020, kubbaaniyyaan qorichaa Janssen, Hanneke Schuitemaker’n durfamuun, talaalli hojjechuu akka eegalan beeksise.
translated: Naannoo Guraandhala 29 bara 2020tti Dhaabbileen Qorichaa Janssen, Hanneke Schuitemaker tiin durfamu, talaallii qopheessuu irratti hojii jalqabuu isaa beeksise.

sourceString: Janssen is co-developing an oral vaccine with its biotechnology partner, Vaxart.
targetString: Janssen talaallii afaaniin fudhatamu hiriyaa isaa baayoteknoolojii, Vaxart waliin dagaagsaa jiru.
translated: Janssen talaallii afaaniin fudhatamu michuu isaa Vaxart waliin ta'uun hojjechaa jira.

sourceString: On 18 March 2020, Emergent BioSolutions announced a manufacturing partnership with Vaxart to develop the vaccine.
targetString: Bitootessa 18, 2020, Baayosolution warshaleen hiriyyummaa Vaaksart waliin talaalli argachuuf akka oomishu beeksise.
translated: Amajjii 18 bara 2020, Emergent BioSolutions talaallii kana hojjechuuf Vaxart waliin tumsa oomishaa beeksiseera.

sourceString: On 8 February 2020, the laboratory OncoGen in Romania published a paper on the design of a vaccine with similar technology to the one used for cancer neoantigen vaccination therapy.
targetString: Guraandhala gaafa 8, 2020 irratti, laaboraatooriin Onkoojiinii Romaaniyaa diizaayinii talaallii, teknoloojii wallaansa talaallii kaanserii niyeentijiinii keessatti fayyadameen walfakkaatuu irratti waraqaa qorannoo maxxanseera.
translated: Fulbaana 8 bara 2020 laaboraatooriin OncoGen jedhamu Rumaaniyaa keessatti argamu waraqaa dizaayinii talaallii teeknooloojii kan yaala talaallii kaansarii niwoantigen jedhamuuf oolu waliin walfakkaatu maxxanseera.

sourceString: On 25 March the head of the research institute announced that they had finalized the synthesis of the vaccine and were beginning the tests.
targetString: Bitootessa 25 duraa taa’an dhaabbata qorannicha qophii talaalli xumuranii akkkasumas yaalii eegaluu isaanii beeksisee ture.
translated: Amajjii 25 itti gaafatamaan dhaabbata qorannoo kanaa walnyaatinsa talaallii kanaa xumuruu isaanii fi qorannoo jalqabuu isaanii beeksisaniiru.

sourceString: On 27 February 2020, a Generex subsidiary company, NuGenerex Immuno-Oncology, announced they were beginning a vaccine project to create an Ii-Key peptide vaccine against COVID-19.
targetString: Gurraandhala 27, 2020tti, kaampaaniin hortee Generex, NuGenerex Immuno-Oncology, pirojektii talaallii talaallii Ii-Key peptide COVID-19 irratti uumuuf jalqabaa jiraachuu isaanii beeksisan.
translated: Fulbaana 27 bara 2020, dhaabbati ijoo Generex, NuGenerex Immuno-Oncology, talaallii peeptiidii Ii-Key COVID-19 uumuuf pirojektii talaallii jalqabuu isaanii beeksise.

sourceString: They wanted to produce a vaccine candidate that could be tested in humans "within 90 days."
targetString: Talaallii kaadhimamaa “guyyoota 90 keessatti” namarratti yaalamuu danda’an hojjechuu barbaadani.
translated: Kaadhimamaa talaallii "guyyoota 90 keessatti" nama irratti qoratamuu danda'u oomishuuf barbaadan.

sourceString: On 5 March 2020, Washington University in St. Louis announced its projects to develop a vaccine.
targetString: Bitootessa 5 2020 tti, Yunivarsiitiin Waashiingtan St. Louis keessaa talaallii dagaagsuuf pirojektoota isaa beeksiseera.
translated: Sadaasa 5 bara 2020 Yunivarsiitiin Waashingitan Seent Luwiis piroojektii talaallii qopheessuu beeksise.

sourceString: On 5 March 2020, the United States Army Medical Research and Materiel Command at Fort Detrick and the Walter Reed Army Institute of Research in Silver Spring, both in western Maryland, announced they were working on a vaccine.
targetString: Bitootessa 5 bara 2020, qorattoonni dawaa fi ajajni meeshaalee loltoota United States Fort Detrick fi loltootni dhaabbata qorannoo meetii arfaasaa Walter Reed,Maryland lixaa lachuu keessatti, talaallii argachuu irratti hojjechaa akka jiran ibsan.
translated: Amajjii 5 bara 2020, Ajajni Qorannoo Fayyaa fi Meeshaalee Waraana Yunaayitid Isteets Foorti Deetrik fi Inistiitiyuutiin Qorannoo Waraana Walter Reed Silver Spring, lamaan isaanii iyyuu dhiha Meeriilaandii, talaallii irratti hojjechaa akka jiran beeksisan.

sourceString: Around 10 March 2020, Emergent Biosolutions announced that it had teamed with Novavax Inc.
targetString: Naannoo Bitootessa 10, 2020 Faloonni lubbuu Attatamaa Novavax Inc waliin gurmaa’an beeksifaman.
translated: Naannoo Amajjii 10 bara 2020tti Emergent Biosolutions Novavax Inc waliin ta'uu isaa beeksise.

sourceString: in the development and manufacture of a vaccine.
targetString: dagaagfamaa fi oomisha talaallii keessatti.
translated: qophii fi omisha talaallii keessatti.

sourceString: The partners further announced plans for preclinical testing and a Phase I clinical trial by July 2020.
targetString: Maatiin dabalataan karoorawwan qorannoo kilinikaalaa duraa fi yaalii kilinikaala sadarkaa I adoolessa 2020 ni beeksisu.
translated: Michoonni kunneen dabalataan karoora qorannoo kilinikaa duraa fi yaaliin kilinikaa Marsaa I hanga July 2020tti gaggeeffamuuf qaban beeksisaniiru.

sourceString: On 12 March 2020, India's Health Ministry announced they are working with 11 isolates, and that even on a fast track it would take at least around one-and-a-half to two years to develop a vaccine.
targetString: Bitootessa gaafa 12, 2020 irratti Ministeerri Fayyaa Indiyaa gareewwan 11 kan hojjechaa jiranii fi talaallii hojjechuuf ariitiin yoo faana dha’ame yoo xinnaate waggaa-tokkoof-walakkaatii hamma waggoota lamaa akka fudhatu ibseera.
translated: Amajjii 12 bara 2020 Ministeerri Fayyaa Hindii namoota adda baafaman 11 waliin hojjechaa akka jiran kan beeksise yoo ta'u, daandii saffisaa irrattillee talaallii kana hojjechuuf yoo xiqqaate naannoo waggaa tokkoo fi walakkaa hanga lamaa akka fudhatu beeksiseera.

sourceString: On 12 March 2020, Medicago, a biotechnology company in Quebec City, Quebec, reported development of a coronavirus-like particle under partial funding from the Canadian Institutes for Health Research.
targetString: Bitootessa 12 2020 tti, kaampaaniin baayooteknoolojii Magaalaa Quebec, Quebec, gargaarsa walakkaa Dhaabbatoota Kanaadaa Qorannoo Fayyaaf irraa argataniin dagaaguu vaayirasii koroonaa akka suudootti gabaasan.
translated: Amajjii 12 bara 2020, Kuubeek magaalaa Kuubeek keessatti dhaabbata baayooteknooloojii Medikaagoon, maallaqa gartokkoon Inistiitiyuutii Qorannoo Fayyaa Kanaadaa irraa argameen, paartiikilii vaayirasii koroonaa fakkaatu akka hojjetamu gabaaseera.

sourceString: The vaccine candidate is in laboratory research, with human testing planned for July or August 2020.
targetString: Kaadhimamaan talaallichaa qorannoo laaboraatoorii keessa jira, qorannoo ilma namaa Adoolessa yookaan Hagayya 2020 karoorfame wajjin.
translated: Kaadhimamaa talaallii kun qorannoo laabraatoorii irratti kan argamu yoo ta'u, qorannoon namaa ji'a July ykn August 2020tti gaggeeffamuuf karoorfameera.

sourceString: Earlier that week, The Guardian reported that the US President Donald Trump had offered CureVac "'large sums of money' for exclusive access to a Covid-19 vaccine", against which the German government protested.
targetString: Jalqaba torban sanaatti, The Guardian Pireezidaantiin US Donaald Traamp CureVac’f "'qarshii ol’aanaa' argannoo talaallii Covid-19 addaatiif" akka dhiyeessan gabaasan, kan mootummaan Jarman irratti mormii kaase.
translated: Jalqaba torbee sanaa, Gaazexaan Gaardiyaan akka gabaasetti, prezidaantiin Ameerikaa Doonaald Tiraamp CureVac ''talaallii Covid-19 addatti argachuuf ''maallaqa guddaa''' dhiyeessuu isaanii, mootummaan Jarmanii mormuun isaa ni yaadatama.

sourceString: On 17 March 2020, American pharmaceutical company Pfizer announced a partnership with German company BioNTech to jointly develop a mRNA-based vaccine.
targetString: Bitootessa 17, 2020, kubbaaniyyaan Qorichaa Ameerikaa Pfizer kubbaaniyaa Jaarman BioNtech waliin ta’uun talaalli mRNA irratti hundaa’e akka hojjetan beeksisan.
translated: Amajjii 17 bara 2020 dhaabbati qorichaa Ameerikaa Pfizer dhaabbata Jarmanii BioNTech waliin ta’uun talaallii mRNA irratti hundaa’e hojjechuuf tumsa uumuu isaa beeksise.

sourceString: mRNA-based vaccine candidate BNT162, currently in pre-clinical testing with clinical trials expected to begin in April 2020.
targetString: Talaalliin kaadhimamaa mRNA irratti hundaa’e BNT162, yeroo ammaa qorannoo kilinikaawaan duraa keessa jira yaaliiwwan kilinikaawaa Ebla 2020 tti akka eegalan abdii godhachuun.
translated: Kaadhimamaa talaallii mRNA irratti hundaa'e BNT162, yeroo ammaa qorannoo kilinikaa duraa kan jiru yoo ta'u, yaaliin kilinikaa Ebla 2020 ni jalqabama jedhamee eegama.

sourceString: In Italy on 17 March 2020, Takis Biotech, an Italian biotech company announced they will have pre-clinical testing results in April 2020 and their final vaccine candidate could begin human testing by fall.
targetString: Xaaliyaan keessatti Bitootessa 17, 2020, Taakis baayoteek, kubbaaniyyaan baayotek Xaaliyaa bu’aa qorannoo yaalii kilinikala duraa Ebla keessa akka argachu danda’an beeksisan akkasumas Ebla 2020 kadhimaan talaalli dhumaa nama irratti taasisuun jalqabu ni danda’a.
translated: Xaaliyaaniitti Amajjii 17 bara 2020 dhaabbati baayooteek Xaaliyaanii Takis Biotech bu’aa qorannoo kilinikaa duraa Ebla 2020 akka qabaatu fi kaadhimamaa talaallii isaanii isa dhumaa hanga ji’a kufaatiitti qorannoo namaa jalqabuu akka danda’u beeksiseera.

sourceString: In France on 19 March 2020, the Coalition for Epidemic Preparedness Innovations (CEPI) announced a US$4.9 million investment in a COVID-19 vaccine research consortium involving the Institut Pasteur, Themis Bioscience (Vienna, Austria), and the University of Pittsburgh, bringing CEPI's total investment in COVID-19 vaccine development to US$29 million.
targetString: Faransaayi keessatti Bitootessa gaafa 19, 2020 Gamtaan Argannoowwan Qophaa’ina Weeraraa (CEPI) investimentii miiliyoona US$4.9 qorannoo talaallii COVID-19 kan kampaanota Instiitiyuut Paasterii, Teemis Baayoosaayinsii (Veenaa, Ostiiriyaa), fi Yuuniversiitii oof Piitirisbergii, waliin ta’uun investimentii waliigalaa hojii talaallii COVID-19 miiliyoona US$29 tti fideera.
translated: Faransaayitti Amajjii 19 bara 2020, Gamtaan Kalaqa Qophii Weeraraa (CEPI) konsortiimii qorannoo talaallii COVID-19 Inistiitiyuutii Paastar, Themis Bioscience (Vienna, Austria), fi Yuunivarsiitii Piittsbarg hirmaachisuun doolaara Ameerikaa miiliyoona 4.9 invastimantii taasisuu beeksise Invastimantii waliigalaa CEPI misooma talaallii COVID-19 irratti Doolaara Ameerikaa miiliyoona 29.

sourceString: CEPI's other investment partners for COVID-19 vaccine development are Moderna, Curevac, Inovio, Novavax, the University of Hong Kong, the University of Oxford, and the University of Queensland.
targetString: Shariikonni investimentii oomisha talaallii COVID-19 CEPI kan biroon Moodernaa, Kiyuurvaach, Aayinooviyoo, Noovaavaaksii, Yuuniversiitii oof Hoongi Koongi, Yuuniversiitii oof Ooksifoord fi Yuuniversiitii oof Kuwiinsilaandi dha.
translated: Michoota invastimantii CEPI kanneen biroon misooma talaallii COVID-19 irratti hojjetan Moderna, Curevac, Inovio, Novavax, Yuunivarsiitii Hoong Koong, Yuunivarsiitii Oksifoord, fi Yuunivarsiitii Kuwiinslaandiidha.

sourceString: On 20 March 2020, Russian health officials announced that scientists have begun animal testing of six different vaccine candidates.
targetString: Bitootessa 20, 2020 tti, qondaaltonni fayyaa Raashiyaa saayintistoonni qorannoo bineensaa kaadhimamtoota talaallii ja’aa akka jalqaban beeksisaniiru.
translated: Sadaasa 20 bara 2020 qondaaltonni fayyaa Raashiyaa saayintistoonni kaadhimamaa talaallii adda addaa jaha irratti qorannoo bineensotaa jalqabuu isaanii beeksisaniiru.

sourceString: Imperial College London researchers announced on 20 March 2020 that they are developing a self-amplifying RNA vaccine for COVID-19.
targetString: Qorattoonni koolleejjii Impeeriyaalaa London gaafa Bitootessa 20 2020 talaallii RNA ofiin of guddisu COVID-19’f dagaagsaa jiraachuu isaanii beeksisan.
translated: Qorattoonni Kolleejjii Impeeriyaal Landan talaallii RNA COVID-19 ofumaan guddisu qopheessuu isaanii Amajjii 20 bara 2020 beeksisan.

sourceString: The vaccine candidate was developed within 14 days of receiving the sequence from China.
targetString: Talaalichi kaadhimaa guyyoota 14 keessatti tartiba jiinii chaayinaa irraa fudhatameen kan dagaagedha.
translated: Kaadhimamaa talaallii kun erga tartiiba Chaayinaa irraa fudhatee guyyoota 14 keessatti hojjetame.

sourceString: In late March, the Canadian government announced C$275 million in funding for 96 research projects on medical countermeasures against COVID-19, including numerous vaccine candidates at Canadian companies and universities, such as the Medicago and University of Saskatchewan initiatives.
targetString: Dhuma Bitootessaatti, mootummaan Kaanaadaa doolaara Kaanaadaa miiliyoona 275 wal’aansa ittisa COVID-19 irratti pirojektiiwwan qorannoo 96’f gargaarsa gochuuf beeksiseera, kaadhimamtoota talaallii hedduu kaampaanota Kaanaadaafi Yuunivarsiitootaatti dabalatee, kan akka Medicago fi karoora haaraa rakkoo adda ta’eef karoorfame kan Yuunivarsiitii Saskatchewan.
translated: Dhuma baatii Sadaasaa keessa mootummaan Kaanaadaa pirojektoota qorannoo tarkaanfiiwwan yaalaa COVID-19 irratti hojjetaman 96f maallaqa doolaara Kaanadaa miiliyoona 275 akka kennu beeksisee ture, kunis kaadhimamaa talaallii hedduu dhaabbilee fi yunivarsiitiiwwan Kaanaadaa keessatti, kanneen akka jalqabbii Medikaagoo fi Yunivarsiitii Saskatchewan dabalatee.

sourceString: Around the same time, the Canadian government announced C$192 million specifically for developing a COVID-19 vaccine, with plans to establish a national "vaccine bank" of several new vaccines that could be used if another coronavirus outbreak occurs.
targetString: Yerooma walfakkaataatti, Mootummaan Kaanaadaa talaallii COVID-19 oomishuufi, achumaanis koronaavaayiresiin kanbiraan kan ka’u yoo ta’eef akka fayyadamamuuf talaaliiwwan haaraa hedduuf karoora “baankii talaallii” biyyaalessaa hundeessuuf, addatti C$ miiliyoona 192 kan ramadeera.
translated: Naannoo yeroo walfakkaatutti mootummaan Kanaadaa talaallii COVID-19 qopheessuuf addatti Doolaara C$192 miliyoona 192 kan beeksise yoo ta'u, "baankii talaallii" biyyoolessaa talaallii haaraa hedduu yoo weerarri vaayirasii koroonaa biraa mudate itti fayyadamuu danda'an hundeessuuf karoorfateera.

sourceString: On 2 April 2020, researchers at the University of Pittsburgh School of Medicine reported on testing of PittCoVacc, a possible COVID-19 vaccine in mice, stating that "MNA delivered SARS-CoV-2 S1 subunit vaccines elicited potent antigen-specific antibody responses [in the mice] that were evident beginning 2 weeks after immunization."
targetString: Ebla 2, 2020 irratti, qorattoonni Yunivarsiitii Pittsburgh Kutaa Barnoota Wal’aansaa yaalii PittCoVacc irratti godhame gabaasan, talaallii COVID-19 ta’uu malu hantuuta keessatti, akka jedhanitti “MNA’n kutaa xiqqoo talaalliiwwan SARS-CoV-2 S1 deebii farra qaamaa farra qaama alagaa humna guddaa qabu kenne [hantuuta keessatti] erga talaalliin kennamee torban 2 boodaa kaasee argame. "
translated: Ebla 2 bara 2020 qorattoonni Yunivarsiitii Piittsbarg Mana Barumsaa Fayyaa qorannoo talaallii COVID-19 ta'uu danda'u PittCoVacc hantuuta irratti gaggeeffamu irratti gabaasa dhiyeessan, "MNA delivered SARS-CoV-2 S1 subunit vaccines elicited potent antigen-specific antibody responses [ hantuuta keessatti] kanneen talaallii erga fudhatanii booda torban 2 irraa eegalee mul'atan."

sourceString: In Canada on 16 April 2020, the University of Waterloo School of Pharmacy announced design of a DNA-based vaccine candidate as a possible nasal spray.
targetString: Kaanaadaa keessatti Ebla 16 bara 2020, Yuunversiitiin Waaterloo Manni Barumsa Dunkana Qorichaa saxaxa DNA irratti hundaa’e kadhima talaalli ispiraay funyaan keessa ta’uu akka mulu beeksise.
translated: Kanaadaatti Ebla 16 bara 2020 Yunivarsiitiin Waterloo Manni Barumsaa Faarmaasiin kaadhimamaa talaallii DNA irratti hundaa'e akka biifama hidhii ta'uu danda'utti dizaayiniin isaa beeksise.

sourceString: Using bacteriophages, the DNA will be designed to replicate inside human bacteria to produce harmless virus-like particles, which may stimulate the immune system to produce antibodies against the SARS-CoV-2 virus.
targetString: Fayyadamuun, DNA’n baakteriyaa namaa keessatti akka of baay’isuutti saxamuun vaayrasii miidhaa hin qabne, ittisa qaama farra alagaa vaayrasii SARS-CoV-2 kakaasuu kan mulu akka oomishamuuf faayida irra oola.
translated: Baakteeriyoofeejii fayyadamuun DNAn kun baakteeriyaa namaa keessaa akka baay'atee vaayirasii fakkaatu kan miidhaa hin qabne uumuuf kan qophaa'u yoo ta'u, kunis sirni ittisa qaamaa farra qaama vaayirasii SARS-CoV-2 akka uumuuf kakaasuu danda'a.

sourceString: In March 2020, the US government, industry, and three universities pooled resources to access supercomputers from IBM, combined with cloud computing resources from Hewlett Packard Enterprise, Amazon, Microsoft, and Google.
targetString: Bitootessa 2020 keessa, mootummaan US, industiriin, fi yunivarsiitonni sadii IBM irraa kompiitaroota humna ola’aanaan hojjetan argachuuf qabeenyota walitti qaban, qabeenyota kilaawud komputiingii Interpiraayizii Hewlett Packard, Amaazoon, Maaykiroosooft, fi Google irraa waliin walitti makamuun.
translated: Amajjii 2020tti mootummaan Ameerikaa, industirii fi yunivarsiitiiwwan sadii qabeenya walitti qabuun suppercomputers IBM irraa argatan, qabeenya shallaggii duumessaa Hewlett Packard Enterprise, Amazon, Microsoft, fi Google irraa walitti makamaniiru.

sourceString: Some vaccines have heterologous effects, also called non-specific effects.
targetString: Talaalliwwan muraasni bu’aa heddu qabu, akkasumas bu’aa adda hin baane jedhamuun beekkamu.
translated: Talaalliiwwan tokko tokko bu’aa heterologous kan qaban yoo ta’u, bu’aa adda hin taane jedhamuunis ni waama.

sourceString: That means they can have benefits beyond the disease they prevent.
targetString: Sana jechuun dhukkuboota ittisan garasitti faayidaalee qabaachuu danda’u.
translated: Kana jechuun dhukkuba ittisan bira darbee faayidaa qabaachuu danda'u jechuudha.

sourceString: A further randomized trial in Australia is seeking to enrol 4,170 healthcare workers.
targetString: Awustiraaliyaa keessatti yaaliin baajuree gadi-fageenyaanii hojjettoota eegumsa fayyaa 4,170 hirmaachisuuf yaadaa jira.
translated: Yaaliin tasaa dabalataa Awustiraaliyaa keessatti gaggeeffamu hojjettoota eegumsa fayyaa 4,170 galmeessuuf barbaada.

sourceString: It is possible vaccines in development will not be safe or effective.
targetString: Talaalliiwwan hojjetamaa jiran amanamoo ta’uu ykn dandeettii qabaachuu dhiisuu malu.
translated: Talaalliin qophaa'aa jiru nageenya ykn bu'a qabeessa ta'uu dhiisuun isaa ni mala.

sourceString: Early research to assess vaccine efficacy using COVID-19-specific animal models, such as ACE2-transgenic mice, other laboratory animals, and non-human primates, indicate a need for biosafety-level 3 containment measures for handling live viruses, and international coordination to ensure standardized safety procedures.
targetString: Qorannoon gara duraa bu’a-qabeessummaa talaallii madaaluuf moodeloota bineeldaa COVID-19-adda ba’ee kan akka hantuuta sanyii fooyya’aaa-ACE2, bineeldota laaboraatoorii biroo, fi piraaymeetota nama hin ta’iinii vaayiresoota kanneen to’achuuf tarkaanfiiwwan to’annoo baayooseeftii-gulant 3 fi adeemsota nageenyaa sadarkaasaanii eeggatan mirkaneessuuf walitti hidhamiinsa addunyaa akka barbaachisu ibsa.
translated: Qorannoon jalqabaa bu’a qabeessummaa talaallii madaaluuf moodeelota bineensotaa COVID-19 adda ta’an fayyadamuun, kan akka hantuuta ACE2-transgenic, bineensota laabraatoorii biroo, fi priimeetota nama hin taane, vaayirasoota lubbuu qaban to’achuuf tarkaanfiiwwan ofirraa ittisuu sadarkaa nageenya baayoo 3, fi qindoomina idil-addunyaa barbaachisaa ta’uu agarsiisa hojimaata nageenyaa sadarkaa isaa eeggate mirkaneessuuf.

sourceString: Vaccines against SARS and MERS have been tested in non-human animal models.
targetString: Talaalliiwwan farra SARS fi MERS moodeloota bineeldota nama hin taane irratte yaalameera.
translated: Talaalliin SARS fi MERS moodeelota bineensota nama hin taane irratti qoratameera.

sourceString: As of 2020, there is no cure or protective vaccine for SARS that has been shown to be both safe and effective in humans.
targetString: Hanga 2020 tti, SARS irraa kan fayyisu ykn ittisu namaaf naga-qabeessaa fi bu’a-qabeessa akka ta’e talaalliin mullate hin jiru.
translated: Bara 2020 irraa eegalee talaalliin qoricha ykn ittisa SARS nama irratti nageenyaafi bu'a qabeessa ta'uun isaa mirkanaa'e hin jiru.

sourceString: According to research papers published in 2005 and 2006, the identification and development of novel vaccines and medicines to treat SARS was a priority for governments and public health agencies around the world.There is also no proven vaccine against MERS.
targetString: Akka waraqaawwan qorannoo 2005 fi 2006 maxxanfamaniitti, adda baafamnii fi dagaagfamni talaalliiwwan nooveeliifi daawaawwanii SARS’n wal’aanuuf mootummootaa fi ejensoota fayyaa uummataa addunyaarra jiraniif dursi kan kennamuufi. Dabalataan talaalliin MERS’f mirkanaa’ellee hin jiru.
translated: Akka waraqaawwan qorannoo bara 2005 fi 2006 maxxanfaman akka mul’isutti, talaallii fi qorichoota haaraa SARS yaaluuf gargaaran adda baasuu fi qopheessuun mootummootaa fi dhaabbilee fayyaa hawaasaa addunyaa maraaf dursa kennamee ture.Akkasumas talaalliin MERS irratti mirkanaa’e hin jiru.

sourceString: When MERS became prevalent, it was believed that existing SARS research may provide a useful template for developing vaccines and therapeutics against a MERS-CoV infection.
targetString: Gaafa MERS babal’ataa ture, qorannoon SARS duraan ture talaalliiwwaniifi damee wal’aansaa dhukkuba fayyisuu irratti xiyyeeffatan dagaagsuuf qajeelcha hojii barbaachisaa hubama MERS-CoV irratti akka dhiyeessuu malutu amanamee ture.
translated: Yeroo MERS babal’ate, qorannoon SARS amma jiru talaallii fi yaala infekshinii MERS-CoV qopheessuuf unka faayidaa qabu ta’uu akka danda’u amanama ture.

sourceString: As of March 2020, there was one (DNA based) MERS vaccine which completed phase I clinical trials in humans, and three others in progress, all of which are viral-vectored vaccines, two adenoviral-vectored (ChAdOx1-MERS,  BVRS-GamVac), and one MVA-vectored (MVA-MERS-S).
targetString: Akka Bitootessa 2020, talaallin MERS (DNA irratti kan hundaa’e) guutumatti yaalii kilinikaalaa sadarkaa I namoota kan darbe, akkasumas kanneen biroo adeemsarra jiru, talaalliwwam baattuun- vaayralii hundi, baattuun adenovaayralii lama (ChAdOx1-MERS, BVRS-GamVac), fi baattuu-MVA tokko (MVA-MERS-S).
translated: Amajjii 2020tti talaalliin MERS tokko (DNA irratti hundaa’e) kan yaaliiwwan kilinikaa marsaa I nama irratti xumure, fi kanneen biroo sadii adeemsa irra jiran, hundi isaanii talaallii vaayirasii veektarii, lama adenoviral-vectored (ChAdOx1-MERS, BVRS-GamVac ), fi tokko MVA-veektarii (MVA-MERS-S) ta’e.

sourceString: Social media posts have promoted a conspiracy theory claiming the virus behind COVID-19 was known and that a vaccine was already available.
targetString: Vaayirasiin COVID-19 duubaan jiru beekamaafi talaalliin dursee argameera jechuun maxxansoonni miidiyaa hawaasaa yaada qorannoo shiraan guute beeksisaniiru.
translated: Maxxansi miidiyaa hawaasaa vaayirasiin COVID-19 duuba jiru beekamaa turee fi talaalliin duraan argamuu ture jechuun yaada shiraa guddisan.

sourceString: The patents cited by various social media posts reference existing patents for genetic sequences and vaccines for other strains of coronavirus such as the SARS coronavirus.
targetString: Maddeeleen maxxansoota sabquunnamtii hawaasaa hedduun caqafaman, maddeelee tartiiba hidda sanyii jiranii fi talaaliiwwan qacceelee koronaavaayiresii biroo akka koronaavaayiresii SARS kan waabeffatanidha.
translated: Paatentoonni maxxansaalee miidiyaa hawaasaa adda addaatiin caqasan paatentii tartiiba jeneetikii fi talaallii gosoota vaayirasii koroonaa biroo kan akka vaayirasii koroonaa SARS kan jiran eeruun.

sourceString: b'Coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19) is an infectious disease caused by severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2).
targetString: Dhukkubi vaayirasii koroonaa 2019 (COVID-19) dhibee daddarbaa mallattoowwan dhibee argansuu hamaa balaafamaa vaayirasii koroonaa 2 (SARS-CoV-2) dhaan dhufudha.
translated: b'Dhukkubni Vaayirasii Koronaa 2019 (COVID-19) dhukkuba daddarbaa dhukkuba sirna hargansuu cimaa (severe acute respiratory syndrome) koronaavaayirasii 2 (SARS-CoV-2) tiin dhufuudha.

sourceString: Common symptoms include fever, cough, and shortness of breath.
targetString: Mallattoolee baramoon kanneen akka qaama gubaa, qufaa fi hafuura kutaa dabalatu.
translated: Mallattoowwan baay’inaan mul’atan ho’a qaamaa, qufaa fi hafuura kutuu.

sourceString: Other symptoms may include fatigue, muscle pain, diarrhea, sore throat, loss of smell, and abdominal pain.
targetString: Mallattooleen biro dadhabbii, dhukkubbii irree, garaa kaasaa, madaa’uu kokkee, foolii baasuu, fi dhukkubbii garaa fa’a ta’uu malu.
translated: Mallattoowwan biroon dadhabbiin, dhukkubbii maashaalee, garaacha, dhukkubbii qoonqoo, urgaa dhabuu fi dhukkubbii garaa ta’uu danda’a.

sourceString: The time from exposure to onset of symptoms is typically around five days but may range from two to fourteen days.
targetString: Yeroon qabamuu hanga mallattoo agarsiisuu naannoo guyyoota shaniiti, garuu guyyoota lamaa hanga kudha afurii gidduuttis argamuu danda’a.
translated: Yeroon saaxilamuu irraa kaasee hanga mallattoon mul’atutti yeroo baay’ee naannoo guyyaa shanii yoo ta’u garuu guyyaa lamaa hanga kudha afuriitti ta’uu danda’a.

sourceString: While the majority of cases result in mild symptoms, some progress to viral pneumonia and multi-organ failure.
targetString: Dhimmoonni hedduun bu’aa mallattoolee jalqabaa irratti kan beekaman ta’us, tokko tokko immoo adeemsa hanga michii sombaa vaayirasiittii fi miidhamuu qaamota hedduutti deemu.
translated: Namoonni baay’een isaanii mallattoolee salphaa kan fidan yoo ta’u, tokko tokko gara dhukkuba sombaa vaayirasii fi kufaatii qaamolee hedduutti guddatu.

sourceString: As of 17 April 2020, more than 2.24 million cases have been reported across 210 countries and territories, resulting in more than 153,000 deaths.
targetString: Ebla 17, 2020 irraa eegalee, biyyootaafi daangaawwan 210 keessatti namoonni miliyoona 2.24 ol qabamuudhaan namoonni 153,000 ol immoo du’uun isaanii gabaafameera.
translated: Hanga Ebla 17 bara 2020tti biyyootaa fi naannolee 210 keessatti namoota miiliyoona 2.24 ol vaayirasichaan qabamuun lubbuu namoota 153,000 ol darbeera.

sourceString: More than 568,000 people have recovered.The virus is primarily spread between people during close contact, often via small droplets produced by coughing, sneezing, or talking.
targetString: Namoonni 568,000 ol dhukkubarraa fayyaniiru. Vaayirasichi irra guddinaan yeroo namoonni wal tuttuqan, yeroo hedduu karaa copha xixiqqoo qufa’uu, haxxiffachuu yookaan dubbachuudhaan uumamaniin namaa namatti darba.
translated: Namoonni 568,000 ol bayyanataniiru.Vaayirasiin kun adda durummaan namoota gidduutti yeroo walitti dhiyeenyaan wal qunnaman gidduutti kan babal’atu yoo ta’u, yeroo baay’ee karaa copha xixiqqaa qufaa, haxxiffannaa ykn haasa’uudhaan uumamu.

sourceString: While these droplets are produced when breathing out, they usually fall to the ground or onto surfaces rather than being infectious over long distances.
targetString: Coboonni kunniin yeroo hafuura baafatan kan ba’an utuma ta’ee jiruu, fageenyarratti nama faaluu mannaa yeroo baay’ee lafatti yookaan qaama wantootaarratti coccobu.
translated: Cophni kun yeroo hafuura baafatan kan uumaman yoo ta’u, yeroo baay’ee fageenya dheeraa irratti daddarboo ta’uu mannaa lafatti ykn lafa irratti kufa.

sourceString: People may also become infected by touching a contaminated surface and then touching their eyes, nose, or mouth.
targetString: Qaama wanta faalamee tuqanii, sana booda ija, funyaan yookaan afaan isaanii tuquudhaan namoonni dhukkubichaan qabamuu danda’u.
translated: Namoonni bakka faalame tuquudhaan booda ija, hidhii ykn afaan isaanii tuquudhaanis dhukkubichaan qabamuu dandaʼu.

sourceString: The virus can survive on surfaces up to 72 hours.
targetString: Vaayirasiin fuula wantoota irra sa’aatii 72f turuu danda’a.
translated: Vaayirasichi hanga sa'aatii 72tti lafa irratti jiraachuu danda'a.

sourceString: It is most contagious during the first three days after the onset of symptoms, although spread may be possible before symptoms appear and in later stages of the disease.The standard method of diagnosis is by real-time reverse transcription polymerase chain reaction (rRT-PCR) from a nasopharyngeal swab.
targetString: Mallattoon jalqabee guyyaa sadan jalqabaa keessatti yeroo biraa caalaa baay’ee daddarba, mallattoon utuu hin eegalin duraafi sadarkaalee dhumaa dhukkubichaatti daddarbuu haa danda’u iyyuu malee. Tooftaan qorannaa mallattoolee inni fudhatama qabu eenzaayimiin walitti dhufu wanta inni agarsiisu yeroo inni raawwachaa jirutti jiidha harsasseedhaa hanga laagaatti jiru keessaa fuudhanii kallattii isaa duubatti deebisanii ilaaluudhaan (rRT-PCR) raawwatama.
translated: Mallattoon kun erga mul’atee booda guyyoota sadan jalqabaa keessatti baay’ee kan daddarbu yoo ta’u, mallattoon dhukkubaa osoo hin mul’atin dura fi sadarkaa dhukkubichaa isa boodaatti babal’achuun ni danda’ama.Malli adda baasuu istaandaardii yeroo dhugaa (reverse transcription polymerase chain reaction) (rRT-PCR) dha ) kan jedhamu kan nasopharyngeal swab irraa argamu.

sourceString: The use of masks is recommended for those who suspect they have the virus and their caregivers.
targetString: Itti fayyadamni aguugduu afaanii fi funyaanii namoota vaayiresicha qabaachuu isaanii of shakkaniifi namoota isaan kunuunsaniif akka godhatan gorfama.
translated: Namoota vaayirasicha qaba jedhanii shakkanii fi kunuunsitoota isaaniif haguuggii fuulaa fayyadamuun ni gorfama.

sourceString: Recommendations for mask use by the general public vary, with some authorities recommending against their use, some recommending their use, and others requiring their use.
targetString: Akkaataan ajaja itti fayyadama uwwistuu fuulaa hoggantoota biratti garaagarummaa qaba, abbootiin aangoo tokko tokko akka itti hin fayyadamne dhaamu, kuun immoo akka itti fayyadamamu dhaamu.
translated: Yaadni itti fayyadama haguuggii fuulaa ummanni bal’aan kennamu garaagarummaa kan qabu yoo ta’u, aanga’oonni tokko tokko akka itti hin fayyadamne, kaan akka hin fayyadamne kan gorsan yoo ta’u, kaan immoo itti fayyadama isaanii kan barbaadan ta’uu ibsameera.

sourceString: Currently, there is no vaccine or specific antiviral treatment for COVID-19.
targetString: Yeroo Ammaa, talaallin yookiin yaalli farra vaayirasii COVID-19’f kennamu hin jiru.
translated: Yeroo ammaa kana talaalliin ykn yaaliin farra vaayirasii addaa COVID-19 hin jiru.

sourceString: Local transmission of the disease has been recorded in most countries across all six WHO regions.
targetString: Daddarbuun dhukkubichaa kan naannoo keessaa naannolee Dhaabbata Fayyaa Addunyaa jahan keessatti biyyoota harka caalan keessatti mul’atee jira.
translated: Naannolee WHO ja'an hunda keessatti biyyoota irra caalaan dhukkubichaa daddarbiinsa naannootti galmaa'eera.

sourceString: Those infected with the virus may be asymptomatic or develop flu-like symptoms such as fever, cough, fatigue, and shortness of breath.
targetString: Namoonni vaayirasichaan qabaman mallattoo agarsiisuu dhabuu danda’u yookaan mallattoolee akka infuluweentaa fi hoo’a qaamaa, qufa’uu, miira dadhabbii agarsiisuu, harganuu dadhabuu agarsiisuu malu.
translated: Namoonni vaayirasichaan qabaman mallattoo dhukkuba kanaa kan hin agarsiifne yookiin mallattoolee dhukkuba infuleenzaa fakkaatan kan akka ho’a qaamaa, qufaa, dadhabbii, afuura kutuu qabaachuu danda’u.

sourceString: Emergency symptoms include difficulty breathing, persistent chest pain or pressure, confusion, difficulty waking, and bluish face or lips; immediate medical attention is advised if these symptoms are present.
targetString: Mallattooleen yeroo muddamaa kanneen akka hafuura baafachuuf rakkachuu, dhukkubbii yookaan ukkaamsuu laphee keessaa, joonjee, deemuu dadhabuu fi fuula yookaan hidhiin gurraacha’uu; mallattooleen kunniin yoo jiraatan tajaajila mana yaalaa atattamaa argachuutu gorfama.
translated: Mallattoowwan hatattamaa hafuura baafachuu dadhabuu, dhukkubbii ykn dhiibbaa garaa itti fufiinsa qabu, burjaajii, dammaquuf rakkachuu fi fuula ykn funyaan diimaa ta’uu; mallattoon kun yoo mul’ate hatattamaan yaala fayyaa kennuu ni gorfama.

sourceString: Less commonly, upper respiratory symptoms such as sneezing, runny nose or sore throat may be seen.
targetString: Haala hin baratamneen mallattooleen qaamota hargansuu olaanoo kanneen akka haxxifachuu, dhangala’aan funyaaniin bahuu yookaan dhukkubuun kokkee mul’achuu danda’a.
translated: Yeroo baay’ee hin mul’anne mallattoon sirna hargansuu gubbaa kan akka haxxiffannaa, hidhii dhangala’uu ykn dhukkubbii qoonqoo mul’achuu danda’a.

sourceString: Gastrointestinal symptoms such as nausea, vomiting and diarrhoea have been observed in varying percentages.
targetString: Mallattoo dhukkubbii mar’imaanii fi garaa kanneen akka oldeebi’uu, hooqqisuu fi garaa kaasaa parsanteejii garaagaraa irratti argamu.
translated: Mallattoowwan garaachaa kanneen akka garaa kaasaa, garaa kaasaa fi garaachaa dhibbeentaa adda addaatiin mul’ataniiru.

sourceString: Some cases in China initially presented only with chest tightness and palpitations.
targetString: Chaayinaatti dhukkubsattoonni muraasni jalqabarratti miidhaa ceekuu fi onnee keessa qofaan dhiyaatan.
translated: Chaayinaa keessatti namoonni tokko tokko jalqaba irratti garaa isaanii dhiphachuu fi dha'annaa onnee qofaan kan dhiyaatan turan.

sourceString: In some, the disease may progress to pneumonia, multi-organ failure, and death.
targetString: Garii keessatti dhukkubichi gara daranyoo sombaatti, hojii dhaabuu buusaawwan qaamaatti, akkasumas du’atti guddachuu mala.
translated: Tokko tokko irratti dhukkubni kun gara dhukkuba sombaa, qaamolee hedduu dadhabuu fi du’aatti guddachuu danda’a.

sourceString: This is called the incubation period.
targetString: Kun yeroo itti dhukkubi mallattoo utuu hin agarsiisin turudha.
translated: Kunis yeroo inkuubeshinii jedhama.

sourceString: The incubation period for COVID-19 is typically five to six days but may range from two to 14 days.
targetString: Yeroon riphuu mallattoolee COVID-19 yeroo hedduu guyyoota shanii hanga jahaattidha, garuu guyyaa lamaa hanga 14 gidduutti ta’uu mala.
translated: Yeroon inkuubeshinii COVID-19 akkaataa idileetti guyyoota shanii hanga jahaa ta’us guyyaa lamaa hanga 14 ta’uu danda’a.

sourceString: 97.5% of people who develop symptoms will do so within 11.5 days of infection.Reports indicate that not all who are infected develop symptoms.
targetString: Namoota mallattoolee agarsiisan keessaa dhibbeentaan 97.5 faalama guyyoota 11.5 keessatti mallattoo agarsiisu. Gabaasonni akka agarsiisanitti mallattoo kan agarsiisan namoota qabaman hunda miti.
translated: Namoota mallattoon dhukkuba kanaa mul’atan keessaa %97.5 erga vaayirasichaan qabamaniin booda guyyoota 11.5 keessatti ni raawwatu.Namoonni vaayirasichaan qabaman hundi mallattoo akka hin mul’anne gabaasni ni mul’isa.

sourceString: The role of these asymptomatic carriers in transmission is not yet fully known; however, preliminary evidence suggests that they may contribute to the spread of the disease.
targetString: Namoonni mallattoolee hin mul’anne baatan kunniin ga’een isaan daddabarsuu keessatti qaban hanga ammaatti guutummaatti hin beekamne; haa ta’u malee, ragaan iddoo hin geenye akka agarsiisutti namoonni kun dhukkubicha daddabarsuu keessatti ga’ee qabaachuu malu.
translated: Gaheen namoota mallattoo hin qabne kanaa daddarbiinsa keessatti qaban ammallee guutummaatti hin beekamne; haa ta’u malee, babal’ina dhibee kanaaf gumaacha taasisuu akka danda’an ragaaleen duraa ni mul’isu.

sourceString: The proportion of infected people who do not display symptoms is currently unknown and being studied, with the Korea Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (KCDC) reporting that 20% of all confirmed cases remained asymptomatic during their hospital stay.
targetString: Haalli namoota faalamanii garuu mallattoo hin agarsiifnee qoratamee hanga ammaatti hin beekamne. Akka qorannoo Korea Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (KCDC) gabaasetti namoota qabaman keessaa 20% yeroo hospitaala turanitti mallattoo hin agarsiisa.
translated: Yeroo ammaa kana hammi namoota vaayirasichaan qabaman kan mallattoo hin agarsiifne kan hin beekamnee fi qoratamaa kan jiru yoo ta’u, Giddu-galli To’annoo fi Ittisa Dhukkubaa Kooriyaa (KCDC) akka gabaasetti, namoota vaayirasichaan qabaman hunda keessaa %20 yeroo hospitaala turanitti mallattoo tokko malee hafaniiru.

sourceString: China's National Health Commission began including asymptomatic cases in its daily cases on 1 April; of the 166 infections on that day, 130 (78%) were asymptomatic at the time of testing.
targetString: Akka Koomishiiniin Fayyaa Biyyaalessaa Chaayinaa ebla 1tti guyyaa guyyaan namoota mallattoota hin agarsiisin dabalatee guyyaa sana kanneen turan dhukkubsattoota 166 keessaa 130(78%) yeroo qorannaatti mallattoo hin agarsiisan.
translated: Komishiniin Fayyaa Biyyaalessaa Chaayinaa namoota mallattoo hin qabne guyyaa guyyaan qabaman keessatti hammachuu kan jalqabe Ebla 1; guyyaa sana namoota dhukkuba kanaan qabaman 166 keessaa 130 (%78) yeroo qorannoon taasifamanitti mallattoo dhukkuba kanaa kan hin agarsiifne ta’uu ibsameera.

sourceString: Both sputum and saliva can carry large viral loads.
targetString: Aakkee fi hancufnis hamma vaayirasii guddaa baachuu danda’a.
translated: Hafni fi haxxiffannaa lamaan isaanii iyyuu fe’iinsa vaayirasii guddaa baachuu danda’u.

sourceString: Loud talking releases more droplets than normal talking.
targetString: Sagalee olkaasanii dubbachuun suuta dubbachuu caalaa copha akka baafnu ni saaxila.
translated: Sagalee guddaa dubbachuun haasa'uu idilee caalaa copha baay'ee gadhiisa.

sourceString: A study in Singapore found that an uncovered cough can lead to droplets travelling up to 4.5 meters (15 feet).
targetString: Akka qorannoon biyya Singaapoor argatetti afaan keenya osoo hin haguugun qufa’uun cophni qaama keenya keessaa bahu hanga meetira 4.5 (faana 15) deemuu akka deemu taasisa.
translated: Qorannoon Singaapoor keessatti gaggeeffame akka agarsiisutti qufaa hin haguugamne cophni hanga meetira 4.5 (15 feet) akka imalu taasisuu danda'a.

sourceString: Though the virus is not generally airborne, the National Academy of Science has suggested that bioaerosol transmission may be possible and air collectors positioned in the hallway outside of people's rooms yielded samples positive for viral RNA.
targetString: Vaayirasichi guutumatti kan qilleensaan daddarbu ta’uu dhabaatus akkaadaamiin saayinsii biyyaalessa baayooerosoliin daddarbuu akka danda’u akeeka. Kanaaf meeshaaleen qilleensa sassaaban kutaalee namootaa irraa gara alaatti akka naanna’an ta’uu qaba.
translated: Vaayirasichi akka waliigalaatti qilleensarra kan hin jirre ta'us, Akkaadaamiin Saayinsii Biyyaalessaa daddarbiinsa baayoo-eeroosoolii ta'uu akka danda'u yaada dhiheessee fi walitti qabatoonni qilleensaa kutaa namootaatiin alatti daandiin keessa kaa'aman saamuda RNA vaayirasii qabaachuu danda'u argamsiiseera.

sourceString: Some medical procedures such as intubation and cardiopulmonary resuscitation (CPR) may cause respiratory secretions to be aerosolised and thus result in airborne spread.
targetString: Adeemsi yaalii tokko tokko, kanneen akka ujummoo seensisuutiifi onneefi somba hojiitti deebisuun (CPR) dhangala’aan qilleensaan akka yaa’u waan taasisa, kanarraa kan ka’e akka inni qilleensaan faffaca’u taasisa.
translated: Hojimaatni yaalaa tokko tokko kan akka intubation fi cardiopulmonary resuscitation (CPR) dhangala’aan sirna hargansuu akka aerosolized ta’ee fi kanaan qilleensa keessaa akka babal’atu gochuu danda’a.

sourceString: While there are concerns it may spread via feces, this risk is believed to be low.The virus is most contagious when people are symptomatic; while spread may be possible before symptoms emerge, the risk is low.
targetString: Yeroo xuraawaa qaama keessaa ba’uun ni daddarba jedhamee shakkamutti balaan kun gadi bu’aadha jedhamee amanama. Vaayirasichi yeroo namoonni qabaman mallattoo agarsiisuutti ce’an sadarkaa olaanaan daddarba; osoo mallattoo agarsiisuu hin eegalinis daddarbuun akkuma jirutti ta’ee, balaan isaa garuu gadi bu’aadha.
translated: Karaa manca’aa babal’achuu akka danda’u yaaddoon jiraatus, balaan kun gadi aanaa ta’uu ni amanama.Vaayirasiin kun baay’ee kan daddarbu yeroo namoonni mallattoo dhukkuba kanaa agarsiisan; mallattoon dhukkubaa osoo hin mul’atin babal’achuun kan danda’amu yoo ta’u, balaan isaas xiqqaadha.

sourceString: The European Centre for Disease Prevention and Control (ECDC) says while it is not entirely clear how easily the disease spreads, one person generally infects two to three others.The virus survives for hours to days on surfaces.
targetString: Wiirtuun Ittisaa fi To’annaa Dhukkubaa Awurooppaa (ECDC), dhukkubichi salphaatti akkaataa inni itti daddarbu guuutummaan guutuutti ifa yoo ta’uu baate illee, namni tokko waliigalaan nama tokkoo hanga lamaa ni faala jedha. Vaayirasichi qaama wantootaa irra sa’atiiwwan hedduudhaa hanga guyyoota hedduutti tura.
translated: Giddu-galli Ittisaa fi To'annoo Dhukkuboota Awurooppaa (ECDC) akka jedhutti dhibeen kun hammam akka salphaatti akka babal'atu guutummaatti ifa ta'uu baatus, walumaa galatti namni tokko namoota lamaa hanga sadii qaba.

sourceString: Specifically, the virus was found to be detectable for one day on cardboard, for up to three days on plastic (polypropylene) and stainless steel (AISI 304), and for up to four hours on 99% copper.
targetString: Keessattuu muka irra guyyaa tokkoof tura, pilaastikii (pooliipiroopiliin) irraa fi sibiila (AISI 304) irra guyyaa sadiif tura, wantoota 99% koopparii ta’an irra sa’aatii afur tura.
translated: Addatti ammoo vaayirasichi kaartoonii irratti guyyaa tokkoof, pilaastikii (polypropylene) fi sibiilli hin goggogne (AISI 304) irratti hanga guyyaa sadii, sibiila diimaa %99 irratti ammoo hanga sa'aatii afuriif adda baafamuu danda'uun isaa argameera.

sourceString: This, however, varies depending on the humidity and temperature.
targetString: Haa ta’u malee, kun jiidhinaa fi ho’a qaamaa irratti hundaa’uudhaan garaa gara ta’a.
translated: Kun garuu jiidhina fi ho’a irratti hundaa’uun garaagarummaa qaba.

sourceString: Soap and detergent are also effective if correctly used; soap products degrade the virus' fatty protective layer, deactivating it, as well as freeing them from skin and other surfaces.
targetString: Saamunaafi qulqulleessituunif yoo sirriitti itti fayyadamne bu’aa qabu; oomishni saamunaa qaama itttisaa furdaa vaayirasii hir’isa, ni ciicessa, akkasumas gogaa fi qaamota biro irraa balleessa.
translated: Saamunaa fi saamunaan yoo sirritti itti fayyadamanis bu’a qabeessa; oomishaaleen saamunaa vaayirasicha cooma ittisu mancaasu, hojii irraa akka hin hojjenne gochuu, akkasumas gogaa fi wantoota biroo irraa bilisa taasisu.

sourceString: Other solutions, such as benzalkonium chloride and chlorhexidine gluconate (a surgical disinfectant), are less effective.In a Hong Kong study, saliva samples were taken a median of two days after the start of hospitalization.
targetString: Furmaanni biraa kanneen akka benzaankooniyem kiloorayid fi kilorheksaadiin giluukoneet (baqaqsanii waldhaanuu) bu’aa gadi aanaa qabu. Qo’annoo Hoongi Koongi keessatti erga gara hospitaalaa dhufanii booda guyyoota lama gidduutti hancufni fudhatama.
translated: Furmaatni biroo kan akka benzalkonium chloride fi chlorhexidine gluconate (farra vaayirasii baqaqsanii hodhuu) bu’a qabeessa miti.Qorannoo Hong Kong keessatti saamuda haxxiffannaa hospitaala ciisuu erga jalqabanii booda giddu galeessaan guyyaa lamaa fudhatameera.

sourceString: In five of six patients, the first sample showed the highest viral load, and the sixth patient showed the highest viral load on the second day tested.
targetString: Dhukkubsattoota jaha keessaa shan, saamuudi duraa baay’ina vaayirasii hundaan ol guddatu agarsiisan, dhukkubsataa jahaffaan immoo guyyaa lammaffaa qoratametti baay’ina vaayirasii hunda caalu agarsiise.
translated: Dhukkubsattoota ja’a keessaa shan irratti saamuda jalqabaa fe’iinsa vaayirasii olaanaa kan agarsiise yoo ta’u, dhukkubsataan ja’affaan ammoo guyyaa lammaffaa qoratame irratti fe’iinsa vaayirasii olaanaa agarsiiseera.

sourceString: Severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2) is a novel severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus, first isolated from three people with pneumonia connected to the cluster of acute respiratory illness cases in Wuhan.
targetString: Severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2)’n haarawa. Jalqaba namoota sadii niimooniyaa qabanii fi dhukkubichi qaama hargansuu miidhe kanneen Wuhan keessatti argaman irraa adda baafame.
translated: Severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2) koronaavaayirasii asoosama severe acute respiratory syndrome yoo ta’u, jalqaba namoota dhukkuba sombaa qaban sadii kanneen kilaastara dhukkuba sirna hargansuu cimaa Wuhaan keessatti qabaman waliin walqabate irraa adda baafame.

sourceString: All features of the novel SARS-CoV-2 virus occur in related coronaviruses in nature.
targetString: Amaloonni vaayirasiin novel SARS-CoV-2’n qabu vaayirasii koroonaa walitti dhiheenya qaban keessatti uumamaan ni argama.
translated: Amaloonni vaayirasii asoosama SARS-CoV-2 hunduu uumamaan vaayirasii koroonaa walqabatan keessatti mul'atu.

sourceString: Outside the human body, the virus is killed by household soap, which bursts its protective bubble.SARS-CoV-2 is closely related to the original SARS-CoV.
targetString: Qaama namatiin ala, vaayirasichi saamuna mana keessatti argamuun du’e, qaama ittisa isaa irraa balleessudhaan. SARS-CoV-2 isa jalqabaa SARS-CoV’tti dhihaata.
translated: Qaama namaatiin alatti vaayirasichi saamunaa mana keessaatiin kan ajjeefamu yoo ta’u, kunis bubbee ittisaa isaa dhoo’a.SARS-CoV-2 SARS-CoV isa jalqabaa wajjin walitti dhiyeenyaan kan walqabatudha.

sourceString: The lungs are the organs most affected by COVID-19 because the virus accesses host cells via the enzyme angiotensin-converting enzyme 2 (ACE2), which is most abundant in the type II alveolar cells of the lungs.
targetString: Sombi qaama COVID-19’dhaan hedduu miidhamuudha. Sababni isaa vaayirasichi karaa inzaayimiitiin angiotensin-converting enzyme 2 (ACE2) isa somba keessatti murteessaa ta’e argata.
translated: Somba qaamolee COVID-19n baay’ee miidhaman waan ta’eef vaayirasichi karaa inzaayimii angiotensin-converting enzyme 2 (ACE2) kan seelii alveolar gosa II sombaa keessatti baay’inaan argamuun seelii keessummeessituu dhaqqaba.

sourceString: The virus uses a special surface glycoprotein called a "spike" (peplomer) to connect to ACE2 and enter the host cell.
targetString: Vaayirasichi gilaayikoopirootiinii irra keessaa adda ta’e, kan “ispaayikii” jedhamuun beekamu (peepiloomarii) fayyadamuun ACE2 tti maxxanee seelii keessa jiraatu sana seena.
translated: Vaayirasiin kun ACE2 waliin walqabsiisee seelii keessummeessituu seenuuf gilaayikoopirootiinii addaa fuula irraa "spike" (peplomer) jedhamu fayyadama.

sourceString: Acute cardiac injury was found in 12% of infected people admitted in hospital in Wuhan, China, and is more frequent in severe disease.
targetString: Namoota dhukkubsatanii hospitaala Wuhan, Chaayinaa turan keessaa 12% miidhaa onnee cimaa qabu, inni kun immoo namoota dhukkubni itti cime biratti baratamaadha.
translated: Miidhaan onnee cimaan namoota vaayirasichaan qabaman keessaa %12 Chaayinaa Wuhaan keessatti hospitaala seenan irratti kan argame yoo ta'u, dhukkuba cimaa keessatti baay'inaan mul'ata.

sourceString: Rates of cardiovascular symptoms is high, owing to the systemic inflammatory response and immune system disorders during disease progression, but acute myocardial injury may also be related to ACE2 receptors in the heart.
targetString: Qaamni namaa dheekkamuu fi yeroo dhukkubichi ammaachaa deemutti malli dhukkuba ittisuu qaamaa waan toora irraa kaatuuf saffisi mallattoolee onneefi hidda dhiigaatiin walqabatan agarsiisuu guddaadha, garuu miidhaa cimaan onnee riseeptaroota ACE2 onnee keessaa waliin walitti hidhachuu malu.
translated: Saffisni mallattoolee onnee fi ujummoolee dhiigaa ol’aanaadha, sababa deebii inflammatory sirnaa fi jeequmsa sirna ittisa qaamaatiin yeroo dhukkubni kun guddatu, garuu miidhaan maayookaardiyaa cimaan fudhatoota ACE2 onnee keessatti argamaniin walqabatees ta’uu danda’a.

sourceString: ACE2 receptors are highly expressed in the heart and are involved in heart function.
targetString: Riseeptaroonni ACE2 onnee keessatti guddisanii mul’atu, hojjechuu onnee keessatti himaatus.
translated: Fudhatootni ACE2 onnee keessatti baay’ee kan ibsaman yoo ta’u, hojii onnee keessatti hirmaatu.

sourceString: A high incidence of thrombosis (31%) and venous thromboembolism (25%) have been found in ICU patients with COVID-19 infections and may be related to poor prognosis.Autopsies of people who died of COVID-19 have found diffuse alveolar damage (DAD), and lymphocyte-containing inflammatory infiltrates within the lung.
targetString: Carraan olaanaan tirombosis (31%) fi tirombomboliisim (25%) dhukkubsataa yaala fayyaa addaa fayyadamu keessatti dhukkuba COVID-19 wajjiin argamu fi tilmaama faallaas ta’uu danda’a. qorannaan reeffa namoota COVID-19’tiin du’anii diffuse alveolar damage (DAD)’n argate, fi liimfosaayitii rifachiisaa somba keessa seenu qabaachuu danda’a.
translated: Dhukkubsattoota ICU dhukkuba COVID-19 qaban irratti thrombosis (%31) fi venous thromboembolism (%25) ol’aanaa ta’uun kan argame yoo ta’u, raaga gaarii dhabuu wajjin kan walqabatu ta’uu mala.Autopsies of people who died of COVID-19 have found diffuse alveolar damage ( DAD), fi limfoosaayitii of keessaa qabu inflammatory infiltrates somba keessaa.

sourceString: Although SARS-COV-2 has a tropism for ACE2-expressing epithelial cells of the respiratory tract, patients with severe COVID-19 have symptoms of systemic hyperinflammation.
targetString: SARS-COV-2’dhaaf ACE2’n jiraatus seelii hargansuu epiteelii walqabatee namoonni COVID-19’n hedduu miidhaman mallattoo haayperinfilaameeshin agarsiisu.
translated: SARS-COV-2 ACE2-expressing epithelial cells of the respiratory cells tropism qabaatus, dhukkubsattoonni COVID-19 hamaa qaban mallattoolee systemic hyperinflammation qabu.

sourceString: In particular, pathogenic GM-CSF-secreting T-cells were shown to correlate with the recruitment of inflammatory IL-6-secreting monocytes and severe lung pathology in COVID-19 patients.
targetString: Keessumaa, T-seeliiwwan dhukkuba fidan, kanneen GM-CSF maddisiisan, filannoo moonoosaayitoota dheekkamoo IL-6 maddisiisanii fi mallattoolee dhibee sombaa hamaa dhukkubsattoota COVID-19 irratti mul’atu waliin walirra bu’uun isaa agarsiifameera.
translated: Keessattuu, seelonni T GM-CSF-secreting pathogenic dhukkubsattoota COVID-19 keessatti qacarrii inflammatory IL-6-secreting monocytes fi paatolojii sombaa hamaa waliin walqabatee akka jiru agarsiifameera.

sourceString: Lymphocytic infiltrates have also been reported at autopsy.
targetString: Dhangala’aa seelii adii baatu keessa seenamuun illee qorannoo reeffarratti godhameen gabaafameera.
translated: Qorannoon reeffaa irrattis limfoosaayitii seenuun gabaafameera.

sourceString: The WHO has published several testing protocols for the disease.
targetString: WHO’n adeemsa qorannaa dhukkubichaa hedduu qopheessee jira.
translated: WHOn pirootokoolii qorannoo dhibee kanaa hedduu maxxanseera.

sourceString: The standard method of testing is real-time reverse transcription polymerase chain reaction (rRT-PCR).
targetString: Tooftaan qorannaa inni fudhatama qabu eenzaayimiin walitti dhufu wanta inni agarsiisu yeroo inni raawwachaa jirutti kallattii isaa duubatti deebisanii ilaaluudhaan (rRT-PCR) raawwatama.
translated: Malli qorannoo istaandardiin yeroo dhugaa (reverse transcription polymerase polymerase chain reaction) (rRT-PCR) dha.

sourceString: The test is typically done on respiratory samples obtained by a nasopharyngeal swab; however, a nasal swab or sputum sample may also be used.
targetString: Qorannichi addatti kan gaggeeffame fudhannaa hargansuu funyaan keessaa argameeni; ta’us, haxxaawwii funyaanii yookaan fudhannaa dhangala’aa sombarraa argamu fayyadamuu ni danda’ama.
translated: Qorannoon kun akkaataa idileetti saamuda sirna hargansuu kan nasopharyngeal swab jedhamu irraa argame irratti; haa ta’u malee, saamuda hidhii ykn saamuda fincaanis fayyadamuun ni danda’ama.

sourceString: Results are generally available within a few hours to two days.
targetString: Firiin kan beekamu sa’aatii muraasaa hanga guyyaa lamaatti.
translated: Bu’aan akka waliigalaatti sa’aatii muraasaa hanga guyyaa lamaa keessatti argama.

sourceString: Blood tests can be used, but these require two blood samples taken two weeks apart and the results have little immediate value.
targetString: Qorannoowwan dhiigaatti fayyadamuun ni danda’ama, garuu saamuuda dhiigaa lama, kan torban lama walirraa fageessuun fuudhamu barbaadu, bu’aan isaanii ammoo bu’aa hatattamaa xiqqoo qabu.
translated: Qorannoo dhiigaa fayyadamuun ni danda'ama, garuu kunniin saamuda dhiigaa lama torban lama addaan baafamanii fudhatamuu kan barbaadan yoo ta'u bu'aan isaas gatii battalaa xiqqaa qaba.

sourceString: Chinese scientists were able to isolate a strain of the coronavirus and publish the genetic sequence so laboratories across the world could independently develop polymerase chain reaction (PCR) tests to detect infection by the virus.
targetString: Laabiraatooriiwwan guutummaa addunyaa kanaa faalama faayirasii kanaa ittiin adda baasuuf dhuunfaa isaaniitti eenzaayimiiwwan walitti dhufan maal akka uuman (PRC) qorannoo adda baasu akka hojjetaniif saayintistoonni Chaayinaa akaakuu vaayirasii koroonaa tokko adda baasanii wal duraa duuba jiinii isaa maxxansuu danda’anii turan.
translated: Saayintistoonni Chaayinaa gosa vaayirasii koroonaa adda baasuun tartiiba jeneetikii maxxansuun laaboraatooriiwwan guutuu addunyaa of danda’anii qorannoo poliimeereezii chain reaction (PCR) qopheessuun vaayirasichaan qabamuu adda baasuu danda’aniiru.

sourceString: As of 4 April 2020, antibody tests (which may detect active infections and whether a person had been infected in the past) were in development, but not yet widely used.
targetString: Ebla 4, 2020 irraa eegalee, qorannoowwan antiiboodii (warri dhukkuboota haaraa adda baasuu malanii fi namni tokko duraan qabamuufi dhiisuu isaa adda baasan) qopheeffamaa turan, garuu hanga ammaatti bal’inaan dhimma itti hinba’amne.
translated: Ebla 4 bara 2020 irraa eegalee qorannoon farra qaamaa (kan infekshinii sochiirra jiru adda baasuu danda'uu fi namni tokko kanaan dura vaayirasichaan qabamuu fi dhiisuu isaa) hojjetamaa ture, garuu hanga ammaatti bal'inaan itti hin fayyadamne.

sourceString: The Chinese experience with testing has shown the accuracy is only 60 to 70%.
targetString: Muuxannoon warri Chaayinaa qorannoo irratti qaban sirrummaan isaa dhibbeentaa 60 hanga 70 qofa ta’uu agarsiisee jira.
translated: Muuxannoon Chaayinaa qorannoo irratti qabdu sirrummaan isaa %60 hanga 70 qofa akka ta'e agarsiiseera.

sourceString: The FDA in the United States approved the first point-of-care test on 21 March 2020 for use at the end of that month.Diagnostic guidelines released by Zhongnan Hospital of Wuhan University suggested methods for detecting infections based upon clinical features and epidemiological risk.
targetString: Dhaabbati Qorichaa Federaalaa Yuunaayitid Isteetsi keessaa Bitootessa 21, 2020 qorannoon bakkee itti kunuunfamanittii inni jalqabaa dhuma ji’ichaatti akka tajaajila eegaluuf mirkaneesse. Qajeelafamoonni qorannaa mallattoolee Hospitaala Dzoonginaan Yuunivarsitii Wuhaaniin gadhiifame amaloota dhukkubaa fi balaawwan aramuufi daddarba dhukkubaa akka malawwan faalama ittiin adda baafachuun danda’amuutti yaada dhiyeesse.
translated: FDAn Ameerikaatti qorannoo qabxii kunuunsaa jalqabaa dhuma baatii sanaatti akka itti fayyadamuuf Amajjii 21 bara 2020 raggaasiseera.Qajeelfamni adda baasuu Hospitaala Zhongnan Yuunivarsiitii Wuhaan baase malawwan infekshinii adda baasuuf malawwan amala kilinikaa fi balaa weeraraa irratti hundaa’uun yaada dhiheesse.

sourceString: Bilateral multilobar ground-glass opacities with a peripheral, asymmetric and posterior distribution are common in early infection.
targetString: Fuullee-lafarraa lamee multibolar fi wantoota barbaachisoo walhinfakkaanne ta’an raabsuun wantoota faalama jalqabaa fidaniidha.
translated: Bilateral multilobar ground-glass opacities kan raabsa naannoo, asymmetric fi posterior qabu infekshinii jalqabaa keessatti baay’inaan mul’ata.

sourceString: Subpleural dominance, crazy paving (lobular septal thickening with variable alveolar filling), and consolidation may appear as the disease progresses.
targetString: Golga sombaatiin haguugamuu, qaawwa hamaa saaquu (alveelarii guutudhaan ispeectamii dhiphisuu), akkasumas akkuma dhukkubni dabalaa deemuun ciminni mul’achuu danda’a.
translated: Subpleural dominance, crazy paving (lobular septal thickening with variable alveolar filling), fi consolidation akkuma dhukkubni kun itti fufetti mul’achuu danda’a.

sourceString: Few data are available about microscopic lesions and the pathophysiology of COVID-19.
targetString: Guyyoonni murtaa’aniin waa’een madaa xiqqoo fi daddarbiinsa COVID-19 argamuu mala.
translated: Waa'ee madaa maaykirooskoopii fi paatofiiziyoloojii COVID-19 irratti ragaan jiru muraasni.

sourceString: The main pathological findings at autopsy are:
targetString: Qorannoo dhibeewwanii warra du’an irratti taasifame argannoowwan isaa guddaan isaan kana:
translated: Argannoowwan paatolojii ijoo qorannoo reeffaa irratti argaman:

sourceString: Macroscopy: pleurisy, pericarditis, lung consolidation and pulmonary oedema
targetString: Maaykirooskooppiin: hubamuu golga sombaa, jajjabaachuu sombaa fi babaldhachuu sombaa.
translated: Macroscopy: pleurisy, pericarditis, somba jabaachuu fi dhiita’uu sombaa

sourceString: Four types of severity of viral pneumonia can be observed:
targetString: Vaayirasiin michii sombaa cimaan akaakuu afurtu argame:
translated: Hamma dhukkuba sombaa vaayirasii gosa afur mul’achuu danda’a:

sourceString: mild pneumonia: pulmonary oedema, pneumocyte hyperplasia, large atypical pneumocytes, interstitial inflammation with lymphocytic infiltration and multinucleated giant cell formation
targetString: Niimooniyaa salphaa: dhiita’uu kalee, niimosaayit hayperpilashiyaa, niimoosaayit guddaa, tishuulee gidduutti dhiitofni uumamuu fi seeliin niwuukilasii hedduu qabu baay’ee guddaa ta’e uumamuu.
translated: dhukkuba sombaa salphaa: dhiita’uu sombaa, haayperpilaasiyaa sombaa, sombaa guddaa atypical, inflammation interstitial kan limfoosaayitii seenuu fi uumamuu seelii gurguddaa multinucleated

sourceString: severe pneumonia: diffuse alveolar damage (DAD) with diffuse alveolar exudates.
targetString: Daranyoo sombaa hamaa: miidhaa tatamsa’aa ujummoo qilleensaa xixiqqaa (DAD) dhimmisa ujummoo qilleensaa faffaca’aa wajjin.
translated: dhukkuba sombaa cimaa: miidhaa alveolar diffuse (DAD) kan diffuse alveolar exudates wajjin.

sourceString: DAD is the cause of acute respiratory distress syndrome (ARDS) and severe hypoxemia.
targetString: ‘DAD’ sababa mallattoo ukkaamfamuu hafuuraa hamaa (ARDS) fi hir’ina ooksijiinii dhiiga keessaa hamaati.
translated: DADn sababa dhiphina sirna hargansuu cimaa (ARDS) fi dhiibbaa dhiigaa cimaa (severe hypoxemia) ti.

sourceString: healing pneumonia: organisation of exudates in alveolar cavities and pulmonary interstitial fibrosis
targetString: Niimooniyaa dandammii: qindaa’ina dhuujummooafaan keessaa fi dhuujummoo onnee keessaa gudduu
translated: dhukkuba sombaa fayyisuu: gurmaa’ina exudates qaawwa alveolar fi pulmonary interstitial fibrosis keessatti

sourceString: Blood: disseminated intravascular coagulation (DIC); leukoerythroblastic reaction
targetString: Dhiiga: dhiigi faffaca’ee hidda dhiigaa keessatti kantaruu (DIC); luukoo’eeriitiroobilaastik ri’aakshinii
translated: Dhiiga: dhiiga ujummoolee dhiigaa keessaa babal’ate (DIC); walnyaatinsa leukoerythroblastic

sourceString: Preventive measures to reduce the chances of infection include staying at home, avoiding crowded places, washing hands with soap and water often and for at least 20 seconds, practising good respiratory hygiene and avoiding touching the eyes, nose or mouth with unwashed hands.
targetString: Carraa dhukkuba kanaan qabamuu hir’isuudhaaf tarkaanfiiwwan ittisaa mana keessa turuu, bakkee namni itti baay’atu irraa fagaachuu, irra deddeebiin harka saamuunaadhaafi bishaanii yoo xiqqaate sekoondii 20 f dhiqachuu, qulqullina hafuura baafannaa gaarii shaakaluu fi ija, funyaan, yookaan afaan keenya harka hindhiqamneen tuquu dhiisuufaa of keessatti qabata.
translated: Tarkaanfiiwwan ittisaa carraa dhukkuba kanaan qabamuu hir’isuuf fudhataman mana keessa turuu, bakka namoonni itti baay’atan irraa fagaachuu, yeroo baay’ee fi yoo xiqqaate sekondii 20f saamunaa fi bishaaniin harka dhiqachuu, qulqullina sirna hargansuu gaarii shaakaluu fi harka hin dhiqamin ija, hidhii ykn afaan tuquu irraa of qusachuu ni dabalata.

sourceString: The CDC recommends covering the mouth and nose with a tissue when coughing or sneezing and recommends using the inside of the elbow if no tissue is available.
targetString: CDC’n yeroo qufaanuu fi haxxifannu harkaa fi afaan keenya akka ciqilee harka keenyaatiin haguugnu dhaama.
translated: CDCn yeroo qufaa ykn haxxifannu afaanii fi hidhii tishuudhaan haguuggachuu kan gorsu yoo ta’u, yoo tishuun hin jirre keessa jilba fayyadamuu gorsa.

sourceString: Proper hand hygiene after any cough or sneeze is encouraged.
targetString: Qufaa yookaan haxxifuu kamuu booda qulqullina harkaa sirriin barbaachisaadha.
translated: Qufaa ykn haxxiffannaa kamiyyuu booda qulqullina harkaa sirrii ta’e gochuun ni jajjabeeffama.

sourceString: The CDC has recommended the use of cloth face coverings in public settings, in part to limit transmission by asymptomatic individuals.Social distancing strategies aim to reduce contact of infected persons with large groups by closing schools and workplaces, restricting travel and cancelling large public gatherings.
targetString: Namoota mallattoo hin agarsiifne irraa gara isa kaaniitti akka hin daddabarre CDC’n naannawa ummanni baay’inaan argamutti uffataan fuula haguuggachuu ajaja jira. Adeemsi addaan siiquu hawaasaa manneen barnootaa fi iddoo hojii cufuun, imala ugguruunii fi walitti qabama ummataa hir’isuun waltutuqqii nama dhibichaan qabamee fi hawaasa fayyaa gidduu jiru hir’isuuf kan kaayyeffateedha.
translated: CDCn bakka ummanni itti baay’atutti haguuggii fuula huccuu akka fayyadaman yaada dhiyeessee jira, kunis gartokkoon namoota mallattoo hin agarsiifneen daddarbiinsa daangessuuf.Tooftaaleen fageenya hawaasummaa manneen barnootaa fi bakka hojii cufuu, imala daangessuu fi walga’ii ummataa gurguddaa haquun tuttuqaa namoota vaayirasichaan qabaman garee gurguddaa waliin qaban hir’isuuf kaayyeffateera.

sourceString: Distancing guidelines also include that people stay at least 6 feet (1.8 m) apart.
targetString: Qajeelfamoonni wal irraa fagaachuu namoonni yoo xiqqaate fiitii 6 (meetira 1.8) ni dabalata.
translated: Qajeelfamni fageenyaa namoonni yoo xiqqaate meetira 1.8 akka addaan fagaatanis ni dabalata.

sourceString: There is no medication known to be effective at preventing COVID-19.As a vaccine is not expected until 2021 at the earliest, a key part of managing COVID-19 is trying to decrease the epidemic peak, known as "flattening the curve".
targetString: COVID-19 ittisuuf qorichi bu’a-qabeessa ta’uun isaa beekame hinjiru. Yoo baay’ee dhiyaate hanga 2021 tti talaalliin waan hin yaadamneef to’annaa COVID-19 tiif furtuu kan ta’an keessaa tokko bal’ina weerarichaa, isa “adeemsa achii olii dalga galchuu” jedhu hir’isuuf yaaluudha.
translated: Qorichi COVID-19 ittisuuf bu'a qabeessa ta'uun isaa beekamu hin jiru.Talaalliin yeroo jalqabaaf hanga bara 2021tti waan hin eegamneef, COVID-19 to'achuuf qaamni ijoo ta'e, olka'iinsa weerara kanaa hir'isuuf yaaluun, "flattening the curve" jedhamuun beekama.

sourceString: The CDC also recommends that individuals wash hands often with soap and water for at least 20 seconds, especially after going to the toilet or when hands are visibly dirty, before eating and after blowing one's nose, coughing or sneezing.
targetString: Kana malees, ‘CDC’n namoonni dhuunfaan, keessumaa erga mana fincaanii dhaqanii booda yookaan xuriin harka irraa sirriimatti yeroo mul’atu, nyaachuudhaan duraafi erga furrii baafatanii, qufaa’anii yookaan haxxiffatanii booda, harka isaanii saamuunaa fi bishaaniin yoo xiqqaate sekoondii 20f akka isaan dhiqatan gorsa.
translated: Akkasumas CDCn namoonni dhuunfaa yoo xiqqaate sekondii 20f yeroo baayyee harka isaanii saamunaa fi bishaaniin akka dhiqatan gorsa, keessumaa erga mana fincaanii deemanii booda ykn yeroo harki mul’atu xuraa’aa ta’e, nyaata nyaachuu isaanii dura fi erga hidhii ofii afuufanii booda, qufa’uu ykn haxxiffannaa booda.

sourceString: It further recommends using an alcohol-based hand sanitiser with at least 60% alcohol, but only when soap and water are not readily available.For areas where commercial hand sanitisers are not readily available, the WHO provides two formulations for local production.
targetString: Qulqullessituu harkaa alkooliirraa qopheeffame, kan qabiyyeen alkoolii isaa yoo xiqqaate %60 ta’e, fayyadamuutu gorfama, garuu kun saamuunaafi bishaan qophaa’ee hinjiru yoo ta’edha. Bakkeewwan qulqulleessitootni harkaa gurgurtaadhaaf salphaatti hin argamnetti Dhaabbati Fayyaa Addunyaa bulbula akaakuu lama kan naannootti oomishamuu danda’an dhiyeessa.
translated: Dabalataanis, qulqulleessituu harkaa alkoolii irratti hundaa’ee fi yoo xiqqaate alkoolii %60 qabu fayyadamuu gorsa, garuu yeroo saamunaa fi bishaan salphaatti hin argamne qofa.Naannoowwan qulqulleessituu harkaa daldalaaf salphaatti hin argamneef WHOn oomisha biyya keessaaf qophii lama ni kenna.

sourceString: In these formulations, the antimicrobial activity arises from ethanol or isopropanol.
