targetString: Foormulaa kana keessatti, gochoonni jarmii (antimaaykiroobiyaal) ajjeesan itaanolii yookaan aysopiroopaanol irraa argamu.
translated: Foormulaawwan kana keessatti sochiin farra maaykiroobiyaanii etaanoolii ykn isopropanol irraa kan uumamudha.

sourceString: Hydrogen peroxide is used to help eliminate bacterial spores in the alcohol; it is "not an active substance for hand antisepsis".
targetString: Haayidiroojiin peerooksaayidiin seeliiwwan baakteeriyaa alkoolii keessatti argaman balleessuuf fayyada malee “harka baakteeriyaarraa qulqulleessuuf wanta dammaqinaan fayyadu miti”.
translated: Haayidroojiin peerooksaayidiin ispoorota baakteeriyaa alkoolii keessa jiran dhabamsiisuuf gargaara; "wanti antisepsis harkaatiif sochii qabu miti".

sourceString: Glycerol is added as a humectant.
targetString: Gilaayiserooliin jiidha akka kennuuf itti dabalame.
translated: Glycerol akka humectant tti itti dabalama.

sourceString: People are managed with supportive care, which may include fluid therapy, oxygen support, and supporting other affected vital organs.
targetString: Namoonni kunuunsa gargaarsaa kanneen akka yaala dhangala’oo, gargaarsa oksijiinii, fi gargaarsa qaamota miidhaman birootiin hogganamu.
translated: Namoonni kunuunsa deggersa qabuun kan bulfaman yoo ta’u, kunis yaala dhangala’aa, deeggarsa oksijiinii fi qaamolee barbaachisoo biroo dhibee kanaan qabaman deeggaruun kan dabalatu ta’uu danda’a.

sourceString: The CDC recommends that those who suspect they carry the virus wear a simple face mask.
targetString: ‘CDC’n namoonni vaayirichan baadha jedhanii of shakkan akka isaan maaskii fuulaa xiqqoo godhataniif gorsa.
translated: CDCn warri vaayirasicha qabatanii shakkan haguuggii fuulaa salphaa akka godhatan gorsa.

sourceString: Extracorporeal membrane oxygenation (ECMO) has been used to address the issue of respiratory failure, but its benefits are still under consideration.
targetString: Extracorporeal membrane oxygenation (ECMO)’iin dadhabbi sirna hargansuu hogganuuf fayyada. Ta’us bu’a qabeessummaan isaa ammas too’annaa jala jira.
translated: Dhimma dadhabina sirna hargansuu furuuf oksijiinii meembraanii qaama alaa (ECMO) fayyadamaa kan ture yoo ta'u, faayidaan isaa ammallee ilaalamaa jira.

sourceString: Personal hygiene and a healthy lifestyle and diet have been recommended to improve immunity.
targetString: Qulqullina dhuunfaa fi jireenya fayyaa qabeessa akkasumas sirna nyaataa humna ittisa dhibee dabalutu ajajama.
translated: Qulqullina dhuunfaa fi jireenyaa fi nyaata fayya qabeessa ta’e qabaachuun dandeettii dhukkuba ofirraa ittisuu fooyyessuuf gorfameera.

sourceString: Supportive treatments may be useful in those with mild symptoms at the early stage of infection.The WHO and Chinese National Health Commission have published recommendations for taking care of people who are hospitalised with COVID-19.
targetString: Waldhaansi salphaan namoota mallattoolee sasalphoo sadarkaa jalqaba dhukkubichaatti agarsiisaniif kennamu ni fayyada. Dhaabbanni fayyaa addunyaa fi koomishiiniin fayyaa chaayinaa filannoowwan namoota COVID-19’n qabamanii yaala irra jiran kunuunsuuf oolu qopheessan.
translated: Wal’aansi deeggarsaa namoota sadarkaa jalqabaa dhukkuba kanaan qabaman irratti mallattoon salphaan mul’atu irratti faayidaa qabaachuu mala.WHO fi Komishiniin Fayyaa Biyyaalessaa Chaayinaa namoota COVID-19n qabamuun hospitaala ciisan kunuunsuuf yaada kennaman maxxansaniiru.

sourceString: Intensivists and pulmonologists in the U.S. have compiled treatment recommendations from various agencies into a free resource, the IBCC.
targetString: Ogeessonni sombaa U.S. dhaabbattota hedduurraa raga ba’iinsa yaalii madda bilisaa IBCC qopheessaniiru.
translated: Ogeeyyiin cimaa fi sombaa US keessatti yaada wal’aansaa dhaabbilee adda addaa irraa walitti qabuun qabeenya bilisaa, IBCCtti galchaniiru.

sourceString: As of April 2020, there is no specific treatment for COVID-19.
targetString: Ebla 2020 irraa eegalee, COVID-19 dhaaf daawaan adda ta’e hin jiru.
translated: Hanga Ebla 2020tti yaaliin addaa COVID-19 hin jiru.

sourceString: For symptoms, some medical professionals recommend paracetamol (acetaminophen) over ibuprofen for first-line use.
targetString: Mallattoolee dhukkubichaatiif ogeeyyiin fayyaa tokko tokko itti fayyadama yeroo jalqabaatiif iibuuproofiiniirra parastaamoolii (aseetaaminoofiinii) fudhachuu gorsu.
translated: Mallattoolee dhukkubichaaf ogeeyyiin fayyaa tokko tokko sarara jalqabaa irratti akka fayyadamaniif ibuprofen irra paracetamol (acetaminophen) gorsu.

sourceString: Precautions must be taken to minimise the risk of virus transmission, especially in healthcare settings when performing procedures that can generate aerosols, such as intubation or hand ventilation.
targetString: Babal’ina vaayirasii hir’isuuf, keessattuu sirna eegumsa fayyaa keessatti yeroo adeemsa uujummoo hargansuu maddisiisu raawwannu of eeggannoowwan godhamuu qaban.
translated: Keessattuu bakka eegumsa fayyaa keessatti adeemsa eroosoolii maddisiisuu danda’u kan akka intuubashinii ykn qilleensa harkaa yeroo raawwatamu balaa daddarbiinsa vaayirasii xiqqeessuuf of eeggannoowwan godhamuu qabu.

sourceString: For healthcare professionals caring for people with COVID-19, the CDC recommends placing the person in an Airborne Infection Isolation Room (AIIR) in addition to using standard precautions, contact precautions and airborne precautions.The CDC outlines the guidelines for the use of personal protective equipment (PPE) during the pandemic.
targetString: Ogeessota fayyaa namoota COVID-19 qaban wal’aananiif, Wiirtuun To’annaa Qorichaa (CDC) of-eeggannoowwan beekamoo, of-eeggannoowwan wal tuttuqqii fi of-eeggannoowwan wantoota qilleensaan baatamanii irratti dabaluudhaan Kutaa Eerboorni Infeekshin Aayisoleeshin (AIIR) keessa namicha qabame san akka tursan gorsa. ‘CDC’n yeroo weeraraa kanatti itti fayyadama meeshaalee eeggannoo dhuunfaatiif qajeelfamoota tarreessee jira.
translated: Ogeessota eegumsa fayyaa namoota COVID-19 qaban kunuunsaniif, of eeggannoo sadarkaa, of eeggannoo tuttuqaa fi of eeggannoo qilleensaa fayyadamuu malees, kutaa Infeekshinii Qilleensaa (AIIR) keessa kaa’uu CDCn gorsa.CDCn qajeelfama itti fayyadama ittisa dhuunfaa ni kaa’a meeshaalee (PPE) yeroo weerara dhibee kanaa.

sourceString: The recommended gear is: PPE gown, respirator or facemask, eye protection, and medical gloves.When available, respirators (instead of facemasks) are preferred.
targetString: Golgaawwan qaamaa jajjabeeffaman: uffata PPE, meeshaa hargansuuf gargaaru yookaan haguuggaa fuulaa, haguugduu harkaati. Kan argamu taanaan haguugduu fuula caalaa hargansiiftuutu filatama.
translated: Meeshaaleen gorfaman: Gown PPE, respirator ykn face mask, eegumsa ijaa, fi guwaantii yaalaa.Yeroo argamu, respirators (bakka face mask) filatamaadha.

sourceString: N95 respirators are approved for industrial settings but the FDA has authorised the masks for use under an Emergency Use Authorisation (EUA).
targetString: Meeshaan hargansuu N95 sirna industiriitiif darbe, garuu FDA’n maaskicha Emergency Use Authorisation (EUA) jalatti akka tajaajilu eeyyame.
translated: Meeshaaleen hargansuu N95 bakka industiriidhaaf kan hayyamaman yoo ta’u FDAn garuu haguuggii fuulaa kana Hayyama Itti Fayyadama Hatattamaa (EUA) jalatti akka fayyadamaniif hayyameera.

sourceString: They are designed to protect from airborne particles like dust but effectiveness against a specific biological agent is not guaranteed for off-label uses.
targetString: Dhukkubota qilleensaan daddarban akka ittisaniif qophaa’anis qaama baayilojikaala tokkoof faallaa ta’uun tajaajilaaf akka hin oolle godha.
translated: Isaanis qilleensa keessaa kan akka dafqa irraa eeguuf kan qophaa’an yoo ta’u garuu bu’a qabeessummaan ergamaa baayoloojii murtaa’e tokko irratti fayyadama asxaa ala ta’eef wabii hin qabu.

sourceString: When masks are not available, the CDC recommends using face shields or, as a last resort, homemade masks.
targetString: Maaskiin yeroo hinjirretti Wiirtuun Ittisaa fi To’annaa Dhukkubaa (CDC) golgaa fuulaa yookaan, akka filannoo isa dhumaatti ammoo, aguugduu manatti hojjetame akka godhatan gorsa.
translated: Yeroo haguuggii fuulaa hin jirretti CDCn gaachana fuula ykn akka furmaata dhumaatti haguuggii fuulaa mana keessatti hojjetamu fayyadamuu gorsa.

sourceString: Most cases of COVID-19 are not severe enough to require mechanical ventilation or alternatives, but a percentage of cases are.
targetString: Dhukkuboonni KOVID-19 harki caalaan isaanii cimoo fi veentileetarii namaan hojjetu yookaan filannoowwan biraa kan barbaadan miti, dhibbeentaan hangi tokko garuu ni barbaadu.
translated: Namoonni COVID-19 qabaman irra caalaan isaanii hamma qilleensa makaanikaal ykn filannoo biraa barbaadan kan hin taane yoo ta’u, dhibbeentaan tokko garuu.

sourceString: The type of respiratory support for individuals with COVID-19 related respiratory failure is being actively studied for people in hospital, with some evidence that intubation can be avoided with a high flow nasal cannula or bi-level positive airway pressure.
targetString: Akaakuu rakkoo hargansuu namoota COVID-19’n qabaman muudatu irratti gargaarsa gochuuf namoota hospitaalatti argaman irratti yaalii cimaatu gaggeeffame. Ragaawwan hammataman tokko tokko hambisuudhaan daddarba cimaa keessoo funyaanii fi dhiibbaa daandii qilleensaa karaa geessisa.
translated: Gosti deeggarsa sirna hargansuu namoota dhuunfaa COVID-19 waliin walqabatee dadhabina sirna hargansuu qabaniif namoota hospitaala jiraniif dammaqinaan qoratamaa kan jiru yoo ta’u, intuubashiniin kaanuulaa hidhii dhangala’aa olaanaa ykn dhiibbaa ujummoo qilleensaa sadarkaa lamaa pozaatiivii ta’een hambifamuu akka danda’u ragaaleen tokko tokko ni mul’isu.

sourceString: Whether either of these two leads to the same benefit for people who are critically ill is not known.
targetString: Lamaan isaanii namoota baay’ee dhukkubsataniif bu’aa tokko qabaachuufi dhiisuu isaanii hin beekamne.
translated: Lamaan kana keessaa tokko namoota dhukkuba cimaa qabaniif faayidaa walfakkaataa fiduu fi dhiisuun isaa hin beekamu.

sourceString: Some doctors prefer staying with invasive mechanical ventilation when available because this technique limits the spread of aerosol particles compared to a high flow nasal cannula.Severe cases are most common in older adults (those older than 60 years, and especially those older than 80 years).
targetString: Doktoroonni tokko tokko meeshaa hafuura baafachiisu kan qaama namaa keessa galu waliin turuu filatu sababni isaas malli kun ujummoo funyaaniin qaama keessa seensifamu caalaa faffaca’iinsa qaamolee qilleensaa xixiqqoo daangessa. Dhukkubsattoonni haala ammaataa keessa seenan ga’eessota umurii guddaati (warra waggaa 60 olii, fi keessumaa immoo warra waggaa 80 olii).
translated: Doktooronni tokko tokko yeroo argamu qilleensa makaanikaa weerartuu wajjin turuu filatu sababiin isaas tooftaan kun babal’ina paartiikilii eroosoolii kan daangessuuf kaanuulaa hidhii dhangala’aa guddaa qabuun wal bira qabamee yoo ilaalamu.Dhimmoonni ciccimoon baay’inaan ga’eessota dullooman (kanneen umuriin isaanii waggaa 60 ol ta’e, fi keessumaa kanneen umuriin isaanii waggaa 80 ol ta’e) irratti mul’ata. .

sourceString: Many developed countries do not have enough hospital beds per capita, which limits a health system's capacity to handle a sudden spike in the number of COVID-19 cases severe enough to require hospitalisation.
targetString: Biyyoonni guddatan hedduun tokkoon tokkoon namootaatiif siree mana yaalaa ga’aa hinqaban, kun immoo dhaabbileen fayyaa lakkoofsa namoota COVID-19 dhaan qabamanii dhukkubi itti ammaachuurraa kan ka’e wal’aansa mana yaalaa barbaadan, isa aal tokkoon garmalee ol ka’e keessummeessuudhaaf humna hinqaban.
translated: Biyyoonni guddatan hedduun nama tokkoof siree hospitaalaa gahaa waan hin qabneef, dandeettii sirni fayyaa tokko lakkoofsi namoota COVID-19 akka tasaa dabalaa dhufe hamma hospitaala ciisuu barbaachisu danda’u daangessuudha.

sourceString: One study in China found 5% were admitted to intensive care units, 2.3% needed mechanical support of ventilation, and 1.4% died.
targetString: Qorannoon biyya chaayinaa tokko akka argatetti 5 % gara kutaa waldhaansa addaatti seenu, 2.3% gargaarsa tajaajila meeshaa sirna hargansuu barbaadu, 1.4% ni du’u.
translated: Qorannoon Chaayinaa keessatti godhame tokko akka agarsiisutti %5 kutaa yaala cimaa keessa kan seenan yoo ta'u, %2.3 deeggarsa makaanikaa qilleensaa kan barbaadan yoo ta'u, %1.4 ammoo du'aniiru.

sourceString: In China, approximately 30% of people in hospital with COVID-19 are eventually admitted to ICU.
targetString: Chaayinaa keessatti, namoota COVID-19 dhaan qabamanii hospitaala jiran keessaa tilmaamaan %30 dhumarratti gara kutaa kunuunsa cimaatti (ICU) seenu.
translated: Chaayinaa keessatti namoota COVID-19n qabamuun hospitaala jiran keessaa tilmaamaan %30 yeroo booda gara ICU seenu.

sourceString: Mechanical ventilation becomes more complex as acute respiratory distress syndrome (ARDS) develops in COVID-19 and oxygenation becomes increasingly difficult.
targetString: Meeshaadhaan hafuura baafachiisuun akka mallattoon hafuura baafannaa dhiphisaa cimaan (ARDS) COVID-19 keessatti uumameen daran walxaxaa ta’aa adeema, ooksijiinii kennuufiinis daran rakkisaa ta’aa adeema.
translated: COVID-19 keessatti dhibee hargansuu cimaa (ARDS) uumamuu fi oksijiinii argachuun daran rakkisaa waan ta’eef qilleensa makaanikaal walxaxaa ta’a.

sourceString: Ventilators capable of pressure control modes and high PEEP are needed to maximise oxygen delivery while minimising the risk of ventilator-associated lung injury and pneumothorax.
targetString: Veentileeteroonni humna qilleensaa to’achuu danda’aniifi ‘PEEP’ guddaa qaban dhiyeessii ooksijiinii guddisuufi miidhaafi walitti galuu sombaa balaa veentileeterii waliin walqabate xiqqeessuuf barbaachisoodha.
translated: Ventilator haala to’annoo dhiibbaa dandeettii fi PEEP ol’aanaa ta’e kan barbaachisu yoo ta’u, balaa miidhamuu sombaa ventilator waliin walqabatee dhufu fi niwumothorax xiqqeessuudhaan kenniinsa oksijiinii guddisuuf barbaachisaadha.

sourceString: High PEEP may not be available on older ventilators.
targetString: Veentileeteroota moofaa keessa ‘PEEP’ n jiraachuu dhiisuu mala.
translated: PEEP ol’aanaan veentileetaroota durii irratti argamuu dhiisuu danda’a.

sourceString: Research into potential treatments started in January 2020, and several antiviral drugs are in clinical trials.
targetString: Qorannoon qorichoota abdii qaban irratti godhamu Amajjii 2020 keessa eegalame, qorichoonni farra vaayirasii hedduun immoo dhukkubsattootarratti yaalamaa jiru.
translated: Qorannoon yaala ta'uu danda'u Guraandhala 2020 kan eegale yoo ta'u, qorichi farra vaayirasii hedduun yaalii kilinikaa irra jiru.

sourceString: Remdesivir appears to be the most promising.
targetString: Remdesivir hunda caalaa waan abdii qabu fakkaata.
translated: Remdesivir hunda caalaa abdachiisaa ta'ee mul'ata.

sourceString: Although new medications may take until 2021 to develop, several of the medications being tested are already approved for other uses or are already in advanced testing.
targetString: Daawaa haaraa qopheessuun hanga 2021 tti turuu malu illee, daawaalee yaalamaa jiran keessaa hedduun isaanii faayidaalee biroodhaaf kan hayyamamanidha yookaan immoo kanumaan dura yaalii olaanaarra jiru.
translated: Qorichootni haaraan hojjetamuuf hanga bara 2021tti fudhachuu danda'us, qorichi qoratamaa jiru hedduun isaanii itti fayyadama biroof hayyamameera ykn qorannoo sadarkaa olaanaa irra jiru.

sourceString: Antiviral medication may be tried in people with severe disease.
targetString: Qorichi farra vaayirasii namoota sadarkaa olaanaan dhukkubsatan irratti yaalamuu danda’a.
translated: Qorichi farra vaayirasii namoota dhukkuba cimaa qaban irratti yaaluun ni danda’ama.

sourceString: The WHO recommended volunteers take part in trials of the effectiveness and safety of potential treatments.The FDA has granted temporary authorisation to convalescent plasma as an experimental treatment in cases where the person's life is seriously or immediately threatened.
targetString: Dhaabbati Fayyaa Addunyaa namoonni fedha qaban yaalii bu’a qabeessummaafi nagummaa wantoota daawaa ta’uu malan kanaatti akka hirmaataniif yaada dhiyeesse. Abbaan Taayitaa Daawaa Federaalaa akka daawaa yaaliitti dhukkubsattoota lubbuun isaanii balaa hamaarra jiru yookaan saffisaan miidhaman irratti akka yaalamuuf pilaazmaa dandamateef hayyama yeroo gabaabaa kenne.
translated: WHOn tola ooltonni yaaliiwwan bu’a qabeessummaa fi nageenya wal’aansoowwan ta’uu danda’an irratti akka hirmaatan gorse.FDAn pilaasmaa fayyisu akka yaala yaaliitti yeroof hayyama kenneera, haala lubbuun nama sanaa balaa hamaa ykn battalumatti balaadhaaf saaxilame keessatti.

sourceString: It has not undergone the clinical studies needed to show it is safe and effective for the disease.
targetString: Dhukkubichaaf akka fayyadu qo’annoo kilinikaatiin miti kan mirkanaa’e.
translated: Qorannoowwan kilinikaa dhibee kanaaf nageenyaafi bu'a qabeessa ta'uu agarsiisuuf barbaachisan keessa hin darbine.

sourceString: In February 2020, China launched a mobile app to deal with the disease outbreak.
targetString: Gurraandhala 2020 keessa, Chaayinaan ka’umsa dhukkuba kanaa qorachuuf mosaajjii bilbila sochootuu gad dhiistee turte.
translated: Bitootessa 2020 keessa Chaayinaan weerara dhibee kana ittisuuf appii mobaayilaa eegalte.

sourceString: Users are asked to enter their name and ID number.
targetString: Fayyadamtoonni maqaa fi lakkoofsa eenyummaa (ID) isaanii akka galchan gaafataman.
translated: Fayyadamtoonni maqaa fi lakkoofsa eenyummaa isaanii akka galchan gaafatamaniiru.

sourceString: The app is able to detect 'close contact' using surveillance data and therefore a potential risk of infection.
targetString: App’chi odeeffannoo sarveellansii irraa argatuun walitti siiquu fi haalota faalamaaf nama saaxilan adda baasa.
translated: Appichi daataa hordoffii fayyadamuun 'qunnamtii dhiyeenyaa' adda baasuu waan danda'uuf balaa vaayirasichaan qabamuu danda'u.

sourceString: Every user can also check the status of three other users.
targetString: Fayyadamaan tokko haala fayyadamtoonni biroo sadii keessa jiran sakatta’uu danda’a.
translated: Fayyadamaan kamiyyuu haala fayyadamtoota biroo sadiis ilaaluu danda'a.

sourceString: If a potential risk is detected, the app not only recommends self-quarantine, it also alerts local health officials.Big data analytics on cellphone data, facial recognition technology, mobile phone tracking and artificial intelligence are used to track infected people and people whom they contacted in South Korea, Taiwan and Singapore.
targetString: Yoo balaa hamaan argame app’chi akka namoota irraa addatti of baafnu qofa miti kan himu, hoggantoota fayyaa naannawatti argaman beeksisa. Qorannaa odeeffannoo bilbilaa, teeknoolojii fuula adda baasu, bilbila moobaayilaa too’achuu fi odeeffannoo nam-tolcheen namoota dhukkubaan qabamanii fi namoota isaan Kooriyaa kibbaa, Taayiwaanii fi Singaapooritti qunnaman adda baasuuf fayyada.
translated: Balaan mudachuu danda'u yoo adda baafame appichi ofirraa adda baasuu qofa osoo hin taane, qondaaltota fayyaa naannoo akeekkachiisa.Xiinxala daataa guddaa daataa mobaayila, teknooloojii fuula beeku, hordoffii bilbila harkaa fi sammuu namtolchee fayyadamuun namoota vaayirasichaan qabaman fi namoota isaan Kooriyaa Kibbaa, Taayiwaan fi Singaapoor keessatti qunnamaniiru.

sourceString: In March 2020, the Israeli government enabled security agencies to track mobile phone data of people supposed to have coronavirus.
targetString: Bitootessa 2020 keessa mootummaan Israa’el dhaabbileen nageenyaa bilbila moobaayilaa namoota vaayirasii koroonaa qabanii akka hordofan dandeessise.
translated: Sadaasa bara 2020 mootummaan Israa’el dhaabbileen nageenyaa daataa bilbila harkaa namoota koronaavaayirasii qaba jedhaman akka hordofan dandeessiseera.

sourceString: The measure was taken to enforce quarantine and protect those who may come into contact with infected citizens.
targetString: Adabbichi kan kennamu yeroo turtii adda baafamuu irratti dhiibbaa uumuuf akkasumas namoota lammiilee dhukkubichaan qabaman tuttuquu danda’an ittisuuf.
translated: Tarkaanfiin kun kan fudhatame tursiisa hojiirra oolchuu fi namoota lammiilee vaayirasichaan qabaman waliin wal qunnamuu malu eeguuf.

sourceString: Also in March 2020, Deutsche Telekom shared aggregated phone location data with the German federal government agency, Robert Koch Institute, in order to research and prevent the spread of the virus.
targetString: Bitootessa 2020 keessas, Teeleekoomiin Dooch, tatamsa’ina vaayiresichaa qorachuu fi ittisuuf Dhaabbata Rooberti Kooch, eejensii mootummaa federaalaa Jarmaniitiif ragaa bakkee bilbilaa walta’aa qoode.
translated: Akkasumas Amajjii 2020 keessa Doyiche Telekom tatamsa’ina vaayirasichaa qorachuu fi ittisuuf jecha, daataa bakka bilbilaa walitti qabame dhaabbata mootummaa federaalaa Jarmanii, Inistiitiyuutii Roobart Kooch waliin qooddateera.

sourceString: Russia deployed facial recognition technology to detect quarantine breakers.
targetString: Namoota seera adda-of baasuu cabsan adda baasuuf Raashaan teeknooloojii fuula namaa qalbeeffatu hojiitti bobbaaste.
translated: Raashiyaan namoota adda baafamuu cabsan adda baasuuf teknooloojii fuula adda baasu bobbaafte.

sourceString: Italian regional health commissioner Giulio Gallera said he has been informed by mobile phone operators that "40% of people are continuing to move around anyway".
targetString: koomishiinarri fayyaa naannoo Xaaliyaan Giulio Gallera jedhanitti ummanni 40% ammas sochii itti fufee akka jiru opereetaroota bilbila harkaa irraa akka odeeffatan himan.
translated: Komishinarri fayyaa naannoo Xaaliyaanii Giulio Gallera akka jedhanitti, ''namoonni %40 haala kamiinuu socho'uu itti fufaniiru'' jechuun opereetota bilbila harkaatiin itti himameera.

sourceString: German government conducted a 48 hours weekend hackathon with more than 42.000 participants.
targetString: Mootummaan Jarman guyyaa sanbataa fi dilbataa dorgommii sa’aatii 48 fudhatee fi namoota 42,000 hirmaachise gaggeesse.
translated: Mootummaan Jarman hackathon dhuma torbee sa'aatii 48 gaggeesseen namoota 42.000 ol hirmaachise.

sourceString: Also the president of Estonia, Kersti Kaljulaid, made a global call for creative solutions against the spread of coronavirus.
targetString: Akkasumas, Pirezidaantiin Istooniyaa, Keeristii Kaaljuuleeyid, tatamsa’ina vaayirasii koroonaa irratti guutummaan addunyaa fala haaraa akka barbaaduuf waamicha godhan.
translated: Akkasumas preezdaantiin Istooniyaa, Kersti Kaljulaid, tatamsa’ina vaayirasii koroonaa irratti furmaata kalaqaa akka argatu waamicha addunyaa taasisaniiru.

sourceString: Individuals may experience distress from quarantine, travel restrictions, side effects of treatment or fear of the infection itself.
targetString: Namoonni dhuunfaa adda of baasuu, qoqqobbii imalaa, dhiibbaa cinaa wal’aansaa yookaan faalama sodaachuu irraa kan ka’e dhiphachuu malu.
translated: Namoonni dhuunfaa adda baafamuu, uggura imala, miidhaa wal’aansaa ykn sodaa infekshinii mataa isaa irraa kan ka’e dhiphinni isaan mudachuu danda’a.

sourceString: BBC quoted Rory O'Connor in saying, "Increased social isolation, loneliness, health anxiety, stress and an economic downturn are a perfect storm to harm people's mental health and wellbeing."
targetString: BBC’n jecha Rory O'Connor akkanatti kaa’e “dabaluun addaan fageenya hawaasaa, kophummaa, faalamuu fayyaa, cinqamuu fi diinagdeen hubamuun fayyaa sammuu qaama namaa irratti miidhaa fida.”
translated: BBCn Roorii O'Konor wabeeffachuun, "hawaasa irraa adda baafamuu, kophummaa, yaaddoon fayyaa, dhiphinaafi kufaatiin dinagdee dabaluu fayyaa sammuu fi nageenya namootaa miidhuuf obomboleettii mudaa hin qabnedha" jedheera.

sourceString: The disease may take a mild course with few or no symptoms, resembling other common upper respiratory diseases such as the common cold.
targetString: Dhukkubi kun laafaa mallattoolee muraasa agarsiisu yookaan mallattoo hinqabne ta’uu mala, kan dhibeewwan hafuuraan darban beekamoo, kanneen akka qufaa isa fakkeessan.
translated: Dhukkubni kun dhukkuboota sirna hargansuu gubbaa kanneen biroo kan akka qorra barame kan fakkaatu ta’ee, adeemsa salphaa fudhachuu danda’a, mallattoo muraasa ykn hin mul’anne.

sourceString: Mild cases typically recover within two weeks, while those with severe or critical diseases may take three to six weeks to recover.
targetString: Warri dhukkubni itti hin cimin yeroo turban lamaa keessatti fayyu, warri dhukkubichi itti cime torbanoota sadii hanga jahaa itti fudhachuu mala.
translated: Namoonni dhukkuba salphaa ta’an yeroo baay’ee torban lama keessatti kan fayyan yoo ta’u, kanneen dhukkuba cimaa ykn murteessaa qaban ammoo fayyuuf torban sadii hanga jahaa fudhachuu danda’u.

sourceString: Pregnant women may be at higher risk for severe infection with COVID-19 based on data from other similar viruses, like SARS and MERS, but data for COVID-19 is lacking.In some people, COVID-19 may affect the lungs causing pneumonia.
targetString: Daataawwan vaayirasii walfakkaataa irra dhaabachuun dubartoonni ulfaa dhibee COVID-19 irra jireessaan hubamoo ta’u, garuu daataan COVID-19 ni hir’ata,dhibeen COVID-19 dhukkuba sombaa fiduudhaan somba hubuu danda’a.
translated: Dubartoonni ulfaa ragaa vaayirasoota walfakkaatan biroo kan akka SARS fi MERS irraa argame irratti hundaa'uun carraan dhukkuba COVID-19 hamaa qabamuu ol'aanaa ta'uu danda'a, garuu ragaan COVID-19 hanqina qaba.Namoota tokko tokko irratti COVID-19 somba irratti dhiibbaa uumuun dhukkuba sombaa fiduu danda'a.

sourceString: In those most severely affected, COVID-19 may rapidly progress to acute respiratory distress syndrome (ARDS) causing respiratory failure, septic shock or multi-organ failure.
targetString: Warreen dhukkubichi sadarkaa olaanaan itti hammaate irratti COVID-19 sirna hargansuu hubuudhaan, qaamota biroos miidhuun saffisaan gara acute respiratory distress syndrome (ARDS)’tti ce’uu danda’a.
translated: Namoota baay’ee miidhaman keessatti COVID-19 saffisaan gara acute respiratory distress syndrome (ARDS)tti guddachuu danda’a kunis sirna hargansuu dadhabuu, septic shock ykn multi-organ failure fiduu danda’a.

sourceString: Complications associated with COVID-19 include sepsis, abnormal clotting and damage to the heart, kidneys and liver.
targetString: Burjaaja’ummaan COVID-19 wajjiin walqabatu seepsiisii, miidhama onnee, kale fi tiruu hin baratamin fa’a hammata.
translated: Rakkoolee COVID-19 waliin walqabatan dhukkuba seepsii, dhiigni dhiigaa haala hin baramnee fi miidhaa onnee, tiruu fi kalee irra gahu kan dabalatudha.

sourceString: Clotting abnormalities, specifically an increase in prothrombin time, have been described in 6% of those admitted to hospital with COVID-19, while abnormal kidney function is seen in 4% of this group.
targetString: Dhukkubsattoota COVID-19 dhaan hospitaala seenan keessaa dhibbeentaan 6 kantaruu dhiigaa seeraan ala ta’e, keessumaa yeroo pirootiroombiinii ol ka’aa akka qaban, garee kana keessaa dhibbeentaan 4 ammoo kalee sirriitti hin dalagne akka qaban ibsame.
translated: Clotting abnormalities, addatti yeroon prothrombin dabaluu, namoota COVID-19n hospitaala seenan keessaa %6 irratti kan ibsame yoo ta’u, hojiin tiruu hin baramne garee kana keessaa %4 irratti mul’ata.

sourceString: Approximately 20-30% of people who present with COVID-19 demonstrate elevated liver enzymes (transaminases).
targetString: Tilmaamaan namoonni COVID-19 qaban dhibbeentaa 20 hanga 30 tti eenzaayimii tiruu ol ka’aa (tiraansaaminaasis) agarsiisu.
translated: Namoota COVID-19 qabatanii dhiyaatan keessaa tilmaamaan %20-30 inzaayimii kalee (transaminases) olka’uu agarsiisu.

sourceString: According to the same report, the median time between onset of symptoms and death was ten days, with five being spent hospitalised.
targetString: Akka gabaasa walfakkaatuutti, dheerinni yeroo inni giddugaleessaa mul’achuu mallattootii fi du’a gidduu jiru guyyoota kudhanidha, isa keessaa shan mana yaalaa keessatti kan dabarfamu.
translated: Akka gabaasa walfakkaatutti, yeroon mallattoon dhukkubaa mul'achuu fi du'a gidduu jiru guyyoota kudhan yoo ta'u, shan hospitaala ciisaniiru.

sourceString: However, patients transferred to an ICU had a median time of seven days between hospitalisation and death.
targetString: Haa ta’u malee, dhukkubsattoonni gara ICU tti darban giddugaleessaan yeroo guyyaa torbaa deddeebii hospitaalaa fi du’a gidduutti qabu.
translated: Haa ta'u malee dhukkubsattoonni gara ICUtti jijjiiraman hospitaala ciisuu fi du'a gidduutti yeroon giddu galeessaa guyyoota torba ture.

sourceString: In a study of early cases, the median time from exhibiting initial symptoms to death was 14 days, with a full range of six to 41 days.
targetString: Qo’annoo dhukkubsattoota gara jalqabaa irratti adeemsifame keessatti, giddugaleessi dheerina yeroo mallattoo jalqabaa agarsiisuudhaa hanga du’aatti jiru guyyoota 14 ture, guutummaan dheerina yeroo isaa immoo guyyaa jahaa hanga 41 ti.
translated: Qorannoon namoota jalqabaa irratti gaggeeffame, yeroon mallattoo jalqabaa agarsiisuu irraa kaasee hanga du'aatti guyyoota 14 yoo ta'u, yeroon guutuun guyyoota jahaa hanga 41 ture.

sourceString: In a study by the National Health Commission (NHC) of China, men had a death rate of 2.8% while women had a death rate of 1.7%.
targetString: Qorannoo National Health Commission (NHC) chaayinaa keessatti akka agarsiisutti dhiira 2.8% fi dubara 1.7%tu du’a.
translated: Qorannoon Komishiniin Fayyaa Biyyaalessaa (NHC) Chaayinaa gaggeesseen dhiironni %2.8 yoo du'an dubartoonni ammoo %1.7 du'aniiru.

sourceString: Histopathological examinations of post-mortem lung samples show diffuse alveolar damage with cellular fibromyxoid exudates in both lungs.
targetString: Qorannoon Histopatoologii somba nama du’ee irraa fudhatamu akka agarsiisutti somba lamaan keessatti manca’iinsi sombaa babal’achuu mul’isa.
translated: Qorannoon histopathological saamuda sombaa du’a boodaa somba lamaan keessatti seelii fibromyxoid exudates waliin miidhaa alveolar diffuse agarsiisa.

sourceString: Viral cytopathic changes were observed in the pneumocytes.
targetString: Jijjiiramni Saayitoopaatikii vaayirasii niimoosaayitii keessatti argame.
translated: Jijjiiramni saayitoopaatikii vaayirasii niwumoosaayitii keessatti mul’ateera.

sourceString: The lung picture resembled acute respiratory distress syndrome (ARDS).
targetString: Suuraan sombaa sun rakkoo hafuura baafachuu dadhabuu isa hamaa (ARDS) fakkaate.
translated: Suuraan sombaa kun dhukkuba sirna hargansuu cimaa (ARDS) fakkaata ture.

sourceString: In 11.8% of the deaths reported by the National Health Commission of China, heart damage was noted by elevated levels of troponin or cardiac arrest.
targetString: Du’a namootaa Koomishiinii Fayyaa Biyyoolessaa Chaayinaatiin gabaafame keessaa dhibbeentaan 11.8 miidhaan onnee olka’uu hanga tirooppooniinii yookaan onneen hojii dhaabuu irraa ka’e ta’uu hubachiifame.
translated: Du'a Komishiniin Fayyaa Biyyaalessaa Chaayinaa gabaase keessaa %11.8 miidhaan onnee sadarkaa troponin olka'uu ykn onnee dhaabuun mul'ateera.

sourceString: According to March data from the United States, 89% of those hospitalised had preexisting conditions.Availability of medical resources and the socioeconomics of a region may also affect mortality.
targetString: Akka ragaa bitootessa Yunaayitid Isteetiitti, namoota hospitaala seenan keessaa 89% mallattoo baratamaa qaba. Akkasumas hammi namoota du’anii qabeenya meeshaalee fayya fi diinagdee biyyaa irratti hundaa’a.
translated: Akka ragaan Sadaasa Ameerikaa irraa argame agarsiisutti, namoota hospitaala galan keessaa %89 haalawwan duraan turan.Qabeenyi yaalaa fi hawaas-dinagdee naannoo tokkoo argamuun du’a irrattis dhiibbaa uumuu danda’a.

sourceString: Estimates of the mortality from the condition vary because of those regional differences, but also because of methodological difficulties.
targetString: Tilmaamni du’aa garaagarummaa naannolee irratti hundaa’ee garaagarummaa qaba, akkasumas ciminni tooftaalee sababa ni ta’a.
translated: Tilmaamni du’a haala kanaan dhufu garaagarummaa naannoo sanaa irraa kan ka’e garaagarummaa qaba, garuu sababa rakkoo malaatiinis.

sourceString: The under-counting of mild cases can cause the mortality rate to be overestimated.
targetString: Dhibeewwan ammaatoo hintaane hammaa gaditti lakkaa’uun hammi du’aa hammaa olitti akka tilmaamamu taasisuu danda’a.
translated: Lakkoofsi namoota salphaa ta’an gadi aanaa ta’uun du’a garmalee akka tilmaamamu gochuu danda’a.

sourceString: However, the fact that deaths are the result of cases contracted in the past can mean the current mortality rate is underestimated.
targetString: Haa ta’u malee, du’i namootaa sababa qabamuu kanaan duraa ta’uun isaa saffisi du’a yeroo ammaa hammaa gaditti yaadame jechuudha.
translated: Haa ta’u malee, duuti bu’aa dhimmoota kanaan dura qabamanii ta’uun isaa du’a amma jiru xiqqeessamee ilaalamuu danda’a.

sourceString: Smokers were 1.4 times more likely to have severe symptoms of COVID-19 and approximately 2.4 times more likely to require intensive care or die compared to non-smokers.Concerns have been raised about long-term sequelae of the disease.
targetString: Namoonni tamboo xuuxan carraan isaan mallattoolee COVID-19 hamaa agarsiisan warra hinxuuxne caalaa harka 1.4 dha, tilmaamaan immoo carraan kunuunsa cimaa barbaachuu yookaan du’uu isaanii hinxuuxne caalaa harka 2.4 guddata. Rakkoo dhukkubichi yeroo dheeraa keessa fidu ilaalchisee yaaddoowwan jiran kaafamaniiru.
translated: Namoonni tamboo xuuxan namoota tamboo hin xuuxne waliin wal bira qabamee yoo ilaalamu carraan mallattoolee dhukkuba COVID-19 hamaa qabaachuu isaanii dachaa 1.4 yoo ta’u, carraan kunuunsa cimaa barbaadu ykn du’uu tilmaamaan dachaa 2.4 ta’uu ibsameera.Yaaddoon yeroo dheeraaf itti fufiinsa dhukkuba kanaa ka’ee jira.

sourceString: The Hong Kong Hospital Authority found a drop of 20% to 30% in lung capacity in some people who recovered from the disease, and lung scans suggested organ damage.
targetString: Hoggantoonni hospitaala hoong koong qabiyyee sombaa namoota dhukkubsatanii fayyanii keessatti copha 20% hanga 30% ta’u argatan.
translated: Abbaan Taayitaa Hospitaala Hoong Koong namoota dhukkuba kanarraa dandamatan tokko tokko irratti dandeettiin sombaa %20 hanga %30 gadi bu'uu kan argate yoo ta'u, sakatta'iinsi sombaa qaama namaa akka miidhamu agarsiisa.

sourceString: This may also lead to post-intensive care syndrome following recovery.
targetString: Dhukkubicharraa fayyuutti aansee wanti kun gara mallattoo kunuunsa addaa boodaatti geessuu danda’a.
translated: Kunis fayyina booda dhukkuba kunuunsa cimaa boodaa (post-intensive care syndrome) fiduu danda’a.

sourceString: As of March 2020, it was unknown if past infection provides effective and long-term immunity in people who recover from the disease.
targetString: Akka bitootessa 2020tti namoonni dhukkubsatanii fayyan madiinummaan isaanii ni deebi’aaa fi yeroo dheeraa turuu danda’aa irratti wanti beekame hin jiru.
translated: Hanga Amajjii 2020tti infekshiniin darbe namoota dhibee kanarraa dandamatan irratti dandeettii dhukkuba ofirraa ittisuu bu'a qabeessaa fi yeroo dheeraa kan kennu ta'uu isaa hin beekamu ture.

sourceString: Immunity is seen as likely, based on the behaviour of other coronaviruses, but cases in which recovery from COVID-19 have been followed by positive tests for coronavirus at a later date have been reported.
targetString: Madiinummaan akka amala vaayirasii koroonaa irratti hundaa’a, garuu namoonni COVID-19 irraa fayyanii ammas qorannoon isaanii pozatiivii ta’e gabaafame.
translated: Dhukkubni dhukkuba ofirraa ittisuu akka carraa ta'etti ilaalama, amala vaayirasii koroonaa biroo irratti hundaa'uun, garuu namoonni COVID-19 irraa bayyanachuu hordofanii yeroo booda qorannoo koronaavaayirasiin qabamuu isaanii gabaafameera.

sourceString: These cases are believed to be worsening of a lingering infection rather than re-infection.
targetString: Haallonni kunniin irra deebiin dhukkubaan qabamuu irra dhukkuba dhaabuun hamaa akka ta’etti amanama.
translated: Namoonni kunniin deebi'anii dhukkuba kanaan qabamuu caalaa infekshinii yeroo dheeraa turuun akka hammaatan amanama.

sourceString: The virus is thought to be natural and have an animal origin, through spillover infection.
targetString: Vaayirasichi uumamaan kan jiruu fi bineensota irraa dhufe jedhamee yaadama.
translated: Vaayirasiin kun uumamaa fi madda bineensotaa akka ta'e yaadama, karaa infekshinii dhangala'aa (spillover infection).

sourceString: The actual origin is unknown, but by December 2019 the spread of infection was almost entirely driven by human-to-human transmission.
targetString: Maddi isaa inni dhugaan hinbeekamne, garuu Muddee 2019 tti faffaca’iinsi faalamaa guutummaan guutuutti haala jechuun danda’amuun namaa namatti darbaa ture.
translated: Ka'umsi qabatamaan isaa hin beekamu, garuu hanga Muddee 2019tti babal'inni infekshinii guutummaatti jechuun ni danda'ama nama irraa gara namaatti daddarbuun kan hoogganamu ture.

sourceString: A study of the first 41 cases of confirmed COVID-19, published in January 2020 in The Lancet, revealed the earliest date of onset of symptoms as 1 December 2019.
targetString: Qorannaan namoota calqaba COVID-19 qabaman 41 irratti gaggeeffame fi Amajjii 2020 maxxanfame akka ifoomsetti guyyaan jalqaba itti mallattoon mul’ate Muddee 1 2019 dha.
translated: Qorannoon namoota 41 jalqabaa COVID-19n qabamuun isaanii mirkanaa'e irratti gaggeeffame, Guraandhala 2020 gaazexaa The Lancet irratti maxxanfame, guyyaan mallattoon dhukkuba kanaa jalqaba Mudde 1 bara 2019 akka ta'e ibseera.

sourceString: Official publications from the WHO reported the earliest onset of symptoms as 8 December 2019.
targetString: Mallattoon jalqabaa WHO’dhaan kan maxxanfame muddee 8, 2019.
translated: Maxxansi ofiisaa WHO irraa akka gabaasetti mallattoon dhukkuba kanaa yeroo jalqabaaf Mudde 8 bara 2019 akka ta’e gabaaseera.

sourceString: Several measures are commonly used to quantify mortality.
targetString: Lakkoofsa namoota du’anii himuuf tarkaanfiiwwan hedduutu fudhatama.
translated: Du’a lakkoofsaan ibsuuf safartuuwwan hedduun yeroo baay’ee itti fayyadamu.

sourceString: These numbers vary by region and over time and are influenced by the volume of testing, healthcare system quality, treatment options, time since initial outbreak and population characteristics such as age, sex and overall health.
targetString: Lakkoofsi kun biyya, yeroo fi hamma qorachuu, qulqullina sirna fayyaa, filannoowwan yaalaa, umrii saalaa fi fayyaa waliigalaa irratti hundaa’a.
translated: Lakkoofsi kun naannoo fi yeroon garaagarummaa kan qabu yoo ta’u, baay’ina qorannoo, qulqullina sirna eegumsa fayyaa, filannoowwan yaalaa, yeroo erga weerarri jalqabaa mul’atee fi amala baay’ina ummataa kan akka umurii, saalaa fi fayyaa waliigalaa irratti dhiibbaa qaba.

sourceString: In late 2019, WHO assigned the emergency ICD-10 disease codes U07.1 for deaths from lab-confirmed SARS-CoV-2 infection and U07.2 for deaths from clinically or epidemiologically diagnosed COVID-19 without lab-confirmed SARS-CoV-2 infection.The death-to-case ratio reflects the number of deaths divided by the number of diagnosed cases within a given time interval.
targetString: 2019 gara dhumaatti, Dhaabbati Fayyaa Addunyaa koodiiwwan dhukkubaa ICD-10 yeroo muddamaa du’a faalama SARS-CoV-2 laabiraatooriidhaan mirkanaa’een dhufeef U07.1, akkasumas du’a mallattoolee dhukkubaa COVID-19 kan faalama SARS-CoV-2 laabiraatooriidhaan hin mirkanoofneen dhufeef U07.2 ramade. Reeshiyoon du’a dhukkubsattootatti madaalu wal irraa fageenya yeroo murtaa’aa keessatti lakkoofsi warra du’anii lakkoofsa namoota mallattoon dhukkubichaa irratti argameef qoodamuu isaa agarsiisa.
translated: Dhuma bara 2019tti WHOn koodii dhukkuba ICD-10 hatattamaa U07.1 kan du’a infekshinii SARS-CoV-2 mana yaalaa keessatti mirkanaa’eef, U07.2 ammoo du’a COVID-19 kilinikaan ykn epidemiologically adda baafame kan SARS-CoV-2 laabraatooriin mirkanaa’e malee U07.2 ramadee ture. 2 infection.Reeshiyoon du’aa fi nama tokkoo yeroo murtaa’e keessatti baay’ina namoota vaayirasichaan qabamuun adda baafamaniin hiramuun baay’ina namoota du’anii calaqqisiisa.

sourceString: Based on Johns Hopkins University statistics, the global death-to-case ratio is 6.9% (153,822/2,240,191) as of 17 April 2020.
targetString: Odeeffannoo Yuunivarsiitii Joon Hoopkiinsi irratti hundaa’uun, akka ebla 17,2020tti reeshiyoon dhukkubsattoota keessaa kanneen du’anii 6.9% (153,822/2,240,191) dha.
translated: Istaatistiksii Yunivarsiitii Joon Hoopkiins irratti hundaa’uun, hanga Ebla 17, 2020tti reeshiyoon du’aa fi namoota qabamanii addunyaa %6.9 (153,822/2,240,191) dha.

sourceString: The number varies by region.Other measures include the case fatality rate (CFR), which reflects the percent of diagnosed individuals who die from a disease, and the infection fatality rate (IFR), which reflects the percent of infected individuals (diagnosed and undiagnosed) who die from a disease.
targetString: Lakkoofsi naannoo naannootti garaagarummaa qaba. Shallaggiiwwan biraa case fatality rate (CFR) hammatan, kan parsantii namoota mallattoon dhibee isaani adda bahee du’anii agarsiisu fi infection fatality rate (IFR), kan namoota mallattoon dhibee isaanii adda bahee fi osoo adda hin bahin du’an.
translated: Lakkoofsi kun naannoodhaan garaagarummaa qaba.Safartuuwwan biroon namoota dhukkuba tokkoon du’an keessaa dhibbeentaa du’a namoota dhukkuba kanaan qabaman (CFR) fi namoota dhukkuba kanaan qabaman (kan adda baafamanii fi kan hin adda baafamne) dhibbeentaa du’a dhukkuba kanaan qabaman (IFR) calaqqisiisa ) kan dhukkuba tokkoon du’an.

sourceString: These statistics are not time bound and follow a specific population from infection through case resolution.
targetString: Odeeffannoon kun kan yeroo irratti hundaa’uu fi hawaasa murtaa’e qofa hordofu miti.
translated: Istaatistiksii kun yeroon kan hin daangeffamne yoo ta’u, uummata murtaa’e tokko infekshinii irraa kaasee hanga furmaata dhimmaa hordofu.

sourceString: While not all infected people develop antibodies, the presence of antibodies may provide information about how many people have been infected.
targetString: Namoonni faalaman hundi pirootiinii dhiigaa dhukkuba ittisu horachuu yoo baatan illee, jiraachuun pirootiiniiwwan kanniinii lakkoofsa namoota faalamanii ilaalchisee odeeffannoo kennuu malu.
translated: Namoonni dhukkuba kanaan qabaman hundinuu farra qaamaa kan hin horanne ta’us, farra qaamaa jiraachuun namoota meeqa dhukkuba kanaan qabaman odeeffannoo kennuu danda’a.

sourceString: In the epicentre of the outbreak in Italy, Castiglione d'Adda, a small village of 4600, 80 (1.7%) are already dead.
targetString: Giddugaleessa jalqabbii dhukkubichaa biyya Xaaliyaanii keessatti, ganda xiqqoo Kaastiiliyoonee Dii Aadaa uummata 4600 qabdu keessatti namoonni 80 (%1.7) du’anii jiru.
translated: Giddugala weerarri kun Xaaliyaanii keessatti, Castiglione d'Adda, ganda xiqqoo namoota 4600 qabdu, 80 (%1.7) reefuu du'aniiru.

sourceString: In Gangelt, the disease was spread by Carnival festivals, and spread to younger people, causing a relatively lower mortality, and not all COVID-19 deaths may have been formally classified as such.
targetString: Gaangelt keessatti, dhukkubichi feestivaala kaarnivaaliin baballate, gara dargaggootaattis daddarbe, du’a gadi bu’aaf galmeessisaa jira, akkasumas du’I COVID-19 hundi akka kanatti adda ba’eera ta’uu danda’a.
translated: Gangelt keessatti dhukkubni kun ayyaana Kaarniivaliin kan babal’ate yoo ta’u, dargaggoota irrattis kan babal’ate yoo ta’u, kunis du’a xiqqaa kan taasise yoo ta’u, du’a COVID-19 hunduu sirnaan akkasitti ramadamuu dhiisuu danda’a.

sourceString: Furthermore, the German health system has not been overwhelmed.
targetString: Caalaatti sirna fayyaa Jarmanitti humnaa ol hin taane.
translated: Kana malees sirni fayyaa Jarmanii humna ol hin taane.

sourceString: In the Netherlands, about 3% may have antibodies, as assessed from blood donors.
targetString: Neezerlaan keessatti, akka namoota dhiiga arjooman irraa tilmaamametti gara 3%tu aantiibodii qaba.
translated: Nezerlaanditti gara %3 farra qaama qabaachuu danda'a, akka arjoomtoota dhiigaa irraa madaalameetti.

sourceString: 69 (0.004% of the population) have been confirmed to have died from COVID-19.
targetString: 69 (baay’ina uummatichaa keessaa dhibbeentaan 0.004) COVID-19 irraa kan ka’e du’uu isaanii mirkaneeffameera.
translated: 69 (%0.004 ummata) COVID-19n du'uun isaanii mirkanaa'eera.

sourceString: The impact of the pandemic and its mortality rate are different for men and women.
targetString: Miidhaan weerarichi geessisuu fi hammi ajjeechaa isaa dhiiraa fi dubara irratti garaagarummaa qaba.
translated: Dhiibbaan weerara vaayrasii koroonaa fi du'a isaa dhiiraa fi dubartootaaf adda adda.

sourceString: Mortality is higher in men in studies conducted in China and Italy.
targetString: Qorannoowwan Chaayinaa fi Xaaliyaanii keessatti adeemsifaman keessatti du’i dhiirotaa olaanaadha.
translated: Qorannoon Chaayinaa fi Xaaliyaanii keessatti gaggeeffameen duuti dhiirota irratti ol’aanaadha.

sourceString: The highest risk for men is in their 50s, with the gap between men and women closing only at 90.
targetString: Dhirootaaf balaa olaanaan waggaa 50 keessa yoo jiraatanidha, garaagarummaan dhiiraa fi dhalaa waggaa 90 tti bada.
translated: Balaan guddaan dhiirotaaf mudatu umrii 50 keessa yoo ta'u, qaawwi dhiiraa fi dubartoota gidduu jiru 90 qofa irratti cufama.

sourceString: In China, the death rate was 2.8 percent for men and 1.7 percent for women.
targetString: Chaayinaa keessatti hammi du’a dhiiraa parsantii 2.8 fi kan dubaraa dhibbeentaa 1.7 dha.
translated: Chaayinaatti dhiironni dhibbeentaa 2.8, dubartoonni ammoo dhibbeentaa 1.7 ta’uu ibsameera.

sourceString: The exact reasons for this sex-difference is not known, but genetic and behavioural factors could be a reason.
targetString: Sababii sirriin garaagarummaa kornaayaa kun hin beekamu, garuu garaagarummaan jiiniitiifi amalaa sababa ta’uu danda’a.
translated: Sababni sirrii garaagarummaa saalaa kanaa hin beekamu, garuu sababoonni jeneetikii fi amala sababa ta'uu danda'u.

sourceString: Sex-based immunological differences, lesser prevalence of smoking in women and men developing co-morbid conditions such as hypertension at a younger age than women could have contributed to the higher mortality in men.
targetString: Garaagarummaan madiinumma saala irratti hundaa’e, sigaaraa aarsuun dubartoota irratti xiqqaachuun fi dhiironni sadarkaa dargagummaatti dubartoota caalaa amala cinqamuu agarsiisuun du’aatiin dhiiraa kan dubartootaa caalaa akka dabalu taasise.
translated: Garaagarummaan ittisa dhibee saalaa irratti hundaa’e, dubartootaa fi dhiirota umurii xiqqaatti haalawwan dhukkuba waliin dhufan kan akka dhiibbaa dhiigaa dubartoota caalaa qaban keessatti tamboo xuuxuu xiqqaa ta’uun isaa du’a dhiirota irratti ol’aanaa ta’eef gumaachuu danda’a ture.

sourceString: In Europe, 57% of the infected individuals were men and 72% of those died with COVID-19 were men.
targetString: Awurooppaa keessatti namoota faalaman keessaa dhibbeentaan 57 dhiirota turan, namoota COVID-19 dhaan lubbuun isaanii darbe keessaa ammoo dhibbeentaan 72 dhiirota.
translated: Awurooppaatti namoota vaayirasichaan qabaman keessaa %57 dhiirota yoo ta’u, kanneen COVID-19n du’an keessaa %72 dhiirota.

sourceString: As of April 2020, the US government is not tracking sex-related data of COVID-19 infections.
targetString: Akka ebla 2020tti mootummaan US dhukkubsattoota sababa walqunnamatii saalaatiin COVID-19’n qabaman hin arganne.
translated: Ebla bara 2020 irraa eegalee mootummaan Ameerikaa ragaa saalqunnamtii waliin walqabatu namoota COVID-19 qabaman hordofaa hin jiru.

sourceString: Research has shown that viral illnesses like Ebola, HIV, influenza and SARS affect men and women differently.
targetString: Akka qorannoon agarsiisutti dhukkubni vaayirasii kanneen akka Iiboolaa, HIV, infuluweenzaa fi SARS miidhaan isaan dhiiraa fi dubara irraan gahan garaagarummaa qaba.
translated: Dhukkuboonni vaayirasii kanneen akka Iboolaa, HIV, infuleenzaa fi SARS dhiiraa fi dubartoota haala adda addaatiin akka miidhan qorannoon ni mul’isa.

sourceString: A higher percentage of health workers, particularly nurses, are women, and they have a higher chance of being exposed to the virus.
targetString: Hojjattoonni fayyaa parsantiin hedduun, keessattu narsoonni, dubartoota, kanaafis carraa dhukkubaaf saaxilamuu olaanaa qabu.
translated: Hojjettoonni fayyaa, keessattuu narsoonni dhibbeentaan ol’aanaan dubartoota, carraan vaayirasichaaf saaxilamuu isaanii ol’aanaadha.

sourceString: The World Health Organization announced on 11 February 2020 that the official name of the disease would be "COVID-19".
targetString: Maqaan seeraa dhukkubichaa "COVID-19" akka ta’u dhaabbanni fayyaa addunyaa Gurraandhala 11 2020 murteesse.
translated: Dhaabbanni Fayyaa Addunyaa Fulbaana 11 bara 2020 maqaan ofiisaa dhukkuba kanaa "COVID-19" akka ta'u beeksiseera.

sourceString: WHO chief Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus explained that CO stands for corona, VI for virus, D for disease, and 19 for when the outbreak was first identified: 31 December 2019.
targetString: Akka hogganaan dhaabbata fayyaa addunyaa Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus ibsanitti CO’n corona bakka bu’a, VI’n virus bakka bu’a, D’n disease bakka yoo bu’u, 19 yeroo dhukkubichi jalqaba itti eegale, muddee 31, 2019 bakka bu’a.
translated: Hogganaan WHO Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus CO jechuun koroonaa, VI vaayirasii, D dhukkuba, 19 ammoo yeroo weerarri kun jalqaba adda baafame: 31 December 2019 jechuun ibsaniiru.

sourceString: The name had been chosen to avoid references to a specific geographical location (e.g. China), animal species or group of people, in line with international recommendations for naming aimed at preventing stigmatisation.The virus that causes COVID-19 is named severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2).
targetString: Maqaan isaa kan filatame kallattii murtaa’e irratti akka hin fudhatamne hamisuuf (fakkeenyaaf chaayinaa), gosa bineensotaa yookaan garee namootaattis akka hin murtoofneef tooftaalee maqeessuu biyyoolessaatti fayyadamuun istiigmatayizeeshii ittisuudhaaf kan moggaafameedha. Vaayirasiin COVID-19 fidu severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2) jedhamee moggaafameef.
translated: Maqaan kun kan filatame bakka teessuma lafaa murtaa'e (fkn Chaayinaa), gosa bineensotaa ykn garee namootaa akka hin eeramneef, yaada moggaasa idil-addunyaa maqaa balleessuu ittisuuf kaayyeffate waliin walsimsiisuuf.Vaayirasiin COVID-19 fidu severe acute respiratory syndrome jedhama koronaa vaayirasii 2 (SARS-CoV-2) jedhamuun beekama.

sourceString: The WHO additionally uses "the COVID-19 virus" and "the virus responsible for COVID-19" in public communications.
targetString: Dhaabbanni Fayyaa Addunyaa quunnamtii uummataa keessatti “vaayirasii COVID-19” fi “vaayirasii COVID-19 fidu” dabalataan fayyadama.
translated: WHO dabalataan "vaayirasii COVID-19" fi "vaayirasii COVID-19f itti gaafatamummaa qabu" qunnamtii ummataa keessatti fayyadama.

sourceString: Both the disease and virus are commonly referred to as "coronavirus".
targetString: Vaayirasichii fi dhukkubichis lamaanuu bakka tokkotti “koroonaa vaayiras” jedhmu.
translated: Dhukkubni fi vaayirasiin lamaan isaanii iyyuu yeroo baay'ee "vaayirasii koroonaa" jedhamuun waamamu.

sourceString: During the initial outbreak in Wuhan, China, the virus and disease were commonly referred to as "coronavirus" and "Wuhan coronavirus".
targetString: Yeroo dhukkubichi Wuhaan, Chaayinaa keessatti eegale keessatti, vaayirasichis dhukkubichis “koroonaa vaayiras” fi “Koroonaa vaayirasii Wuhaan” jechuun beekamu turan.
translated: Yeroo weerarri jalqabaa Chaayinaa Wuhaan keessatti mul'ate vaayirasichaa fi dhukkubni kun yeroo baay'ee "vaayirasii koroonaa" fi "vaayirasii Wuhaan" jedhamuun waamamu ture.

sourceString: In January 2020, WHO recommended 2019-nCov and 2019-nCoV acute respiratory disease as interim names for the virus and disease in accordance with 2015 guidance against using locations in disease and virus names.
targetString: Amajjii 2020tti, dhaabbanni fayyaa addunyaa qajelfama bara 2015 irratti hundaa’uun fi maqaa fi naannoo itti argamu irratti hundaa’uun maqaa 2019-nCov fi 2019-nCov cimaa jedhamu dhiheessee.
translated: Guraandhala bara 2020 keessa WHOn akkaataa qajeelfama bara 2015 maqaa dhukkubaa fi vaayirasii keessatti iddoowwan itti fayyadamuu irraa baheen dhukkuba sirna hargansuu cimaa 2019-nCov fi 2019-nCoV maqaa yeroo vaayirasichaa fi dhukkuba akka ta’u yaada dhiyeessee ture.

sourceString: The official names COVID-19 and SARS-CoV-2 were issued on 11 February 2020.
targetString: Maqaaleen seeraa COVID-19 fi SARS-CoV-2 Gurraandhala 11, 2020 itti moogafame.
translated: Maqaan ofiisaa COVID-19 fi SARS-CoV-2 Fulbaana 11 bara 2020 bahe.

sourceString: Due to capacity limitations in the standard supply chains, some digital manufacturers are printing healthcare material such as nasal swabs and ventilator parts.
targetString: Hanqina humnaa sirna dhiheessaa keessa jiruun dhaabbileen oomisha dijiitaalaa tokko tokko meeshaalee fayyaa kanneen akka qulqulleessituu funyaanii fi veentileetarii oomishaa jiru.
translated: Sababa dandeettii dhiyeessii istaandaardii keessatti mul’atuun oomishtoonni dijitaalaa tokko tokko meeshaalee eegumsa fayyaa kanneen akka hidhii fi kutaalee veentileetara maxxansaa jiru.

sourceString: In one example, when an Italian hospital urgently required a ventilator valve, and the supplier was unable to deliver in the timescale required, a local startup reverse-engineered and printed the required 100 valves overnight.
targetString: Fakkeenya tokko keessatti, hospitaalli biyya Xaaliyaanii tokko yemmuu inni atattamaan vaalvii veentileetaraa barbaadee dhiyeessaan yeroo barbaadamu keessatti dhiyeessuu dadhabe, warshaan naannoo sanaa tokko vaalvii warshaa biraa qorachuun halkan tokkotti vaalviiwwan barbaachisan 100 oomishee bule.
translated: Fakkeenya tokko keessatti, hospitaalli Xaaliyaanii tokko hatattamaan valve veentileetara yeroo barbaadu, fi dhiyeessaan yeroo barbaadame keessatti geessuu dadhabe, dhaabbati biyya keessaa tokko jalqabbii biyya keessaa tokko valve 100 barbaachisu halkan tokkotti duubatti deebisee maxxansee ture.

sourceString: After the initial outbreak of COVID-19, conspiracy theories, misinformation and disinformation emerged regarding the origin, scale, prevention, treatment and other aspects of the disease and rapidly spread online.
targetString: Ka’umsa jalqabaa COVID-19 booda, katabbiiwwan to’annoo, hundeeffamasaan walqabatee odeeffannoo dhabuu, iskeelii, ittisa, yaalii fi gama dhukkubichaa biroo fi faffaca’iinsa ariitii.
translated: Erga weerara COVID-19 jalqabaa booda ka’umsa, guddina, ittisa, wal’aansaa fi gama biroo dhibee kanaa ilaalchisee yaadonni shiraa, odeeffannoo dogoggoraa fi odeeffannoo sobaa mul’atuun saffisaan toora interneetii irratti babal’ataniiru.

sourceString: Humans appear to be capable of spreading the virus to some other animals.
targetString: Namni bineensa biraattis dhukkubicha daddabarsuu akka danda’u irra gahamee jira.
translated: Ilmaan namootaa bineensota biroo tokko tokkotti vaayirasicha babal'isuuf dandeettii kan qaban fakkaatu.

sourceString: The study failed to find evidence of viral replication in pigs, ducks, and chickens.
targetString: Qorannochi booyyee, daakiyyee fi lukkuu keessatti vaayirasiin wal horuu isaatiif ragaa argachuu hindandeenye.
translated: Qorannoon kun ragaa baay'ina vaayirasiin allaattii, hantuutaa fi hanqaaquu irratti argamu argachuu hin dandeenye.

sourceString: No medications or vaccine is approved to treat the disease.
targetString: Dhukkubicha yaaluuf daawaan yookaan talaalliin mirkanaa’ee hinjiru.
translated: Qorichi ykn talaalliin dhibee kana yaaluuf hin hayyamamu.

sourceString: International research on vaccines and medicines in COVID-19 are underway by government organisations, academic groups and industry researchers.
targetString: Talaallii fi daawaa COVID-19 irratti qo’annoon idil addunyaa dhaabbilee mootummaa, gareewwan hayyootaa fi qorattoota indaastiriitiin adeemsifamaa jira.
translated: Qorannoo idil-addunyaa talaallii fi dawaa COVID-19 irratti dhaabbilee mootummaa, gareewwan barnootaa fi qorattoota industiriitiin gaggeeffamaa jira.

sourceString: In March, the World Health Organization initiated the "SOLIDARITY Trial" to assess treatment effects of four existing antiviral compounds with the most promise of efficacy.
targetString: Bitootessa keessa, bu’aa yaalii farra vaayirasii qophaa’ee jiruu, kanneen bu’a-qabeessummaan isaanii olaanaadha jedhamanii abdatamanii gamaaggamuuf Dhaabbati Fayyaa Addunyaa “Yaalii TOKKUMMAA” eegale.
translated: Ji'a Sadaasaa keessa Dhaabbanni Fayyaa Addunyaa bu'aa wal'aansa kompaawundoota farra vaayirasii afur kanneen bu'a qabeessummaaf waadaa guddaa qaban madaaluuf "SOLIDARITY Trial" jalqabe.

sourceString: There is no available vaccine, but various agencies are actively developing vaccine candidates.
targetString: Talaalli argame hin jiru, garuu dhaabbileen hedduun talaallii isaa irratti hojjachaa jiru.
translated: Talaalliin argamu hin jiru, garuu dhaabbileen adda addaa kaadhimamaa talaallii dammaqinaan qopheessaa jiru.

sourceString: Previous work on SARS-CoV is being utilised because SARS-CoV and SARS-CoV-2 both use the ACE2 receptor to enter human cells.
targetString: Qorannoon kanaan dura SARS-CoV irratti adeemsifame dhimma itti ba’amaa jira, sababiin isaas SARS-CoV fi SARS-CoV-2n lachan isaanii risaptarii ACE2 fayyadamuudhaan seeliiwwan namaa seenu.
translated: Hojiin kanaan dura SARS-CoV irratti hojjetame fayyadamaa jira sababiin isaas SARS-CoV fi SARS-CoV-2 lamaan isaanii iyyuu seelii namaa seenuuf fudhataa ACE2 fayyadamu.

sourceString: There are three vaccination strategies being investigated.
targetString: Malawwan talaallii sadiitu qoratamaa jiru.
translated: Tooftaaleen talaallii sadii qoratamaa jiru.

sourceString: First, researchers aim to build a whole virus vaccine.
targetString: Jalqaba, qorattoonni talaallii vaayrasii guutuu hojjachuuf karoorfatan.
translated: Tokkoffaa, qorattoonni talaallii vaayirasii guutuu ijaaruuf kaayyeffatan.

sourceString: The use of such a virus, be it inactive or dead, aims to elicit a prompt immune response of the human body to a new infection with COVID-19.
targetString: Itti fayyadamni vaayirasii kanaa, kan humni isaa laafes ta’e du’aan isaa, deebii dandamannaa qaamni namaa faalama haaraa COVID-19 tti utuu yeroo hin fudhatin agarsiisu keessaa baasuu irratti xiyyeeffata.
translated: Fayyadamni vaayirasii akkasii, sochii hin qabnes ta’ee du’e, qaamni namaa infekshinii haaraa COVID-19 irratti deebii ittisa qaamaa ariifataa fiduuf kan akeekedha.

sourceString: A second strategy, subunit vaccines, aims to create a vaccine that sensitises the immune system to certain subunits of the virus.
targetString: Malli lammaffaan, talaalliiwwan qaamolee jaloo, talaallii malli dhukkuba ittisuu akka inni qaamolee jaloo vaayiresichaa adda baafatuuf gargaaru uumuudha.
translated: Tarsiimoon lammataa, talaallii subunitii, talaallii sirna ittisa qaamaa subunitii vaayirasichaa murtaa’eef miira namaa kakaasu uumuuf kan akeekedha.

sourceString: In the case of SARS-CoV-2, such research focuses on the S-spike protein that helps the virus intrude the ACE2 enzyme receptor.
targetString: SARS-CoV-2 keessatti, qo’annoon akkanaa pirootiinii essi-ispaayikii (S-spike) isa vaayirasichi akka riseeptarii eenzaayimii ACE2 keessa seenuuf gargaaru irratti xiyyeeffata.
translated: Dhimma SARS-CoV-2 irratti qorannoon akkasii pirootiinii S-spike kan vaayirasichi fudhataa inzaayimii ACE2 keessa akka seenu gargaaru irratti xiyyeeffata.

sourceString: A third strategy is that of the nucleic acid vaccines (DNA or RNA vaccines, a novel technique for creating a vaccination).
targetString: Tooftaan sadaffaan talaallii nucleic acid (talaallii DNA fi RNA, tooftaa jalqabaa talaallii uumuu).
translated: Tooftaa sadaffaan talaallii asiidii niwuukilii (talaallii DNA ykn RNA, mala haaraa talaallii uumuuf gargaaru) dha.

sourceString: Experimental vaccines from any of these strategies would have to be tested for safety and efficacy.On 16 March 2020, the first clinical trial of a vaccine started with four volunteers in Seattle.
targetString: Talaalliiwwan namarratti yaalaman kanneen malawwan kanniin irraa maddan sababoota nageenyaatii fi bu’a qabeessummaatiif jedhanii qoratamuu qabu. Bitootessa 16, 2020 yaaliin talaallii dhukkubsataa irrattii inni jalqabaa Siyaatil keessatti namoota fedhiidhaan itti hirmaatan afur irratti eegalame.
translated: Talaalliin yaalii tooftaalee kana keessaa kamirraayyuu nageenyaafi bu’a qabeessummaa isaaf qoratamuu qaba ture.Amajjii 16 bara 2020 yaaliin kilinikaa jalqabaa talaallii tokkoo tola ooltota afur waliin Siyaatil keessatti eegale.

sourceString: The vaccine contains a harmless genetic code copied from the virus that causes the disease.Antibody dependent enhancement has been suggested as a potential challenge for vaccine development for SARS-COV-2, but this is controversial.
targetString: Talaalliin jeneetik koodii miidhaa hin qabne kan vaayirasicha dhibee fidu irraa fudhatame of keessaa qaba. Fooyya’iinsi farra qaama alaagaa uumamaa irratti hundaa’e kan talaallii SARS-COV-2 oomishuuf oolu akka dhiibbaa cimaatti ilaalama. Garuu kun mormisiisaadha.
translated: Talaalliin kun koodii jeneetikii miidhaa hin qabne kan vaayirasii dhukkuba kana fidu irraa waraabame of keessaa qaba.Foyya'iinsi farra qaamaa irratti hirkataa ta'uun talaallii SARS-COV-2 qopheessuuf qormaata ta'uu danda'a jedhamee yaadameera, garuu kun falmisiisaa dha.

sourceString: There are more than 300 active clinical trials underway as of April 2020.
targetString: Akka ebla 2020tti yaaliiwaan 300 caalaan kilinika keessatti taasifamaa jiru.
translated: Hanga Ebla 2020tti yaaliin kilinikaa sochiirra jiru 300 ol taasifamaa jira.

sourceString: Seven trials were evaluating already approved treatments for malaria, including four studies on hydroxychloroquine or chloroquine.
targetString: Yaaliiwwan torba, qorannoowwan afur haadirooksiikiloorookuwiinii yookaan kiloorookuwiinii irratti adeemsifaman dabalatee, qorichoota busaa hanga ammaatti mirkaneeffaman qeeqaa turan.
translated: Yaaliin torba yaaliiwwan dhukkuba busaa duraan mirkanaa'an madaalaa turan, kanneen keessaa qorannoowwan afur haayidirooksiikiloorookiinii ykn kiloorookiin irratti.

sourceString: Repurposed antiviral drugs make up most of the Chinese research, with nine phase III trials on remdesivir across several countries due to report by the end of April.
targetString: Qorannoowwan Chaayinaa harki caalaan isaanii sababa gabaasa xumura Eblaarraa kan ka’e biyyoota hedduu keessatti remdesivir irratti yaaliiwwan sagal marsaa III qaban wajjin qoricha farra vaayirasii deebisanii kaayyoo biraatiif hojjechuu irratti xiyyeeffatu.
translated: Qorichootni farra vaayirasii irra deebiin kaayyoof oolan qorannoo Chaayinaa keessaa harka caalu kan ta’an yoo ta’u, yaaliin marsaa III sagal biyyoota hedduu keessatti remdesivir irratti dhuma baatii Eblaatti gabaafamuu qaba.

sourceString: A dynamic review of clinical development for COVID-19 vaccine and drug candidates was in place, as of April 2020.Several existing antiviral medications are being evaluated for treatment of COVID-19, including remdesivir, chloroquine and hydroxychloroquine, lopinavir/ritonavir and lopinavir/ritonavir combined with interferon beta.
targetString: Adeemsi talaallii fi qoricha COVID-19 uumuu kilinika keessa jira. Akka ebla 2020tti qorichoonni farra vaayirasii kanaan dura jiran kannen akka remdesiviir, kiloorookiin fi haydirooksiikiloorookiin, lopinaavir/ riitonaaviir fi lopinaavir/ riitonaaviir interferoon wajjiin walitti makamuun yaala COVID-19’tiif qoratamanii jiru.
translated: Gamaaggamni daayinamikii misooma kilinikaa talaallii fi kaadhimamaa qoricha COVID-19 hojiirra oolaa ture, hanga Ebla 2020. Qorichootni farra vaayirasii amma jiran hedduun wal’aansa COVID-19f madaalamaa jiru, kanneen akka remdesivir, chloroquine fi hydroxychloroquine, lopinavir/ritonavir fi lopinavir/ dabalatee. ritonavir interferon beta waliin walitti makame.

sourceString: There is tentative evidence for efficacy by remdesivir, as of March 2020.
targetString: Ragaan dhaabbataa hin taane kan Reemdesiivir bitootessa 2020 dhiheesse jira.
translated: Ragaan yeroof bu'a qabeessummaa remdesivir jira, Amajjii 2020 irraa eegalee.

sourceString: Clinical improvement was observed in patients treated with compassionate-use remdesivir.
targetString: Dhukkubsattoota dhimmamanii ‘remdesivir’ fayyadaman irratti mallattoon fooyya’iinsaa mul’atee jira.
translated: Dhukkubsattoota remdesivir gara laafina-fayyadamaatti yaalaman irratti fooyya’iinsi kilinikaa mul’ateera.

sourceString: Phase III clinical trials are being conducted in the US, China and Italy.Chloroquine, previously used to treat malaria, was studied in China in February 2020, with preliminary results.
targetString: Yaalii kilinikaa sadaffaan US, Chaayinaa fi Xaaliyaaniitti gaggeeffame. Kiloorookuwiin duraan malariyaa waldhaanuuf itti fayyadamnu kan qo’atame Chaayinaatti Gurraandhala 2020 dha.
translated: Yaaliin kilinikaa marsaa III Ameerikaa, Chaayinaa fi Xaaliyaanii keessatti gaggeeffamaa jira.Kiloorookiin, kanaan dura dhukkuba busaa yaaluuf kan oolu yoo ta’u, Bitootessa 2020 Chaayinaa keessatti qoratamee, bu’aa duraa argateera.

sourceString: However, there are calls for peer review of the research.
targetString: Gama biraatiin irra durduubee qorannootiif waamichatu jira.
translated: Haa ta’u malee, qorannicha gamaaggama hiriyaatiin akka godhamu waamichi ni jira.

sourceString: Korean and Chinese Health Authorities recommend the use of chloroquine.
targetString: Aangawoonni fayyaa kooriyaa fi chaayinaa bu’a qabeessummaa kiloorookuwiinii himaniiru.
translated: Abbaan Taayitaa Fayyaa Kooriyaa fi Chaayinaa kiloorookiin akka fayyadaman gorsu.

sourceString: However, the Wuhan Institute of Virology, while recommending a daily dose of one gram, notes that twice that dose is highly dangerous and could be lethal.
targetString: Haa ta’u malee, Dhaabbati Vaayirooloojii Wuhaan, guyyaa guyyaatti hamma fudhannaa giraama tokko utuma gorsuu, hammi fudhannaa harka lama yoo ta’e balaa hamaa hanga du’aatti nama geessuu danda’u qabaachuu isaa yaadachiisa.
translated: Haa ta'u malee, Inistiitiyuutiin Vaayirasii Wuhaan, doosiin guyyaatti giraama tokko akka kennamu yoo gorsu, doosiin sun dachaa lama balaa guddaa akka qabuu fi lubbuu namaa galaafachuu akka danda'u hubata.

sourceString: On 28 March 2020, the FDA issued an emergency use authorisation for hydroxychloroquine and chloroquine at the discretion of physicians treating people with COVID-19.The Chinese 7th edition guidelines also include interferon, ribavirin or umifenovir for use against COVID-19.
targetString: Bitootessa 28, 2020tti kunuunsa namoota COVID-19 qabamaniif FDA’n haydirooksikiloorookiin fi kiloorookiin hayyama gaafata. Maxxansi 7ffaan qajeelfama chaayinootaas interfiroonii, riibaviriinii yookaan yumiifenoviir ittisa COVID-19’f itti fayyadama.
translated: Amajjii 28 bara 2020 FDAn hayyama itti fayyadama hatattamaa haayidirooksiikiloorookiinii fi kiloorookiin akka murtoo hakiimota namoota COVID-19n qabaman yaalanitti kenneera.Qajeelfamni Chaayinaa maxxansa 7ffaa keessattis interferon, ribavirin ykn umifenovir COVID-19 irratti akka fayyadamaniif ni dabalata.

sourceString: Preliminary data indicate that high doses of ribavirin are necessary to inhibit SARS-CoV-2 in vitro.
targetString: Odeeffannoon wixineerra jiru akka ibsutti riibaviriin humnaa ol fayyadamuun dhuujummoo qorannaa keessatti amalli SARS-CoV-2 akka mul’atu taasisa.
translated: Daataan jalqabaa akka agarsiisutti SARS-CoV-2 in vitro dhorkuuf ribavirin doosiin olaanaan barbaachisaadha.

sourceString: Nitazoxanide has been recommended for further in vivo study after demonstrating low concentration inhibition of SARS-CoV-2.Studies have demonstrated that initial spike protein priming by transmembrane protease serine 2 (TMPRSS2) is essential for entry of SARS-CoV-2 via interaction with the ACE2 receptor.
targetString: Naataazozaniid qorannoo SARS-CoV-2’tiif dabalataan ajajama. Akka qorannoowwan agarsiisanitti pirotiinii qopheessuuf oolu transmembrane protease serine 2 (TMPRSS2)’n fudhattuu ACE2 wajjiin seensa SARS-CoV-2’tiif muteessadha.
translated: Nitazoxanide qorannoo dabalataa in vivo erga agarsiisee booda inhibiishinii qindoomina gadi aanaa SARS-CoV-2.Qorannoowwan akka agarsiisanitti, jalqaba pirootiinii ispiik priming transmembrane protease serine 2 (TMPRSS2) tiin SARS-CoV-2 karaa wal-nyaatinsa waliin seenuuf barbaachisaa ta'uu isaati kan ACE2 fudhataa ta’e.

sourceString: The studies of chloroquine and hydroxychloroquine with or without azithromycin have major limitations that have prevented the medical community from embracing these therapies without further study.Oseltamivir does not inhibit SARS-CoV-2 in vitro and has no known role in COVID-19 treatment.
targetString: Qorannoowwan kiloorookuwiinii fi haayidirookiloorookuwiinii aziitiroomaayisiinii qaban yookaan hinqabne rakkoowwan guguddoo, kan hawaasi fayyaa utuu qorannoon dabalataa irratti hin adeemsifamin akka qorichaatti akka hinfudhanne isaan taasise qabu. Oseltaamiviir ‘vaayitiroo’ keessatti SARS-CoV-2 hin ittisu, COVID-19 wal’aanuu keessattis ga’ee beekamaa hinqabu.
translated: Qorannoowwan kiloorookinii fi haayidirooksiikiloorookiin azithromycin waliinis ta'e osoo hin qabaatin daangeffama guddaa kan qabu yoo ta'u, kunis hawaasni yaalaa qorannoo dabalataa malee yaaliiwwan kanneen akka hin hammanne taasiseera.Oseltamivir SARS-CoV-2 in vitro hin dhorku, wal'aansa COVID-19 keessattis gahee beekamaa hin qabu.

sourceString: Cytokine storm can be a complication in the later stages of severe COVID-19.
targetString: Buubbeen saayitookin (cytokine storm) dhibee dabalataa sadarkaalee dhumaa COVID-19 isa ammaataa ta’uu danda’a.
translated: Obomboleettiin saayitookinii sadarkaa boodaa COVID-19 hamaa keessatti rakkoo ta’uu danda’a.

sourceString: There is evidence that hydroxychloroquine may have anti-cytokine storm properties.Tocilizumab has been included in treatment guidelines by China's National Health Commission after a small study was completed.
targetString: Haaydrookilooriiniin amaloota farra saaytookiinii qabaachuu akka danda’u ragaan jira. Erga qorannoon salphaan gaggeeffameen booda Tocilizumab’iin qajeelfama yaalaa koomishiinii fayyaa biyyaalessa chaayinaatti dabalee jira.
translated: Haayidirooksiikiloorookiin amaloota obomboleettii farra saayitookinii qabaachuu akka danda'u ragaaleen ni mul'isu.Tosilizumaab qorannoon xiqqaan erga xumuramee booda Komishinii Fayyaa Biyyaalessaa Chaayinaatiin qajeelfama wal'aansaa keessatti hammatameera.

sourceString: It is undergoing a phase 2 non randomised test at the national level in Italy after showing positive results in people with severe disease.
targetString: Erga nama sadarkaa hamaatti dhukkubsate irratti mallattoon argameen booda Xaaliyaanitti qorannoon marsaa 2ffaan sadarkaa biyyaalessaatti gaggeeffamaa jira.
translated: Namoota dhukkuba cimaa qaban irratti bu'aa gaarii erga agarsiisee booda sadarkaa biyyaatti Xaaliyaaniitti qorannoo marsaa 2ffaa (non randomized test) taasifamaa jira.

sourceString: Combined with a serum ferritin blood test to identify cytokine storms, it is meant to counter such developments, which are thought to be the cause of death in some affected people.
targetString: Qorannoo dhangala’aa ferritinii dhiigaa wajjiin walitti makamuun saaytookinii adda baasuuf oola, kana jechuun adeemsa namoota dhukkubsatan tokko tokko ni ajjeesa jedhamee yaadamu hambisa.
translated: Qormaata dhiigaa seerumi feeritiinii obomboleettii saayitookinii adda baasuuf godhamu waliin yoo walqabate, guddina akkasii kan namoota dhibee kanaan qabaman tokko tokko irratti sababa du'aa ta'a jedhamee yaadamu ofirraa ittisuuf kan yaadamedha.

sourceString: The interleukin-6 receptor antagonist was approved by the FDA based on retrospective case studies for treatment of steroid refractory cytokine release syndrome induced by a different cause, CAR T cell therapy, in 2017.
targetString: Fudhataan faallessaa interluukiin – 6 FDA’n kan mirkanaa’e qo’annoo yaalaa gosa mallattoo stirooyidii saayirookiinii duraa sababa garaagaraatiin dhufu yaala seelii CAR T bara 2017tti.
translated: Antaagonistiin fudhataa interliyuukin-6 kun qorannoo haala duubatti deebi’ee ilaaluu irratti hundaa’uun wal’aansa siindiroomii isteeroyidii refractory cytokine release syndrome sababa adda ta’een, CAR T cell therapy, kakaafame irratti hundaa’uun bara 2017tti mirkanaa’eera.

sourceString: To date, there is no randomised, controlled evidence that tocilizumab is an efficacious treatment for CRS.
targetString: Ammatti ragaan qindaa’aan toolikizumaab yaala CRS’f ni oola jedhu hin jiru.
translated: Hanga ammaatti, ragaan tasaa, to’atame kan tocilizumab yaala CRS bu’a qabeessa ta’uu isaa agarsiisu hin jiru.

sourceString: Transferring purified and concentrated antibodies produced by the immune systems of those who have recovered from COVID-19 to people who need them is being investigated as a non-vaccine method of passive immunisation.
targetString: Namoota COVID-19 irraa fayyan irraa pirootiiniiwwan dhiigaa dhukkuba ittisan, kanneen calalamanii fi walitti tuuta’an fuudhanii gara namoota barbaadaniitti dabarsuun akka mala al-talaallii karaa seelii dadhabsiifameen dhukkuba ittisuutti qoratamaa jira.
translated: Farra qaamaa qulqullaa’ee fi qindaa’e kan sirna ittisa qaamaa namoota COVID-19 irraa bayyanatamaniin oomishaman gara namoota isaan barbaadanitti dabarsuun akka mala talaallii ala ta’ee (passive talaallii) ta’ee qoratamaa jira.

sourceString: This strategy was tried for SARS with inconclusive results.
targetString: Tooftaan kun firii hin xumuramin qabaatus SARS’f yaalame.
translated: Tooftaan kun SARS'f yaalamee bu'aa murteessaa hin arganne.

sourceString: Viral neutralisation is the anticipated mechanism of action by which passive antibody therapy can mediate defence against SARS-CoV-2.
targetString: Vaayirasii balleessuun tooftaa gocha ittisa qaamaa teeraappiin ittisa faallaa SARS-CoV-2 itti wal simsiisuudha.
translated: Vaayirasii niwutraalaayizeeshiniin mala gochaa eegamu kan yaaliin farra qaamaa dabarsoo ittisa SARS-CoV-2 gidduu galeessa ta’uu danda’uudha.

sourceString: Other mechanisms however, such as antibody-dependent cellular cytotoxicity and/or phagocytosis, may be possible.
targetString: Ta’us tooftaaleen biro kanneen akka ittisa qaamaa- kan manca’uu seelii irratti hundaa’u cytotoxicity fi phagocytosis fa’a ni danda’amu.
translated: Malli biroo garuu, kan akka farra qaama irratti hirkate saayitootoksiisii seelii fi/ykn faagosaayitoosii, ta’uu danda’a.

sourceString: Other forms of passive antibody therapy, for example, using manufactured monoclonal antibodies, are in development.
targetString: Karaan yaala antiiboodii biraa, fakkeenyaaf monokolinaal antibodii warshaatti oomishame fayyadamuu qophaa’aa jiru.
translated: Gosoonni yaala farra qaamaa dabarsoo biroo, fakkeenyaaf, farra qaama monokloonal oomishame fayyadamuun, qophaa’aa jiru.

sourceString: Production of convalescent serum, which consists of the liquid portion of the blood from recovered patients and contains antibodies specific to this virus, could be increased for quicker deployment.
targetString: Seeramii dandamataan, inni bishaan dhiigaa dhukkubsattoota fooyya’anii of keessaa qabuu fi pirootiiniiwwan addumaan vaayirasii kana ittisan of keessaa qabu, ramaddii atattamaatiif oomishi isaa guddachuu danda’a.
translated: Omishni seerumi fayyinaa, kan kutaa dhangala'aa dhiiga dhukkubsattoota fayyan irraa argamu of keessaa qabuu fi farra qaama vaayirasii kanaaf adda ta'e of keessaa qabu, saffisaan bobba'uuf dabaluu danda'a.

sourceString: Coronavirus diseases, a group of closely related syndromes
targetString: Dhukkuboota vaayirasii koroonaa, garee mallattoolee walitti dhiyaatanii
translated: Dhukkuboota vaayirasii koroonaa, garee siindiroomii walitti dhiyeenyaan walqabatan

sourceString: Li Wenliang, a doctor at Central Hospital of Wuhan, who later contracted and died of COVID-19 after raising awareness of the spread of the virus.
targetString: Lii Weenliyaangi, ogeessi fayyaa Hospitaala Seentiraal kan Wuhaan, tatamsa’ina vaayirasichaarratti hubannoo namootaa guddisee booda COVID-19 dhaan qabamee du’e.
translated: Doktarri Hospitaala Giddugaleessaa Wuhaan kan ta'e Li Wenliang, boodarra COVID-19n qabamee erga tatamsa'ina vaayirasichaa irratti hubannoo uumtee booda du'e.
